string: アミュレットはそのままもらっていいのか？

original: I need training for Two-Handed weapons.
string: 両手武器の訓練を受けたい

original: Arkay says you'll be facing warlocks.
string: アーケイによれば、敵はウォーロックだ

original: Any advice for a new vampire hunter?
string: 新米の吸血鬼ハンターに助言は？

original: We have a happy life together.
string: 一緒に暮らせて幸せだ

original: Let's go.
string: 行きましょう

original: By ensuring the Chalice reaches our Lord, you have increased his power over them, and at the same time deprived them of their little pets.
string: お前は我らの主へ聖杯を確実に届ける事で、彼らに対する主の支配力を強め、同時に彼らの小さなペットを剥奪した

original: They say if a vampire so much as scratches you, you'll turn into one. That better not be true.
string: 吸血鬼にひっかかれただけで吸血鬼へと変わると言う。真実じゃないといいがな

original: Let's finish this!
string: 終わらせてやる！

original: Where can I learn more about magic?
string: 魔法を学ぶには、どこに行けばいい？

original: Careful now... this area's not stable.
string: 用心して… この場所は不安定だ

original: No matter how long I've been here, I'll still never get used to this place.
string: どれだけ長くここにいようと、決してこの場所には慣れないわ

original: All I needed was the blood of a vampire and his own weapon, Auriel's Bow.
string: 必要なものは吸血鬼の血液と、その武器であるアーリエルの弓だけだった

original: Then I see nothing preventing my return to Tamriel.
string: では私のタムリエルへの帰還を妨げるものはないわ

original: Soon... soon your blood will be mine...
string: すぐに… すぐにお前の血は私のものになる…

original: Hmm, I suppose I can work with your face. After all, the sculptor cannot always choose the finest clay.
string: ふむ、あなたの顔を何とかできそうね。結局、彫刻家がいつも最高の土を選べるわけじゃないもの

original: Isran's at Fort Dawnguard.
string: イスランはドーンガード砦にいる

original: I will find you...
string: 見つけてやる…

original: We're not close anymore.
string: お互いの距離が離れてしまった

original: Very well.
string: よろしい

original: He's a priest of Arkay. Well, he was. It's... it's complicated.
string: 彼はアーケイの僧侶なの。今は違うけど… 複雑な事情でね

original: I found you equally worthy.
string: こちらも互角の相手だと感じた

original: Although I would gladly die by your hand, perhaps I could offer an alternative way to read the scrolls?
string: あなた様の手にかかって死ぬのは本望ですが、書を読む別の方法をできれば教えて差し上げたいです

original: What do you do here?
string: ここではどんな役目を？

original: Light armor. (25 husks)
string: 軽装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: And I have half a mind to tell Lokil of your disloyalty.
string: 半ば、ロキルにお前の不実を伝えたくなってくるよ

original: I offer you my blood. Take it, and you will walk as a lion among sheep. Men will tremble at your approach, and you will never fear death again.
string: 私自身の血だ。これを得れば羊達の間を狼として歩め、近づけば人々がふるえ上がる事だろう。死を恐れる必要もなくなる

original: Can you teach me to be a better Marksman?
string: より良い射手になれるよう訓練してほしい

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈るわ

original: Now where is it I'm supposed to be going?
string: それで、どこに向かえばいいのかしら？

original: It's... well, it's about me. And the Elder Scroll that was buried with me.
string: 話は… わたしの事、および、一緒に埋まっていた星霜の書の事なのですが…

original: <Alias=Candidate> has been welcomed to the family.
string: <Alias=Candidate>が血を分けた家族となった

original: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
string: ソウル・ケルンを旅した事で、あなたの身体はかの地に同調したの

original: They didn't tell you she was immortal.
string: 不死身だとは聞いてなかったんだな

original: New recruits? Hmm.
string: 新入りだと？ ほう

original: I'll scatter your ashes myself!
string: 風に舞う塵となれ！

original: How many more?
string: 残りいくつだろうか？

original: Yes?
string: はい？

original: Isran knows how to fight those monsters. He's been preparing for this day for a long time.
string: イスランはあの怪物どもとの戦い方を知っている。長い間この日に備えてきたんだ

original: You can use my coffin whenever you like.
string: 私の棺はいつでも使ってちょうだい

original: Time has very little meaning to me. Consequently, it has little meaning to the Ideal Masters as well.
string: 時間は私にとってほぼ無意味。それゆえに、アイディール・マスターにとってもほぼ無意味なの

original: I suggest you have Serana change you back. At once.
string: セラーナに頼んで元に戻してもらうといい。直ちにな

original: What now?
string: 次はどうする？

original: Hmmm. Not bad. We'd better hope that's good enough. Mistakes with these kinds of portals can be... gruesome.
string: あらまあ、悪くないですわね。それで事足りると願いたいですわ。こういった転移門で手違いをしてしまうと… それはおぞましい結果になる事がございますのよ

original: Let me know if you need anything.
string: 困った時は言ってほしい

original: May Auri-El's radiance fill your heart with joy.
string: アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たさん事を

original: I have to admit, I'm impressed. I didn't think you had the spirit for it.
string: 正直なところ、感心いたしましたわ。そんな度胸はないと思っておりましたもの

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: I don't have time for this.
string: そんな暇はない

original: Don't get in my way, and I won't tear your arms off. Simple, isn't it?
string: 邪魔をしなければ両腕を引き千切らないでやる。簡単だろう？

original: Is this... some kind of a joke? Did Arkay put you up to this?
string: それは… 何かの冗談か？ アーケイにそうしろと言われたのか？

original: Afraid my memory can't be bought with what you've got there.
string: 悪いけどそこに持っているものでは記憶がよみがえらないな

original: For the first time in a long while, I think I - we - may actually be able to do this. And... and I owe it all to you. Thank you.
string: この長い間で初めて、あたしが… あたし達が… 本当に成し遂げられる気がする。あんたのおかげだね。ありがとう

original: Then people stopped taking the threat seriously, the Dawnguard was disbanded, and the vampires came creeping back.
string: だが人々は奴らの脅威を軽視し始めた。そしてドーンガードは解散して、吸血鬼が再びはびこるようになったのだ

original: Have you been paying attention? It's obvious my father's well beyond reason.
string: ちゃんとその目は見開いていて？ わたしの父は理屈を超えた存在ですのよ

original: Harkon will reward us richly for this.
string: ハルコンはたっぷり見返りをくれるはず

original: I've never even seen this part of the castle before. Be careful. I don't know what might be around.
string: お城のこの部分には来た事がありませんの。用心なさって。何があるか分かりませんわ

original: Well, we got the knife... now all we need to do is track down one of those Canticle Trees.
string: とにかくナイフが手に入りましたわ。お次はカンティクルの木を探し当てる番ですわね

original: I guess we should head towards your family's home, then.
string: そちらの家族の住む家に向かうとしよう

original: Oh wow. This is gorgeous.
string: はわぁ… すごく豪華ですわね

original: Absolutely. I've spent a great deal of time perfecting an extract that increases the potency of soul husks.
string: その通り。魂のハスクの能力を増加するエキスを完成させるのに膨大な時間を費やしたわ

original: I know how that feels. I mean... I know it isn't the same thing. But I was a pretty lonely child, myself.
string: その気持ち、分かりますわ。もちろん… 同じだという気はございませんの。ただわたしも寂しい子供時代でしたから

original: Where do the thralls come from?
string: 下僕たちの出どころは？

original: The Empire supports Elisif, and killed Ulfric for his rebellion.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持していて、反乱を起こしたウルフリックを討伐した

original: Well, you've met most of us. My father's not exactly the most stable, and eventually he drove my mother crazy with him.
string: 会った事がおありでしょう。父があまりに頑固で、そのせいで母をひどく怒らせたのですわ

original: Rii...
string: リィ…

original: Got any ideas about the knife?
string: ナイフはどうすればいい？

original: They slaughtered everyone and stormed the Inner Sanctum where I believe they corrupted Vyrthur.
string: 皆を殺し、奴らは最奥聖域に攻め込んだ。ヴィルスールはそこで奴らの手に落ちたのだろう

original: Don't you worry about me. I've been through worse. I'll come out of this just fine.
string: 心配するな。もっとひどい状況も生き延びてきたんだ。今度も切り抜けてみせる

original: She wanted to go home, so I took her to her castle.
string: 家に帰りたがっていたので、故郷の城に連れて行った

original: But Auriel should have protected you...
string: でもアーリエルが守ってくれたはずですわよ…

original: Because she's one of them.
string: 彼女も一員だからだ

original: Can you feel it? You're now so much more than you were before.
string: 感じる？ 以前よりはるかに大きな存在になった事を

original: Well? I'm waiting.
string: で？ どうしたのだ？

original: Speak with Sorine. She has something for you.
string: ソリーヌに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: I will await your return.
string: お帰りをお待ちしております

original: Take the scroll, then be on your way.
string: 書を受け取って、行きなさい

original: Out of our way.
string: 邪魔だ

original: You said you didn't know where she went.
string: どこに行ったのかわからないと？

original: We can't waste time on cryptic clues.
string: 謎めいた手掛かりに割いている時間はない

original: This place tears at me as though I'm still alive and being drawn and quartered. I... can't stand it anymore.
string: この場所は苦しみばかり。まるでまだ生きていて、体を引き裂かれるような… これ以上は耐えられない

original: Oh. I didn't even know. Is it a happy home?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。幸せな家庭なのかしら？

original: I'm afraid he's a few years too late. I've moved on. I have more important business to attend to.
string: 数年前に言ってくれればな。あいにく新しい暮らしに移ってしまって、外せない用事がある

original: Look out! Gargoyles!
string: 気を付けて！ ガーゴイルですわ！

original: This "stranger" has done more for me in the brief time I've known her than you've done in centuries!
string: その“よそ者”の彼女は、お母様が何世紀もの間にしてくれた以上の事を、わずかな間にしてくれましたのよ！

original: So you sought the Soul Cairn for answers.
string: そのため答えを求めてソウル・ケルンに来たと

original: Sorry, maybe next time.
string: 悪いな、また今度

original: And the crystals?
string: あの水晶は？

original: Molag Bal is a powerful daedric lord, and his will is made reality.
string: モラグ・バルは強大な力を持つデイドラの王で、すべては彼の意のままなのですわ

original: Who knows, maybe it has a death wish. Maybe it's just insane. I don't really care.
string: さあな。死の願望でもあるのか、ただ頭が変なだけか… どうでもいい事だが

original: I'm ready when you are.
string: 準備はできておりますわ

original: Don't try and impress me. It only leaves you looking foolish.
string: いいところを見せようとするな。愚かに見えるだけだ

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: I have five soul husks here.
string: 魂のハスクを5個集めてきた

original: I've brought the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を持ってきた

original: A prophecy that lacked a single, final ingredient... the blood of a pure vampire. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour.
string: 予言を完成させる、最後の要素… 純粋なる吸血鬼の血液。コールドハーバーの娘の血液だ

original: Falmer up ahead.
string: ファルメルがこの先にいるよ

original: And promise me you'll keep my daughter safe. She's the only thing of value I have left.
string: そして娘の安全を守ると約束して。私に残された価値あるものは彼女だけなの

original: Well, before we spoke to my mother in the Soul Cairn, I would have said we bring the bow to my father.
string: ソウル・ケルンで母と話をする前でしたら、弓を父のところに持って行こうとわたしは言ったでしょうね

original: I wonder how long they've been like this.
string: 彼らはいつからあんなふうなのかしら

original: The skies of Keizaal are mine again!
string: ケイザールの空は再び我がものとなった！

original: Very well. I'll hurry on my way there before more of those vampires turn up.
string: 分かった。吸血鬼達がぞろぞろ現れる前にすぐそこに向かおう

original: Oh, no. No way. I'm not helping a vampire. Get out of here, get yourself cured.
string: おいおい、冗談じゃない。吸血鬼に手を貸したりするものか。ここから立ち去って、治療を受けてこい

original: Let's not waste too much time, then.
string: でしたら時間を無駄にしすぎない方がいいですわね

original: Enjoy your hunt.
string: 良い狩りを

original: The one with the ruined castle? Don't you know that place is cursed? Even seasoned sailors steer far around that place.
string: 城の廃墟がある所かい？ あの島は呪われてるのを知らないのか？ ベテランの船乗りだって避けて通る場所だぞ？

original: I'll have to think about it.
string: 考えさせてくれ

original: Was it "Having the adoration of thousands..." No, wait. I could make it "the adoration of tens of thousands."
string: 「数千人の歓呼を受けて」… いや、待った。「数万人」と書いたかも知れない

original: ...Yeah. I thought I was prepared for anything. How can you prepare for a damned earthquake?
string: …ああ。備えは万全だと思っていた。でも地震に対してどう準備できる？

original: I just hope we weren't too late.
string: 遅すぎたのでなければいいが

original: There's no need for that kind of talk. I said it was possible.
string: そのような話に意味はない。可能性があると言っただけだ

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Killing their leaders should discourage them from an out and out war with us.
string: 奴らのリーダー達を殺せば、我らとの全面戦争は思いとどまるはずだ

original: Do you know where I can find him?
string: どこに行けば会えるだろうか？

original: I figured it would be more of an issue for you.
string: むしろ、あなたの方が問題だと思っておりましたわ

original: I want us to be a family again. But I don't know if we can ever have that.
string: わたしはもう一度家族になりたい。でも、それが可能かどうかは分かりませんわ

original: Talk to Isran. He'll decide if he wants you for the Dawnguard.
string: イスランと話せ。ドーンガードに必要な人材かどうかは彼が判断する

original: Dexion didn't really give us a lot to go on, did he?
string: デキソンは大してやる事を示してくれなかったのではなくて？

original: What are you still doing here?
string: まだここで何をしているの？

original: Sounds like she was being cautious.
string: 用心していたみたいだな

original: You've been given a great gift. Do not squander it.
string: 大いなる恩恵を受けた以上、有意義に使うのだぞ

original: You ever heard of Aetherium? A rare mineral used by the dwarves.
string: エセリウムって聞いた事ある？ ドワーフの使う希少な鉱物だよ

original: What kind of beast is that? No law against it, but if that thing starts attacking people, it's getting a sword in the gullet.
string: 一体何の獣だ？ 違法ではないが、もし人を襲い始めたら喉に剣を突っ込まれるぞ

original: Brought some soul husks or are you wasting my time?
string: 魂のハスクを持ってきたのか？ それとも私の時間を無駄にしたいのか？

original: Volumes written on Durnehviir allege that he can't be slain by normal means. It appears they were mistaken.
string: ダーネヴィールの記述がある巻では、通常の手段では殺せないと断言している。間違いだったようね

original: What you probably don't know is that he still grants it to his more impressive followers.
string: ですが、彼が今でも高位の部下にその力を与えている事は、知らなかったのではなくて？

original: All I heard is that without a Septim sitting on the throne of the Empire, the Dragonfires in a place called the Temple of the One were no longer lit.
string: よくは知らんが、セプティムが玉座にいなければ、最高神の神殿という場所にあるドラゴンファイアが消えるとかいう話を聞いた

original: Can't anyone become a vampire if bitten by one?
string: 噛まれたら誰でも吸血鬼になりうるのでは？

original: I'm ready.
string: 準備はできてる

original: You're mortal? What are you doing here like that?
string: あんた定命の者かい？ こんな所で何をやってるんだ？

original: That many fewer vampires to worry about. Good work.
string: これで吸血鬼どもがだいぶ減ったな。よくやった

original: Look at the device here - the gear in the center is just about the right size. Try putting the shards in and... we'll see what happens.
string: ここの機器を見て… 中心の歯車がちょうどいい大きさだね。破片をはめ込んでみて… どうなるか確かめてみよう

original: It appears I have you to thank for turning my daughter against me.
string: 娘を心変わりさせたのはお前の仕業のようだな

original: Arrrggghh...
string: ああああ…

original: Of course I do. What do you want?
string: もちろんさ。何がほしいんだ？

original: Still, it's beautiful.
string: けれど、すこぶる美しいですわね

original: The reason I'm standing in front of you as only a whisper of my former self should tell you that.
string: こうして声だけでお前に語りかけているのを見りゃ分かるだろ

original: Not going to happen.
string: あり得ませんわね

original: After 400 years, you think you'll be the one to take me down?
string: この400年間で初めて、私を倒す者になれると思うのか？

original: Isran found something for you to do, eh? I thought he'd like you. Good luck!
string: イスランから何か言いつかったのかい？ あんたなら気に入られると思っていたよ。幸運を！

original: So maybe you could ask Isran if he knows anything? Just keep in mind that he... well, he might not like the idea.
string: だから、イスランに聞いてみるといいんじゃない？ ただし… 彼はこの考えが気に入らないかも知れないから注意して

original: Somewhere up north, in the ice fields.
string: 北の氷原のどこかだ

original: I'm sure.
string: 迷うところじゃない

original: Rii!
string: リィー！

original: I'll never tell you anything, vampire. My oath to Stendarr is stronger than any suffering you can inflict on me.
string: 言ったろう。何の話か分からないな

original: Oh, gods...
string: ああ、神よ…

original: It wasn't always like this. Best-preserved dwarven city I'd ever laid eyes on. And then... the earthquake hit.
string: ずっとこうだったわけじゃない。かつて見た中で最も保存状態のいいドワーフの都市だった。その後… 地震が起きたんだよ

original: What happened? How did I get here?
string: 何が起こった？ どうしてここに？

original: Are all of those ingredients here?
string: 材料はここで全部そろうのか？

original: You again? I thought it was clear I was busy.
string: また来たのか？ こう見えておれは忙しいんだぞ

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: What was your campaign against them?
string: 彼らに対する戦いは？

original: You'll be a welcome addition to the court, I'm sure.
string: 君はきっと喜んで宮廷に迎え入れられるだろう

original: No husks, no sale. Guess you have some scavenging to do.
string: ハスクがなけりゃ売れないね。探してきなよ

original: I want to show you something. It's important. You really must come. (Persuade)
string: 見せたいものがある。大事な話だ。ぜひともついて来てほしい(説得)

original: You are in danger. A vampire has infiltrated your court. (Give letter)
string: 吸血鬼が宮廷の一員になりすましているため、危険だ(手紙を渡す)

original: Speak with Fura Bloodmouth. She has something for you.
string: フーラ・ブラッドマウスと話すといい。何かあるはずだ

original: Just be sure to keep your eyes open and your guard up.
string: 目を見張って、気を抜かないようにさえしてくれれば

original: I've read stories. Stories about fools that managed to... communicate with them.
string: 色々な話を読みましたわ。彼らとの… 疎通を成功させた愚かな者達の話を

original: Then we're finished.
string: ならばおしまいだ

original: I did what needed to be done. Nothing more.
string: わたくしはなすべき事をした。ただそれだけですわ

original: Aye. And you be careful with the creature.
string: ああ。大事にしてやってくれ

original: I'll probably stay with the Dawnguard, for as long as they'll let me.
string: ドーンガードのところにいようと思っておりますわ。彼らに追い出されるまでの話ですけれども

original: Oh, look at you. What've you done? You've gone and gotten yourself turned into one of them.
string: なんてザマだ。何をやったんだ？ 吸血鬼殺しが吸血鬼になったわけか

original: Then the rest is up to me.
string: あとはわたし次第というわけですのね

original: I can't believe it.
string: 信じられない

original: Empire? What... what empire?
string: 帝国？ …どの帝国の事かしら？

original: What? What are you talking about?
string: 何だって？ 何を言ってるんだ？

original: Go destroy the feral beast before this becomes a problem.
string: これが問題になる前に、野蛮な獣達を殺してきなさい

original: Does it bother you that we're working against your father?
string: 父親を出し抜こうとしているのは気にならないのか？

original: Do you know where he's staying now?
string: 彼が今どこにいるか知っておりますの？

original: Oh, I'm sure I have something you'll find useful.
string: 君の役に立ちそうなものを持ってるよ

original: I'm pretty sure she's a vampire, actually.
string: 彼女も十中八九、吸血鬼だろう

original: Perhaps you care to explain this letter then?
string: この手紙について説明してもらいたい

original: This is all well and good, but do we actually know anything about what they're doing? What do we do now?
string: うまく行ったけど、彼らが何してるか分かる？ この後はどうすればいいの？

original: Is it fragile? Do we need to be careful with it?
string: 壊れやすいものなのか？ 慎重に扱う必要はあるのか？

original: ...Dawnguard getting to be more than a nuisance... gather some of the hunters... teach them a lesson...
string: …ドーンガードの奴ら、目障りじゃ済まなくなってきてる… ハンターを集めてるとか… 思い知らせてやらないと…

original: Please... end this misery.
string: 頼む… ひと思いに楽にして

original: Yes. I am married.
string: ああ、結婚している

original: 6000 gold, and they're yours.
string: 6000ゴールド出すなら売ろう

original: Of course, if you've got any more adventures planned...
string: 願ったりですわ。次の冒険の計画はどんなのかしら…

original: Aggh...
string: あああ…

original: It is the greatest token we can bestow upon those we love and wish to see protected.
string: 我々が愛し守るべき者達に捧げられる最高の贈り物をね

original: Try... taking it out?
string: 試しに… 取ってみる？

original: A magical shield that when blocked with, surrounds it's wielder with a holy aura that harms the undead.
string: 持つ者を聖なるオーラで覆い、それに触れたアンデッドにダメージを与える魔法の盾

original: Without a Septim on the throne of the Empire, Dagon was able to leave Oblivion through the gates and attack.
string: 帝国の玉座にセプティムが不在となった事で、デイゴンは門を通ってオブリビオンから攻撃を仕掛ける事が可能になった

original: What's wrong? You want to go hunt some vampires?
string: どうした？ 吸血鬼でも狩りに行かないか？

original: If a line of communication could be established with them, maybe they can find peace.
string: 彼らとの交流手段が確保できれば、平和な関係が結べるかも知れない

original: Death first!
string: さっさと死ね！

original: Refuse me, and I will banish you from this castle. I will spare your life this once, but after that, you are prey.
string: 断ればこの城からお前を追放する。今回ばかりは見逃してやるが、その後は獲物とみなす

original: Well, look. Kill me, you've killed one vampire. But if people are after me, there's something bigger going on.
string: なら、わたしを殺せば、吸血鬼を1人仕留めた事になりますわ。けれども、大勢がわたしを追うのは、何かもっと大変な事が起きている証拠ですのよ

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: But I have something for you to do, since you're asking.
string: でも君が望むなら、少々やってほしい事がある

original: The wizards know about all kinds of things that people probably shouldn't know about.
string: ウィザードは普通の人達が知るべきではない事を色々とご存知ですものね

original: I need training in Speech.
string: 話術の訓練をしてほしい

original: Thank you. Somehow I knew you'd understand.
string: ありがとう。あなたなら分かってくれるとなんとなく思っておりましたわ

original: Hsss...Hsss
string: シャー… シャー

original: That part, I don't know. Once we have it, hopefully it'll be obvious.
string: その部分はよく分かりませんわね。手に入れたら明らかになるかと思いますわ

original: I do not fear death.
string: 死なんかちっとも怖くない

original: You already know as much as I do. And that's a compliment.
string: 君の知識は私のそれと変わらない。これは褒め言葉だ

original: Could I help?
string: 手伝えることはあるか？

original: Let's just find my mother and get out of here.
string: すぐに母を見つけてここから出ましょう

original: I am afraid you're beyond my meager abiliities. I am sorry I cannot serve you better.
string: そちらの方がよっぽど達者だよ。お役に立てなくて悪いね

original: What do you mean by a "high profile" target?
string: “目立つ”標的とは？

original: That's not a name I know. And it doesn't sound like a name a group of vampires would choose.
string: そのお名前は存じませんわ。それに、吸血鬼が自分達で付けそうな名前でもございませんわね

original: Can you feel the power of the ancient blood coursing through your veins?
string: 古き血が体を駆けめぐるのを感じるか？

original: Free? No. I have been here too long, Qahnaarin.
string: 自由だと？ 我はここに長居しすぎたのだ、クァーナーリン

original: What have you got for sale?
string: どんな物を売ってるんだ？

original: Can you train me in Smithing?
string: 鍛造の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: Good. I suspected you might possess some intellect.
string: いいね。君に知性があるのか疑ってたよ

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: I've always been fascinated with Dwemer artifacts. I take them apart, poke around in their guts, and try to figure things out - with mixed results.
string: ドゥーマーの造った物には、いつも驚かされるわ。分解して、中の部品をいじり回して調べるんだけど、うまく理解できる事ばかりじゃないの

original: I won't fall for your tricks!
string: その手には乗らなくてよ！

original: I need you to do something for me.
string: やってほしいことがある

original: I believe the secret to unraveling that prophecy is written in Serana's Elder Scroll.
string: その予言の真実を突き止める鍵となる秘密が、セラーナの星霜の書に書かれているようなのだ

original: Did you hear something?
string: 何か聞こえて？

original: What's happening...
string: 何が起きている…

original: You're doing well, but two of the spires remain intact.
string: いい調子ね、でもまだ二つの尖塔が手つかずのままよ

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: Of course, my dear. All will be well now.
string: もちろんだ。これですべて良くなる

original: Didn't want that lot getting wind of it. Especially my father.
string: あの者達に聞きつけられたくありませんでしたわ。とくに父には

original: You said "even if I could." Why?
string: “たとえできたとしても”、というのはどういう意味だ？

original: Forget I said anything.
string: 言ったことは忘れてくれ

original: A battleaxe. (25 husks)
string: 両手斧(魂のハスク25個)

original: Did you spend a lot of time down here?
string: よくここに来ていたのか？

original: Yes. They swarmed the Chantry in vast numbers until we were completely overrun. We never really stood a chance.
string: そうだ。奴らは大群で礼拝所に攻め込み、すべてを破壊し尽くした。我々は為す術もなかった

original: I can only assume the gates have been closed by now.
string: とうに門は閉じているとは思うけどね

original: Damn fool. I told him not to go. The Vigilants always had more bravery than sense.
string: 能なしめが。彼には行くなと言ったのに。番人達は血の気が多くて困るな

original: Have to put a stop to this menace...
string: 奴らの脅威を食い止めねば…

original: A shrine to Molag Bal, the mighty Daedra Prince who is father to all our kind.
string: 我々の同朋すべての父であるデイドラの王子、モラグ・バルをまつった祠だ

original: As you know, vampires are powerful, but we have limits. Our great enemy is the sun, and until recently it's an enemy we've had no way to fight.
string: 知っての通り、吸血鬼は強大な力をもつが、限界もある。最大の敵は太陽であり、最近までは戦う術のない相手だった

original: Of course, I wouldn't be telling you where to find it if I desired it for myself.
string: もちろんさ。自分のものにするなら君にそのありかを教えてないよ

original: May the blessings of Auri-El protect you as you climb the road to the Inner Sanctum and final enlightenment.
string: アーリエルの祝福が、汝とともにあらん事を。最奥聖域での悟りへの旅路に幸多からん事を

original: It's your funeral.
string: あんたの問題なんだよ

original: Here we go, let's get the blood flowing again.
string: さあ、もうひと暴れして差し上げますわよ

original: Always a pleasure to serve a fellow alchemist.
string: 仲間の錬金術師のためならいつでも協力するよ

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Let someone else rule. I just want to kill and feed.
string: 支配は他の誰かに任せるわ。私はただ殺して食べたいだけ

original: We usually feed on our visitors, but perhaps we'll make an exception in your case.
string: 大抵の訪問者は糧とするのだが、お前の場合は例外としてやってもいいかも知れんな

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: The sooner we get the scroll home, the sooner we deal with my father.
string: 早く書を持ち帰る事ができましたら、それだけ早く父と決着をつけられますのよ

original: Be a dear and collect these diagrams for me?
string: 図面を探してきてくれないかしら？

original: That damn dremora and his minions. They didn't even give me a chance to explain who I was.
string: 忌々しいドレモラとその手下うんぬんの仕業だ。名乗る暇さえ与えられなかった

original: I'm just here for the Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書を取りに来た

original: Leave me be!
string: 放っといてくれ！

original: Are you trying to get my attention?
string: 何か言いたいことでも？

original: The <Alias=Boss> at <Alias=Dungeon> has been dealt with.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Boss>を片付けた

original: I wonder what happened to them.
string: 彼らに一体何があったのかしら

original: It is a cherished gift you have given me. To see the world this way, through your eyes. It will only bring us closer.
string: この恩恵は実に大切なもので、こうして愛する人と同じ目で世界を見つめられることで、我々の距離はさらに縮まることでしょう…

original: But I'm afraid that they're well beyond a cure at this point.
string: 彼らがもはや治療できる状態ではない事を残念に思う

original: Nope, never heard of you.
string: いいや、聞いたことすらない名前だ

original: While the blessed state of undeath can be "accidentally" conferred - consider the brutish creatures you find wailing in dank hovels in the wild...
string: 不死の祝福は“図らずも”授けられるが… 荒野のジメジメしたあばら屋で泣き叫ぶ野蛮な者達を見てみなよ…

original: I'll be at the dock whenever you're ready.
string: 準備ができましたらいつでも波止場にいらっしゃって

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Minutes? Hours? Years? I can't even begin to guess. I suggest we don't wait around to find out.
string: 数分？ 数時間？ 数年？ 考えもつかないわ。それが分かるまで待つ事もないでしょうね

original: You care nothing for Serana or our plight.
string: セラーナや私達の苦境はお構いなしなのね

original: What will happen to the Chantry now?
string: 礼拝所はこれからどうなる？

original: ...just fed but still hungry... blood... all I can think about these days... last kill was so good... just the right amount of struggle...
string: …食事を終えたばかりなのに、まだひもじいわ… 近頃は血の事ばかり考えてる… この前の獲物は最高だった… 存分に抵抗してくれたもの…

original: Just hit them, and they'll... do whatever it is they're supposed to do.
string: 叩いてみて、そうすれば… 必要な仕掛けを担ってくれるはず

original: Originally owned by the Jarl of Riften back in the Second Era, it was a bit of a black mark on the Hold's history.
string: 元は第二紀の頃にリフテンの首長が所有していたものだった。要塞の歴史におけるちょっとした汚点だがな

original: But please, do be discreet. Our aim isn't to stir the nest, just to skin a rat, reminding them that they are the prey.
string: だが、慎重に進めろ。目的は騒ぎを起こす事ではない。ちょっとネズミの皮をはいで、奴らに自身が獲物だと自覚させる事だ

original: You're not paying attention then. Like most everyone else around here.
string: まわりを見ていないんだな。ここらにいる連中はほとんどがそうだが

original: Your life ends here, Vyrthur!
string: お前の命はここで尽きますのよ、ヴィルスール！

original: Please, turn back... before it's too late...
string: お願い、引き返して… 手遅れになる前に…

original: But I got used to it.
string: でももう慣れましたわ

original: You disappoint me, Serana. You've taken everything I provided for you and thrown it all away for this... pathetic being.
string: 失望したぞ、セラーナ。私がお前に与えたもののすべてを投げ捨てたというのか、この情けない存在のために

original: Wonderful. Carry on, then.
string: 素晴らしい。ではその続きを

original: Isran needs your help.
string: イスランが力を借りたがっている

original: Serana believes in me, why won't you?
string: セラーナに信用されているのに、信用できないのか？

original: But... what about you?
string: けれども… あなたはどうなのかしら？

original: The reason I had it... and why I was down there.
string: 星霜の書を持っていて、あそこにいた理由…

original: But you did not follow instructions to kill the victim in view of others while wearing the Dawnguard uniform.
string: でも指示を守らなかったな。ドーンガードの制服を着て、人目につくところで殺せと言ったはずだ

original: It's... it's not easy. But I don't think we have much of a choice.
string: それは… 簡単な事ではありませんわね。けれども、そうするしかないとも思っておりますのよ

original: Coldharbour?
string: コールドハーバーとは？

original: Why am I able to bestow the gift of Harkon's blood?
string: 自分もハルコンの血の恩恵を他人に授けられるのはどうしてか？

original: I should have killed you and your mother long ago!
string: 母親共々、はるか昔に殺すべきだった！

original: Stand aside!
string: どいてよ！

original: It's pointless and vague, like all prophecies. The part he latched onto said that vampires would no longer need to fear the sun.
string: 例にもれず、予言とは話があいまいで見えないもの。父がその中で注目したのは、吸血鬼が太陽を恐れずにすむようになるという一節でしたの

original: Prelates of these shrines were charged with teaching the mantras of Auri-El to our Initiates.
string: 祠の聖職者は皆、入信者達にアーリエルの真言を教える役割を担っていた

original: Destroy the Keepers that are tending them, and it should bring the barrier down.
string: それを見張っている番人達を倒せば、障壁は崩れるはずよ

original: The ceremony was... degrading.
string: 目を… 背けたくなるような儀式でしたわ

original: Don't worry about me, I'll be fine!
string: 心配しないで、大丈夫だ！

original: But then it all changed.
string: でもすべてが変わってしまった、と

original: Sometimes you get one who comes willingly, but most have to be convinced to join us here.
string: 時々好き好んで来るのもいるが、大半は説得しないとここには来たがらない

original: Just call your name in Tamriel? That's it?
string: タムリエルで名を呼べと？ それだけなのか？

original: May Auri-El's light guide you in your darkest hours.
string: 苦難の時も、アーリエルの光の導きがあらん事を

original: Got anything left to sell?
string: 他に売ってもらえそうなものは？

original: Now, you might already know that Molag Bal is the original source of vampirism.
string: さて、モラグ・バルが最初の吸血鬼を造った事は、もうご存知ですわね

original: A strange race, these Falmer.
string: 変わった種族ですわ、このファルメルというのは

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について知りたい

original: My wares? I, uh... Oh so sorry, I'm all sold out.
string: 商品を？ あの… 悪いけど、全部売れちゃったんだ

original: No matter. Serana will sacrifice her blood for the sake of the prophecy, and I will feast upon yours in Molag Bal's honor!
string: まあよい、セラーナの血を予言成就のために捧げ、モラグ・バルを称えつつお前の血をすするとしよう！

original: Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.
string: 今すぐハルコン卿に会いに行け

original: The Dawnguard will, no doubt, soon become even more of a nuisance now that Auriel's Bow has been recovered.
string: アーリエルの弓を取り戻した今、ドーンガードがもうじきさらに邪魔な存在になるのは間違いない

original: Here you go.
string: ほらよ

original: Now what?
string: これからどうする？

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: Don't let me stand in your way, then.
string: でしたら、あなたの邪魔はしたくありませんわ

original: Then let's get going. I want to get there before my father has a chance to track us down.
string: では急ぎましょう。父に見つかる前にそこへ行かなければ

original: We need to do all that nonsense to get into the temple, so we can kill your brother and claim Auriel's Bow?
string: こういう馬鹿げた事をしてまで寺院に入らなければならないのは、あなたの兄弟を殺してアーリエルの弓を手に入れるためという事ですの？

original: I'll be waiting.
string: 待っているぞ

original: But we'll put a swift end to that.
string: だがそれもすぐに終わりにしてやる

original: Arkay says bandits. Or, wait... no, he says bandits.
string: アーケイは山賊だと言っている。待てよ… いや、やっぱり山賊だ

original: She's asking me to take her home, to some castle.
string: 家に案内するように頼まれた。どこかにある城だとか

original: Well, well. You made it. Good. Isran's in the fort. He'll get you sorted out.
string: おお、無事に着いたか。イスランは砦にいる。話せば色々分かるはずだ

original: What's that basin in the center signify?
string: 真ん中にあるあの水盤は何を意味しているのかしら？

original: Victory to the Dawnguard!
string: ドーンガードに勝利を！

original: Perhaps. Do you have a way out of here?
string: かもな。ここから出る方法を知ってるか？

original: Rocks and valley, crevices and hiding places. This is the kind of place where hermits and fanatics dwell.
string: 岩がちな谷間と、裂け目だらけで身をひそめる場所に事欠かない地形。世捨て人や狂信者が住むにはうってつけの場所ですわね

original: If I'm reading this right, there's a formula here that should give us safe passage into the Soul Cairn.
string: 読み間違いでなければ、ソウル・ケルンへと無事に入るための手順が記されていますわ

original: I can't believe I lost those pages.
string: あの原稿を失くすなんて、おれは一体何だってどうして

original: Because of this, I strongly believe you were meant to hear the ancestral chorus. Only one way to find out.
string: つまり君は先人のコーラスを聞く運命にあるというわけだ。それが真理を得る唯一の方法だよ

original: I'm afraid there's not much more to tell. Even today, the Elder Scrolls remain a great enigma.
string: これ以上話せる事はないよ。今日においても尚、星霜の書は大きな謎に包まれているからね

original: Very clever, mother. Very clever.
string: 賢明ですわね、お母様。とても賢明ですわ

original: Tell me what you're looking for and maybe we can make a deal... if you have the husks.
string: ほしいものがあるなら取引しよう… ハスクとね

original: Let's check that out.
string: 調べてみましょう

original: Look at this place. Do you think anything would want to live here?
string: ご覧になって。こんなところに住みたい生き物がいると思いまして？

original: You've nothing to fear from me. Please, we have much to discuss.
string: 恐れる必要は何もない。話したい事がたくさんある

original: How so?
string: どうして？

original: Winged Menace?
string: 羽根のある敵？

original: Anyway, this is all very touching, but don't we have some more important things to worry about right now?
string: とにかく、とても感動的なお話ですけれど、今はもっと心配しなければならない事がありましてよ？

original: I don't think so. She said she wanted to stay awake in case the situation was resolved.
string: そうかしら。状況が改善した時に備えて目は覚ましておきたいと母は言っておりましたわ

original: Who were your people?
string: 同族について聞かせてほしい

original: They were eventually forced to put him down. The Jarl banished them from the hold, but they stuck to their cause.
string: やがて彼らはやむなく息子を殺さざるをえなくなった。首長は彼らを砦から追放した。しかし彼らは任務を放棄しなかった

original: For the time being, they will remain open.
string: しばらくの間は、閉ざされる事はない

original: No. He has to die. We have no choice.
string: ありませんわね。彼は死ぬべきですわ。他に道はなくてよ

original: Here's where I fell. Feels like ages ago.
string: 落ちたのはここだよ。ずいぶん昔に感じるな

original: Depends how much you're paying.
string: それは買い値によるな

original: All right.
string: いいだろう

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Uhhhhh.
string: ううっ

original: You think I do this for my health? Come back when you've got the coin.
string: 健康のためにやってるとでも？ 金をこしらえてから来な

original: After what I've put Serana through, I would understand if she never wished to see me again. I leave that decision in your hands.
string: セラーナに経験させた事を思えば、彼女が二度と私に会いたがらなくても理解できる。その決断はあなたに任せるわ

original: You said something happened to the Hall of Vigilants?
string: さっき、番人の間がどうかしたとか？

original: I've been pouring over some of the tomes left here in the keep. Interesting stories, indeed.
string: この書庫に残されていた書物をひっくり返して調べてみた。非常に興味深い話だったよ

original: The way I've heard it, the sun represents the connection from our world to theirs.
string: わたしが聞いた話によると、太陽は我々の世界と彼らの世界のつながりを表していますわ

original: Probably not.
string: そうは思いませんわ

original: It's not working! Try something else!
string: 効果がないよ！ 別の方法を試して！

original: Does it bother you that I'm here?
string: わたし、お邪魔かしら？

original: Do we at least know what the vampires are after?
string: 我々に吸血鬼どもの狙いが少しでも分かっているのか？

original: If Harkon obtained Auriel's Bow and Serana's blood was used to taint the weapon, the Tyranny of the Sun would be complete.
string: もしハルコンがアーリエルの弓を手に入れて、セラーナの血で武器を染めれば、太陽の専制は完成する

original: I must head back to the Sanctuary before dawn. I will see you there, Listener.
string: 夜明け前に聖域へ戻らないと。そこで会いましょう、聞こえし者

original: It will be done, my lord!
string: 仰せの通りに、我が主よ！

original: Sounds useful.
string: 役に立ちそうだな

original: What's wrong with the sky?
string: 空はどうしてしまったんだ？

original: The Dawnguard will now be dedicated to safeguarding it, making sure that prophecy will never come to pass.
string: ドーンガードは、弓を守る事に今後は身を捧げよう。あの予言は決して実現させてはならない

original: Well, well. Where've you been, Vingalmo? Nose stuck in a book all day?
string: おやおや、どこにいたんだ、ヴィンガルモ？ 一日中本にでも埋もれていたか？

original: To come in here alone... a fool like all the rest of them.
string: ここに一人で来るのは… 他の皆と同じ愚か者よ

original: Actually, I can't stop to play games right now.
string: 正直に言うと、遊んでいる時間はないんだ

original: Troll, get lost!
string: トロールよ、立ち去れ！

original: Land on the ground, and I will have more to teach you.
string: 地面に下りろ。さらに説明してやる

original: Your suffering will be legendary!
string: その苦しみは伝説として残るだろう！

original: It's not too far, now. At least, I don't think it is. I thought you knew the way?
string: もうそんなに遠くありませんわ。少なくともわたしの見立てでは。道は分かっておりますわよね？

original: I've located the petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I should be able to extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 太古の吸血鬼が石化した遺体の在処を見つけた。遺体を持ってきてくれたら、血の聖杯の効果を延長させる事ができるはずだ

original: Honestly, I don't know. Necromancers are always interested in souls, though, so that probably has some kind of interest.
string: 正直分かりませんけど、死霊術師は誰でも魂をほしがりますから、同様の何かがあるのかも知れませんわね

original: That's too bad.
string: 残念なことだ

original: Very well then, you leave me no choice!
string: そうか、ならば仕方あるまい！

original: He's a little eccentric, but we can trust him and we could definitely use his skills.
string: ちょっと変人だけど、信用できるし、彼の能力は必ず役に立つわ

original: Make it 3,000 and you have a deal. (Persuade)
string: 3000にまけてくれれば払おう(説得)

original: Not that I ever saw.
string: 見た事はございませんの

original: Who are the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターとは？

original: You Vigilants were never trained for...
string: 君達番人はまったく訓練を受けてないな…

original: Well, the Moth Priests are the only ones I've heard of who can do it. They spend years preparing before they start reading, though.
string: 読めるらしいと聞いているのは聖蚕の僧侶くらいですわ。読み始めるまでに何年も準備に費やすそうですけど

original: It's what some call the domain of Molag Bal. His place in Oblivion.
string: モラグ・バルの領地とも呼ばれる、オブリビオンにおける彼の場所よ

original: Let's make some more stories.
string: わたし達の物語を紡ぎましょう

original: Are you out of your mind?
string: 酔狂にもほどがありましてよ？

original: I'll hang back for a bit, but you're not leaving me behind. This is too important.
string: ちょっと離れますけれど、置いて行ったりなさらないで。絶対ですわよ

original: I'll try my luck elsewhere.
string: 他を当たってみよう

original: Truth is, I'm a little nervous. I've never done anything like this before. I hope you don't mind if I walk up with you.
string: 正直、ちょっとビビってるんだ。何しろこういうのは初めてだから。一緒に行っても構わないかな？

original: You will not leave this valley alive!
string: 生きてこの峡谷を出られると思うな！

original: I've no love for living out of a tent, but I'll take that over being ripped apart.
string: テント暮らしが好きとは言わないが、八つ裂きにされるよりマシだ

original: It is good to have powerful allies, is it not?
string: 頼もしい味方がいるってのはいいもんだね

original: He's a... powerful man. Or at least used to be.
string: 彼は… 凄い力を持っていますわ。少なくとも、ある時点ではそうだった

original: I'll find you soon.
string: すぐに見つけてやる

original: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
string: つまり、あなたのほんの一部がかの地に乗り移って、代わりに、ソウル・ケルンのかけらがその隙間を埋めたのよ

original: I don't have any gyros on me.
string: ジャイロの持ち合わせはない

original: Come on, the bow has to be in this valley somewhere.
string: さあ行きましょう。弓はこの谷のどこかにあるはずですわ

original: Safe? You call bringing her here safe? Has she explained nothing to you?
string: 安全？ 彼女をここへ連れてきて安全だと言うの？ 彼女は何も説明しなかった？

original: All of the ingredients for our potions came from there. She used to say that my father couldn't stand the place. Too... peaceful.
string: うちの薬の材料はみんなそこで採ってたの。彼女いわく、父はその場所が大嫌いだったみたい。ちょっと… 和やかすぎるから

original: Why would your wife betray you?
string: どうして妻に裏切られたんだ？

original: Perhaps they'll never return to their former appearance, but over the centuries, I've noticed a rise in their intellect.
string: 元の姿には戻れないかも知れないが、何世紀もの間に彼らの知性が確かに高まってきているのを感じる

original: Now my work will never see the light of day. My name will be forgotten.
string: あの作品は永遠に日の目を見ない、と。この名も忘れられてしまうってのか

original: Come on, let's take it to Dexion.
string: 行きましょう。デキソンに届けますわよ

original: I requested refuge in the Soul Cairn, and in exchange, I would provide the Ideal Masters the souls that they craved.
string: ソウル・ケルンでかくまってもらうよう頼み、見返りにアイディール・マスターが切望する魂を提供するつもりだった

original: Absolutely. I can only do twenty at a time, so if you want the rest of your arrows blessed, let me know.
string: いいとも。一度に作れるのは12本だけだから、残りの矢にも祝福がほしいならまた言ってくれ

original: Walked right into a trap, and didn't even realize it until I was captured.
string: 罠のど真ん中に飛び込んだわけだよ。捕まるまでちっとも気づかなかった

original: Well, let's move then. I'm nothing if not persuasive.
string: さあ、先を急ぎましょう。わたしは説得力には自信がございますのよ

original: Lord Harkon, defeated. I never imagined I'd see the day.
string: ハルコン卿の敗北。この日を見るとは想像もしなかった

original: Heh... wait, you're serious? This is the Redwater Den, purveyors of the best Skooma outside of Balmora.
string: え… ちょっと、冗談よね？ このレッドウォーターの隠れ家は、バルモラ以外では最高のスクゥーマが手に入る場所よ

original: Now that I have reclaimed one of my Elder Scrolls, we must find a Moth Priest to read it.
string: 今ここに星霜の書の一つを取り戻せた、ゆえに聖蚕の僧侶を見つけて読ませる必要がある

original: I don't know, maybe. Won't know until we get him out of there.
string: そうかも知れない。奴をあそこから追い出すまで確かな事は言えないよ

original: This stranger may call herself vampire, but she knows nothing of our struggle. Why should I entrust you to her?
string: このよそ者が吸血鬼を名乗ったとしても、私達の苦悩を何一つ知らないのよ。どうしてあなたを任せられる？

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: ガンマーに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: Now this is a find! Plans for improving the Dwemer crossbow. This should add some extra punch to an already devastating weapon.
string: これは大発見ね！ ドゥーマーのクロスボウを改良するための設計図だわ。ただでさえ強力な武器に、さらなる威力を与えられる

original: Often I take on tasks that Garan or Feran find distasteful, or... beneath them.
string: ガランやフェランの仕事を肩代わりする事も少なくないよ。二人がその… やりたがらない時にね

original: Is that another one of those wayshrines up there? I wonder where this one goes...
string: あそこにあるのは旅の祠ではなくて？ あれはどこと繋がっているのかしら…

original: I... don't know who that is.
string: 存じませんわ… 誰なのかしら

original: I don't require an answer, Qahnaarin. Simply speak my name to the heavens when you feel the time is right.
string: 返事はしなくともかまわん、クァーナーリン。ここぞと思った時に、我が名を天に向けて発するがいい

original: They swept into the Chantry without warning and began killing everyone without pause.
string: 奴らは何の前触れもなく礼拝所に押し入り、そこにいた者を手当たり次第に殺していった

original: If we're going to survive this, we're going to have to be as ruthless as our enemies.
string: この戦いを生き抜きたいなら、敵と同じぐらい非情に徹しなければならない

original: There were ten of them in all. Find them for me, please, I beg you!
string: 原稿は全部で10枚。探してきてくれ、頼む、お願い！

original: Auriel is one of the elven gods. He's with the rest of them in Aetherius.
string: アーリエルはエルフの神の一人ですわ。彼ら神々はエセリウスにおりますの

original: Ulfric Stormcloak is the true High King.
string: 真の上級王はウルフリック・ストームクロークだ

original: The castle, of course, is yours. We shall follow you, and help spread your influence across Skyrim.
string: 当然、城はお前のものだ。我らはお前に追従し、その威光をスカイリム中に広げる力となろう

original: Halt, vampire!
string: 止まれ、吸血鬼め！

original: How long were you in there?
string: あの中にはいつ頃から？

original: I used to hide down here and look out at the sea. Usually when my father was in a bad mood.
string: よくここに隠れて海を眺めたものでしたわ。大抵は父の機嫌が悪い時でしたのよ

original: How's a moth related to the Elder Scrolls?
string: 蚕と星霜の書の間に、どうして関係が？

original: Quickly, this way.
string: 早く、こっちよ

original: I guess it doesn't matter now. At least Isran is trying to do something noble with the name.
string: 今となっては、関係ないわ。少なくともイスランは、その名にかけて高貴な事をやろうとしてる

original: What's wrong?
string: どうした？

original: Sounds powerful.
string: 威力がありそうだ

original: What have you got?
string: 腕前を見せてご覧なさい

original: The more they worry, the more they talk about it. I've been hearing rumors for a bit now.
string: 不安が高まれば、人々はもっとその事を口々にする。そして、すでに少しうわさを耳にした

original: Greetings, master. What do you need?
string: 主様、ご用は何ですか？

original: Deal. (Give Book)
string: 商談成立だ(本を渡す)

original: Yeargh!
string: イイヤァ！

original: You're new here, so I'll explain this once. You feed from the thralls as much as you like. You kill them, and I'll split you in half.
string: ここは不慣れだろうから、一度だけ説明する。従徒どもの血は好きなだけ飲んでくれていいが、殺したりしたらお前を引き裂いてやるからな

original: I'm <Alias=Player>. Who are you?
string: <Alias=Player>という。そちらは？

original: What will you do now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: I will resist you, monster. I must!
string: バケモノめ、お前の言いなりにはならないぞ。絶対に！

original: Fellow hunter, we're looking for some Vampires that have been reported in the area. Have you seen any?
string: お仲間か。この一帯にいるらしいという吸血鬼を探している。見かけなかったか？

original: However, the night powers are still yours to command, and your claws are still formidable weapons.
string: だが夜の力はまだ使えるうえに、爪の驚異的な威力は変わらない

original: It's like the world is alive again. Just like me.
string: わたしと一緒に、世界にも生命が戻ったような思いですわ

original: The air here... it feels different. Almost like...
string: ここの空気… 違う感じがするよ。まるで…

original: No doubt she'd like you to lead her into such a place. Then, when you're alone and beyond help, the fangs will come out!
string: そのような場所に誘い込んで、助けの来ない場所で一人になった時に牙をむく、ってやつかもね…

original: You'll be meeting my friend Arkay very, very soon!
string: あの世でアーケイに会うがいい！

original: Die, monster!
string: 死ね、化物！

original: Your guess is as good as mine. This place looks pretty different from when I was locked away.
string: わたしにもよく分かりませんわ。幽閉されていた頃からずいぶんと印象が変わっていますのよ

original: If we had the crests, we wouldn't have to keep hanging around this lovely place.
string: クレストさえあれば、この“素敵な”場所に長居する必要はありませんのに

original: Go on downstairs. You're bothering me.
string: さっさと下の階に下りろ。目障りだ

original: Your wife, kidnapped!
string: 奥さんが、さらわれた！

original: They had control of my mind, but fortunately they couldn't possess my soul.
string: 精神は支配されてしまったものの、幸い魂まではとりつかれずにすんだ

original: Yes, I have them. What now?
string: 持っている。それで？

original: I won't beg for protection, but I'm not even sure that would work with this Isran.
string: 守ってもらおうと懇願するつもりはないが、したとしてもイスランとやらには通用するだろうか？

original: A swift death is all you deserve!
string: 今すぐ死んで罪を償え！

original: Vingalmo and Orthjolf both long for our Lord's throne, but cannot make overt moves against him.
string: ヴィンガルモとオースユルフは我らの主の玉座を切望している。だが露骨な行動は取れない

original: That was... not as useful as I would have liked. Even so, you did well.
string: どうもあれは… 期待していたほど有用ではなかったな。それでも上出来には変わらない

original: So we're pinning the murder on the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードに濡れ衣を着せろと？

original: Can't it wait?
string: 後じゃだめなのか？

original: We need to destroy him before he turns his comrades into a brood of vampires.
string: 仲間達を吸血鬼の一団に変えてしまう前に仕留める必要がある

original: Can you tell me more about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について詳しく知りたい

original: Maybe a shorter title is in order?
string: 題名が長すぎるのでは？

original: Your time is at an end!
string: これで終わりだ！

original: It's definitely been a bad thing, on the whole.
string: すべてが最悪でしたわ

original: Have you talked to Isran?
string: イスランとは話した？

original: Arkay says we're going to win this. Well, probably.
string: アーケイは、この戦いが勝利に終わると言ってる。多分な

original: At their bases, the barrier's energy is being drawn from unfortunate souls that have been exiled here.
string: その根元では、ここに追放されてきた不運な魂から障壁のエネルギーを吸収しているの

original: The Chalice has been in Lord Harkon's possession for quite some time now. It is, when used properly, able to increase the potency of our powers.
string: 聖杯はかなり以前からハルコン卿の手元にある。適切に使えば、我らの潜在能力を増幅できるものだ

original: Very good. I'll just... I'll be going now.
string: いいですとも。ちょうどその… 行こうと思ってたんです

original: Fortunately, you're in a position to breach the barrier that surrounds these ruins.
string: 幸い、あなたはこの遺跡を囲む障壁を破る事ができる

original: No, I am alive only because the vampires spared me.
string: 自分が生きているのは吸血鬼達に見逃してもらったからだ

original: Well, I've been so busy, I dunno. What are you, kidding me?
string: さあね、ずっと忙しかったんだ。何のつもりだ？ からかってるのか？

original: Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.
string: 今すぐハルコン卿に会いに行け

original: Do you get lonely?
string: 孤独を感じる事はありまして？

original: She persuaded an elven artisan to make some improvements. You can see the plates that show the phases of the moons, Masser and Secunda.
string: 母はエルフの職人を説得して日時計を改造させましたの。二つの月、マッサーとセクンダの満ち欠けを示すプレートが見えますかしら

original: If I'd known Skyrim was so dangerous, I'd have brought more guards.
string: スカイリムが危険な場所だと知ってたら、もっと守りを固めて来たのに

original: Why else would she risk her life to come here?
string: そうでなければどうして命を危険にさらしてこんな所まで？

original: You there! Traveler! Over here!
string: おーい！ そこの旅人！ こっちだ！

original: I think it is, actually.
string: 実際、そうだと思いますわ

original: Let's just start at the beginning...
string: 一番最初から話してくれれば…

original: Loyalty? You never intended to let me live.
string: 忠誠心？ 生かしておくつもりは元からなかっただろう

original: So I am. I guess we could use my blood. Do you have any arrows? Elven arrows. I'm not going to just bleed on any old thing.
string: そうですわね。わたしの血を使ってよろしくてよ。矢は持ってますの？ エルフの矢がいいですわね。古いものはダメですわよ

original: Gods, Vampires! I... I can't take this anymore! I'm not cut out for this!
string: げっ、吸血鬼ども！ 俺は… 俺はもう耐えられない！ 入団するんじゃなかった！

original: I am.
string: 準備はできた

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Climb on in and let's get this over with.
string: 乗ってくれ。さっさと済ましてしまおう

original: How hard would it be to feed a few extra mouths? I'm sure they can manage, and not leave us sitting out here like cattle.
string: 人数がちょっとくらい増えても大差ないだろう。放牧中の牛のように出したままにせずに、入れてくれてもばちは当たらないと思うが

original: I'm impressed you could find a Moth Priest so quickly.
string: 驚いたな。聖蚕の僧侶をそんなに早く見つけるなんて

original: (Heavy breathing)
string: ハァ、ハァ

original: If you change your mind and decide to join the fight before it's too late, go talk to Isran up in the fort.
string: もし気が変わって、手遅れにならないうちに戦いに加わりたいのであれば、上の砦にいるイスランと話せ

original: When I fled Castle Volkihar, I fled with two Elder Scrolls.
string: ヴォルキハル城を脱出した時、二つの星霜の書を持ち出したわ

original: My offer is still a thousand. Did you want to sell?
string: 買い値は1000ゴールド、変わらないぞ。売ってくれるのか？

original: The two of them just never got along. That's why Isran didn't have you go looking for him when he sent you after us.
string: 彼らの関係はずっと険悪なの。だからイスランも、あなたに彼を探しに行かせず、私達のところへ来させたのよ

original: Simple. He says 'kill', I kill.
string: 単純よ。彼が“殺せ”と言い、私が殺す

original: Of course, master.
string: もちろんです、主様

original: I knew it was only a matter of time before she'd return with hatred in her heart.
string: 娘がその心に憎しみを宿して戻るのも、時間の問題だとは分かっていた

original: Auriel, Auri-El, Alkosh, Akatosh... so many different names for the sovereign of the snow elves.
string: アーリエル、アルコシュ、アカトシュ… 呼び名は様々だがすべて同じ、スノーエルフの守護神アーリエルだ

original: Wait... that almost makes sense!
string: お待ちになって… きっとそうですわ！

original: This is all more excitement than I'm used to.
string: こんなに心みなぎるのは初めてだよ

original: Now it's a race to claim the remaining Scrolls and discover what part Auriel's Bow has to play in this prophecy.
string: 残りの書を手に入れて、この予言におけるアーリエルの弓の役割を誰が先に解き明かすのか… 競争だな

original: She's... she's a vampire? Are you a complete fool? You can't trust them! She'll turn on you the first chance she gets!
string: 彼女も… 吸血鬼なのか？ お前は正気か？ 吸血鬼が信用できるものか！ 隙あらば寝首をかかれるぞ！

original: At first you may pity the thin-bloods. But after disposing of a few, you realize they aren't worth the worry.
string: 最初は血の薄い者達を哀れむかも知れない。でも数人殺した後には、彼らが心配に値しないと分かるわ

original: I began to explore what the dovah call "Alok-Dilon," the ancient forbidden art that you call necromancy.
string: 我はドヴァーの言葉で“アロク・ディロン”、そなたらが死霊術と呼ぶ古代の禁呪に手を染め始めた

original: Oh. All right then. You know where to find me.
string: そう。結構ですわよ。わたしの居場所はご存知ですわね

original: Ah, if only your traitor mother were here, I would let her watch this reunion before putting her head on a spike.
string: 私を裏切ったお前の母親がこの場にいれば、この再会を見せてやったうえで頭から串刺しにしてやるのだが…

original: What's going on? Where did the sun go?
string: どうなってる？ 太陽はどこだ？

original: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
string: ハニーサイド、リフテンの家だ

original: You've gone from a between-meal snack to the darling of the court. Impressive.
string: 間食用のつまみから、宮廷の寵愛を集める立場にまでなったか。大したものだ

original: That Moth Priest, Dexion. He said we needed two other Elder Scrolls. I think I know where we can start looking.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶デキソンは、星霜の書がもう二つ必要になると言っていましたけれど、どこにありそうかの見当ならつきますわよ

original: We meet again. That was quite the trek.
string: またね。すごい旅だったよ

original: What exactly are we looking for?
string: 何を見つければいいんだ？

original: I felt I had two choices. I could either live in fear of the night, or I could do something to help protect my people.
string: 選択肢は2つあると感じたんだ。夜に怯えて生きるか、それとも同胞を守るために立ちあがるか

original: Why weren't the snow elves here affected?
string: ここにいるスノーエルフが影響を受けていないのは？

original: No answer? Then I'll take it from your corpse!
string: 答えないのか？ ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！

original: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
string: 本物ですの？ 信じられませんわ！

original: Isran needs your help.
string: イスランが力を借りたがっている

original: How did you know I was a vampire?
string: どうしてこちらも吸血鬼だと？

original: Do not forget the price of your new power. I expect your complete obedience.
string: この新たな力の代償を忘れるなよ。お前の完全なる忠誠を要求する

original: Hsss...
string: シャー…

original: I see... I... I understand. Thank you
string: ああ… 分かった。ありがとう

original: Isran was right all along. We should have listened to his warnings. It's too late for the Vigilants now.
string: イスランの言っていた事は正しかった。彼の警告に耳を貸すべきだった。番人達はもはや手遅れだよ

original: I've been performing a little research on the Blood Chalice.
string: 血の聖杯に関してちょっとした研究を続けてきたんだ

original: Now, this Chalice needs to be filled directly from the bloodspring that is the source of Redwater Den. But that's not enough.
string: さて、この聖杯はレッドウォーターの隠れ家の水源である血の泉から直接満たす必要がある。だがそれだけではない

original: I... Well, that's actually something I never would've anticipated. Interesting.
string: うーん… それは少しも予想していなかったわ。興味深いわね

original: So, you've returned.
string: ほう、戻ったのか

original: Lord Harkon has never cared to use the Chalice, relying on his more than adequate powers until now.
string: ハルコン卿は自分のあり余る力を当てにして、今まで一度も聖杯を使おうとしなかった

original: Do you still feel lonely?
string: まだ孤独を感じるか

original: This attack... it's unlike the vampires. Do we at least know what they were after, or is this completely a lost cause?
string: 今回の襲撃は… どうも吸血鬼らしくない。我々は少なくとも奴らの狙いが分かっているのか？ それともこれはまったく勝ち目のない戦いなのか？

original: Armory. (<Global=HDWindhelmArmory> gold)
string: 武器庫(<Global=HDWindhelmArmory> ゴールド)

original: So how has it come to pass that a vampire hunter is in the company of my daughter?
string: それで、吸血鬼ハンターがなぜ私の娘に同行する事になったの？

original: Maybe I can't leave, but my writings can.
string: 原稿だけなら、何とかなるともさ

original: I've learned of a possible monster.
string: 隠れおおせている化け物がいるらしいと聞きつけた

original: If you're here to join up, you need to see Isran. He's up at the fort talking to some Vigilant.
string: 仲間になりたくて来ているなら、イスランに会うんだ。砦で番人らしき奴と話している

original: In return, I was to serve them as a Keeper until the death of the one who calls herself Valerica.
string: ただし、ヴァレリカと名乗る者が死すまで、番人として彼奴らに仕えるのを条件としてだ

original: All right, calm down... Here, take this.
string: 分かった、落ち着いて… さあ、これを

original: Well, if you want to reach the summit, you're going to need some help. You... want a hand?
string: まあ、辿り着きたければ手助けが必要だよ。手を… 貸そうか？

original: I can't guarantee you'd be free from harm. Becoming blind could be the least of your worries.
string: 君に危害が及ばない保証はない。何も見えなくなるのは、心配事の中でも一番ましな方かも知れないよ

original: I keep an eye on their comings and goings. No one suspects poor Cairine. Poor, poor Cairine. Ha!
string: 彼らの行動は見張っているわ。哀れなカイリーンを疑う者はいない。哀れな、哀れなカイリーンを。アハ！

original: Heard they're reforming the Dawnguard. Vampire hunters or something, in the old fort near Riften. Might consider joining up myself.
string: ドーンガードを改編しているらしいね。吸血鬼ハンターか何か、リフテンの近くの古い砦で。入隊しようかな

original: Did your mother keep gargoyles here?
string: 母親はここでガーゴイルを飼っていたのか？

original: Are there other Vigilants still out there?
string: まだ他にも番人はいるのか？

original: By the Eight...
string: なんて事だ、八大神よ…

original: Tell me again about being a Vampire Lord.
string: 吸血鬼の王の力についてもう一度聞きたい

original: The poor thing living here probably just fell out of favor upstairs.
string: ここにいるお気の毒な方は、上の階で機嫌を損ねたのでしょうね

original: And if I want to remain a werewolf?
string: ウェアウルフのままでいたいと言えば？

original: By the way... my name is Serana. Good to meet you.
string: ところで… わたしはセラーナ。どうぞよしなに

original: Here you go.
string: ほらよ

original: Hmm?
string: ふふん？

original: If this ends up being a wasted trip, your friend Dexion and I are going to have some words when we get back.
string: もしこれが無駄骨に終わるようでしたら、戻ってからお友達のデキソンと話をしなければなりませんわね

original: Yes, I see them now... One contains the ancient secrets of the dragons, and the other speaks of the potency of ancient blood.
string: 見えてきたぞ… 書のひとつにはドラゴンに関するいにしえの秘密が含まれ、もうひとつには古き血が持つ力の事が記されている

original: You think he'll try to kill us?
string: 我々を殺そうとしてくるだろうか？

original: I'll rip the Dawnguard apart!
string: ドーンガードなど八つ裂きにしてくれる！

original: Speak with Isran. He has something for you.
string: イスランに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: Yeah.
string: ですわね

original: Unh!
string: あああ！

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: We're going to a place I've never been... and we're goind to see my mother. After all these years.
string: わたしが行った事もない場所におもむいて、母と会う事になるなんて… 何年ぶりになるのかしら

original: Only thirty more pages and my next volume will be complete.
string: あと30ページで、次の巻が完成するぞ

original: It's not a question of trust... he's just obsessed with the prophecy.
string: 信頼うんぬんの問題ではなくて… 父は予言一辺倒になってしまったの

original: I immediately realized things must be pretty bad. Looks like I was right.
string: 相当ヤバい事になってるのはすぐに察しがついたが、どうやら図星だったらしいな

original: The sky shouldn't look like that...
string: 空の様子がおかしい…

original: The name's Katria. I am - was - an adventurer. Raided ruins like this for nigh on twenty years.
string: あたしの名はカトリア。かつては… 冒険者だった。こういう遺跡をほぼ20年間暴いてきたよ

original: Will I be able to keep these rings?
string: 指輪はそのままもらっていいのか？

original: Well, I think it's specifically the black ones. I don't know if the Soul Cairn takes just any leftovers.
string: ええ、特に黒い方に関しては。ソウル・ケルンが残り物なら何でも受け入れるかどうかは分かりませんわね

original: Definitely. You must think my life has been so strange. It sounds like your family wasn't nearly as fractured as mine.
string: そのとおりですわ。わたしの人生がすごく変わってるとあなたは思うのかしらね。わたしと違って、あなたの家族は全然壊れてなかったのでしょうから

original: Well... I trust you'll take care of this unwanted visitor. My guards will not interfere with you carrying out my justice.
string: なるほど… この招かれざる客を処理してくれるな。お前が私の正義を執行するのに衛兵は干渉しない

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: Finished?
string: 済みまして？

original: He'll tell you what a monster I am, that I can't be trusted... You mark my words, it's him you need to worry about.
string: 我（われ）がいかに人でなしで、信用に値しないか… とか言ってくるだろうが、警戒すべきなのは奴の方だからな！

original: Finally! I never thought I'd see these again.
string: やっとか！ もう戻らないかと思ってた

original: They've holed up in an abandoned fort in the Reach.
string: 彼らはリーチにある廃墟と化した砦に潜伏したわ

original: Nothing. Well, not on purpose. But you never know. The strangest accidents can happen at any time.
string: 何も。少なくとも、故意ではないわ。まあ、何が起こるかは、誰にも分からないものよね

original: I'll fight anything that can be fought. Beyond that... I don't want your death on my conscience.
string: 戦えるものとは何であろうと戦う。その先は… あんたを決して死なせたくはないよ

original: What are you doing here?
string: ここで何をしてるんだ？

original: You should not have come here, vampire.
string: ここはお前の来るところじゃない

original: She was very fond of her alchemical garden in the castle courtyard. She taught me quite a bit about cultivating quality reagents.
string: 母はお城の中庭にある錬金術用の庭園がとても好きでしたわ。わたしに質のいい試薬の作り方を色々教えてくれましたのよ

original: It's only a matter of time!
string: 逃げられると思うな！

original: I need to find someone named Florentius.
string: フロレンティウスという人物を探している

original: Arkay be with you, my friend.
string: 友よ、アーケイの加護がありますように

original: Shhh. They're watching us. Always watching.
string: シー。彼らが見てる。いつも見張ってるんだ

original: This is true, but my techniques only work on the living. You've chosen a different path to remake yourself.
string: これは本当よ、でも私の技術は生者にしか使えない。あなたは自分を作り変える別の道をすでに選んだ

original: Get out of my way.
string: 邪魔をするな

original: Go on.
string: 続けてくれ

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: ...this is where I ended up. It was... quite the fall.
string: …あたしの最後の場所だ。すごい落ちっぷりだったな…

original: Rival assassin?
string: 対立関係にある暗殺者？

original: You've turned her against me!
string: 娘を離反させたな！

original: The Ideal Masters have charged him with overseeing the Keepers, and will undoubtedly investigate the fact that the barrier has fallen.
string: アイディール・マスターに、番人を監視する任務を負わされているの。きっと障壁が破れた事実を調査するはずよ

original: I didn't want you to think I was one of those... you know, the women who just sit in their castle all day?
string: よくいるあの… お城に一日中座っている部類の女だと思われたくなかったのです

original: Surprisingly, they agreed to protect us but demanded a terrible price... the blinding of our race.
string: 彼らは意外にも我々を守る事に同意したが、法外な対価を要求してきた。種族の目から光を奪うというのだ

original: What have you got for sale?
string: どんな物を売ってるんだ？

original: What is this artifact?
string: どんな秘宝なんだ？

original: Your words do me great honor.
string: 名誉ある言葉だ

original: I knew it would come to this one day. I knew, and no one believed.
string: いつかこうなるのは分かっていた。でも誰もそれを信じようとはしなかったのだ

original: And I'm not half the vampire Lord Harkon is. Truth is I'm better with a forge than I am with claws or fangs.
string: それでも吸血鬼としてはハルコン卿の足元にも及ばない。実際、爪と牙を使うよりも鍛冶の方が得意なの

original: Makes everything else worth it.
string: 来た甲斐がありましたわ

original: Ain't too often we get a visitor like that.
string: ああいう客人は珍しいからな

original: What do you mean by allaying fear through vampiric seduction?
string: 吸血鬼の誘惑で恐れを鎮める、というのは？

original: Burn them all!
string: 焼き尽くせ！

original: I'm surprised you think you can manage without me, but it's your choice.
string: わたしがいなくても大丈夫だなんて、大した自信ですのね。好きにしてよろしくてよ

original: Isran will decide if you've got what it takes. Go on, he's right inside.
string: 使いものになるかどうかはイスランが見極める。入れ。彼は中にいる

original: Good. I knew I was sending the right man for the job.
string: いいぞ。仕事の人選は間違ってなかったようだな

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: Look, there's a chest in there. Door's sealed tight, though...
string: 見て、あそこに宝箱がある。扉は密閉されているけど…

original: Nothing you can't handle.
string: 楽勝だろ

original: Don't. Get. Caught.
string: 捕まるなという事だ

original: I don't know, but she must be connected.
string: わからないが、人脈はありそうだった

original: The Soul Cairn has become a part of what I am. I can never fully call Tamriel my home again, or I would surely perish.
string: ソウル・ケルンは我が存在の一部と化している。タムリエルに戻ろうとしても、この身は滅んでしまうだろう

original: Try asking one of the guards.
string: 衛兵に聞いてみればいいんじゃない

original: The first vampire came from Molag Bal. She... was not a willing subject. But she was still the first.
string: 最初の吸血鬼はモラグ・バルから生まれましたの。その彼女は… 自ら望んだのではなかった。けれども彼女は真祖となった

original: Good riddance.
string: 寂しいなんて思っちゃいないんだからな

original: Speak with Florentius. He has something for you.
string: フロレンティウスに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: You never disappoint. What've you got there?
string: 期待を裏切らないわね。何を見つけたの？

original: Not the most solid construction here. About what I'd expect from... creatures like this.
string: ここの造りは微妙ですけれど、このあたりに関しては例外ですわね…

original: Isran? My help?
string: イスラン？ 手を貸せと？

original: Good. You are weaker while on the ground, because you cannot access the blood magic.
string: 地上では血の魔法が使えないため、力が弱くなる

original: Hurry back. You don't want to keep Lord Harkon waiting.
string: 急いで戻れ。ハルコン卿を待たせたくはないだろう

original: Another one of those things. Let's keep our distance.
string: また同じのですわ。距離を保って

original: What is your command?
string: ご命令は？

original: I'd try to visit my mother in the garden, and she'd quickly shoo me away saying she was much too busy.
string: 庭園にいる母のところへ行こうとしましたの。すると彼女は忙しいと言ってわたしをすぐ追い払ったのですわ

original: As far as I've heard, no one's seen them and returned to Tamriel to tell about it.
string: 聞いた限りでは、それらを目にしてタムリエルに戻れた者はいないようですけれども

original: You're pretty good. I don't think there's anything more you can learn from me.
string: なかなかやるわね。これ以上私から学ぶ事はないと思うわ

original: DialogueGenericHello
string: DialogueGenericHello

original: Calm down. Who's Arvak?
string: 落ち着いて。アルヴァクは？

original: All quiet now.
string: 物音がしないな

original: Keep going...
string: 続けて…

original: Life here is better than you could find anywhere in Skyrim.
string: ここでの暮らしはスカイリムで一番だよ

original: These Vigilants never know when to give up. I thought we'd taught them enough of a lesson at their hall.
string: 番人どももあきらめが悪いな。番人の間で思い知らせてやったつもりが

original: I never got the chance.
string: そんな機会はなかった

original: What is the vampire doing?
string: その吸血鬼は何をしているのか？

original: This feels like the right way. I was starting to worry.
string: こちらで正解ですわね。一時はどうなる事かと思いましたわ

original: The Elder Scroll is just ahead.
string: 星霜の書はすぐ先よ

original: Feed well.
string: よく食べなさい

original: Nothing else?
string: 他には？

original: I'm going to rend you limb from limb!
string: バラバラに引き裂いてやる！

original: Your blood will not protect you!
string: お前の血はお前を守ってはくれない！

original: Why is it so dark?
string: なぜこんなに暗いんだ？

original: One more word of warning. There's a dragon that calls itself Durnehviir roaming the Cairn.
string: もう一つ警告するわ。ダーネヴィールと名乗るドラゴンがケルンをうろついている

original: So what exactly am I doing to it?
string: 具体的にどうすれば？

original: None of the others ever made it this far.
string: ここまで来られた奴は他にいないよ

original: Hello
string: やあ

original: Teamwork, right there.
string: チームワークの勝利ですわ

original: Can I cound on you to handle whatever smithing work we need done? Repairs, new armor, weapons...
string: 鍛冶仕事なら何でも君に任せていいだろうか？ 修理とか、新しい防具や武器の製造とか…

original: As promised, I now teach you the first word of Soul Tearing: "Rii" - the essence of your enemy's life force.
string: 約束どおり、ソウル・ティアリングの最初の一語、“リィ”を教えよう。敵の命の粋を意味する

original: Wait... Serana? Is that truly you? I cannot believe my eyes!
string: ちょっと待った… セラーナ？ 本当に君なのか？ 信じられない！

original: What was this place?
string: この場所は？

original: As a vampire, you will gain new powers, but also a weakness to sunlight.
string: 吸血鬼になると新たな力を発揮できるが、同時に太陽光が弱点となる

original: Come on, she's leading us to the scroll.
string: 行きましょう。母が書の在りかまで案内して下さいますわ

original: Good. Go and speak to Garan Marethi. Tell him it is time. He will understand.
string: よし。ガラン・マレシに時が満ちたと伝えるがいい。それで分かるはずだ

original: Exactly. It's a lost art. Most necromancers just raise up whatever bodies are nearby. A simple trick, really. Child's play.
string: そのとおりですわ。まさしく失われた技術。ほとんどの死霊術師は、近くにある死体を何でも甦らせているだけですの。簡単な子供だましです

original: Scions of the night! Hear my words!
string: 夜の末えい達よ！ 我が言葉を聞け！

original: And if Harkon failed?
string: ハルコンがしくじった場合は？

original: I think... mostly I hate what it's done to my family.
string: 多分… 家族にされた事が、我慢できなかった

original: This land feels... twisted. I'm surprised my father didn't want to live out here.
string: ここはなんだか… ゆがんだ感じがいたしますわ。父がここに住みたがらなかったのは驚きですわね

original: Of course they did. I never doubted for a moment.
string: もちろんだよ。それに関しては一瞬たりとも疑った事はない

original: I still remember how to fight!
string: 戦い方ならまだ憶えてますの！

original: Well what did you expect, Tolan? Didn't I tell you? Didn't I warn you this would happen?
string: トラン、何を期待してたんだ？ 言っただろう？ こうなるぞと警告したはずだぞ

original: Oh, and I suppose now he remembers that I proposed no less than three different scenarios that involved vampires overrunning the population.
string: そういえば、吸血鬼が人口の大多数を占めるようになるまでのシナリオを何通りも提示した事があるけど、今は信じてくれてるんでしょうね

original: What can I do for you?
string: ご用は何だい？

original: I see you, heathen!
string: 見つけたぞ、野蛮人め！

original: Oh thank you, milady. Thank you!
string: 奥様… ありがとうございます！

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: Have you decided? I am not a patient man.
string: 決めたのか？ 私は決して気の長い男ではない

original: If you have a better lead than this, I'm all ears.
string: もっといい手掛かりを持っているなら、聞いてさしあげてもよくてよ

original: It feels... old, doesn't it? Even by dwarven standards. No one has been here in thousands of years.
string: 古い感じだね… そうじゃない？ ドワーフの基準をもってしても。数千年間、誰もここに来ていない

original: The Dawnguard will want the Bow, and they will fight us, hard, to get it.
string: ドーンガードは弓をほしがる。手に入れるためには必死で戦うでしょうね

original: Are you sure? I'm willing to turn you, but you need to think it through.
string: 本当に？ わたしとしてはあなたを変えてもいいけれど、入念に考えないと

original: The darkness hums and we sing its praises. Sweet melodies. Sweet like the water that flows through their veins.
string: 闇がハミングし、私達はその称賛を歌う。甘い旋律。彼らの血管を流れる水のように甘い

original: Sorine needs help with her project to improve our crossbows. And if that doesn't interest you...
string: ソリーヌがクロスボウの改良を手伝ってくれる人を探してる。それに興味がないなら…

original: Hey, if you don't like it, you could always shop for your Elder Scrolls elsewhere.
string: 嫌なら別の場所で星霜の書を探せばいいだけの話だ

original: Nnnnyyaarrgghh!
string: ぬおおおお！

original: Weergh!
string: うわっ！

original: Excellent. I knew I could count on you. That's one less trouble maker to keep an eye on.
string: 素晴らしい。やはりお前は頼りになるな。これで監視する厄介者が一人減った

original: How dare you trespass here!
string: よくここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな！

original: Well of course we do. I'm old, not stupid.
string: もちろんやっている。私は年寄りだが愚か者ではない

original: Not bad. Not bad at all.
string: いける、いける

original: Let me show you what I need.
string: 探しているものがある

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Should you run out of magicka, you can descend to the ground and fight as the beasts do.
string: マジカが尽きてしまった場合、地面に下りてけだものどもと同様に戦う事もできる

original: Is that where you were attacked?
string: そこで襲われたのか？

original: What is it?
string: 何？

original: You give me freedom from the enslavement of the Ideal Masters. Thank you.
string: アイディール・マスターどもの束縛から自由を得る事ができた。ありがたい

original: Lord Harkon. Remember your place.
string: ハルコン卿。立場をおわきまえに

original: Testing this will require some extra precautions, I think.
string: これを試すには、かなり注意が必要ね

original: Here you are.
string: ほらよ

original: I think we'll want Sorine Jurard. Breton girl, whip-smart and good with tinkering. Fascination with the Dwemer. Weapons in particular.
string: ソリーヌ・シュラルドを仲間にしよう。手先が器用でとても賢いブレトンの娘だ。ドゥーマーの文化に魅せられていて、特に彼らの武器への興味があるらしい

original: You're no bard/merchant/pilgrim.
string: 吟遊詩人でも商人でも巡礼者でもないだろう

original: The vampires are much more dangerous than we ever dreamed. The Dawnguard is the only hope now.
string: 吸血鬼達は想像よりはるかに大きな脅威だ。残された希望はもはやドーンガードだけ

original: Isran, of all people. We're reduced to asking him for help.
string: あのイスランに助けを求めるしかないなんてな

original: I know very little about them.
string: 彼らについてはほとんど知らないわ

original: Suit yourself.
string: お好きなように

original: I know you do, but this is something I need to do alone.
string: 分かっておりますのよ、けれどもこれは一人でやらなくてはいけない事なのです

original: You've heard of the Bloodstone Chalice?
string: ブラッドストーンの聖杯を知っているか？

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: The only thing I see around here in abundance are soul husks. You know, those ugly fungus-looking things growing out of the ground.
string: この辺で山ほどあるものと言えば魂のハスクだけだ。あの地面から生えてる変てこりんなキノコみたいな奴だよ

original: Uh, my weapon? I mostly just use my pa's axe, when wolves are attacking the goats or something.
string: 武器？ 親父の斧だよ。ヤギが狼に襲われた時なんかに使うぐらいさ

original: No, you've got it all wrong. We're here to stop him... to make everything right.
string: 違いますわ、そうではありませんの。わたし達は父を止めるために… すべてを正すためにここへ来ましたのよ

original: It's... not as shiny as I was expecting.
string: ですわね… 思っていたよりもキラキラしておりませんわ

original: (Panting)
string: ハッ、ハッ、ハッ、ハッ、ハッ

original: What makes you say that?
string: どうしてわかる？

original: Some Imperial scholar arrived in Skyrim a few days ago. I was staking out the road when I saw him pass by. Maybe that's your Moth Priest.
string: 数日前に帝国の学者がスカイリムにやってきた。路上で張り込みをしていたら、彼が通り過ぎるのが見えたんだ。多分あれは君の探している聖蚕の僧侶だろう

original: Which, I'm sorry to say, means your usefulness is at an end!
string: つまり、お前はもう用済みだという事だ！

original: That's one of them Imperial scholars, right? Old man with a gray robe?
string: 帝国の学者さんかい？ 灰色のローブを着たじいさんか？

original: Guards! Kill her!
string: 傭兵ども！ 奴の頭をねじ切れ！

original: Are you all right?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: I'll drain the life from you!
string: 命を吸い取ってやる！

original: I mean, what do you think my father will do when we bring him the bow?
string: 弓を届けたら、父は一体何をするつもりだと思いますの？

original: Agh!
string: ああ！

original: Fools? Why do you say that?
string: 愚かな者たち？ どうしてそう思う？

original: They've holed up in an abandoned fort in the Reach.
string: 彼らはリーチにある廃墟と化した砦に潜伏した

original: Are you mad, woman? After the trouble I've gone through?
string: 正気か、お嬢さん？ これだけやった挙句にか？

original: I'm getting there. Making my peace with it.
string: もう少しですのよ。そうなれば、悩まなくて済むようになりますわ

original: Come now, and hear my proclamation.
string: さあ、我が宣言を聞くがいい

original: I'm sure you've heard a bit of what we're up against. Powerful vampires, unlike anything we've seen before.
string: 我々の敵について少しは耳にした事があるはずだ。我々がこれまで見た事のないほど、手強い吸血鬼の事を

original: I made it.
string: 自力で作った

original: Once I get it done, first I'll publish a regular edition, then the folio. I'll be rich!
string: それが完成したら、まずは通常版を発表し、拡大版も制作する！ 大金持ちになれちゃうな！

original: Auriel's Bow will be mine!
string: アーリエルの弓は私のものだ！

original: Because most of the stories end with the Ideal Masters duping the necromancers, who end up dead or wishing they were dead.
string: 話のほとんどではアイディール・マスター達に出し抜かれた死霊術師達が、死んだり、いっそ死にたいと思ったりする結末でしたから

original: Any soul gem?
string: どんな魂石でも？

original: Why do you call me "Qahnaarin?"
string: こちらを“クァーナーリン”と呼ぶ理由は？

original: You're not getting the best of me!
string: わたしには勝てませんことよ！

original: The White-Gold Tower?
string: 白金の塔？

original: No... I won't let you ruin centuries of preparations...
string: やめろ… 何世紀もかけた計画を台なしにする気か…

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: We don't need competition for blood, and we don't want the mortals getting up in arms making things difficult for us.
string: 血の獲得競争は必要ない、そして定命の者達がいきり立って状況を困難にする事も望ましくない

original: It all comes back to my father.
string: すべては父にまつわる話なのです

original: Good. Do not offend me by losing it again.
string: よし。再び失くすなどという無礼のないようにな

original: It was.
string: 昔はそうでしたわね

original: Then go forth, child. May the enrichment of Auri-El strengthen your resolve as you undertake your journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: さあ、行くがいい。アーリエルの力が汝の意思をさらに強くし、最奥聖域への道のりを助けるだろう

original: Cursed, not dead. Doomed to exist in this form for eternity. Trapped between laas and dinok, between life and death.
string: 死ではなく、永遠にこの姿で存在させられる呪いなのだ。ラースとディノク、生と死の狭間に閉じ込められて…

original: What can you tell me about Dimhollow Crypt?
string: ディムホロウ墓地について聞かせてほしい

original: Another elf, I see. I'm sure Vingalmo will be sizing you up as we speak, trying to figure if you're friend or foe.
string: またエルフか。こうして話している間にもヴィンガルモが品定めをして、敵か味方かを見極めている事だろうな

original: If there's assistance I can provide, just ask. It's the least I can do.
string: 何かできる事があれば言ってくれ。私にはそんな事しかできないのだ

original: What was the bargain?
string: 取引の条件は？

original: She just wants to go home.
string: 家に帰りたいだけだろう

original: No.
string: いいや

original: I used to help my mother tend a garden in the courtyard here.
string: 母がここの中庭の庭園を世話するのをよく手伝いましたわ

original: Let twilight fall and blood spill!
string: 世界を闇で包み、血で染めろ！

original: I don't really care what you are.
string: そちらが何者であろうと、気にしない

original: Why was Dagon able to do this?
string: デイゴンはどうしてそんなことを？

original: I don't want to become a vampire. I refuse your gift.
string: 吸血鬼にはなりたくない。申し出は拒否する

original: Is something wrong?
string: 何か問題でも？

original: If there's anything I can do before you depart, you must let me know.
string: 出発前に何かできる事があれば、必ず知らせてちょうだい

original: It is the greatest token we can bestow upon those we love and wish to see protected.
string: 我々が愛し守るべき者達に捧げられる最高の贈り物をね

original: I have killed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: You've managed to turn into one of them. Wonderful. I won't kill you, but you'd better get yourself cured.
string: 彼らの仲間になれたわけね。大層な事だわ。殺しはしないけど、治療を受けた方がいいわよ

original: I killed them both.
string: 両方とも手にかけた

original: Were did you go?
string: どこへ行った？

original: Did you know I visited Elswyr once? What a strange and wondrous place.
string: エルスウィーアに行ったことがあるって話したか？ 奇妙で驚くほど凄い所だったな

original: Do not presume to tell me who I can and cannot trust. I possess the wisdom of a dozen lifetimes, and I will make my own judgements.
string: 誰を信用すべきかは私が決める。永き時間を生きてきたこの知恵で、私が判断するのだ

original: Speak with Orthjolf. He has something for you.
string: オースユルフと話すといい。何かあるはずだ

original: I can't say that I'm surprised by your answer. Until I get my second volume published, no one will ever know of my achievements.
string: 驚くような事じゃないぞ。手記の第二巻を出版するまで、我が偉業は誰も知らなかったのであるからして

original: Of course he did.
string: もちろんだ

original: All right. Here goes.
string: では始めますわ

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: I wish I could have been there to hear the sounds of their screams.
string: 奴らの悲鳴をこの耳で聞きたかったものだ

original: These pages meant the world to me. Thank you!
string: この原稿はおれの全てなんだ。ありがとう！

original: Could you get this for me? I don't exactly have a lockpick...
string: これをどうにかしてくれる？ 開錠は得意じゃなくてね…

original: For countless years I've roamed the Soul Cairn, in unintended service to the Ideal Masters.
string: 我は幾星霜もの間ソウル・ケルンをさまよい、意図せずしてアイディール・マスターどもに仕えていた

original: Allow me to gather some of my things and I'll head back to Castle Volkihar.
string: 荷物をまとめさせて。それからヴォルキハル城へ向かいましょう

original: Hmmm... interesting... those dwarves were clever creatures. I'll tinker around with these techniques and see what I can come up with around here.
string: へえ… すごいわね… 頭の切れるドワーフがいたのね。この技術に手を加えて、ここで手に入る物で何か作ってみるわ

original: Ah, well, in that case I'll tell you what I know.
string: なるほど、そういう事なら特別に教えてやるよ

original: All right, so obviously not this way, either.
string: いいですわ。この道でもない事は明らかですわね

original: Might come in handy.
string: 役立ちそうだ

original: You know, an important member of society. Someone attached to the Jarl's court, a merchant, a bard, a priest, someone with stature.
string: まあ、社会的に重要な人物だな。首長の宮廷の関係者とか、商人、吟遊詩人、司祭などの社会的地位のある者がいい

original: I guess... we kind of have to go way back. To the very beginning. Do you know where vampirism came from?
string: おそらくは… これまでの事を逆向きに、始まりまで辿って行かねばなりませんわね。吸血鬼がどこから来たかご存知？

original: All this talk of Elder Scrolls and Auriel's Bow... Lord Harkon's ambition truly is great.
string: 星霜の書とアーリエルの弓の色々な話… ハルコン卿の大志は本当に偉大よ

original: What happened to this place?
string: ここで一体何がありましたの？

original: You disrespect Lord Harkon by walking around here like that. Go see him at once, else you might find yourself in a cage.
string: そのように歩きまわるのはハルコン卿に対する非礼だ。直ちに拝謁しに行け、さもないと檻にぶち込むぞ

original: I'm sorry, I'm not about to do that without at least a single gyro to show for my efforts.
string: 悪いけど、見返りのジャイロが1つもないなら、引き受けるわけにはいかないわ

original: That's it. That's the last scroll.
string: それですわ。それが最後の書ですのよ

original: You realize it's not really necessary to take on that form here.
string: ここではその姿になる必要はないぞ

original: I'll set out at once, then.
string: 直ちに出発します

original: You think I can't tell my own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
string: 自分が何者かも、分からないように見えまして？ 目を開けなくても、匂いで気づくぐらいですわ

original: Odds and ends I've gathered over the years. Well, used to gather before all of this nonsense happened to me.
string: 長年かけて集めたガラクタだよ。このバカげた境遇に陥る前は、物を集めるのが好きだったんだ

original: Feel free to poke around the fort and take what you need. There isn't much yet, but you're welcome to anything you can use.
string: 好きなだけ砦を散策して、必要なものがあったら持っていってくれ。大したものはないかも知れないが、使えそうなら何だっていい

original: This is a waste of time.
string: 時間の無駄だ

original: I have not always been a ragged beggar. I learned my art from the masters of the art of flesh sculpture.
string: ずっとみすぼらしい物乞いだったわけじゃない。肉体改造の達人から技術を教わったのよ

original: Is that an Elder Scroll?
string: それは星霜の書なのか？

original: Are you prepared to read the Elder Scroll?
string: 星霜の書を読む用意はできているか？

original: By the divines! It's as if my eyes have been opened! I am blinded by the light of your majesty. I... I must obey you.
string: おお、神々よ！ 覚醒とはこの事です！ あなた様の威光の強さで目が見えない… ご用を何なりと

original: Come with me, "merchant."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“商人”よ

original: But she loved it. I don't know. I guess it's like having a piece of art, if you're into that sort of thing.
string: でも母は気に入っていましたわ。芸術品を持つようなものだったのかも知れませんわね。あなたにそういった趣味があるかは知りませんけれど

original: No, you don't...
string: そんな、違いますわ…

original: It probably didn't have anything to do with you.
string: おそらく君がどうこうという話じゃなかったんだろうな

original: It was only just a little bit ago. I bet you can catch them if you hurry up.
string: ほんの少し前の事だよ。急げばきっと追いつくんじゃないかな

original: Look at this place. I can't imagine choosing to come here. My mother must have been terrified.
string: ご覧になって。好きこのんでこんな所に来る人なんておりますかしら？ 母は無理強いされたに違いありませんわ

original: One less monster in the world.
string: これでこの世から化物が1匹消えた

original: Watch yourself. Since the quake, this place has been pretty unstable.
string: 気をつけて。地震以来、この場所はかなり不安定だよ

original: I suppose that's as much as I can hope for.
string: それがせめてもの願いだ

original: Thank you for your kindness. I'll remember it the next time I'm feeling hungry.
string: ご親切にありがとう。次にお腹がすいた時には今のを思い出す事にいたしますわ

original: How many do you need?
string: いくつ必要なんだ？

original: Let's take a look around. There has to be something here that tells us where she's gone.
string: 探してみましょう。母の行き先の手がかりがどこかにあるはずですわ

original: Why would a dremora attack you?
string: どうしてドレモラに襲われるんだ？

original: So go and meet your beloved Stendarr.
string: 最愛のステンダールとやらの所に行くがいい

original: Well done! I said you'd return victorious, Arkay wasn't so sure. Wield it bravely.
string: お見事！ あんたなら勝てると言ったが、アーケイは信じてなかったよ。勇敢な奴だ

original: What will happen to you now?
string: そちらはこれからどうする？

original: This is an intriguing change.
string: 興味深い変化だな

original: The Soul Cairn is home to very powerful beings. Necromancers send them souls, and receive powers of their own in return.
string: ソウル・ケルンには強大な力を持つ存在が複数いる。死霊術師はそれらに魂を送り、見返りとして力を得ている
