original: Idiot! I can't get to the scroll with Durnehviir attacking us!
string: 馬鹿者！ ダーネヴィールに攻撃されながら書を手に入れる事はできないわ！

original: Not much. If you read any history, it shows up from time to time, but it's a hard thing to track.
string: そうでもありませんの。歴史の書物には時々出てきますけれど、その行方を追い続けるのが難しいのですわ

original: What can you tell me about Auriel's Bow?
string: アーリエルの弓について何か知らないか？

original: Sit down and enjoy yourself.
string: まあ掛けてくつろいでくれ

original: In this form, you can drain the life from your foes with your right hand.
string: この姿では右手で敵の生命力を吸い取る事ができる

original: They tried me for murder, threw me on a prison ship and sent me to the jail in Vivec City.
string: 殺人容疑で裁判にかけられ、護送船でヴィベク・シティにある監獄に送られたよ

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: I knew you'd miss me.
string: わたしでなければダメだと分かっておりましたのよ

original: You've done exactly as I predicted and brought your fetching companion to me.
string: 確かにお前は言った通りの仕事を終え、魅力的な人物を連れ帰ってきた

original: So either I need to find the satchel those mudcrabs stole, or I need another gyro from someplace. You wouldn't happen to have one, would you?
string: つまり、マッドクラブに盗まれた袋を探し出すか、代わりのジャイロを手に入れなくちゃいけないという事。あなたは持ってない？

original: Were you looking for me?
string: わたしを探しておりましたの？

original: Sorry, I'll drop it.
string: 悪い、この話はやめよう

original: By the Divines, what happened to the sky?
string: ああ、神々よ、空はどうなってしまったんだ？

original: You know where to find me if you need more.
string: 必要になったら来てくれ

original: You're always welcome to return here at any time, of course.
string: 用があればいつでもここに来てくれ

original: I liked to explore. My parents almost never let me off the island, so yeah, I poked around down here a lot.
string: 探検するのが好きでしたの。両親がほとんど島の外に出してくれませんでしたから、ここをずいぶん見て回りましたわ

original: Bedroom furnishings. (<Global=HDWhiterunBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室用品(<Global=HDWhiterunBedroom> ゴールド)

original: You'll remain mortal, but you'll find yourself weakened within the Soul Cairn.
string: 定命の体は変わりませんけれども、ソウル・ケルン内では力が弱くなってしまうでしょうね

original: Run, coward! You're a traitor to your race!
string: 逃げるがいい、同族を裏切った臆病者め！

original: You know as much as I do. I can't teach you anything new.
string: 既に同じくらいの腕になってるだろう。これ以上、教えられる事はない

original: (grunt)
string: うう…

original: I'm ready if you are.
string: あなたさえよければよろしくてよ

original: Now the whole world will fall at our feet.
string: 全世界が今私達の足元にひれ伏すでしょう

original: I need to speak to you, stranger. Now.
string: 見知らぬ者よ、今すぐ話がある

original: Well, unless my vision's playing tricks, there seems to be some sort of magical effect around you. Seems like we're on the right track.
string: 幻惑でも見ていない限り、あなたの周りに魔法の効果のようなものが見えますわ。やり方は間違っていなかったようですわね

original: You sound like you were a weird little kid.
string: だいぶひねくれた子供だったみたいだな

original: I trust you completely.
string: 全面的に信頼している

original: Farewell, friend. May the light of Auri-El illuminate your darkest hours.
string: さようなら、友よ。苦難の時も、アーリエルの光が導いてくれるだろう

original: So this is it...
string: これだね…

original: I think that might have been what we were waiting for.
string: まるでわたし達が訪れるのを待っていたように思えますわね

original: I wish Orthjolf and Vingalmo would just get it over with and kill each other. I'm tired of listening to them.
string: オースユルフとヴィンガルモが吹っ切れて互いを殺せばいいのに。彼らの話を聞くのはうんざりよ

original: Mind yourself. There's a vicious bear on the loose.
string: 気をつけろ、凶悪なクマがうろついてる

original: That would fit with the rest of it... I don't like it, but you did right to play along. We need to find out what this is all about.
string: それでしっくりくるな… 気に食わないが、君はうまくやってくれた。この件の真相を解明しよう

original: What do we do now?
string: これからどうする？

original: Door's shut tight. I bet those Resonators would open it, though.
string: 扉は密閉されている。でもあの共鳴装置で開くはずだよ

original: I don't have 25 husks.
string: ハスク25個の手持ちはないな

original: The sooner we get out of this place, the better.
string: できるだけ早くここから出た方がよろしくてよ

original: Get out of here, monster.
string: バケモノめ、ここから去れ

original: She had a theory about soul gems. That the souls inside of them don't just vanish when they're used... they end up in the Soul Cairn.
string: 母は魂石に関する仮説を話してくれましたわ。中の魂が消費されてもただ消えるのではなく、ソウル・ケルンの中に送られるのかも知れないと

original: Is that... oh no. Are we going down there?
string: あれは… まさか、あそこに降りますの？

original: You're dead!
string: お前は終わりだ！

original: Arkay is so hard to understand when it comes to life and death. Is he still alive? There's always hope...
string: 生や死に関しては、アーケイの言葉は分かりにくい。彼は生きてるのか？ まだ希望はあるはずだ…

original: Not... yet...
string: まだ… まだだ…

original: Gunmar and I agree that we're going to need Florentius to help.
string: フロレンティウスの助けが必要という事で、ガンマーとも意見が一致したわ

original: I'll be around here if you need me.
string: ここにおりますわ、用がありましたらまた

original: This may be the last time we're able to converse. If you have any questions before you leave, I suggest you ask them.
string: 話ができるのは、これが最後になるかも知れない。分からない事があれば、今聞いておいた方がいいぞ

original: How do I turn her into a vampire?
string: 彼女を吸血鬼に変えるにはどうすれば？

original: Opus? What do you mean?
string: 作品とは？

original: You wouldn't dare. Now shut up and keep on watch.
string: あなたには無理よ。さあ黙って警戒を続けなさい

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: All right. I'll hear out Isran, see if there's anything I can do to help.
string: 分かった。イスランの言い分を聞いて、力になれるかどうか考えよう

original: He doesn't know we're here. I don't have time to explain.
string: わたし達がここにいるのをお父様は知りませんわ。説明している時間はありませんの

original: The law will require proof that we can't present. And Jarls disapprove of bloodshed they haven't called for themselves.
string: 法は我々では提示できない証拠を求めるだろうし、各首長は自ら命じたもの以外の流血に眉をひそめるものだ

original: From what I saw in the vision, the Elder Scroll which foreshadows the defiance of the gods with the blood of mortals is the key to the prophecy.
string: 私が見たものから判断すると、定命の者の血による神への反逆を予兆する星霜の書が、予言の根幹となるはずだ

original: Ah, of course. The prophecy. You've come here to stop me from taking Auriel's Bow and shrouding the world in darkness.
string: ああなるほど、予言か。私がアーリエルの弓を手にし、この世を闇で覆ってしまうのを止めに来たのだな？

original: I find it tiring to converse with someone in that form. Too much effort.
string: そんな姿をした者と話をするのは疲れるよ。多大な労力を必要とするからね

original: My name is Serana. Who sent you here?
string: わたしはセラーナ。あなた、誰に言われていらっしゃったの？

original: I've collected all the Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 血の魔法の指輪をすべて集めた

original: See to it at once.
string: 直ちに手配してくれ

original: Are you ready to go? I'm not entirely sure what this thing is going to do when I add my blood.
string: 準備はよくて？ わたしの血を加えた時に何がどうなるか、確証はございませんわよ

original: The Empire supports Elisif, but there are many in Skyrim loyal to Ulfric.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持しているが、スカイリムにはウルフリックに忠実な者が大勢いる

original: Follow me.
string: ついて来い

original: You're dead.
string: あなたはもう死んでいる

original: I had some help. From Katria.
string: 助けてもらった。カトリアに

original: I don't trust that man, and I don't want him here.
string: あの男は信用できない。ここにはいてほしくないな

original: Settle down. No need for threats. Lead the way. But I'm warning you, I'm not afraid to fight you if I have to.
string: 落ち着け。脅す必要なんてない。先に行け。ただし、警告しておく。必要があればいつでも戦うぞ

original: Nature will do the rest.
string: その後は自然の成り行きに任せるんだ

original: I'll remember this.
string: この事は忘れませんわ

original: I told you, I've prepared for this. It's going to work.
string: 言っただろ、準備はしてある。うまくいくさ

original: That's right. I used to be a Vigilant, but we had a difference of opinion.
string: そうだ、かつては番人の一員だったが、意見の食い違いがあってな

original: I wish Lokil would hurry it up. I have half a mind to return to the castle and tell Harkon what a fool he's entrusted this mission to.
string: ロキルが急いでくれないかしら。城に戻ってハルコンに彼がどれほどの間抜けにこの仕事を任せたか教えたいぐらいよ

original: Don't worry, we'll find the glade.
string: 心配しないで。“先人の湿地”はきっと見つかるわ

original: Who sent you?
string: 誰に言われてここに？

original: We should check back with Isran.
string: イスランに報告すべきだな

original: The Betrayed weren't to blame.
string: 裏切られし者のせいではなかった

original: And if she doesn't?
string: そうでなければ？

original: I'm afraid I won't be able to help you with the scrolls any longer, milady.
string: 奥様、書の件に関してはもうお手伝いできそうにありません

original: Hmmm... I see. Clever dwarves. With a similar technique and a little tinkering I should be able to improve the capabilities of our crossbows.
string: ふーん… なるほど。頭のいいドワーフね。同じような技術を使って、少し手を加えれば、クロスボウの威力を上げられるはずよ

original: I've collected all the Amulets of Night Power.
string: 夜の力のアミュレットをすべて集めた

original: This is the time of the Dawnguard!
string: ドーンガードの時代は来たれり！

original: Where'd you say this vampire was hiding?
string: 例の吸血鬼の潜伏先はどこだったか？

original: Auri-El himself may have been beyond my reach, but his influence on our world wasn't.
string: アーリエルは手の届かぬ存在だが、その力はこの世界に届いていた

original: I'll admit, I don't know that I can trust you, but I know I can't rely on the Vigilants for anything. So we'll have to work together for now.
string: 正直言って、君を信頼していいのかどうかは分からん。だが番人達が役立たずとあっては、我々は協力せざるを得ない

original: I didn't say that. I wondered if perhaps he did it for the attention, but every now and then he'll say something that makes me reconsider.
string: そうは言ってない。かまってほしくてやったのかと思ったが、時々考え直させられるような事を言ってくるんだ

original: A little extra protection never hurts.
string: 少し余分な防備を持つに越した事はないわ

original: I've heard the rumors around Skyrim. I know something's going on. And I've seen the vampires.
string: 噂はスカイリム中を駆けめぐってる。何かが起きてる事は分かってるんだ。吸血鬼の姿だって何度も見てるし

original: Orthjolf, for example. He'll tell you he means well, but believe me, he can't be trusted at all.
string: 例えばオースユルフがそうだ。善人ぶってるけど、実はまったく信用できない。本当だよ

original: Hunnnhh...
string: うううう…

original: I'll take you as far as I can, but I'm not hanging around and it's gonna cost you extra.
string: 遠いのは構わないが、向こうで待ってるのはごめんだよ。どうしてもって言うなら別料金をもらう

original: The soul of a dragon is as resilient as its owner's scaly hide.
string: ドラゴンの魂は、それを宿すうろこ状の皮と同じぐらい回復力がある

original: What have you got for sale?
string: どんな物を売ってるんだ？

original: Couldn't hurt to gather more I suppose.
string: もっと集めても多分大丈夫ですわ

original: I admire your devotion.
string: 見上げた信仰心だな

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: You're not welcome here.
string: 歓迎はできないな

original: Look, I loved my father, but when he found that prophecy... that became his life. Everything else, even me and my mother... we just became clutter.
string: そう、わたしは父を愛していたけど、予言を見つけてから… 彼にとってそれがすべてになってしまった。他の事はみんな、わたしや母でさえも、どうでもよくなってしまったのです

original: Die!
string: 死ね！

original: Hiding with the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードと共に隠れている？

original: What?
string: 何？

original: I think I could use your help.
string: 手を貸してもらえないか

original: Looking to hire a boat?
string: 船を雇いたいのかい？

original: It sounds like she was pretty selfish.
string: かなり身勝手な人だったようだな

original: It's done, then. We've been chasing that fiend for a long time.
string: じゃあ、片づいたのね。長い間追い続けていた敵だったのよ

original: Come on!
string: かかっておいで！

original: If Isran is anything, he's stubborn.
string: イスランは石頭の頑固者だよ

original: What turned your people into the Betrayed?
string: 同胞たちが裏切られし者に変貌した理由は？

original: For too long we've allowed these vampires to poison the night and kill our people! Now, we finally have the means to strike back!
string: 吸血鬼どもが夜を汚し同胞達を殺すのを、我々はあまりにも長い間許してきた！ しかし今、我々はついに反撃の手段を手に入れたのだ！

original: Why wouldn't you be safe there?
string: どうして安全じゃないんだ？

original: The water from the spring makes the skooma so much more potent, we'll have all the thralls we'll ever need.
string: 泉の水によってスクゥーマの中毒性が格段に強くなる。使っても使いきれないほどの従徒を確保できそうだ

original: Oh. All right, then.
string: あら。でしたら構いませんわ

original: It certainly seems the Vigilants of Stendarr can't help themselves. No surprise there.
string: ステンダールの番人は手詰まりのようだな。あの体たらくでは驚くに値しないが

original: I don't think so. In fact, I'm going to help her get home.
string: いいや。むしろ、家に帰れるように力を貸すつもりだ

original: Aaaayyyaarrrrgghh!
string: あやあああるぐ！

original: He'll help you get around this wretched place, but I'm sure he'd be much happier someplace sunnier.
string: あいつがいれば、このろくでもない土地を動き回るのに便利だよ。もっと明るい所の方が喜ぶけどね

original: You seem to have lost the gift that has been given to you. Perhaps Serana will grant it to you again.
string: せっかくもらった贈り物を失くしたみたいだね。多分セラーナがまたくれるんじゃないかな

original: We'll talk more when we're there.
string: 続きは向こうに着いてからにしましょう

original: We need to find my mother, Valerica.
string: わたしの母、ヴァレリカを見つけなくては

original: What type of assistance do you need?
string: 手を貸すにはどうすればいい？

original: Why am I able to bestow the gift of Harkon's blood?
string: 自分もハルコンの血の恩恵を他人に授けられるのはどうしてか？

original: Get it on the ground!
string: それを地面に置きなさい！

original: There's a courtyard in the castle. I used to help her tend a garden there.
string: お城には中庭があって、母がその庭園の世話をするのをよく手伝いましたわ

original: I hope you're not trying to lord your abilities over me.
string: あんたが威張りん坊じゃないといいけど

original: Yaahh!
string: ヤァー！

original: What now, Isran?
string: 次はどうすればいい、イスラン？

original: No... Serana... your own father....
string: そんな… セラーナ… 実の父をお前は…

original: Hope you're getting along with Isran. He takes some getting used to.
string: イスランとは、うまくやれてる？ 彼、慣れないうちは難しいタイプだから

original: There are five in total, spread far apart across the Chantry.
string: 全部で5つある。広大な礼拝所のあちこちに散らばっているんだ

original: The prophecy is no more!
string: 予言は潰えた！

original: I can't remember how long I've been here. Has it been a day or a century?
string: いつからここにいるのか思い出せない。もう1日経った？ それとも1世紀？

original: It is my sworn duty to see Arkay's wrath delivered to all the undead. It's usually a good bit of fun, too.
string: アーケイの怒りがアンデッドを滅ぼすのを見届ける事が使命なんだ。何より楽しいしな

original: The order of the day would be our destruction until every last vampire was hunted down and eliminated.
string: 絶滅するその日まで吸血鬼を一人残らず追いつめて抹殺する、そんな風潮になるはずよ

original: For centuries I searched for an answer to this problem. I found an old prophecy written by a Moth Priest, those scholars who read the Elder Scrolls.
string: 私は何世紀もこの問題の解決方法を探してきた。そして星霜の書を読んだという学者達、聖蚕の僧侶の一人が記した古い予言を発見した

original: You might look around a bit. Maybe one of our predecessors still has a clue.
string: 少し見て回ったらどうかな。先に来た者達が手掛かりを残してるかも知れない

original: Does it bother you that we're working with your father?
string: 父親に協力していることが気になる？

original: Sure.
string: いいだろう

original: Nooo!
string: 嫌だぁー！

original: I'm not sure.
string: 分かりかねますわ

original: Where would a Moth Priest actually go?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶はどこに行こうとするだろうか？

original: Lah...Haas!
string: ラー…ハース！

original: Now that the Castle is yours, I was wondering.
string: 城がお前のものになったところで、提案だが

original: Beautiful. That shield... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの盾… 非の打ちどころがない

original: I find it hard to believe he's changed his mind. He said some very hurtful things to me before I left.
string: 彼の気が変わったとは思えない。ひどく傷つくような事まで言われたのよ

original: Has it been that long? Oh my.
string: そんなに長く？ そりゃあ大変だねえ

original: Bring me say... twenty-five of them, and you can rummage through what was left on my cart.
string: あれをそうだな… 25個集めてくれ。そしたら荷馬車に残ってたものをあさってもいいぞ

original: We're just going to need some help.
string: ただ、我々には助けの手が必要なんだ

original: Go on, get out of here!
string: さあ、行った行った！

original: Watch the recoil. Takes some getting used to.
string: 反動に注意しろ。慣れるまで時間がかかるぞ

original: How about my house in Windhelm?
string: ウィンドヘルムの家はどうだ？

original: This weather is incredible.
string: この天気、信じられませんわ

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: Let me guess. You're here for the treasure, aren't you? Just like all the others.
string: 当てて見せようか。宝が目的だね？ 他の皆と同じように

original: You're back and alive to boot! Fantastic.
string: 生きて戻ってくるなんて、素晴らしいわ！

original: A small measure of his blood now and forever flows through your veins.
string: 彼の血は少量でも、永遠に君の血管を流れ続けるんだ

original: And so you learn the power of the night.
string: そして夜の力を思い知るがいい

original: I've been trying to make my peace with it.
string: そう思う事で、安心したかったのでしょうね

original: Any luck yet?
string: まだうまくいきませんこと？

original: I have. There was a time, years ago, when we were both members of the Vigilants, and both equally dissatisfied with them.
string: あるとも。以前は二人とも番人のメンバーだったからな。途中で嫌気がさしたのも一緒さ

original: What do we do now?
string: これからどうする？

original: It's not about you! You've been so great in getting me back here.
string: あなたのせいではございませんのよ！ ここに連れ戻してもらって大いに感謝していますわ

original: You don't know what it's like, coming from a family like that.
string: そんな家庭で育つのがどんな事か、あなたには分かりませんわ

original: Nargh!
string: ぬああ！

original: There isn't any Aetherium here, is there? Damn it!
string: ここにエセリウムはないんだね？ ああもう！

original: Yeargh!
string: イイヤァ！

original: So, this was my old stomping grounds. Not the most normal childhood.
string: 昔はここでよく遊びましたわ。ごく普通の子供時代とは言えませんわね

original: The Vigilants mostly hunt down daedra worshippers, which is why they got torn to pieces when they went up against vampires.
string: 番人らは主にデイドラの崇拝者を狩っているのだが、だからこそ吸血鬼を相手にした時に壊滅させられてしまったのだ

original: Dexion said something about that scroll. What was it... something to do with dragons I think?
string: デキソンがあの書の事を何か言っておりましたわ。あれは一体… ドラゴンに関係するものかしら？

original: It's important, so please just listen before your friend, here, loses his patience.
string: 大事な事ですから、そこのお友達がかんしゃくを起こす前に黙って聞いて下さいませ

original: You're not welcome here as long as you're one of those... monsters.
string: ここにいてはいけないわ。今のあなたは… 怪物なのよ

original: I'm ready to carry out this task.
string: 使命を果たす準備ができた

original: What happened to the dragon?
string: ドラゴンはどうなった？

original: With my guidance you will become a deadly instrument, striking terror in the hearts of mortals wherever you tread.
string: 私の導きのもとでお前は驚異的な存在となり、行く先々で定命の者達の心を恐怖に陥れる事だろう

original: I'll have to think about it.
string: 考えさせてくれ

original: A final warning... be wary, for you can only hold your Vampire Lord form for a brief time.
string: 最後に警告しておくが、吸血鬼の王としての変身時間はごくわずかなので注意が必要だ

original: Isran, Carcette is dead. The Hall of the Vigilants... everyone... they're all dead. You were right, we were wrong. Isn't that enough for you?
string: イスラン、カルセッテは死んだ。番人の間で… 全員死んだ。お前が正しく、我々が間違っていた。それ以上何を求める？

original: Years of mocking, of dismissal... and now suddenly here you are, begging for help.
string: 何年もの間あざけり疎外してたくせに… 突然やってきて助けを求めるのか？

original: I heard you might need help.
string: 困っているらしいと聞いた

original: Mortals aren't allowed to freely roam the castle. Not even you.
string: たとえお前でも、定命の者が自由に城をうろつく事は許されない

original: I can handle myself. (Persuade)
string: 自分のことは自分でやれる(説得)

original: Do I get a reward for finding your daughter?
string: お嬢さんを見つけた見返りはもらえるのか？

original: But... that's just not something I'm going to be able to do. Ever.
string: でも… わたしには、そんな事できませんわ。絶対に

original: I was in the midst of writing the second volume and they just threw me into this prison. It's unfair!
string: 第二巻の執筆中だというのに、この牢屋に入れられちまったんだ。ひどい話だよな！

original: You need anything, talk to Master Dreth.
string: 至高のマスター・ドレスに聞け

original: But their time has come to an end. And you will be the one that ends it.
string: でも彼らの時代は終わり。そして終わらせるのはあなたよ

original: Let's move.
string: 行きましょう

original: You've served us all well, friend.
string: 私達皆に尽くしてくれたわ

original: That's close enough, fool. Now you die!
string: バカめ、近づきすぎたな。死ね！

original: Tread lightly. The law is unaware of the danger and will treat you as a criminal if you are caught.
string: 行動は隠密にな。司法側はこの危険に気づいていないため、見られたら罪人扱いだ

original: Those are my only options?
string: 他に選択肢はないのか？

original: Where did the sun go?
string: 太陽はどこへ行ったの？

original: Put his mind to rest, allay his fear through vampiric seduction and when he is in a pliant condition, embrace him and bite him on the neck.
string: 彼の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: If there's one thing I know, it's weapons and armor. Take a look.
string: 知っている事を一つ挙げるなら、武器と鎧の事よ。見てみて

original: And so we've delivered her right to them. I should've kept her here until we were certain...
string: 我々は彼女を連中のもとに送り込んだというわけだ。確信が持てるまで彼女をここに置いておくべきだったな…

original: I'm getting out of here!
string: ここから出るぞ！

original: May your blades stay sharp.
string: 刃が鋭くあらん事を

original: I was going to say the same thing to you.
string: 同じ事を言おうと思っておりましたの

original: There's only one thing worth remembering.
string: 覚えておく価値がある事はひとつだけだ

original: I'm already a vampire. What more can you offer me?
string: 既に吸血鬼になっているのに、それ以上得るものがあるのか？

original: Yes, they smell like trolls. But do you have to? Consider washing up a bit more often.
string: そうさ、トロールみたいな悪臭だよ。もう少し頻繁に風呂に入る気もないのか？

original: This is no place for you.
string: ここはあなたの来る場所じゃない

original: What was the Hall of the Vigilants?
string: 番人の間とは？

original: Stop struggling. I'll give you a swift and beautiful death.
string: 悪あがきはやめなさい。そうすればひと思いに死なせてあげる

original: I'm a loyal servant of the lord of the castle, nothing more.
string: 俺は城主の忠実なしもべだ。それ以上の者じゃない

original: Help me!
string: 助けてくれ！

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
string: ホワイトランの家に住めばいい

original: What?
string: 何？

original: As much as it pains me to send you and Serana back alone, I can't take the risk.
string: あなたとセラーナだけを送り返すのはつらいけれど、危険は冒せない

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: Perhaps some coin will jog your memory? (<BribeCost> gold)
string: 金銭が少々あれば、思い出してもらえるかな？(<BribeCost> ゴールド)

original: Pouring the contents of the ewer into the sacred basin of the Sanctum would allow him to enter for an audience with the Arch-Curate himself.
string: 聖域にある水瓶に水差しの水を注ぐと、最高司祭と直々に面会できる仕組みとなっている

original: Leave no vampire in one piece!
string: 吸血鬼は八つ裂きだ！

original: A song? I, uh... I seem to have misplaced my lute. Another time perhaps?
string: 歌を？ えっと… リュートをどこかに忘れてきたようだ。また今度でいいか？

original: Just get to it!
string: 細かいことはいいから早く！

original: Just one gyro. One, and I can get back to work. Where are they?
string: ジャイロ1個でいいのよ。1個あれば、仕事に戻れるのに。どこにあるのかしら？

original: Never expected so blatant an attack by vampires, of all creatures.
string: まさか、よりによって吸血鬼が、こんなに派手に襲ってくるとは思わなかった

original: Taron Dreth. The world's foremost expert on Dwemer forging techniques. Now answer my question!
string: タロンだ！ タロン・ドレス。ドゥーマーの鋳造技術に関しては世界最高の権威だ。さあ、質問に答えろ！

original: Then you will be prey, like all mortals. I will spare your life this once, but you will be banished from this hall.
string: ならばお前は他の定命の者同様、獲物に過ぎん。今度だけは見逃してやるが、この殿堂からは追放とする

original: But, we haven't gotten rid of them completely. A body can rattle around confused long after it's head's been severed.
string: でも、彼らを完全に始末してはいない。死体は首を切られた後も長い間混乱を引き延ばせるものよ

original: You are the new Master; we bow to your power. A power which, I note, includes Auriel's Bow.
string: お前を新たなマスターに迎え、その力に従おう。アーリエルの弓を含む、その力に

original: Indeed. She's off to Redwater Den.
string: いかにも。彼女はレッドウォーターの隠れ家へ向かった

original: Did you see where she went?
string: 彼女がどこに行ったか見まして？

original: Stendarr watch over you.
string: ステンダールのご加護を

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: I understand the concern.
string: 理解できる懸念だ

original: The Hall was a place of respite, learning and comradeship, where a road-weary brother or sister could rest for a time in peace and comfort.
string: 番人の間は憩いと研さんと親交の場で、旅に疲れた仲間達がしばらく快適に、静かに休める所だった

original: I assure you, no harm was done. In truth, your strength surprises me. Not all mortals can withstand my embrace.
string: 心配せずとも、害はない。正直なところ、お前の強靭さには驚いた。我が抱擁に耐えきれぬ定命の者もいる

original: Unfortunately, yes.
string: 残念な事に、そうよ

original: He tried to hire me for a trip to Dragon Bridge, but I told him that ain't one of my stops.
string: ドラゴン・ブリッジに行きたいって言われたけど、そこはコース外だから断ったんだ

original: Ugh. I told you!
string: きゃっ。もう、言いましたわよね！

original: Enchanting laboratory. (<Global=HDRiftenEnchanting> gold)
string: 付呪器(<Global=HDRiftenEnchanting> ゴールド)

original: Ever since he decided to make that prophecy his calling, we kind of drifted apart.
string: あの予言を天命と見なして以来、疎遠になっていきましたわ

original: I'll bring you down!
string: 叩きのめしますわ！

original: Really? You had to take the armor? Come on, leave me with a little dignity...
string: 本気？ 鎧を取る必要があったの？ 参ったよ、幻滅しちゃうね…

original: I know that better than anybody.
string: 誰よりもその事を知っているつもりですわ

original: Soul what? What in the name of Vivec are you talking about?
string: 魂が何だって？ ヴィベクの名にかけて聞くが、一体何の話だ？

original: Be careful, and keep my daughter safe.
string: 気をつけて、そして娘の安全を守ってね

original: Figures I'd be woken by a couple of know-nothings. So where are we off to, now?
string: つまり、何も知らない人達に起こされたわけですのね。それで、これからどこに行きますの？

original: I'm not sure what they did to this Moth Priest, but he doesn't look right.
string: 連中がこの聖蚕の僧侶に何をしたか知らないが、どうも大丈夫じゃなさそうだぞ

original: Provided for me? Are you insane?
string: わたしのため？ 気は確かですの？

original: Got a fire in your belly to kill vampires, eh? Good for you.
string: 吸血鬼と戦いたくてうずうずしてるのか？ 結構な事だ

original: Fortune smile upon you, milady!
string: 奥様、ご幸運を！

original: Vaaz!
string: ヴァーズ！

original: I've retrieved the <Alias=Item> from <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Item>を回収した

original: Otherwise, you're a threat to all of us.
string: さもないと、我々全員の脅威になる

original: Well of course they did.
string: 彼らは当然そうした

original: Our compassion compels us to destroy it.
string: 我らの思いやりは、その化け物を退治してやる事だ

original: Good.
string: いい返事ね

original: Very well. (Give Auriel's Bow)
string: いいだろう(アーリエルの弓を渡す)

original: Heard anything about a Moth Priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Now, if everyone will please be quiet, I must concentrate.
string: みんな静かにしてくれるかな… 集中したいんだ

original: Die!
string: 死ね！

original: All right, then. Hold still.
string: なら構いませんわね。じっとしてて

original: I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard, then. Don't worry, Arkay will show me the way.
string: では、ドーンガード砦で会おう。問題ない。アーケイが導いてくれる

original: How dare you set foot in here, after being infected by those foul beasts?
string: あの忌々しい獣どもに汚（けが）されたあとで、よくもここに足を踏み入れる事ができたな

original: Come on then, we haven't got all day!
string: 早くしろ、ぐずぐずするな！

original: I hope I have something that interests you. I always wish to be of service.
string: 何かお気に召すものがあるといいけど。人様の役に立ってこその商売だからね

original: Want my advice? Avoid getting wrapped up in Vingalmo's schemes. He's after the throne, and he'll kill anyone that gets in his way.
string: 一つ言っておくと、ヴィンガルモの企てに関わらない方がいい。玉座を狙っていて、邪魔者は誰であろうと殺すような奴だ

original: I think I'd feel more comfortable.
string: その方がこちらは安心できる

original: The Empire will send someone to find me. You'll see!
string: 帝国は私を探しに誰かを送り込む。そのうち分かるぞ！

original: It's time for you to suffer!
string: 今度はお父様が苦しむ番ですわ！

original: This accursed place is nothing but a prison without walls.
string: この呪われた場所は、まるで壁のない牢獄だ

original: And you didn't stop them? You didn't secure the scroll?
string: そして君は奴らを止めなかったと？ 書を確保しなかったのか？

original: They will allow you to draw the waters from the shrine's basin as if you've been enlightened.
string: 悟りを開いた者と同じように祠の水瓶から水を汲む事を許してくれるだろう

original: This time, to the death!
string: 今こそ死ぬがいい！

original: An old jetty where boats would bring supplies to the castle. Once we moved in, it never got used, along with the rest of the undercroft.
string: 城に物資を運ぶ船がつけていた古い桟橋ですわね。わたし達が住みついてからは、地下の設備共々、一度も使いませんでしたわ

original: Well done! Somehow I knew it would be you and Serana who found our moth priest.
string: 上出来だ。聖蚕の僧侶を見つけるのはお前とセラーナだろうと、何故か確信があったのだ

original: Were you close with them?
string: 仲は良かったのか？

original: I've rescued <Alias=Prisoner> from <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Prisoner>を<Alias=Dungeon>から救出した

original: Die Dawnguard!
string: 死ね、ドーンガード！

original: You're damn right I'm interested. Question is, are you selling?
string: 興味は大ありだとも。問題は、売ってくれるかどうかで

original: They belong among our kind, not gathering mold in some vagabond's treasure pile.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。放浪人の宝の山の中でカビを生やしたりなどしてないよ

original: That covering on your eyes. Are you-
string: その目隠しのようなもの、まさか…

original: This is my savior, the one who freed me.
string: これはわたしの心のよりどころ。わたしを自由にしてくれたものですわ

original: Stay alert.
string: 注意を怠るな

original: Hold still, then.
string: では動かないで

original: I was expecting someone... like me, at least.
string: 誰か他の… わたしと同じ種類の人だと思っておりましたわ

original: Filthy vampire!
string: 邪悪な吸血鬼め！

original: The short version is that my parents and I... we were followers of Molag Bal.
string: 簡単に言いますと、わたしと両親は皆、モラグ・バルの信徒だったのです

original: The vampires will show us no mercy. They've proven that.
string: 吸血鬼達は容赦なしだぞ。歴史がそれを証明している

original: Be on your guard at all times. Avoid sleep if you can... Sleep is for the weak.
string: 警戒を常に怠るなよ。できれば眠らない方がいい… 眠るのは弱者だけだ

original: I'll finish up here and head in that direction soon as I can. See you there.
string: できるだけ早くここを終らせて、そっちへ向かうわ。後で会いましょう

original: I don't know. Coming from a place like this, well... it's not really me. I hope you can believe that.
string: 分かりませんわ。こんな場所から出てきたとなると… 本当にわたしだと信じてもらえるといいのですが

original: However, the majority of necromancers that are foolish enough to enter into a bargain with the Ideal Masters wind up here... as harvested souls.
string: ただし、愚かにもアイディール・マスターとの取引を試みる死霊術師の大多数はここで終わるはめになる… 収穫された魂として

original: Elisif of Solitude will be High Queen.
string: ソリチュードのエリシフが上級女王になる

original: They were good people. I miss them.
string: いい人たちだった。会えなくて恋しい

original: Fight well.
string: 奮闘に期待する

original: I've heard it described in tales, but I could never have imagined its beauty.
string: 話には聞いていたが、それほど美しいものとは想像だにしなかった

original: We didn't listen to him any more than we did Isran. He was at the Hall when it was attacked...
string: イスラン同様、ろくに耳を貸さなかったよ。番人の間が襲われた時に、そこにいた…

original: So, this is snow elf magic. Incredible.
string: するとこれはスノーエルフの魔法ですのね。すごいですわ

original: Lah!
string: ラー！

original: Do you have any more work?
string: 他に仕事はあるか？

original: Your old place would suit us just fine.
string: 今まで住んでいた家に一緒に住ませてもらえればいい

original: Lord Harkon will finally have his wish... to see the prophecy fulfilled. Then we will all benefit.
string: いずれハルコン卿の望みが叶い、予言が成就する。そうなればみんなが得をするんだ

original: This is pointless.
string: こんな事は無駄だ

original: When the prey is riled, it makes things difficult for us.
string: 獲物をいら立たせれば、ややこしい事態になるわ

original: Only the most resilient of priests can do it this way... it takes years of practice to interpret the harmony.
string: これを実行できるのは、僧侶の中でも回復力が最も高い者のみだ… それに調和の解釈には何年もの鍛錬が必要になる

original: I don't converse with my meals.
string: 自分の食べ物とは話さないわ

original: I'll see you when I'm done. For now, I need to just do this.
string: 終わったらすぐ行きますわ。今はこれを済ませてしまいたいの

original: My desire to speak with you was born from the result of our battle, Qahnaarin.
string: 戦いの果てに、言葉を交わしたいと思ったのだよ、クァーナーリン

original: One thing about living in Skyrim I could never stomach... all the damn vampires!
string: スカイリムに生きる種族の中でも奴らには我慢ならない… いまいましい吸血鬼どもめ！

original: Isran had a surprising stockpile of weapons and armor. Take a look.
string: イスランが妙に大量の武器や防具を集めていた。見てみるといい

original: Any ideas?
string: 他にいい考えは？

original: My Lady.
string: お嬢様

original: I'll buy whatever you're looking to get rid of.
string: 捨てるものがあったら、何でも買い取るわよ

original: Soul trap me. I won't feel right as a vampire.
string: 魂縛をかけてほしい。吸血鬼になったら自分に納得ができなくなりそうだ

original: Any idea how to get out of here?
string: ここから出る方法は？

original: Can you train me in Smithing?
string: 鍛造の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: So... what now?
string: で、これからどうする？

original: Are there... people in your life?
string: 今まで、あなたの周りに… 仲間はおりましたの？

original: In the meantime, if there are any potions you might need, feel free to help yourself.
string: その間に、もし必要な薬があれば自由に持って行きなさい

original: Where is everybody? This place looks almost deserted.
string: みんなどこにいるんだろう？ まるで人影がないように見えるけど

original: What were you looking for?
string: 何を探してたんだ？

original: I've planted some new herbs in the courtyard garden. I hope they'll grow.
string: 新しいハーブをいくつか中庭の庭園に植えたの。育つといいわね

original: And I thought my father was the delusional one.
string: わたしは父が理性を失ったと思っておりますわ

original: Didn't you try to kill me?
string: こちらを殺そうとしなかったか？

original: Once again, the Elder Scrolls have proven their value.
string: 星霜の書が自らの価値をまた証明したわけだ

original: And now for the feast.
string: ここからは宴だ

original: Go on inside. Isran'll want to talk to you.
string: 中に入れ。イスランが話したいそうだ

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: I discovered too late that the Ideal Masters favor deception over honor and had no intention of releasing me from my binding.
string: 気づいた時には手遅れだった。名誉よりも欺まんを好むアイディール・マスターどもは、我を解き放つつもりなどなかったのだ

original: Forget it, I'll come back.
string: 今はいい。また後で来る

original: That's it, out there to the north. We used to keep a boat around here to get there and back.
string: そうですわ、北に行ったところですの。そこまで行って戻ってくるためのボートを、わたし達はこの辺りに確保しておきましたのよ

original: Yes, I've been aiding Tolan.
string: ああ、トランに協力してきた

original: Who were you expecting?
string: 誰が来ると思ってたのか？

original: Then we have no further need of you.
string: ならばもう用済みだ

original: They request Auriel's Bow, and I request their assistance. It's been repeated so many times, I can't imagine it any other way.
string: 誰もがアーリエルの弓を求め、こちらは見返りに手伝いを頼む。数えきれないほど繰り返して、もはや他のやりとりなど想像もできない

original: If only such a miracle existed, I'd overcome the impossible in order to secure it if it meant pleasing you.
string: そんな奇跡が起こせるなら、不可能を可能にしてあなた様を喜ばせるのに…

original: Yes, yes. Always the noble vampire hunter.
string: ほう、ほう。誇り高き吸血鬼ハンターだな

original: We were hoping Isran would be of help. That now seems unlikely.
string: イスランが助けてくれるかも知れないと思ったんだけど。今となっては、望みは薄いわ

original: Florentius? Really? I assumed Isran would want nothing to do with him.
string: フロレンティウスだと？ イスランが関わりたがるとは思えないが

original: Praise Arkay!
string: アーケイばんざい！

original: Well met, sister.
string: こんにちは

original: Where can I find the people we need?
string: 必要な面々はどこに？

original: This isn't going to end well, is it?
string: どう考えても悪い方に転びそうだな

original: I believe in civility among seasoned warriors, and I find your ear worthy of my words.
string: 互いに古強者として礼節は守るべきだ。そなたの耳は我が言葉を聞かせるに値する

original: Here's all of the pages.
string: ページはこれで全部だ

original: I'll be here. Don't take too long, now!
string: ここにおりますから、あまり待たせないで下さいましね！

original: How is the work coming along?
string: 進み具合はどうだ？

original: The true power of the ancient blood is found in the form of the Vampire Lord.
string: 古き血の真の力は、吸血鬼の王の姿となった時に発揮される

original: Just know that... whatever path you choose, I won't think any less of you. Sometimes things just have to be done.
string: 言っておきますが、どの道を選んでもあなたに対するわたしの考えは変わりませんの。時には止むを得ない状況もありましてよ

original: That's what everybody says, right up until they find their throat being ripped out by a pack of hungry vampires.
string: みんなそう言うんだ。飢えた吸血鬼の一団に喉笛を食い千切られるまではな

original: I admit, I feel a bit frustrated that I can't be more helpful. Still, our enemy is likely just as much in the dark as we are, and that's something.
string: 正直言って、力になれなくて残念だよ。だが暗闇をさまよってるのは敵も同じ事。そう思えば少しは気も楽になるだろう

original: I know how it all sounds, but if there was another way I'd have done it long ago.
string: おかしな話に聞こえるだろうが、他の方法があればとっくにそうしている

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Damn it. How could I be so foolish?
string: クソったれが。おれの大馬鹿野郎が

original: You wanted to speak to me?
string: 話があると聞いた

original: It'll be good to get outside and breathe again. I haven't missed the sunlight, but I do miss fresh air.
string: また外に出て深呼吸できたらいいでしょうね。陽の光は恋しくなくとも、新鮮な空気は恋しいですわ

original: Why would they require sustenance?
string: どうして彼らは糧を必要とするのだろう？

original: My business is my own. Just tell me what I need to know.
string: こちらの問題だ。質問に答えるだけにしてくれ

original: From the castle, you used to just be able to see Solitude over the mountains. It's exactly what I imagined.
string: お城からは山並みの向こうにソリチュードが見えましたのよ。あの頃に思い描いていた通りの街ですわ

original: Well met, friend. We've been chasing that fiend for a long time. On behalf of the Vigil, you have my thanks.
string: よくやってくれたわね。長い間追い続けていた敵だったのよ。番人に代わって感謝するわ

original: And go where? You can't just leave me alone whenever you feel like it. I'm coming with you, like it or not.
string: それで、いずこへと？ いつでもわたしを置いていけると思わないで。何と言おうと、ついて行きますわよ

original: I don't want to step on anyone's toes. Come back to me when you're alone.
string: 人が嫌がる事はいたしませんわ。寂しくなったら、お戻りになられて

original: Precisely! The people will put pressure on the Dawnguard who are apparently murdering their fellows without provocation.
string: そのとおり！ 理由もなく市民を殺す事に対して、ドーンガードに対する風向きは強くなるはずだ

original: There are people I've met and worked with over the years. We need their skills, their talents, if we're going to survive this.
string: ここ何年かの間に私が知り合い協力し合った人々がいる。この状況を切り抜けるには、彼らの技術と才能が必要だ

original: Woah...
string: うわあ…

original: It's amazing what I'm able to learn from studying these Dwemer plans.
string: ドゥーマーの図面から学べる事は計り知れないわ

original: Normally, I'd send you to the Imperial City in Cyrodiil to seek answers at the Imperial Library, but that avenue no longer exists.
string: 本来ならシロディールの帝都にある帝国図書館で答えを探す事をお勧めしたいが、あそこの通りはなくなってしまったんだ

original: But those temples paled in comparison to the glory of the Chantry and its wayshrines.
string: だが、それらの聖堂もこの礼拝所と祠に比べれば色あせて見える

original: For those willing to subjugate themselves, he will still bestow the gift, but they must be powerful in their own right before earning his trust.
string: 彼は、自分に忠誠を誓った者には力を与えるけれど、彼の信用を得るには元々の能力も強くないと無理なのです

original: There will be time to honor the fallen later. For now, we've got to put a stop to these vampires.
string: 倒れた者達を弔う時間はいずれとりたい。だが今は吸血鬼どもを止めないと

original: What else do you want to know?
string: 他に知りたい事はあるか？

original: I can handle myself, and there are still unanswered questions
string: 自分のことは自分でやれるし、まだ解決していない疑問がある

original: I... I suppose this is difficult for you.
string: 私は… 君には難しいと思うが

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: There's no one around to disturb me and distract me from my writing. Present company excepted of course.
string: 書き物をしていても邪魔される事がない。ああっと、お前の事を言ってるわけじゃないぞ

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: That was a long time ago, but the idea was, and is, a good one. That's why I'm bringing it back.
string: 大昔の話だが、彼らの理念は昔も今も正しい。だから私はそれを復活させようとしているのだ

original: I'm on it.
string: やっておりますわ

original: Besides this isn't so bad when you think about it.
string: これはこれで、まあ悪くはないがな

original: And you'd do well to be more careful of whom you engage in witty banter.
string: 軽妙なおしゃべりの相手はもっと慎重に選んだ方がいいね

original: If you need some help, I'm ready.
string: わたしの力が必要でしたら、いつでも準備できてましてよ

original: All that just to end up dumping it out? Makes no sense to me.
string: それを処分するためだけにこんな大騒ぎを？ まるで理屈に合いませんわ

original: I wish I could say how many we numbered, but only a privileged few knew that, and they're dead now.
string: 我々が総勢何名ほどだったのか分かればいいんだが、それを知っていたのは要職の数名だけで、いずれも死んでしまっている

original: So you're just going to give up?
string: あっさりあきらめるのか？

original: These vampires are becoming a real menace.
string: この吸血鬼どもは深刻な脅威になりつつある

original: My best beloved! I never knew the night held such vibrant color, or that the air vibrated so. And at times, it's as if the very shadows whisper.
string: 最愛の人よ！ 夜がこれほどまでに鮮やかな色を秘め、大気がこうも活き活きとしているなんて！ そして時には、影そのものがささやきかけてくるかのよう…

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Tolan said you're a vampire hunter.
string: トランから吸血鬼ハンターだと聞いた

original: Explain this "ritual."
string: その“儀式”について説明してほしい

original: Many in the court don't bother with potions, but I keep things stocked just in case.
string: 宮廷の連中は薬にはあまり興味がないんだ。私はまさかの時に備えて保管しているが

original: He was a vampire. He controlled them.
string: 彼は吸血鬼で、その力を使って彼らを操っていた

original: Supposedly, they had to build a special forge, the Aetherium Forge, to even work with it.
string: それを扱うために、彼らは特別にエセリウムの鋳造器具を作り上げる必要があったらしいんだ

original: You still got it, Morven... a salesman even beyond the end.
string: モルベン、お前はまだ大丈夫だ… 最後の最後まで商売人さ

original: My name is Serana. Were you... sent to wake me?
string: わたしはセラーナ。あなたは… わたしを目覚めさせにいらしたの？

original: I don't know. I honestly don't know. After all these years, it's a miracle even this much survived.
string: 分からないよ、全然全く。これほどの歳月を経て、これだけでも残っていたのが奇跡だ

original: Are you sure Valerica has the Elder Scroll?
string: ヴァレリカが星霜の書を持っているのは確実なのか？

original: Probably to avoid whatever my father would do to her if he could get his hands on her.
string: 父が母を捕まえたらどうするつもりかは分からないのですけど、とにかくそうなる事態を避けるためかしら

original: What are you talking about? I don't know anything about any monsters.
string: 何の話だ？ 怪物なんて知らない

original: It's a werewolf! To arms! To arms!
string: ウェアウルフだ！ 戦闘準備！ 戦闘準備！

original: It... almost doesn't even look real. You know?
string: とても… この世のものとは思えませんわ

original: Back in the Second Era, the Jarl of Riften had a son. Adventurous type, too much for his own good it seems.
string: 第二紀の時代、リフテンの首長には息子が一人いた。冒険好きで危険をかえりみない性格だった

original: No, you must be mistaken. He made it exceedingly clear the last time we spoke that he had no interest in my help.
string: きっと何かの間違いだわ。前に話した時、手助けは必要ないとはっきり言われたもの

original: Well, if I were a betting woman, I'd say it's a scraper of some sort.
string: 憶測でもよければ、多分それはヘラか何かみたいなものね

original: Where did you find it? Tell me!
string: それをどこで見つけた？ 言え！

original: Heard anything about a Moth Priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: I disagree.
string: 賛成できかねますわ

original: It's come to my inescapable attention that you, my dear friend, are married.
string: 友よ、君は結婚してるね。私の目はごまかせないよ

original: Sometimes he doesn't even have to say it.
string: 言う必要さえない時もあるわ

original: Damn! What the...
string: しまった！ こんな…

original: I'll meet you in Dimhollow Crypt. I owe these vampires a debt of vengeance.
string: ディムホロウ墓地で合流しよう。吸血鬼どもに借りを返さないとな

original: Good. I prefer to nip budding problems before they reach full bloom. I trust it wasn't too much of an effort on your part.
string: よろしい。問題は早めに摘み取っておきたい。お前にとってはさほどの手間ではないだろう

original: Been a pleasure doing business with you.
string: 毎度ありがとさん

original: I never knew the darkness held such colors, or the night air smelled so sweet. You have given me a great gift.
string: 暗闇がこんなにも色彩豊かで、夜の空気がこれほどまでかぐわしいとは。すばらしいプレゼントをありがとう

original: The tone of your voice is understandable. Perhaps I can alleviate your suspicions.
string: 言葉を荒げるのも分かろうというもの。ことにそなたの疑心を解く事もできよう

original: Every Moth Priest is taught this ritual, but few ever get the chance to perform it... you should consider yourself fortunate if it works for you.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶はみんなこの儀式について教わるが、実行する者はほとんどいない… うまくいったら幸いだよ

original: At least Barknar and I are here together.
string: 少なくともバークナールと私はここで一緒よ

original: Your soul essence was trapped inside a gem. When you and Serana entered the Soul Cairn, it was "given" to the Ideal Masters as payment.
string: あなたの魂のエキスは石の中に閉じ込められ、セラーナと一緒にソウル・ケルンへ入った時にアイディール・マスターへ報酬として“捧げられた”の

original: Go with the Light.
string: 光と共に行け

original: What? No, no. Yes, I see. All right.
string: えっ？ いえ、いいえ、はい。分かりました

original: A basic one? Of course. That is, assuming you know anything about steel smithing. It's pretty simple.
string: 基本的なもの？ もちろん。この通り、鍛冶を少しでも知っているなら。簡単よ

original: I am at your service, as always.
string: いつもどおり、ご用があれば何なりと

original: Working metal isn't easy. Let me show you a few things.
string: 金属の加工は簡単じゃない。いくつか手ほどきしてやろう

original: The vampire is eternal, and with immortality comes the revelation that these bonds never endure... it's fleeting, momentary at best.
string: 吸血鬼とは永遠の存在であり、不死の身にはそのような絆が決して永続しないという悟りが伴うものだ。よくて束の間の、一瞬の事

original: There are others here like you?
string: 他にも仲間がここに？

original: I don't think the vampires would be stupid enough to attack us here, but you never know.
string: 吸血鬼がここで私達を襲撃するほど愚かだとは思わないけど、どうかしらね

original: The moment I was infected by one of my own Initiates, Auri-El turned his back on me.
string: 弟子だった新人に感染させられたその瞬間から、アーリエルに見放されたのだ

original: Woah!
string: きゃあ！

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of man is he?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。どんな旦那様なのかしら？

original: If he can maintain some appearance of normalcy, I'll allow him to stay.
string: 彼がまともに振る舞う事ができるなら、滞在を許そう

original: Arkay and I will stand triumphant!
string: アーケイと俺に敗北はない！

original: Vampires need to be dealt with. Hunted, rooted out, destroyed.
string: 吸血鬼とは対決すべきだ。見つけ出して、根絶しなければならない

original: What do you mean?
string: どういう意味だ？

original: You shouldn't blame yourself.
string: 自分を責めるべきじゃない

original: I think my father really died a long time ago. This was just... the end of something else.
string: お父様はずっと前に死んでいたのだと思いますの。今のはただ… 別な何かの命が尽きただけの事ですわ

original: Tough day for you!
string: 散々な日にして差し上げますわ！

original: Lord Harkon has searched for his daughter for so long. He must be very grateful.
string: ハルコン卿はずっと長い間娘さんを捜してきた。本当に感謝しているでしょうね

original: Hmph. Beat me to it, this time.
string: ふふん。今度は出し抜いてみなよ

original: Keep searching for her notes. She probably had a journal or something.
string: 彼女のノートを探しましょう。たぶん日記か何かをつけていたはずですわ

original: Come on boy, let's go.
string: ほらほら、行くぞ！

original: Of course I do.
string: もちろんだとも

original: The voice fades and the words begin to shimmer and distort. But wait, there is more here.
string: 声がかすれて言葉が歪み始めている。でもちょっと待った… まだ続きがある

original: I don't think so.
string: そうは思いませんわね

original: Tell you what, you bring me books like this, and I'll pay a thousand gold each. I'll even throw in a translated edition I have for free. Interested?
string: こんなのはどうだ。この類の本を持って来てくれれば、一冊につき1000ゴールド出そう。しかも翻訳された版をただで差し上げる。どうだ？

original: May I strongly suggest that you make a visit to this spouse of yours. And "invite" him to the family by offering him Harkon's Gift.
string: 君の伴侶を訪問して、彼を家族に“招待”する事を強く勧めるよ。ハルコンの贈り物を彼に捧げるんだ

original: I'll see you soon.
string: また会いましょう

original: So be it!
string: ならば！

original: Really? Well, now, that make things easier...
string: 本当に？ まあ、これで少し楽になるかな…

original: Arkay warns it's baneful charge abates with each dawn. Something to keep in mind, I suppose.
string: アーケイからの注意だが、高まった攻撃力は夜明けと共に元に戻る。これは覚えておいた方がいいな

original: Not a lot of our kind here, I see. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 同族はあまりいないわね。驚く事でもないけど

original: I'm not talking about this with you any more.
string: あなたとは、もうこの話はいたしませんわ

original: Why didn't you say something earlier?
string: もっと早く言わなかったのは？

original: She's the daughter of a powerful vampire lord.
string: 強大な吸血鬼の王の娘だ

original: Alas, the vampire can cloud the minds of those he preys upon. It won't be easy to convince anyone he's other than he appears.
string: 吸血鬼は獲物の精神をくもらせる力をもつ。奴の正体を人に信じさせるのは容易な事ではない

original: By the blood of my ancestors...
string: ああ、ご先祖様、なんて事ですの……

original: Grab my journal, would you? We're going to need it.
string: あたしの日記を手に入れてくれない？ それが必要になるよ

original: Despite my present low estate, I am no beggar. Begone until you have the coin to warrant my skills.
string: 今の地位が低くとも、物乞いではないわ。私の技術を受けられる現金ができるまで消えなさい

original: Time for you to head home.
string: 先に家に帰ってほしい

original: Give me everything you are carrying.
string: 持っているものを全部渡してほしい

original: Why did you ever agree to her plan?
string: どうしてそんな計画に同意したんだ？

original: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
string: 本物なの？ 信じられないわ！

original: Valindor of Riften has his ears in places that we'd love to listening in. Joining our family should increase our possibilities in the south.
string: リフテンのヴァリンドルは我々のいい耳になってくれるぞ。仲間に加えれば南での活動の可能性が広がる

original: They mentioned some place called Dimhollow Crypt, but I don't know where that is.
string: ディムホロウ墓地とかいう場所の話をしていたが、どこなのかは分からない

original: What brings you to this remote place?
string: なぜこんな離れた場所に？

original: Can I ask you something first?
string: 先に一つ聞いていいか？

original: I'm... not sure. I've never heard of the Divines speaking directly to someone before.
string: 何とも言えない。神々が今まで直接誰かに話しかけた例は聞いてない

original: You're here because we're abominations in your mind. Evil creatures that need to be destroyed.
string: ここにいるのは、内心では私達を嫌悪しているからだわ。破滅させられるべき邪悪な生物として

original: Well done. Nothing like a good kill to get the blood pumping, is there?
string: よくやったわ。いい殺しほど血の巡りを良くするものはないわよね？

original: And what do you plan to do with it? Do you even know what you're asking about, or are you just someone's errand girl?
string: 手に入れてどうするつもりだ？ 今、自分が何を尋ねているか分かっているのか？ それとも誰かの使い走りをしているだけか？

original: Set my hatred aside? Not a chance. It's what keeps me strong.
string: 憎しみを忘れろだと？ 無理な事だ。憎しみこそが私を強くする

original: It's good to see you all in one piece. Who is this?
string: 無事なようでよかった。そちらの方は？

original: What do you know about Elder Scrolls?
string: 星霜の書についてはどこまで？

original: The items it made were so powerful they went to war over it, and the Forge was lost. Or so the story goes.
string: それからできるアイテムがあまりに強力なために、彼らはそれを巡って争い、鋳造器具は失われたと言われているんだよ

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Next time I say to please not go over the waterfall, maybe you'll listen to me.
string: だから滝の向こうには行かないでと頼みましたのに。少しは耳を貸す気になりまして？

original: Have you tried getting into the Inner Sanctum?
string: 最奥聖域に入ろうと試みたのか？

original: Wow.
string: わあぁ…

original: The Moth Priest can stay here for now. As for the vampire, I still don't trust it, so keep it on a leash.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶は、ひとまずここにいても構わない。だが例の吸血鬼は、まだ信用できんな。首輪をつけておいた方がいいと思うが

original: Can we really trust the words of this Moth Priest? What if he's just lying to save his worthless skin?
string: その聖蚕の僧侶とやらの言葉を信じていいのか？ 自分の身かわいさに出まかせを言っているとしたら？

original: I've located more dwemer plans.
string: 新しいドゥーマーの図面のある場所が分かったの

original: Do you have a moment? Gunmar and I have been talking and, well, we're slightly worried.
string: ちょっといい？ ガンマーと話してたんだけど、ちょっと心配になってきたの

original: Are you alright? That looked painful.
string: 大丈夫ですの？ 苦しそうでしたけど

original: The only things that can survive here are the Ideal Masters, the undead and the souls themselves. Well, if you want to call that "living."
string: ここで生きていけるのはアイディール・マスターとアンデッド。そして魂だけですから。あら、“生きる”という言い方はちょっと変ですわね

original: No. It'll have to run its course, and there's always the chance I may never recover.
string: いや、運命には逆らえないだろう。それに回復不能になるのは常にありうる話だ

original: In Castle Volkihar?
string: ヴォルキハル城の城内に隠れている？

original: Let's just get it over with.
string: とにかくやってしまおう

original: Let's head back to Isran and let him see what we've got first. I'm betting he'll lend us a sword or two.
string: イスランのところへ戻って、わたし達が手に入れたものをまず見せましょう。剣の1本や2本はきっと貸してくれますわよ

original: He just became absorbed... obsessed. It was kind of sick, actually.
string: 父はそれに熱中… 没頭してしまったのです。病的ですらありましたわ

original: Want my advice? Never welch on a bargain with the Ideal Masters... they don't take it very well.
string: いいこと教えてやろうか？ アイディール・マスターとの約束は破らない方がいい… 彼らの機嫌を損ねることになる

original: Come with me.
string: 一緒に来てほしい

original: These Vigilants are nothing but talk.
string: ここの番人達は口先だけなんだ

original: You can also call upon the powers of night to turn into a swarm of bats and reappear some distance away.
string: また、夜の力によってコウモリの一群に姿を変え、少し離れた場所に移る事もできる

original: You're a Daughter of Coldharbour.
string: コールドハーバーの娘だったな

original: How do the necromancers communicate with them?
string: 死霊術師たちはどうやって疎通を？

original: It might take decades to restore the castle to its former glory... but I appear to have plenty of time.
string: 城の壮観を取り戻すには何十年もかかりそうよ… でも私には時間がたっぷりあるわ

original: With your left hand, you can wield the power of blood magic to raise the dead.
string: 左手では血の魔法の力を使って死者をよみがえらせる事が可能だ

original: Hey! Grab my journal. If you survive, you're going to need it.
string: ねえ！ あたしの日記を手に入れて。生き残れば、それが必要になるよ

original: Who are the contenders?
string: 候補者は誰なのかしら？

original: I've killed the vampire masquerading as a <Alias=Target>.
string: <Alias=Target>になりすましている吸血鬼を倒した

original: When you greeted Serana, it sounded like you hadn't seen her in a long time.
string: セラーナに会った時、ずいぶん長い間会っていなかった様子だった

original: Even if he won't help the Vigilants, he could at least offer us shelter for the moment.
string: 番人の手助けはしないとしても、少しの間、安全な場所に入れてくれたっていいのに

original: Just what my mother told me. I've also studied a little bit on my own, but there's not much.
string: 母から教わった事ですわ。自分でも少しばかり勉強しましたけれど、大した知識はございませんの

original: I've never seen leaves this color.
string: こんな色の葉は見た事がありませんわ

original: What we do know is that some are born with the special gift to read the Elder Scrolls.
string: 分かっているのは、星霜の書を読む才能を持って生まれてくる者達がいるという事

original: After all these years, Lady Serana's back. Now that's something.
string: 長年行方不明になっていたセラーナ様が戻ってくるとは。驚いたよ

original: Break his shield! Hurry!
string: 盾を壊して！ 早く！

original: Tolan, tell him about, what was it, Dimhollow?
string: トラン、彼にあの事を教えてやれ。あの… ディムホロウだったかな？

original: Let's get this over with.
string: 終わらせてしまおう

original: And now... now I can't rest. Not until I have proof. Something to show the world what I discovered, what I did. That my life... mattered.
string: そして今… 眠りにはつけない。証拠をつかむまで。あたしの発見、業績を世間に示す何かをつかむまでは。あたしの人生に… 重要だった事をね

original: Don't worry about that. Just tell me.
string: それはいいから、聞かせてほしい

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: What trickery is this?
string: 何の茶番だこれは？

original: It appears the Nords won.
string: ノルドらが勝利したようだな

original: ...first kill is always the best... the blood has never tasted as sweet since...
string: …最初の獲物が最高とはよく言ったもんだ… あれ以上の味にいまだ出会えない…

original: I'll be seeing you.
string: また会いましょう

original: What I can't figure out is why she said it that way.
string: なぜあのような言い方をしたのかよく分かりませんわ

original: I can't believe it. You're one of them... Talk to Isran. Maybe he can help you. Please, I don't want to have to kill you.
string: 信じられない。奴らの仲間じゃないか… とにかくイスランと話すんだ。たぶん力になってくれる。早くしろ、あんたを殺したくない

original: I'm guessing you figured this part out already, but my father's not exactly a good person. Even by vampire standards.
string: もう薄々感づいているとは思いますが、父は吸血鬼の基準でも好人物とは言えませんわ

original: Will I be able to keep the ring?
string: 指輪はそのままもらっていいのか？

original: What do you need?
string: 何が必要ですの？

original: That felt strange.
string: 妙な感覚だった…

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Die, mortal!
string: 死ね、定命の者め！

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally rewrite the prophecy as we see fit.
string: となれば、ほぼ終わったようなものですわ。予言をいい方向に書き変える事がようやくできますのね

original: I've found a new candidate, ripe for Harkon's Gift. I'm sending you to welcome this soul into our family.
string: ハルコンの贈り物を捧げる新たな候補者を見つけたぞ。我々の家族にしてやってくれ

original: She'll help us?
string: 協力してくれるのか？

original: How do we do that?
string: そうするには、どうすれば？

original: I'm not sure whether that makes you brave or foolish. What brings you here?
string: 勇敢なのか向こう見ずなのか分からんな。ここにはどうして？

original: I know, I know, but just... anyway. Molag Bal is the original source of vampirism, and still grants it to his more worthy followers.
string: はいはい、そうですわね、ですが… とにかく、吸血鬼を最初に造ったのはモラグ・バルで、高位の手下には今も吸血鬼の力を与えていますわ

original: Hmph. I tell you what's crazy.
string: ふんだ。本当にイカれた話を教えてやろう

original: How about a sample? (Persuade)
string: 味見をさせてもらえないか？(説得)

original: Any idea where it could be?
string: どこにあるかの見当は？

original: I see you've already taken it upon yourself to gather the information you seek.
string: 求める情報は自分で集める責任を引き受けたらしいね

original: Good luck out there.
string: 幸運を祈りますわ

original: Excuse us. I need to fetch the Bloodstone Chalice.
string: 失礼。ブラッドストーンの聖杯を取ってこなければ

original: Go ahead. After everything you've done, you should do the honors.
string: さあ。これだけの事をしてくれたのだから、あんたがやるべきだよ

original: I'm glad you're here. I don't think I could be doing this alone.
string: あなたがいてくれてよかった。独りでは無理だったと思いますの

original: Wait... I hear something!
string: 待って… 何か聞こえましてよ！

original: Forget me, who are you?
string: むしろそっちの素性が聞きたい

original: Well, I'll be out of your hair soon enough.
string: 離れますわね

original: I think I'll hang on to my things, thank you.
string: 自分の物は自分で持ちますわ。ありがとう

original: Its craftsmanship has no equal anywhere within Tamriel and possibly beyond.
string: タムリエルどころか、どこの世界にも比類するものがない技術で造られたものだ

original: There you are.
string: そこにいたのか

original: May Auri-El's brilliance illuminate your path.
string: アーリエルの光が行く手を照らさん事を

original: You give the Ideal Masters souls, they give you powers to summon the undead. It's all very business-like.
string: アイディール・マスター達に魂を捧げれば、アンデッドを呼び出す力を授けてくれる。まるで商取引のように

original: You do? Alright then, enough mysteries.
string: 君が？ いいだろう。謎には事足りてるからね

original: You go ahead. I'll talk to Isran in a minute.
string: 入ってくれ。すぐイスランに取り次ぐから

original: Once there was a group dedicated to a similar cause. They called themselves the Dawnguard.
string: 以前はそのような大義で活動する集団が存在していた。彼らは自分達をドーンガードと呼んでいた

original: Well done! I trust you'll put those to good use then.
string: よくやった！ 君ならきっと有効に利用してくれるはずだ

original: Death to those who defile the Chantry!
string: 礼拝所を穢す者に死を！

original: Oh, he just left a short while ago. He said he'd finished up his work and it was time to move on.
string: ああ、そいつなら少し前に出てったよ。仕事が済んだから引き払うと言ってね

original: Everyone couldn't have possibly agreed to that.
string: 全員が同意したとは信じがたい

original: What sort of attention?
string: 関心とは？

original: We didn't all get to have parents like yours. Sometimes this is just... how it is.
string: あなたの両親みたいな親の下に生まれて来なくてもよかったでしょうに。まあ… そういうものなのでしょうけど

original: Take a left up here. This is one of those weird double-barred security measures that my father put in when he got more paranoid.
string: 左に折れて。これは例の複式施錠装置の1つですわ。疑心暗鬼を募らせた父が設置したものですわね

original: Now, listen to my words and do as I instruct.
string: さあ、私の言葉を聞き、言う通りにするがいい

original: Indeed. The day hasn't been won while Harkon still walks Tamriel.
string: 確かにな。ハルコンがタムリエルの地を歩いている以上、勝利の日は訪れない

original: If my friends could try this Redwater Skooma they might finally understand why I like slumming it with you commoners.
string: 友人連中にこのレッドウォーター・スクゥーマを味見させられれば、私があなた達と共にこうして遊ぶ理由を分かってもらえるのですが…

original: Something on your mind, Garan?
string: 何か考え事でも、ガラン？

original: Who is your father?
string: 父親とは？

original: Oh, wonderful. A war of succession. Good to know the world didn't get boring while I was gone.
string: なるほど、後継者争いですわね。わたしがいない間に世の中が退屈になっていなくて安心いたしましたわ

original: I had hoped you would have chosen a higher profile target. But the deed is done, and it's effect secured.
string: もっと人目につく標的を選べばよかったのに。でも済んだ事を言ってもしょうがない。それに成功は約束されてるしな

original: I have Auriel's Bow.
string: アーリエルの弓を手に入れた

original: Any luck finding my pages yet?
string: 原稿は見つかったか？

original: An unattended attachment, such as found in your beloved wife creates... an opportunity for unnecessary agitation.
string: 君の愛する奥さんもしっかりつなぎとめておかないと… 余計な考えを起こす者が現れるかも知れない

original: May I strongly suggest that you make a visit to this spouse of yours and "invite" her to the family by offering her Harkon's Gift.
string: 君の伴侶を訪問して、彼女を家族に“招待”する事を強く勧めるよ。ハルコンの贈り物を彼女に捧げるんだ

original: Good luck. I hope you find the answers you seek.
string: 幸運を祈るよ。答えが見つかるといいな

original: Thought you'd never ask.
string: 誘って下さるとは思いませんでしたわ

original: Even before that, we weren't the most normal family. We did worship a daedra, remember?
string: それ以前も、普通の家庭ではございませんでしたわ。デイドラの信徒だったと言いましたわよね？

original: If anyone is going to stand in their way, it's going to be us.
string: 奴らを止める事ができるのは、我々だけだ

original: He's up there, on the balcony. Come on!
string: 彼はバルコニーにいますわ。行きますわよ！

original: ShoutStartShort
string: ShoutStartShort

original: Wait, what? That's not what we agreed. We take it back together.
string: ちょっと待った… 何だって？ 話が違うぞ。一緒にそれを取り戻すはずじゃないか

original: Come and face your destruction!
string: さあ来い、死を受け入れろ！

original: A small price to pay for the betterment of our kind.
string: 我が一族の発展のための、微々たる犠牲だ

original: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, come talk to Isran at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften.
string: そこであんたの出番だ。吸血鬼退治に興味があるなら、リフテンの南東にあるドーンガード砦でイスランに会うんだ

original: How many pages did you lose?
string: 失ったページの数は？

original: Show yourself!
string: 姿を見せろ！

original: I keep the forge running day and night in case you need anything.
string: あなたが何か必要な時のために、鋳造器具は昼夜動かしておくわ

original: Falmer, if I understand Arkay correctly.
string: アーケイによれば、ファルメルらしい

original: And frankly, I need to get home to figure out what's happening.
string: それに実のところ、何が起こっているのか確かめに、家に帰りたいのですわ

original: I can see that.
string: なるほどな

original: You know I'm more than capable. Why are you bringing this up?
string: 腕前は知ってるだろう？ 何でそんな話をするんだ？

original: Really?
string: 本当か？

original: Go cull the brutish beasts before the problem gets out of hand.
string: 問題が手に負えなくなる前に、野蛮な獣達を処分してきなさい

original: My sister in darkness. While it's good to see you, we'll keep up appearances, yes?
string: 闇の姉妹よ。会えてうれしいけれど、平静を装いましょう。いいわね？

original: Knowing that Serana shares that blessing with me, I'm already terrified that Harkon will get his hands on her.
string: セラーナがその祝福を共有している事を知った今、ハルコンが彼女に手を出す事が恐ろしいの

original: Werewolf!
string: ウェアウルフ！

original: Cyrodiil is the seat of an empire?
string: シロディールに帝国が？

original: When you offer the embrace, do so away from prying eyes. Our new sibling will then likely require rest while her blood undergoes the change.
string: 抱きしめる時は人目を避けるように。おそらく我々の新しい同胞は、血が変化する間休息を必要とするだろう

original: Isran asked me to find you.
string: イスランに言われて訪ねに来た

original: Oh. All right. Goodbye, then.
string: ああ、そうですの。それでは失礼いたしますわ

original: This must be the place.
string: ここに違いありませんわ

original: Well then I'm very sorry, but I just can't walk away from this project yet.
string: そう、じゃあ残念だけど、まだここで仕事を続けなくちゃ

original: A Moth Priest? I'm sorry, but I don't know anything about that.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶？ 悪いけど、何も知らない

original: Sealed away like you were?
string: 同じように封じ込められている？

original: All right. If nothing else, I suppose it wouldn't hurt to learn more about what's going on so I can better defend myself.
string: 分かった。どうしてもというなら、状況を詳しく知って自分を守るために、行ってみてもいいわよ

original: I guess we should have seen this coming... Moth Priest, moths... they're apparently related in some way.
string: この事は予測しておくべきでしたわね… 聖蚕の僧侶、蚕… 明らかに何らかの関係がありますわよ

original: Seems the previous incarnation of the Dawnguard had, at one time, some interesting toys.
string: かつてのドーンガードの死霊術では、面白いオモチャが作り出されたようだ

original: Why in the world did you ever try putting armor on trolls?
string: トロールに防具をつけさせて、一体どうするつもりなの？

original: Well, I certainly can't help any less than the Vigilants of Stendarr, now can I?
string: まあ、私もステンダールの番人とそれほど変わりはないがな。そうだろう？

original: Just leave me alone for a bit.
string: しばらく一人にしてちょうだい

original: The kinship between us is gone. I don't understand what he's become, but he's no longer the brother I once knew.
string: もはや我らが絆は失われてしまった。何者になってしまったのかは分からないが、今の彼を兄弟とは思えない

original: Can I use your blood, then?
string: 血を使わせてくれるのか？

original: Do you know this place?
string: この場所は知っているのか？

original: Hhyyaarargghhhh!
string: はいやあああ！

original: Send them to Oblivion!
string: オブリビオン送りだ！

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: It sounds like you already didn't like him much.
string: 元々そこまで好きではなかった様子だな

original: Ah, so that was a Moth Priest, then?
string: ああ、するとあれは聖蚕の僧侶だったってわけか？

original: I took it upon myself to join the cause and fight the dremora, thinking this would simply be another feather in my cap.
string: それで、人々と共にドレモラと戦う事にした。また1つ手柄を増やせてしまうなあ、と思って

original: Perhaps they were once corporeal beings, but they've obviously reached a point where they no longer require a tangible presence.
string: かつては物質的な存在だったかも知れない、でもすでに有形の存在を必要としない地点に達したのは明らかね

original: It's around the side of the castle. Let's move.
string: 城の横手に回ったところですわ。行きましょう

original: Find your own thrall. This one's mine.
string: 他をあたって。これは私の従徒よ

original: None can deny your power now.
string: あなたの力を否定できるものはもうないわ

original: That was... a bit before my time.
string: それは… しばらく前の話だな

original: Follow me. I need your help.
string: ついて来てくれ。手を貸してほしい

original: Arvak, please! You can stop running now!
string: アルヴァク、頼む！ もう逃げなくていいんだ！

original: Oh please, milord. Please... forgive me!
string: 旦那様、お願いです… お許しを！

original: A man named Isran.
string: イスランという名の男だ

original: But you've proven your worth. I'm willing to try.
string: でもあなたは真価を証明した。試してもいいわ

original: Track him down and dispose of him.
string: その男を追い詰めて始末してくれ

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: I did. But something about you makes me think I can trust you. I hope I'm not wrong.
string: そういたしましたわ。でもあなたは何故か、信用してもいい気がしておりますの。勘違いじゃなければいいのですが

original: It is time for action.
string: 正念場だな

original: Let's just say that my mother and father had a bit of a falling out.
string: わたしの父母がちょっとした仲違いをした、とだけ言っておきますわ

original: They are determined and well-armed, but foolish if they think they can defy us. We will deal with them in time.
string: 奴らは決意と武装こそ固いが、我々に抗えると思っているのであれば愚かだな。いずれ対処しよう

original: Arvak!  Where are you, boy?
string: アルヴァク！ どこにいるんだい？

original: I knew it!
string: やっぱり！

original: Do you... hear something?
string: 何か… 聞こえる？

original: They have an Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書の一つを手にしているようだ

original: Farewell, friend. May the glow of Auri-El shield you from your enemies.
string: さようなら、友よ。アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守るだろう

original: What about Auriel's Bow? Do you know where we can find it?
string: アーリエルの弓は？ どこに行けば見つかるのかしら？

original: Bother someone else.
string: 他の誰かのところへ行きなよ

original: You care nothing for Serana or our plight.
string: セラーナや私達の苦境はお構いなしなのね

original: Sometimes we venture out into the world in search of more scrolls for our library at the White-Gold Tower.
string: 白金の塔の書庫に加える巻物を探して、時に我々は世界中を旅する事もある

original: Then we find out where she hid it. If she's still alive... well, as alive as she was before. Or is now. Or... you know what I mean.
string: それから母が書を隠した場所を見つけましょう。もし母がまだ生きていましたら… 以前と同じように生きていましたら、あるいはとにかく今生きていましたら、それとも… お分かりになって？

original: I'm ready.
string: 準備はできてる

original: The sun is gone! We're all doomed!
string: 太陽が消えた！ 皆破滅だ！

original: Excellent, here you are.
string: 素晴らしいわ、さあどうぞ

original: We may feed again today.
string: 今日はまた食事にありつける

original: Speak with Gunmar. He has something for you.
string: ガンマーに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: You'd be surprised what people leave behind when you burn their village to the ground.
string: 村を丸ごと焼いてみるといい。村人達がびっくりするようなものを残していくぞ

original: I don't know who she is. She says she lives in a castle near Solitude.
string: 素性は知らない。ソリチュードの近くの城に住んでいると言っていた

original: There's an offering altar not terribly far from here. I'm willing to bet that the gem you're looking for is there.
string: ここからそう遠くない場所に捧げ物の祭壇があるわ。お探しの石はきっとそこにあるはずよ

original: Since it's your first time... sure. Find a booth and enjoy.
string: まあ、ここは初めてみたいだし… いいわ。空いてる部屋を見つけて楽しんで

original: You've served Skyrim well.
string: 君はスカイリムを救ってくれたのだ

original: Suit yourself. I'm not going anywhere.
string: 好きにしてくれ。どこにも行きやしないさ

original: I'm sure Lord Harkon is grateful you've returned his daughter.
string: 娘を連れ戻してきてもらって、ハルコン卿は感謝している事だろう

original: Where... am I...
string: ここは… どこ…

original: Why were you locked away?
string: 幽閉されていた理由は？

original: I'll bring you everything we have on them, but it's not much.
string: それに関しては我々が持っているすべてを授けよう。だが、あまり大した量ではない

original: Correct. We only numbered perhaps a hundred at the time, so our presence remained a secret to the dwarves and the Nords.
string: その通り。常時100人足らずしかいない我々は、ドワーフやノルドにとって謎に包まれた存在だった

original: Find Lord Harkon at once and ask him to please... "correct" the situation.
string: すぐにハルコン卿を見つけ、彼に… 状況を“正して”くれるよう頼め

original: Are you ready to go?
string: 行く準備はできたか？

original: Living room. (<Global=HDSolitudeLiving> gold)
string: リビングルーム(<Global=HDSolitudeLiving> ゴールド)

original: There's plenty for all.
string: 不自由などない

original: Yeah? You change your mind? The Dawnguard could use somebody like you.
string: おっ？ 気が変わったのか？ あんたならドーンガードの一員として活躍できるかもな

original: I don't know what you're talking about.
string: 何の話か分からないな

original: Do you still want the Elder Scrolls?
string: まだ星霜の書が欲しいか？

original: Ugh. The smell here... let's try to handle this quickly.
string: うっ。ここの臭いときたら… 手早く済ませてしまいましょう

original: It's the price we pay for openly recruiting. We'll have to step up our defenses.
string: 誰でも彼でも雇うからこういう事になるんだ。守りを固めないとまずい

original: You're right. I shouldn't have brought it up.
string: そうだな。話題にすべきじゃなかった

original: As a king is to his subjects, so you are to other vampires.
string: 王に臣下がいるように、お前には他の吸血鬼がいるのだ

original: Enough, Vyrthur. Give us the bow!
string: もうよろしいですわ、ヴィルスール。弓をおよこしになって！

original: I won't lie - if this were any other situation, I'd put her down just on the chance she might be a vampire.
string: 嘘は言わない。もしこんな状況でなければ、彼女を殺しておくところだ。吸血鬼かも知れないからな

original: My family has its problems, but they're our problems.
string: わたしの家族は問題を抱えておりますけど、あくまで家族の問題ですわ

original: Stay on your guard.
string: 油断禁物ですわよ

original: Talk to Gunmar if you need materials.
string: 材料がほしかったら、ガンマーに言うといいわ

original: Leave me be.
string: 放っといてくれ

original: Not fond of vampires, are they?
string: 吸血鬼はお嫌いでしょう？

original: Always good to have a backup plan, in case the claws and teeth aren't enough.
string: 爪と歯では足りない場合に備え、代替策を持つのはいい事よ

original: Damn moths! Why are they doing that?
string: どうして蚕が寄ってくるんだ？

original: It's fine, it can just be kind of a sore subject.
string: 構いませんわ、嫌な話なのは、自分で分かっておりますの

original: The people of Skyrim owe you a great deal, whether they know it or not.
string: 知ってか知らいでか、スカイリムの民に大きな貸しを作ったな

original: If my knowledge of history serves me, I recall that the Dawnguard was an ancient order of vampire hunters.
string: 私の歴史観が確かなら、ドーンガードは吸血鬼ハンター達が集ういにしえの組織だったはずだ

original: Something has shifted in the moons, brother.
string: 月の中で何かが変わったわ、同志よ

original: You hear me? Don't feel like a guest, because you're not. You're a resource. You're an asset.
string: 聞こえたか？ 来客のように振る舞うのはやめろ。君は客ではなく人材なんだ。何かの役に立て

original: What about you? What were your parents like?
string: あなたはどうなのです？ ご両親はどんな方でしたの？

original: An island near the border to Highrock.
string: ハイロックとの境界線近くの島だ

original: Do so now and we will continue.
string: 次に進む前に、試してみるといい

original: Who are the spectral Prelates you mentioned?
string: 先程言っていた精霊の司教とは？

original: You dare to interfere with me?
string: 私の邪魔立てをするつもりか？

original: I think our potential is on the rise. Hircine smiles on us. Let's not question too much.
string: 潜在力が上昇しているみたいよ。ハーシーンがほほ笑んでいる。疑問は捨てましょう

original: Now I'm trying to reestablish the Dawnguard. Take the fight to the vampires for a change. I hope it isn't too late.
string: 今私はドーンガードを復興して、吸血鬼に戦いを挑み、状況を変えようと奮闘している。手遅れでなければいいのだが

original: Keep your guard up.
string: 気を抜かないことね

original: A cadre of lesser beasts has become a nuisance, taking too bold an approach to their feeding.
string: 劣等なけだものの一味が厄介になってきた。獲物への接近があまりに大胆すぎる

original: What exactly did the Betrayed do?
string: 裏切られし者たちは何をしたのか？

original: You're mine!
string: お前は私のだ！

original: How can we get in without your father noticing?
string: 父親に気づかれずに入るには？

original: Hands to yourself.
string: こっちは大丈夫ですわ

original: Our power is a blessing from him. It is he who first bestowed the gift of the ancient blood upon me.
string: この力はそのモラグ・バルからの祝福なのだ。私が最初に古き血を授かった時も、ご本人からだった

original: When you offer the embrace, do so away from prying eyes. Our new sibling will then likely require rest while his blood undergoes the change.
string: 抱きしめる時は人目を避けるように。おそらく我々の新しい同胞は、血が変化する間休息を必要とするだろう

original: Performing the Ritual of the Ancestor Moth within the glade should provide the answers you seek.
string: その湿地内で聖蚕の儀式を行えば、探している答えが見つかるだろう

original: Stay away from the crystals or you may find yourself becoming one of us.
string: 水晶に近づいてはダメだ。こんな姿になりたくないならね

original: Your blood calls me...
string: お前の血が呼んでいる…

original: Caves? Oh, no. The Chantry encompasses far more than a few caves, as you'll soon discover.
string: 洞窟？ いや、それは大きな勘違いだ。今に分かる。この礼拝所はただの洞窟の集まりなどではない

original: The bow belongs to me now.
string: 弓を渡すつもりはない

original: Perish, worm!
string: 死ね、虫けらめ！

original: (Heavy breathing)
string: ハァ、ハァ

original: I'm ready to go when you are.
string: わたくしはいつでもよくてよ

original: Hmmm, I'd say five of them would be enough.
string: ふむ、5つあれば十分だと思うわ

original: Finally came to your senses, eh? Realized what you gave up?
string: ようやく目が覚めたか？ 自分が何を見過ごしたのかに気づいたか？

original: Harkon's short-sightedness was his undoing. In his lust for power, he failed to consider the full consequences of his plans.
string: ハルコンの先見の明のなさは奴の破滅の元凶だ。力を欲するあまり、己の計画がもたらす結果の全体像を見失ったんだよ

original: I knew I smelled mortal blood!
string: 定命の者の血の匂いがすると思ったよ！

original: If you're here for business, go ahead. Otherwise, get lost.
string: 仕事があるなら構わないが、そうじゃなきゃ消えな

original: Glad you made it here safely, Dexion.
string: 無事に辿り着いてくれて何よりだ、デキソン

original: Tell me, what is your name?
string: お前の名は何だ？

original: And if I refuse your gift?
string: 申し出を断わったらどうなる？

original: Isran and I still need your help.
string: イスラン共々、まだ手を貸してほしいと思っている

original: If you want to waste your time, that's fine. But I've got my own destination in mind. Maybe you could help me get there when you're done?
string: 時間を無駄にしたいなら、それでも構いませんわ。ですが、わたしはわたしで行きたい所がありますの。あなたの用事が終わったら、連れて行って頂けません事？

original: Between you and me, there's too many of them. Can't trust the lot of them; never could.
string: ここだけの話、エルフは数が多すぎる。どいつも信用できないし、した事もない

original: I am more than happy to buy or sell whatever you might need.
string: 売り買いなら喜んで相談に乗るよ

original: The moment your father discovers your role in the prophecy, that he needs your blood, you'd be in terrible danger.
string: あなたの父がお告げの中のあなたの役割に、あなたの血が必要な事に気づいた瞬間に、恐ろしい危険にさらされるのよ

original: What does it have to do with the sun?
string: 太陽とはどんな関連が？

original: I don't think I can help you with this.
string: 力にはなれそうにないな

original: Well, you saved me from those vampires. I suppose the least that I can do is hear you out.
string: あの吸血鬼達から救ってくれたんだ。君の話ならいくらでも聞くよ

original: Maybe this will put your mind at ease. (<bribecost> gold)
string: これで気が変わるかな？(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Did you really come here expecting to claim Auriel's Bow?
string: ここに来ればアーリエルの弓が手に入ると、本気で思ったのか？

original: A handful of soul gem shards, some finely-ground bone meal, a good bit of purified void salts...
string: 魂石の破片をいくつか、細かく引いた骨の粉、浄化された虚無の塩をかなりの量…

original: To harness it is to know. The fundaments. The Dwemer lockbox hides it from me.
string: 抑制する事は知る事だ。基本だよ。ドゥーマーの鍵付きの箱が私から隠すのだ

original: Does that mean you can take us to it now?
string: 今すぐ案内してもらえるということか？

original: We read these ancient scrolls of prophecy in order to divine the future, and we use that knowledge to aid the Emperor.
string: 予言が書かれたいにしえの巻物から、我々は未来を読み取る。そしてその知識を皇帝のために使うんだよ

original: What exactly does it do?
string: 何をするものなんだ？

original: Of course it matters to you, but you don't get to make this decision for me.
string: 関係があるのは分かりますが、わたしの事で決断を下す必要はなくてよ

original: May Auri-El's glow shield you from your enemy.
string: アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守らん事を

original: Aye lad.
string: 分かったよ、若いの

original: I'm trying to put it to good use.
string: 私は砦を有効に利用しようとしてるんだ

original: And if Harkon were slain?
string: ハルコンを倒せたとすれば？

original: PushRoDa
string: PushRoDa

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: Report to Isran at Fort Dawnguard. And get moving if you're serious about it. The vampires aren't going to wait around to make their next move.
string: ドーンガード砦にいるイスランに会え。本気なら急ぐんだ。吸血鬼達は次の行動を起こすのを待ってはくれないぞ

original: Not as much.
string: そうでもございませんわ

original: They were trying to free a woman trapped in a crypt.
string: 墓地に閉じ込められた女性を解放しようとしていた

original: I know what you think of us. You think we're soft, that we're cowards. You think our deaths proved our weakness.
string: 考えている事は分かる。我々が弱腰の臆病者で、弱いからこそ死んだのだと

original: I've killed the Dawnguard leaders.
string: ドーンガードの幹部たちを始末した

original: If you think you can accomplish that feat, knowing hundreds before you have tried and failed, then I wish you the best of luck.
string: 数百の者達が挑戦し失敗した事を知った上で、その偉業を達成できると思うのなら、成功を祈るわ

original: You're no bard.
string: 吟遊詩人などではないな

original: Living with you would be perfect.
string: あなたと一緒に住めれば言うことはない

original: Alright! One more set of dwemer plans to go.
string: さて！ ドゥーマーの図面も、残り1組よ

original: Well, my notes were in my journal, but you didn't grab that, did you? Hmph.
string: あたしの日記にメモがあったんだよ、でも手に入れなかったようだね？ ふふん

original: Lord Harkon's a great man. Best show him the proper respect.
string: ハルコン卿は偉大な御方だ。相応の敬意を払うように

original: Tolan, I don't think that's a good idea.
string: トラン、それはいいアイデアとは思えないが

original: Yes, but when I was here it wasn't so... crumbly. This used to be a city.
string: ええ、でもわたしがいた頃はここまで… 崩れかかっていませんでしたわ。大きな街でしたのよ

original: Still, if he sent you to find me, it may actually be pretty bad.
string: それでも、あなたをここによこしたという事は、状況は悪いみたいね

original: Who are the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: What day is it? What year? What era even?
string: 今日は何日？ 何年？ というか第何紀なんだ？

original: Good. That should slow them down.
string: 上出来よ。これで彼らは失速するはず

original: I must return to the frontline Alessian headquarters at once... lives are hanging in the balance!
string: すぐに前線のアレッシア司令部に戻らないと… 人々の命が危ないんだ！

original: Tell me about your family.
string: 家族について教えてほしい

original: There's no escape.
string: 逃げ道なんてないぞ

original: Why the trolls, of course! You seem to have quite a way with them.
string: だいたい、なんでまたトロールなんだ！ どうやら、連中の扱いを心得てるらしいが

original: I don't care. Do as you like.
string: どうでもいい、好きにしてくれ

original: How do I obtain Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢はどうすれば手に入る？

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: If you say so.
string: 分かりましたわ

original: Hmmm. Pull chains and traps. Be careful here. Whatever's on the other side of this, the Falmer wanted to keep there.
string: ええと。引き鎖と罠ですわね。用心なさって。向こう側にあるのが何にせよ、ファルメルが持ち出されたくなかったものですから

original: She didn't want to follow me here. But she wants me to take her home.
string: ここについて来るのには難色を示したが、家に連れて帰ってほしいと言われた

original: She had an alchemy setup in her drawing room, but nothing that even comes close to what's here.
string: 客間に錬金術の道具を置いてはいましたけれど、ここにあるものとは比較になりませんのよ

original: I hope the vampires try to attack us here. A lot easier than hunting them down in their holes.
string: 吸血鬼がここで我々を襲撃するといいのに。穴の中で追跡するよりずっと簡単だ

original: I'd... rather not get into that with you. If that's all right.
string: それは… できれば触れたくありませんわ。お分かり頂けて？

original: Will it be hard for you if we have to kill him?
string: もし彼を殺すことになったら、つらいか？

original: But of course, neither of us can read it.
string: もちろん、わたしどもはどちらも読めないわけですが

original: You've given me a great gift friend. The night air hums and the shadows are full of color.
string: 素晴らしいよ。こんなにも夜の空気が新鮮で、暗がりには色彩があふれているなんて

original: Oh. You read the book, didn't you? "The Aetherium Wars"?
string: ああ。本を読んだんだね？ 「エセリウム戦争」だろう？

original: Quick, the bow!
string: 早く弓を！

original: Isn't that pretty risky, staying around the castle?
string: 城の周囲をうろつくのは危険じゃないのか？

original: There's an unused inlet on the northern side of the island that was used by the previous owners to bring supplies into the castle.
string: 島の北側に放棄された入り江がありますの。前の所有者達が城に荷物を持ち込む時に使っていた場所なのですけれど

original: But don't draw attention. Some kills are for fun, some for profit. And others are for sending messages. This one is a message.
string: ただし目立たないで。楽しみや利益のための殺しもあれば、意図を伝えるための殺しもある。今回は意図を伝える方

original: I understand that, but I really can't leave here without at least one usable piece of dwarven equipment.
string: それは分かったけど、ドワーフの道具が1つでも作れなければ、ここを離れるわけにはいかないわ

original: You took a big risk coming here.
string: ここに来るなんて、大きな危険を冒したな

original: He was obsessed with power. She was obsessed with seeing him fail. It was just so... toxic.
string: 父は力にとりつかれていた。母は父が失敗するのをどうしても見たかった。それは… 中毒みたいなものですわね

original: I try not to rely on others.
string: 他人には頼らないようにしている

original: If you find any more Elder Scrolls lying about, be sure to let me know!
string: また星霜の書を見つけたら、必ず教えてくれよ！

original: I once paid 3000 gold for this fungus that grows in giants armpits. Couldn't stand up for days, but no where as good as this stuff.
string: 前に、巨人の脇の下に生えるというキノコに3000ゴールド払いましたよ。何日も立ち上がれなくなった上に、味もこれの足元には及びませんでした

original: You think they turned him?
string: 彼は奴らに変えられたと思う？

original: We'll get to that. For now, get acquainted with the space.
string: それはまた後程。ひとまず今は、この場所に慣れてくれ

original: New blood, eh? Let's get something very clear.
string: 新顔ね？ はっきりさせておきましょう

original: I guess I'm expected.
string: わたしが来ると分かっていたようですわね

original: What have you done to yourself? I can't work with you in this state, night-walker.
string: 自分に何をしたの？ この状態では取り扱えないわよ、ナイトウォーカー

original: I'll not aid a vampire. Not even you. Get yourself cured, or you're dead to me.
string: 吸血鬼の手助けはしない。たとえあんたでもな。治してからきてくれ

original: Were you and Valerica close?
string: ヴァレリカとは親しかったのか？

original: So close...
string: もうすぐだ…

original: We left together, but that partnership didn't last very long. I didn't agree with some of his methods.
string: で、一緒に脱退したものの、コンビは長続きしなかった。方向性の違いって奴だよ

original: I had a map, in my journal. That's where we should start.
string: あたしの日記に地図があったわ。そこから始めるべきだね

original: Can you help get my soul back?
string: 魂を取り戻したい。どうすればいい？

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: It would be nice not to always be so thirsty.
string: 決して癒されない喉の渇きがなくなるのなら、いいかも知れませんわね

original: You must understand that he's no longer the man I married all that time ago.
string: 彼はもう、私がずっと昔に結婚した男ではない事を理解してちょうだい
