original: I... fell. When the earthquake hit. The ground just... opened up.
string: …落ちたんだよ。地震が起きた時。地面が自然に… 開いたんだ

original: The more we feed, the greater our prowess will grow. We could perhaps discover even more gifts of Hircine.
string: 食べれば食べるほど能力が大きく育つわ。ハーシーンの贈り物をさらに見出せるかも知れない

original: Keep your eyes open, here.
string: ここは用心なさって

original: All right. I'll meet you at the glade.
string: そうですわね。湿地でお会いしましょう

original: I can't see the sun. Where did it go?
string: 太陽が見えない。どこへ行った？

original: No more. I'm done with you.
string: もうたくさんですわ。家族の絆もこれまで

original: Trivial in your mind, perhaps. For me, it would mean a great deal.
string: そなたにとっては微々たる事かも知れんが、我にとっては大きな意義がある

original: I want you to turn me into a vampire.
string: 吸血鬼に変えてほしい

original: Well? Ready to join the fight against the damn vampires?
string: 忌々しい吸血鬼達と戦う覚悟はできたのかな？

original: Well, we're definitely not going to find our way out from here.
string: もし、これではいつまでたってもここから出る道は見つかりませんわよ

original: Well, maybe it really is time to resurrect the Dawnguard.
string: まさに今こそドーンガードを復活させる時だ

original: Nordic ruins. Even older than I am. I wonder if the draugr are as gullible as they were when I was a girl.
string: ノルドの遺跡ですわね。わたしの歳よりも古い場所。今でもドラウグルはわたしの子供の頃と同じくらいノロマなのかしら

original: All right, look. I'll consider it, but I can't just leave this bear to prey on more innocent people.
string: よし、分かった。一考はする、だがあのクマにこれ以上無実の人々を襲わせるわけにもいかない

original: Each sought to gain power by using his underling to kill you and keep the Chalice for himself.
string: ゆえにそれぞれが手下を使ってお前を殺し、聖杯を自分のものにして政権を握ろうとした

original: How long will that take?
string: どれくらい時間がかかるのだろう？
そんな…

original: This "stranger" has done more for me in the brief time I've known him than you've done in centuries!
string: その“よそ者”の彼は、お母様が何世紀もの間にしてくれた以上の事を、わずかな間にしてくれましたのよ！

original: You dare defy your father?!
string: 父親に逆らうだと！？

original: Yeeeaarrggh!
string: イィーヤァー！

original: Well, your thrall awaits and we have given him the Elder Scroll. Command him to read it, and let us hear the words of prophecy together.
string: お前の従徒が待っている。星霜の書を渡してあるので読むように指示してやれ。予言の言葉を共に聞くとしよう

original: Let me address the Dawnguard, and then we'll be off. The men deserve to know that we've finally gained the upper hand.
string: ドーンガードに話をさせてくれ。それから出発だ。我々がついに有利な状況に立った事を知る権利が彼らにはある

original: I mentioned that there was one more danger. Here it is.
string: もう一つ危険があると言ったよね。これだよ

original: Don't keep our master waiting. Take him the bow immediately.
string: 主様を待たせるな。今すぐ弓をお届けしろ

original: Ha. Those two deserved what they got. Their arrogance had become insufferable.
string: ハッ、あの二人の傲慢ぶりには耐えがたくなっていたわ。当然の報いよ

original: Though they are a rebellious and determined lot. While you've severed the snake's head, the body will likely writhe a while longer.
string: ただし彼らは反抗的で決意の固い集団だ。ヘビの頭を切り離しても、体はしばらくの間のたうちまわるかも知れない

original: "Too extreme", they called me. Well, that doesn't seem to have worked out in their favor, now has it?
string: 彼らは私の事を“考えすぎ”だと言っていたが、バカを見たのはどっちだったろうな

original: So this is what it's like on the other side.
string: 世界の裏側って、こんな感じなのか

original: Farewell. Remember that Harkon's not to be trusted.
string: さようなら。ハルコンは信用できない事を忘れないで

original: They threw me out, Tolan!
string: トラン、奴らは私を追い出したんだ！

original: Isran, these vampires are different. I know you've disagreed with the Order in the past...
string: イスラン、今回の吸血鬼は別物だ。かつて教団と対立したのは知っているが…

original: There has to be another way.
string: 他に方法があるはずだ

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to. (Intimidate)
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない(威圧)

original: Last I'd heard of him, he was aiding the Vigilants of Stendarr at Ruunvald. He may still be there.
string: 彼の消息を最後に聞いた時は、ルーンヴァルドでステンダールの番人達に手を貸していた。まだそこにいるかも知れない

original: Isran is the only one trying to do something about these vampires.
string: 吸血鬼をどうにかしようとしているのはイスランだけよ

original: Thank you. I'll be going.
string: ありがとう。もう行くよ

original: I... I almost can't believe it. We did it! We actually did it!
string: ああ… 信じられないよ。やった！ 本当にやったんだ！

original: The letter left on the corpse shall have to suffice. It will no doubt be found.
string: まあ、死体に残した手紙が見つかるはずだから、それで十分だが

original: May Auri-El's glow shield you from your enemy.
string: アーリエルの光の盾がその身を守らん事を

original: I trust you're keeping my daughter safe.
string: 娘の安全を守っていると信じているわ

original: Do you need something?
string: 何か必要なものでも？

original: Don't worry, I'm fine.
string: 心配ない、大丈夫だ

original: What a curious city. It's so... open.
string: すこぶる面白い街ですわね。なんというかすごく… あけっぴろげですわ

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何？

original: So what do we do?
string: どうすればいいと思う？

original: Where were you captured?
string: どこで捕まったんだ？

original: No...
string: 嫌でしてよ…

original: But my master is dead, and his enemies will pay!
string: だが私の主様は死んだ。かの敵どもは報いを受けるぞ！

original: Where did he go?
string: どこへ行ったんだ？

original: I don't know how you do it, getting them into that pen and putting armor on them. A very special relationship, clearly.
string: あいつらをどうやって小屋に集めて、防具を着けさせるんだ？ 特別な関係を結んでる事は確かだな

original: Barknar insisted we come here, said we'd be safe. He also said we'd be inside the walls.
string: バークナールが、安全だし壁の内側にいられると言ってここへ来させたの

original: First thing is to get this fort back into shape. Right now, a vampire could practically walk right in the front door.
string: まずこの砦を再建しなくては。吸血鬼が入口からすんなり入ってくるのはさすがにまずい

original: For the Dawnguard! For Skyrim!
string: ドーンガード万歳！ スカイリム万歳！

original: Before my father became obsessed with the prophecy, mother and I spent quite a bit of time together.
string: 父が予言にとりつかれる前は、わたしと母は一緒にいる事が多かった

original: Once that's done, the blood of a powerful vampire needs to be added to it.
string: それが済んだら、強力な吸血鬼の血をそこに加えなければならない

original: Everything's been torn down... the whole place looks... well, dead. It's like we're the first to set foot here in centuries.
string: 何もかもが破壊されてますわ… この場所全体がまるで… 死んでいるようですのよ。何世紀もの間、誰も足を踏み入れてなかったように見えますわね

original: Come with me, "pilgrim."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“巡礼者”よ

original: It is the great spire at the heart of the Imperial City, among the tallest towers in all of Tamriel.
string: 帝都の中心部にある巨大な塔だ。タムリエルで最も高い塔のひとつだよ

original: You know where to find me if you change your mind.
string: 気が変わりましたら、わたしはいつもの場所におりますわよ

original: Ah, it's so good to breathe again!
string: ああ、また息ができるなんて素晴らしいですわ！

original: Kill your brother, why?
string: 兄弟を殺せと？ 理由は？

original: I mean... as much as anyone. Not a lot.
string: 人並みには。それほどではありませんわ

original: Vaaz...Zol!
string: ヴァーズ…ゾル！

original: The quicker we find the Keepers, the quicker we can leave.
string: 番人達が早く見つかれば、それだけ早くここを出ていけますわ

original: You can't stop the inevitable!
string: 死を避ける事はできないぞ！

original: His own little fortress. Well, I guess I'll get to see what he's been up to all this time.
string: 自分だけの要塞というわけだ。まあ、今まで何を企んでたのかを確かめる、いい機会になるな

original: You simply need to retrieve the gem. The moment you touch it, your soul essence will be restored.
string: 石を取り戻すだけでいいのよ。それに触れた瞬間、魂のエキスは元通りになるわ

original: Got it!
string: やったね！

original: I miss the warm sunshine. Green grass. Blue skies. I miss being alive.
string: 暖かい陽の光や、緑の草原や、青い空が恋しいな。生きてた頃に戻りたい

original: Go now, and prove that my faith in you was not misplaced.
string: 行くがいい、お前を信じた私の判断が間違っていなかった事を証明して見せるのだ

original: They shouldn't be that hard to find. Shelves, tables... should be easy to find. She wouldn't have hidden them.
string: そんなに苦労するはずはありませんわ。棚やテーブルを探せば簡単に見つかると思いますの。母は隠さなかったでしょうから

original: I am Harkon, lord of this court.
string: 私の名はハルコン、この一族の王である

original: It should be among our kind, not laying about unguarded for mortals to find.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。定命の者達の目につかないようにしっかり保管されているよ

original: How does it feel to hold the fate of the vampire in your grasp. Exhilarating, isn't it?
string: 吸血鬼の命運をその手に握った今、さぞかし気分がいいだろう？

original: You're the one who matters to me.
string: 大切なのは君の方だ

original: And yet, I have fallen so low that I must justify myself to a wanderer in the sewers of this backwater of the world.
string: それでもこれほど落ちぶれたからには、世界の果ての下水道に住む放浪者を自称せざるを得ないわね

original: How can I avoid trouble with the law?
string: 司法とのもめ事を避けるにはどうすれば？

original: You heard the Scroll reading. Now do you believe Serana?
string: 星霜の書の内容は聞いただろう。セラーナを信じるか？

original: My what? Wait. That means...
string: 何だって？ という事は、つまり…

original: A... can't you tell just from looking at me? A vampire.
string: きゅ… 見てお分かりでしょう？ 吸血鬼ですわ

original: I never knew it would be this beautiful.
string: こんなにも美しいとは存じませんでしたわ

original: Child, my life ended long before you were born!
string: ガキめ、貴様が生まれるはるか前に、命など捨てたのだ！

original: It can stay for now, but if it so much as lays a finger on anyone here, I'll hold you responsible. Got it?
string: 奴がここにいるのは構わないが、ここの誰かに少しでも危害を加えたら、それは君のせいだ。いいな？

original: Look out!
string: 気をつけて！

original: Sorine and Gunmar are settling in.
string: ソリーヌとガンマーは腰を落ち着け始めている

original: I've destroyed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: Send the troll after them!
string: トロールに追わせるのよ！

original: I am Knight-Paladin Gelebor. Welcome to the Great Chantry of Auri-El.
string: 騎士司祭のギレボルだ。アーリエルの大礼拝所へようこそ

original: By the Eight...
string: なんて事だ、八大神よ…

original: You need to get cured, friend. You're a danger to the Dawnguard otherwise.
string: 治療を受けるべきだ。そのままじゃ、ドーンガードにとっても危険だ

original: Haven't heard from him since.
string: それからというもの彼から音沙汰がないんだ

original: I've sensed the blood pulsing a little stronger, of late. I had assumed you had as well.
string: 最近血の鼓動をより強く感じるわ。あなたも同じだと思っていた

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: Leaving huh? Good. Maybe I can get some work done.
string: 行くのか？ そうか。これでやっと仕事に集中できるよ

original: Without the Hall, the Vigilants need a new rallying point.
string: 番人の間を失った番人達には、新たな拠点が必要だ

original: Vampires aren't counted among the living. I could probably go through there without a problem.
string: 吸血鬼は生ける者と見なされないから、おそらく問題なく通れるはずですわ

original: And the wayshrines?
string: 祠は？

original: What's the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: Her blood will be mine!
string: その娘の血は私のものだ！

original: I assumed you were here to see me about your face. To have it sculpted into something more... artful than Nature has bestowed upon you.
string: 自分の顔の件で私に会いに来たんでしょう。何かもっと… 自然が授けたよりも技巧的な顔へ改造するために

original: Get yourself cured immediately. You're a threat to all of us otherwise.
string: 即刻に治療をすべきだ。さもなくば我々全員の脅威となってしまう

original: He has neglected using it for ages. If he wants it filled now, then grander things are afoot. This is good.
string: 彼は長い間それを放置している。もし彼が今それを満たしたいとすれば、面白い事が起きる。見ものだよ

original: Even with Vyrthur gone and the Inner Sanctum destroyed, my duty as a Knight-Paladin of Auri-El remains.
string: ヴィルスールまでもが連れ去られ、最奥聖域が破壊された今でも、アーリエルの騎士司祭としての使命は続いている

original: All over Skyrim. It's my job to collect them. I try and keep something for everyone. For every taste, I mean.
string: スカイリム全土だ。あいつらを集めるのが仕事だ。幅広い趣味をまかなえるよう、配慮している

original: Focus on the dragon!
string: ドラゴンに集中して！

original: The people of Morrowind were so grateful to have the roads safer again, they took to calling me "Saint Jiub" and then the other names followed.
string: モロウウィンドの人々は、安全に街道を歩けるようになって喜んでくれた。その功績を讃えられ、“聖ジウブ”などと呼ばれるようになったってわけだ

original: I suppose I could... what, praytell, is there?
string: 何か… 教えてくれ、一体何をすれば？

original: This is about more than killing vampires.
string: 吸血鬼狩りだけの問題ではない

original: That's good enough for me. Go see what the vampires were looking for in this Dimhollow Crypt. With any luck, they'll still be there.
string: 私にとっては好都合だ。吸血鬼どもがディムホロウ墓地で何を探していたのか確かめようじゃないか。運がよければ、奴らはまだそこにいるはずだ

original: You are in danger. A vampire has infiltrated your court.
string: 吸血鬼が宮廷の一員になりすましているため、危険だ

original: I can't help that space is cramped in here, Florentius.
string: 狭いのは仕方ないぞ、フロレンティウス

original: Let's just say I sold something to a guy who turned out to work for a whole coven of necromancers.
string: 死霊術師の集団の御用人に何かを売った… とでも言っておこうか

original: Hey!
string: ちょっと！

original: Let's see what you've got there.
string: 見せてちょうだい

original: So, the beast is destroyed.
string: そうか、バケモノは始末したか

original: This is the kind of thing I've been wanting to see.
string: こんな光景を見たいと思っておりましたの

original: Who are the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: Lah...Haas!
string: ラー…ハース！

original: Transform into the Vampire Lord, and I will teach you more.
string: 吸血鬼の王の姿になれ。さらに説明しよう

original: Then you may begin your reading.
string: 解読を始めてほしい

original: I need someone out in the field, taking the fight to the damn vampires, while we're getting the fort back into shape...
string: 我々が砦を再建してる間に、外の世界で吸血鬼達に戦いを挑む者が必要なんだ

original: They say anyone who steps foot on that island will meet an early death... hope you know what you're doing.
string: あの島に上陸すると早死にするって言われてるんだが… 後悔しなさんなよ

original: "Saviour of Morrowind." Hm, that's good but it sounds too narrow of scope...
string: “モロウウィンドの生存者”。うーん、響きは悪くないが、少し範囲が狭すぎやしないかね…

original: I've never been in those tunnels before, but I'd bet they run right under the courtyard and into the tower ruins.
string: このトンネルには入った事がありませんけど、中庭の下を通って塔の廃墟に通じている事は賭けてもよくてよ

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: Oh sure, keep pestering me then, by all means.
string: いいよ、好きなだけ商売の邪魔でもしてくれ

original: Find their leader and kill him!
string: 首謀者を探し出して殺すのよ！

original: You met Stalf and Salonia, I assume? Lord Harkon and I suspected they might follow you there.
string: スタルフとサロニアには会ったな？ ハルコン卿と自分は彼らがお前の後を追うと思っていた

original: I'm not going to be the one to destroy a marriage. I'm sorry.
string: こちらから別れを切り出すのは嫌ですわよ。お生憎様

original: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
string: それが何を意味するかはまだ分からないが、突き止めてみよう。おそらく吸血鬼達がほしがるものを彼女が持ってるか、彼女自身が重要なのかのどちらかだろう

original: You test my patience with these questions.
string: いつまで質問を続ける気なのだ？

original: Yes, that was my point. I felt it was rather clear.
string: そう、そういう事よ。単純明快だと思うけど

original: Of course. Why did I suppose differently. Fine, tell me what you know.
string: もちろんだ。考えてる事は同じだな。いいだろう、君が知ってる事を教えてくれ

original: That's always a possibility. She was almost as obsessed as my father by the time she shut me in.
string: その可能性は常にありますわね。母がわたしを閉じ込めた頃は、父とほとんど同じぐらい何かにとりつかれておりましたから

original: I remember she use to keep a small journal. See if you can dig it up.
string: そういえば母は小さな日記をつけておりましたわ。見つかりますかしら

original: Of course! It is my duty to serve, and I am happy to do it!
string: いいとも！ 人様のお役に立てるのは嬉しいね！

original: There's only one thing left to do. We have to prove this actually works. That this is the real Aetherium Forge.
string: する事はあと一つだけ。これが実際に動く、真のエセリウムの鋳造器具だと証明しなくちゃならない

original: You... you know too much. I can't afford to let you live.
string: お前は… 知りすぎている。生かしてはおけん

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: What treasure?
string: 宝とは？

original: Ha ha ha! I knew I'd find you.
string: あはははは！ 思った通りだ

original: So let's hear it.
string: では聞かせてもらおうか

original: I'll tell you what. I appreciate what you're trying to do, so I'll play along.
string: こうしよう。あんたのやろうとしてる事は気に入ったから、協力してやるよ

original: Speak with Garan Marethi. He has something for you.
string: ガラン・マレシと話すといい。何かあるだろう

original: The twisted forms you've seen didn't occur overnight. It isn't a plague or a disease that ravaged our species.
string: お前達が目にする邪悪な姿は、突然現れたわけではない。あれは我が種族を蝕む伝染病のようなものだ

original: All right Isran, you've got us all here. Now what do you want?
string: イスラン、来てやったぞ。お次は何だ？

original: What's that you're shooting with?
string: その武器は？

original: Perhaps you still need convincing? Behold the power!
string: まだ納得できないか？ 我が力を見るがいい！

original: If you want me to come along, it has to just be me and you.
string: 一緒に行ってほしいのでしたら、二人だけというのが条件ですわよ

original: Vampires? Really?
string: 吸血鬼？ 本当なの？

original: Other than that, she wouldn't tell me anything.
string: それ以外は何も言わなかった

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: If you need anything, say the word. I can still forge a decent blade.
string: 何か必要なら言ってね。まだまだ立派な刀剣を鍛えるわよ

original: How much longer can you keep this up, Moth Priest?
string: いつまでもつかな、聖蚕の僧侶よ？

original: I'd never do anything that could hurt you.
string: あなたを傷つけるような事はしたくありませんわ

original: How does anyone expect me to write my opus with all of these rude interruptions?
string: 失敬な連中に邪魔されてばかりで、どうやって作品を仕上げればいいんだ？

original: Farewell, friend. May the radiance of Auri-El fill your heart with joy.
string: お別れだ、友よ。アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たすよう祈ろう

original: Maybe.
string: そうですわね

original: The dwarves may have stolen their sight, but it took many generations for them to become what they are today.
string: ドワーフに奪われたのは視力だけだが、何世代も経つうちにあのような姿になってしまったのだ

original: Yeah, just around this bend.
string: そうですわ、あそこを曲がったところ

original: Who's there?
string: 誰だ？

original: I need to find a Moth Priest.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探している

original: Well, growing up the way I did, you get used to it.
string: まあ、わたしみたいな育ち方をしたら、慣れますわよ

original: No. I try to avoid it. Always seems to end in an argument. You?
string: いや、避けるようにしている。口げんかが関の山だからだ。そちらは？

original: I want to show you something. It's important. You really must come. (Persuade)
string: 見せたいものがある。大事な話だ。ぜひともついて来てほしい(説得)

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: Do you have any ideas?
string: 何か思うところはないか？

original: Hold it! She's the one Tolan mentioned.
string: 待て！ あれはトランが言ってた女だ

original: Are you alive? I must be imagining this.
string: 生きてる人？ きっと幻覚だな

original: Once you've located a wayshrine, there will be a spectral Prelate tending to it.
string: 祠を見つけたら、そこを守っている形なき司教がいるはずだ

original: What happens now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: If you're not happy with things... that's not my business.
string: 気に入らない事がありますのね… それはわたしのせいではございませんわ

original: I've been sworn to protect this vale and everything it represents until I die.
string: 命が尽きるまで、この峡谷とここにまつわるすべてを守り抜かねばならない

original: Good to see you again. It's becoming quite lonely out here.
string: また会えてうれしいわ。ここはずいぶん寂しくなってきたものね

original: Because that means there's still hope that they might one day shed their hatred and learn to believe in Auri-El once again.
string: 彼らにもまだ望みが残っているという事だ。いつの日か、憎しみを捨てて再びアーリエルを信じるようになるかも知れん

original: I'm not backing down!
string: 決して退かん！

original: No one will soon forget that you were the one to defeat Harkon.
string: ハルコンを倒す者があなただった事をすぐに忘れる者はいないわ

original: Here we go...
string: 行くよ…

original: The Chantry was a place of peaceful worship. I led a small group of paladins, but we were no match for the Betrayed's sheer numbers.
string: かつての礼拝所は祈りのための平和な場所だった。小さな司祭団を率いていたが、裏切られし者に数で圧倒されてしまったのだ

original: Are you saying you want to learn more about me?
string: こちらの素性を詳しく知りたいのか？

original: The woman was a vampire, and they wanted her back.
string: 女性は吸血鬼で、連中は彼女を奪還しようとしていた

original: Here to join the Dawnguard? Good.
string: ドーンガードに入りたい？ いい心がけだ

original: You must help me find my Arvak. He doesn't deserve to be in a place like this!
string: アルヴァクを探すのを手伝ってくれ。こんな所に居させたくないんだ！

original: You really don't look well. Have you talked to Florentius? Maybe he can help you.
string: 相当具合が悪そうだけど、フロレンティウスに話してみた？ 彼なら力になってくれるわよ

original: Sorry, I'm not interested.
string: すまないが、興味はない

original: Your kind are finished.
string: お前たちの種族は終わりよ

original: Hhyyaarrgghh!
string: ハイヤァアア！

original: Yearrgh!
string: ええい！

original: Questions? I expected as much.
string: 質問はあるか？ 分からない事も多いだろう

original: Serana can change that. I suggest you ask her to.
string: セラーナに変えてもらうよう頼むがいい

original: What about you?
string: あなた自身のこと？

original: Forgive me... Auri-El...
string: ご慈悲を… アーリエル…

original: What foul magic could put the sun out?
string: どんな卑劣な魔法を使えば太陽を消せるんだ？

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵でしたけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうでしたわ

original: What about it?
string: それが何か？

original: I don't know what a Moth Priest is, but I did see an old man in a robe not long ago. He was riding in a wagon with some Imperial guards.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が何かは知らないけど、ローブを着たおじいさんならこの間見たよ。帝国軍の衛兵と一緒に荷馬車に乗ってた

original: I have everything I need right here.
string: ここにいればなんの不足もないわ

original: Are you sure? I'm willing to do it, but you need to think it through.
string: 本当ですの？ わたしはよろしいけれど、しっかり考えた方がよくてよ

original: Farewell, friend. May the warmth of Auri-El provide you strength.
string: お別れだ、友よ。アーリエルの火がその身に力を与えるだろう

original: Good.
string: いい返事だ

original: A little bit. That's... one of the reasons I wanted to come with you.
string: 少しは。それも… あなたについてきた理由の1つですわ

original: You mean the Betrayed.
string: 裏切られし者のことか？

original: Whenever you're ready.
string: いつでもよしなに

original: Please, don't be angry with me.
string: お怒りにならないで下さい

original: Of course, I wouldn't be telling you where to find them if I desired them for myself.
string: もちろんさ。自分のものにするなら君にそれらのありかを教えてないよ

original: Your wife is such a soul, and the stars appear cooperative. Now is your chance.
string: 君の奥さんは大した人だ。それに星の巡りも味方している。今がチャンスだな

original: Turn back...
string: 引き返して…

original: How are your friends?
string: やあ、ごきげんいかがかな？

original: Wonderful. I'll make the necessary preparations for infusion into the Chalice presently.
string: 素晴らしい。では聖杯に注ぐものをすぐ準備する事にしよう

original: That... wasn't as unpleasant as I thought it would be.
string: あれは… 思っていたほど悪くありませんでしたわね

original: Molag Bal created the first vampire.
string: 最初の吸血鬼はモラグ・バルによって生み出された

original: Good thing we stopped that prophecy, huh?
string: あの予言が成就するのを阻止できてよかったわね

original: It seems they were looking for a woman who was sealed in a crypt.
string: 連中は墓場に閉じ込められた女性を探していたようだ

original: He simply said "It is time."
string: “時が満ちた”とだけ

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: This weather seems all wrong to me.
string: この天気はまったくおかしいな

original: You are a guest in this castle at my pleasure. I'll permit you to stay for now, but you're of no use to me like this.
string: この城には私の客人として滞在してもらう。今は置いてやるが、そのままでは何の役にも立たん

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Anyway, my mother and I didn't feel like inviting a war with all of Tamriel, so we tried to stop him. That's why I was sealed away with the Scroll.
string: とにかく、母とわたしは全タムリエルとの戦争を引き起こす気にはなれず、止めようとしたのです。だからこそ星霜の書と共に埋められていたのですわ

original: What are you waiting for? Get out there and find a moth priest!
string: 何を待っている？ 出かけていって聖蚕の僧侶を探すのだ！

original: Come on!
string: かかっておいで！

original: I love it when dinner walks right into my arms.
string: 自分から夕食になりに来るがいい

original: I was simply an addict who needed money for skooma. The stuff wasn't cheap, and murder always seemed to be in demand.
string: 単にスクゥーマをキメてて、そのための金がほしかっただけ。安いものではなかったし、殺し屋はいつの時代も食いっぱぐれないもんだ

original: As far as I know, though, it's never been held by a vampire. That would be a new one.
string: でもわたしの知る限り、吸血鬼の手に落ちた事はありませんわ。それは新しい個体かも知れませんわね

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Serana? What are you doing here? Where's your father?
string: セラーナ？ ここで何をしているの？ あなたの父親はどこ？

original: Last I knew, he was headed to Ruunvald. But then, we hadn't heard from anyone there in a few weeks.
string: 最後に聞いた時はルーンヴァルドに向かっていたが、その時点で音信は数週間途絶えていた

original: Glorious. Serana claims you're her guardian, yet your first instinct appears to be greed. I see that my daughter is still as naive as ever.
string: ご立派ね。セラーナはあなたを保護者だと言う。あなたの最初の動機はどうやら強欲だったようなのに。娘は相変わらずうぶな子だわ

original: We need your help, Isran.
string: 力を貸してほしい、イスラン

original: Hold it right there.
string: ちょっと待ってくれ

original: I just need to be alone. For a while. There's a lot of feelings wrapped up in this old place, and I don't think you're quite ready for them.
string: しばらく独りでいたいだけですわ。ここには昔からの想いが色々と眠っていて、それらにつき合わせるにはまだ早い気がするのです

original: This stranger aligns himself with those that would hunt you down and slay you like an animal, yet I should entrust you to him?
string: このよそ者はあなたを追いつめて動物のように殺す者達と手を組んでいるのよ。それなのにあなたを預けるべきだと？

original: Of course. I wouldn't be telling you where to find it if I desired it for myself.
string: もちろんさ。自分のものにするなら君にそのありかを教えてないよ

original: What he fails to realize is how much attention would be called to our kind if the prophecy came to fruition.
string: 彼が理解していないのは、お告げが実現した場合に私達の同類がどれほど関心を持つかという事よ

original: We have the bow, he'll listen to us.
string: 弓があれば、こちらの言い分に耳を貸すだろう

original: Stay back!
string: お下がりになって！

original: May Auri-El's warmth imbue your body with strength.
string: その身がアーリエルの力で満たされん事を

original: All right... Here, take this.
string: 分かった… これをどうぞ

original: As long as you don't get in my way.
string: 足さえ引っ張らなければ

original: I thought... I hoped that if he saw me, he might feel something again.
string: わたしの姿を目にすれば、もう一度何かを感じてくれるかも知れないと

original: You're vampires.
string: 吸血鬼か…

original: Must be gone now.
string: 行ったか

original: The restoration of this wayshrine means that Vyrthur must be dead and the Betrayed no longer have control over him.
string: この祠が再建されたという事は、ヴィルスールは死に、裏切られし者に操られる事もなくなったわけだ

original: "What do I mean," indeed!
string: はいはいまったくごもっとも！

original: Once enough of the moths are following, they'll provide you with the second sight needed to decipher the scrolls.
string: 聖蚕が十分集まれば、書の解読に必要な第二の視覚を身につける事ができる

original: Once saw Harkon rip a man in half. He's powerful like you wouldn't believe.
string: ハルコンが男を真っ二つにするのを見た事がある。信じられないほど強いのよ

original: Making sure you're not vampires. Can't be too careful.
string: 吸血鬼でない事の確認だよ。念には念を入れないとな

original: Well, don't just stand there!
string: ほら、突っ立ってないで！

original: I think perhaps... I think you did more than that. You have my thanks.
string: 多分… 君はそれ以上の事をしてくれたと思う。ありがとう

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をするの？

original: How do I turn him into a vampire?
string: 彼を吸血鬼に変えるにはどうすれば？

original: No... why?
string: いいえ… どうして？

original: Never mind. I don't need you to do anything.
string: やっぱりいい。特に頼みたいことはない

original: The Dawnguard were there. They fought well, but not well enough.
string: ドーンガードがいて、精一杯の抵抗をしてきたが、敵ではなかった

original: The reason I was down there... and why I had the Elder Scroll.
string: わたしがあそこにいて、星霜の書を持っていた理由…

original: We both realized that if Isran's even allowed us in here, he must be really concerned.
string: 私達がここにいる事をイスランが許すだけでも、かなり悩んでる証拠だわ

original: You've seen your last dawn. I bring the night.
string: 二度と日の出を見ることはないぞ。私が夜をもたらすからな

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: Their focus will be shifted from us, giving us one less nuisance to deal with.
string: 人々の注目は我々からそれる。面倒がひとつ減るというわけだ

original: In my heart, I know that it was my wife, Valerica, who took my beloved daughter away from me.
string: 私は内心、愛する娘を連れ去ったのは妻のヴァレリカだったと心得ている

original: The scrolls are merely a means to an end. The key to the Tyranny of the Sun is Serana herself.
string: 書は目的達成の手段にすぎない。太陽の専制への鍵はセラーナ自身よ

original: Monster? What monster? Don't know what you're game is, but I'll humor for a moment.
string: 怪物？ 怪物って？ 何の話か知らないけど、今は付き合ってやるよ

original: I feel like it was a long time. Who is Skyrim's High King?
string: 長い時間に思えてなりませんわね。スカイリムの今の王はどなたですの？

original: I wonder if the horse's remains are around here... someplace.
string: その馬の亡骸… この辺りのどこかにあるのかしら？

original: We just need... we need help.
string: ただ… 我々は助けを必要としているだけだ

original: Watch out! He's pulling down the ceiling!
string: 気を付けて！ 天井を落とすつもりですわ！

original: Possibly. I guess even a vampire mother is still a mother.
string: ですわね。吸血鬼の母親であっても、母親には変わりないのかも知れませんわ

original: I miss my homeland, but I can't say that I miss all the noise!
string: 故郷は懐かしいが、あの騒音の中に戻る気はこれっぽっちもないぞ！

original: There's nowhere to run. And I'm certainly not moving in with my mother, if that's what your implying.
string: 逃げる場所などありませんわ。それに母と一緒に引っ越してこいと言いたいのでしたら、それは無理な話ですわね

original: Look at this. I should've known it was only a matter of time before they found us.
string: この有り様だよ。奴らが我々を見つけるのは時間の問題だった。それを分かっていれば…

original: You are to destroy the feral creature before this small problem becomes a larger one.
string: この小さな問題が大きくなるまでに、野蛮な生物を殺すのだ

original: Return to me when your part is done.
string: やるべき事が済んだら戻ってきてくれ

original: We didn't really get along. Best that I haven't seen them in a while.
string: 親とは不仲だった。しばらく会っていないのがむしろ救いだ

original: Does this ice feel a little... thin to you?
string: この氷、少しばかり… 薄くありませんこと？

original: Aren't we there yet?
string: まだ着きませんの？

original: It's on an island near Solitude. Hopefully we can find a boat to take us there.
string: ソリチュードの近くの島にございますわ。渡るのに使える小船でもあるといいのですが

original: Are you sure you know what you're doing?
string: 自信をもってやっているのか？

original: Fellow dovah? I am not a dragon.
string: 仲間のドヴァー？ こっちはドラゴンではないぞ

original: You there. The Dawnguard is looking for anyone willing to fight against the growing vampire menace. What do you say?
string: そこのあんた。ドーンガードは増しつつある吸血鬼の脅威と戦う気のある者は誰でも受け入れている。興味はあるか？

original: Dawnstar doesn't have much of a port, but the miners say its got rich ore veins.
string: ドーンスターには大した港はないが、鉱山労働者が言うには、とにかくいくらでも掘れるらしいんだと

original: If was a foolish mistake, and I intend to make sure they learn that the hard way.
string: それが愚かな判断だった事を、奴らへ存分に思い知らせてやりたい

original: It's like from the stories I used to hear... the two adventurers seeing the world.
string: 昔によく聞いた物語みたい… 二人の冒険者が世界中を旅しますのよ

original: Looking at the equipment and materials, it looks like she was trying to advance her necromancy.
string: 器具や素材を見る限り、死霊術を掘り下げようとしていたようですわね

original: I wasn't told where to take you.
string: どこに行けばいいか聞いてなかった

original: I wish to regain the gift of beast blood.
string: 獣の血の恩恵を再び受けたい

original: Arvak!
string: アルヴァク！

original: There are some things I want to ask you about.
string: いくつか聞きたいことがある

original: Well, it seems the Dawnguard really is needed again.
string: どうやらドーンガードの復活が急務のようだ

original: Now that I think on it, I did see your priest.
string: よく考えたら、確かにその司祭を見たよ

original: Look at them... they've definitely taken a liking to you.
string: ご覧になって… すっかりあなたの味をしめたみたいですわ

original: Got a pretty full stock of potions and alchemy reagents.
string: 薬や錬金術の材料を取り揃えてる

original: But... it's hopeless. I died here, just like all the others. Turn back. Turn back before you become the next victim.
string: でも… 絶望的だよ。他の皆と同様、あたしもここで死んだ。さあ帰りな。次の犠牲者になる前に引き返すんだ

original: But when it was all said and done, those elves were either slaughtered, vanished or gave up and took the dwarves' bargain.
string: だが、彼らも結局は殺されたり、追放されたり、考えを曲げてドワーフの要求に従わされたのだ

original: Yyyaaahh!
string: イイヤァー！

original: You think I'd have the audacity to place my own daughter in that tomb for the protection of her Elder Scroll alone?
string: 私が娘を、彼女の星霜の書を守るためだけにあの墓へ置くほど厚かましいと思う？

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: Do you... do you need anything, Feran?
string: 何かその… 必要なものはないですか、フェラン？

original: So this is the grand tour of Skyrim's caves that you're showing me?
string: すると、これはスカイリムの洞窟巡りという事？

original: Vingalmo and Orthjolf are Harkon's primary advisors. I'm sure they're quite surprised to learn that you're taking the Chalice.
string: ヴィンガルモとオースユルフはハルコンの第一の相談役だ。お前が聖杯を受けると聞けばさぞ驚くだろう

original: There is one last thing you must know. Slaying mortal men with your life drain grants you new night powers and blood magic.
string: 最後にもう一つ知っておくといい。定命の人間達の生命力を吸い取って殺せば、新たな夜の力と血の魔法が得られる

original: A woman? Trapped in there? That doesn't make any sense. Who is she? More importantly, where is she?
string: 女が？ 閉じ込められてる？ どういう事だ。その女は誰なんだ？ それよりもっと大事な事だが… 彼女はどこにいる？

original: Back, huh? Well, price is still 4,000 coins.
string: 戻ったのか？ 値段は変わらず4000ゴールドだ

original: Welcome back.
string: お帰り

original: It's a long story.
string: 長い話だよ

original: If anything happens to Serana, I'll have you answer for it.
string: もしセラーナに何か起これば、責任を取ってもらうわ

original: I believe there's more to it than that.
string: 私はそれ以上の存在だと思うわ

original: I suspected as much.
string: そんなことだろうと思った

original: What do these amulets do?
string: そのアミュレットの効果は？

original: Something's wrong with the moondial here. Some of the crests are missing and the dial is askew.
string: ここの月時計は何かおかしいですわ。クレストがいくつかなくなっていますし、時計自体も傾いてますのよ

original: Perhaps it was nothing after all.
string: 大した事じゃないだろう

original: I believe you, Vigilant. And I don't think you even know what you've found here.
string: その言葉を信じよう、番人よ。どうやら自分が見つけたものの意味すら理解していないのだろう

original: The world is alive, and so am I, for once.
string: 世界もわたしも、今は生命に溢れているみたい

original: Gaan...
string: ガーン…

original: Ran off, I suppose.
string: 逃げたのかな

original: All clean. I feel like I can breathe again for the first time since I was turned.
string: 清々しいですわ。まるで、姿を変えられてから初めて呼吸するような気分

original: If I hadn't lost all of the pages, I wouldn't be in this predicament and we wouldn't be having this conversation.
string: 原稿を丸ごと失ったりしなければ、そもそも困っちゃいないし、こんな話もしなくて済んだんだ

original: The light be with you.
string: 光のご加護あれ

original: Arkay says it's good that we're here, but I don't know... Something about this place doesn't feel right.
string: アーケイは我々がここにいるのは良い事だと言うが、どうかな… この場所は何か嫌な感じがする

original: I would gladly accept my fate at their hands if it robs Harkon of victory.
string: ハルコンから勝利を奪えるなら、喜んで運命を彼らの手に委ねるわ

original: It ends here!
string: 終わりにしてやる！

original: You could call it that. Didn't put up much of a fight but made for a tasty snack. A rich bouquet of flavors, I would definitely recommend it.
string: そうとも言えるわね。大して抵抗しなかったけど、おいしい間食にはぴったりよ。豊かな香り。ぜひともお薦めするわ

original: I settled in the city of Kvatch to write my memoirs and to find some peace and quiet.
string: おれはクヴァッチの街に住んで、手記を書きながら静かに暮らそうと思っていた

original: You there, hold fast!
string: そこのお前、待て！

original: Welcome, Initiate. This is the Wayshrine of Sight.
string: ようこそ、入信者よ。ここは物見の祠だ

original: So don't get your hopes up. It's mostly lies, leavened with rumor and conjecture.
string: だから期待はしないでくれ。ユーモアや憶測はなかなか面白くて退屈しないが、ほとんどは嘘だ

original: Neh...Viir!
string: ネー… ヴィール！

original: Spiders!
string: スパイダーめ！

original: May Auri-El's brilliance illuminate your path.
string: アーリエルの光が行く手を照らさん事を

original: Gods, don't let Isran see you like that. Look, I hear Falion in Morthal deals with this kind of thing. Go see him immediately.
string: イスランにその姿を見られるなよ。モーサルにいるファリオンが処置の仕方を知っていると聞いた。今すぐ訪ねるべきだ

original: I've located additional petrified remains of an elder vampire. Bring them to me, and I'll extend the effects granted by the Blood Chalice.
string: 太古の吸血鬼が石化した遺体の手がかりをまた見つけたぞ。それを持ってきてくれたら、血の聖杯の効果を延長させる事ができるはずだ

original: Harkon's vision is a world plunged in eternal darkness where the vampire can flourish and never again fear the "tyranny of the sun."
string: ハルコンの理想は、吸血鬼が繁栄し二度と“太陽の専制”を恐れない、永遠の闇へ突き落された世界よ

original: Kill that beast!
string: あいつを殺して！

original: We both know that a band of fools with crossbows is no match for a scion of the ancient blood.
string: クロスボウごときで武装した愚か者の一団など、古き血の末えいの敵ではない

original: Because he himself bestowed upon you a portion of his vitality when he infused you with his own blood the night you returned with Serana.
string: 彼自身が君に彼の力の一部を授けたからだよ。セラーナと一緒に戻ってきた夜に、彼の血を君はもらっただろう

original: I have returned from <Alias=Dungeon> with the <Alias=Remains>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Remains>を持ち帰った

original: Well, your loss...
string: まったく、残念だよ…

original: The Jarl's in danger. A vampire plays as a visiting "advisor" to the court. Destroy it before it's able to complete its foul business.
string: 首長に危険が迫っている。吸血鬼が1匹、宮廷で“特別顧問”の地位に就いているんだ。奴の汚い企みが完遂する前に、始末してほしい

original: "The Winking Skeever." Charming name.
string: “ウィンキング・スキーヴァー”。チャーミングな名前ですわね

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をするの？

original: Still, those of us here have as much of an obligation to protect Skyrim as any other, wouldn't you agree?
string: でも、ここのみんなと同じようにスカイリムを守る義務があるわ。そうでしょ？

original: And since the Dawnguard are still around, that must not have happened.
string: それにドーンガードが目を光らせておりましたから、そんな事は起こったはずがありませんわ

original: The obvious answer is to go to the Imperial City. The Moth Priests make their home in the White Gold Tower.
string: 帝都に行け、というのが当然の答えだ。聖蚕の僧侶達は白金の塔に住んでいる

original: Are you sure that was wise, Lokil? He still might have told us something.
string: 本当に賢明だったと思う、ロキル？ まだ彼は何か話したかも知れない

original: I thought I'd be able to allay the after effects, but I was wrong. Now I'm paying for it.
string: 後遺症を和らげる事ができると思ったが、それは間違いだった。自業自得だよ

original: See you around... if you live long enough.
string: また会おう… 君が長生きできたら

original: (Sigh)...
string: はぁ…

original: Back to dust!
string: 塵に還りなさい！

original: And you...
string: お前は…

original: Oh, hey there! You here to join the Dawnguard, too?
string: やあ、あんた！ あんたもドーンガードに入るのかい？

original: Is there no end to this nightmare?
string: この悪夢に終わりはあるのか？

original: They must be who that priest was calling "the Betrayed."
string: あの司祭が“裏切られし者達”と呼んでいたのは彼らの事に違いありませんわ

original: Look, what is it you want from me?
string: それで、そっちの要求は何なの？

original: That was interesting.
string: 興味深い体験だった…

original: Now, what were you saying?
string: で、何の話だったかな？

original: Off the northern coast of Skyrim, due west of Solitude.
string: スカイリムの北海岸、ソリチュードのほぼ西…

original: The feast never ends here in Castle Volkihar.
string: ここヴォルキハル城では日夜宴が催されている

original: I'll need your help.
string: 力を貸してほしい

original: ...blood... so hungry all the time now... need to hunt again soon...
string: …血がほしい… 今じゃそう思わない時はない… 早く狩りを再開しないと

original: It's disrespectful and dangerous to walk around here mortal. What were you thinking?
string: 定命の者がここを歩き回るのは無礼で危険な事よ。何を考えていたの？

original: All I wanted is for us to be a family again... for things to return to the way they were before.
string: 私の望みは再び家族になる事だけ… 物事が以前と同じに戻る事だけなのよ

original: Otherwise, you're a threat to all of us.
string: さもないと、我々全員の脅威となる

original: I'm glad you're with me.
string: 一緒に来てくれて嬉しい

original: Hold it! He's the one Tolan mentioned.
string: 待て！ あれはトランが言ってた奴だ

original: Vaaz...Zol!
string: ヴァーズ…ゾル！

original: A book? I'd hardly call a twenty-six volume epic simply a "book."
string: 本だあ？ 26巻もある大作を、単なる“本”などと呼ぶのはよしてくれないか

original: Hope the moths like that bark as much as Dexion said they would.
string: あの蚕がデキソンの言っていた通りに樹皮が大好きだといいのですけど

original: It's hard to describe. The Soul Cairn is... well, hungry, for lack of a better word. It's trying to take your life essence as payment.
string: 説明しにくいのですが、ソウル・ケルンは… いわば、飢えているようなものなのです。代償としてあなたの命を吸い取ろうとしている

original: Well it was... Thank the Vigilants for ruining that.
string: あれを滅ぼしてくれた番人には… 感謝してるさ

original: Look at the sky... the Divines must be angry with us!
string: 空を見て… 神々が私達に怒っているに違いないわ！

original: You are worth very little if you're not one of us.
string: 我らの仲間でなければ、お前はほぼ無価値だ

original: I don't suppose there's a cure.
string: 治療する方法はないんだろうな

original: I'm used to a little more quiet on my journeys.
string: 旅路はもう少し静かなものだと思っている

original: I think...
string: わたしは…

original: I doubt there's any other place like it in Skyrim. It's beautiful.
string: スカイリムに二つとない場所だわ。なんて美しいのかしら

original: Peace at last...
string: ようやく平穏が…

original: I knew you would be victorious.
string: あんたなら勝つと分かってたよ

original: Have you been to Winterhold before?
string: ウィンターホールドを訪れたことは？

original: We'll return for you when we can.
string: できるだけ早く迎えに来る

original: There you are. I'm... I'm back.
string: あなた。わたし… 還ってまいりましたわ

original: I studied with the Faculty of Chirurgeons in Cloudrest. I walked with the Hollow-Faced Men of Nohotogrha for three years.
string: クラウドレストの外科教授陣に学んだわ。ノホトグラの穴あき顔男どもと三年間一緒に過ごしながら

original: Why would it matter more to me?
string: どうしてこっちの方が気にすると？

original: Let's go to the castle's secret entrance.
string: 城の秘密の入口に向かおう

original: That's the last time I argue with a dremora.
string: ドレモラと言い争いになったのは、あれが最後だな

original: Gunmar, there's an area large enough for you to pen up some trolls, get them armored up and ready for use.
string: ガンマー、ここには広い場所があるから、トロールを囲いに入れて、武装させて戦闘に備えるといい

original: I keep the forge running day and night in case Lord Harkon needs anything.
string: ハルコン卿が何か必要な時のために、鋳造器具は昼夜動かしておくわ

original: No, I just... I thought perhaps...
string: いいえ。僕はただ… たぶんこうじゃないかと…

original: Do you think there's more Aetherium somewhere?
string: まだエセリウムがどこかにあるだろうか？

original: Best of luck to you.
string: 幸運を祈るよ

original: I am sure Nazir's cooking is great and all, but my appetites are a little more... discerning.
string: ナジルの料理は確かに申し分ないわ、でも私はもう少し… 舌が肥えているの

original: It's probably best for you if we're not seen together right now.
string: 今は一緒にいるところを見られない方があなたのためかも知れませんわ

original: I must have been gone longer than I thought. Definitely longer than we planned.
string: わたしは思っていた以上に長い間いなくなっていたようですわね。当初の目論見よりは確実に

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: Vyrthur and myself are the only two snow elves that remain.
string: スノーエルフの生き残りは私とヴィルスールだけだ

original: Your crown... gods, it's made of Aetherium! Pure Aetherium!
string: お前の王冠は… 何てこった。エセリウム製じゃないか！ 正真正銘のエセリウムだ！

original: Of course not. He's an elf, isn't he?
string: そんなはずないだろう。奴はエルフだぞ？

original: I don't suppose you have some good news for me.
string: いい知らせは多分ないんだろうな

original: In his eyes, she'd be dying for the good of all vampires.
string: 彼の考えでは、彼女はすべての吸血鬼のために死ぬ事になる

original: I hadn't really thought about it.
string: これと言って考えていなかった

original: Go now, and carry out this task. This is my command!
string: お前に命ずる。行け、そして使命を果たせ！

original: You want us to help you?
string: 手を貸してほしいと？

original: Your kind are a blight upon Tamriel, monster!
string: お前らはタムリエルの破滅の元凶だ。バケモノめ！

original: You're... you're mortal! What are you doing here like that?
string: あなたは… 定命の者！ そんな状態でここで何をしているの？

original: Oh thank you, milord. Thank you!
string: 旦那様… ありがとうございます！

original: Carefully gather the bark? How?
string: 樹皮を慎重にはがすって？ どうやって？

original: Let's get indoors. Or in a cave. Anywhere, just out of this.
string: 建物の中に入りましょう。洞窟でも構いませんわ。とにかく陽の届かない所へ

original: If only it were so. With the world in shadow, we would never tire, never weaken... more than a match for their pitiful armies.
string: そうでもあるが。世が影に覆われれば、我々は疲れも衰えもしなくなる… 奴らのぜい弱な軍勢などとるに足らんよ

original: Did I start with my ride on the prison ship, or was it before that?
string: 冒頭は護送船に乗るところからだったか、その前だったかな？

original: Stop apologizing for everything.
string: 何にでも謝るのはおよしになって

original: This is Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦だ

original: I doubt very much that they'll hasten to exact revenge for freeing me from the ruins.
string: 私を遺跡から解放した事に対して、急いで報復を求めるとはとても思えないわ

original: If she made it there, we'll find her.
string: 彼女の足取りを追えば、見つかるさ

original: I knew it was a matter of time before the vampires would come for us.
string: 吸血鬼らに狙われるのは時間の問題だと分かっていた

original: I can't imagine that opinion has changed.
string: その考えが変わったとは思いにくい

original: Not many people understand the appeal. You keep surprising me.
string: この魅力が分かる方は少ないのですよ。あなたには驚かされますわ

original: So are you here as a client? Shall I remake your face?
string: それで、顧客として来たの？ 顔を作り変えましょうか？

original: That's the last one, isn't it? It's... it's almost time. I'll meet you at the Forge!
string: それが最後の一つだね？ …いよいよだ。じゃあ鋳造器具の所で！

original: Where did these amulets come from?
string: それらのアミュレットの出どころは？

original: Anyway, I'm quite happy in my current pursuits. So if you'll excuse me...
string: とにかく、私は今の仕事に満足してるから。じゃあ、失礼…

original: No, a group called the "Dawnguard" sent me here.
string: いや、“ドーンガード”という一団に言われて来た

original: Isn't it obvious? They're soft, the lot of them.
string: 明白な事実だろう？ 彼らは例外なく考えが甘いんだ

original: I'll explain later. Right now, we need your help and time is short.
string: 後で説明する。とにかく力を借りたいんだが、時間がない

original: Why didn't you tell me it was so huge?
string: これほど巨大なら、事前に言ってくれても…

original: It appears that way. I suppose he wanted to put the past behind him.
string: そのようですわね。過去を忘れたかったのかも知れない

original: My business is my own. Just tell me what I need to know.
string: こちらの問題だ。質問に答えるだけにしてくれ

original: Someone you don't want to see?
string: 会いたくない人でもいるとか？

original: When I was tossed in here I felt myself falling... and I dropped the pages I had been holding.
string: ここに送られた時、すっ転んだような気がする。その時、持っていた原稿を手放してしまったんだ

original: Are you ready to do this?
string: 心の準備はできたか？

original: Not a serious threat, but we can't leave them completely unchecked or they may become one.
string: 深刻な脅威ではないが、完全に放置していればそうなるかも知れない

original: What did you do?
string: 何をした？

original: Is that your best, mortal?
string: それが精一杯ってわけか？

original: By having the Ancestor Moths close to the Moth Priest, they can utilize the conduit and share the moth's augury.
string: 聖蚕会は聖蚕の僧侶の身近に置かれて初めて架け橋となり、その予言の力を共有できるんだよ

original: I'll feed your corpse to the Betrayed.
string: 死体は裏切られし者の餌にしてやる

original: I need training in Heavy Armor.
string: 重装鎧の扱いを訓練したい

original: Farewell, and good journey milord.
string: では旦那様、よい旅を

original: It's my family home. Not the most welcoming place, but depending on who's around, I'll be safe there.
string: わたしの家族の家です。そこまで歓迎されないかも知れませんが、誰がいるかによっては安全なはず

original: I'm glad you're here with me.
string: あなたが一緒にいてくれて嬉しいですわ

original: I've spent years cleaning the place up and making repairs. You can be damn sure the vampires won't be burning this place down.
string: 何年もかけて改修や修理を施してきたのだ。吸血鬼どもに焼かれてたまるものか

original: Kind of soothing, actually. I feel a little warmer, now.
string: むしろ癒されたくらいですわ。前よりも体が暖かく感じますもの

original: No... all these wasted months, or has it been years? I don't even remember how much time has passed.
string: そんな… 何か月、いや何年、いや、思い出せないほどの時間は無駄だったってのか？

original: When I entered the Soul Cairn, I had intended to strike a bargain with the Ideal Masters, the custodians of this place.
string: ソウル・ケルンへ入った時、この場所の管理者であるアイディール・マスターと取引を結ぶつもりだったわ

original: Remember your place, and you'll be taken care of.
string: 自分の立場をわきまえれば、相手をしてもらえるだろう

original: Back already? Can't wait.
string: もう戻ってきたの？ 早く見せて

original: We were once a wealthy and prosperous society that occupied a portion of Skyrim.
string: 我が同胞はかつて、スカイリムの一部を支配する豊かで高貴な種族だった

original: Aren't the Dawnguard here to help, to make it safe for us? Can't see why they wouldn't let us in.
string: ドーンガードは我々を守り、助けてくれるためにここにいるのでは？ 中に入れてくれない理由が分からない

original: I'll give you a single chance to turn over the bow to me. There will not be a second.
string: 今すぐ弓を引き渡せ。二度目はないぞ

original: Well... we weren't the closest of friends... Here, take this.
string: まあ… 親友でもなかったしな… さあ、これを

original: The <Alias=Boss> at <Alias=Dungeon> has been destroyed.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Boss>を倒した

original: Put his mind to rest, allay his fear through vampiric seduction and when he is in a pliant condition, embrace him and bite him on the neck.
string: 彼の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: Does it work?
string: 使える状態なのか？

original: Once your thrall is suitably sedated, you will be able to impart the gift without resistance.
string: 君の従徒がちゃんと落ち着いたら、贈り物を容易に授ける事ができるだろう

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of a vampire lair.
string: 吸血鬼の巣窟の位置を特定した

original: Why is that?
string: なぜなんだ？

original: Well, that's the second one - we're halfway there. I'll keep looking. See you soon!
string: ああ、あれが二つめだよ… これで半分だね。あたしは探し続けるよ。また後でね！

original: I can't say it surprises me. I kind of figured we were heading for this some day.
string: 別段、不思議な事ではありませんわ。いつかはこうなると思っておりましたもの

original: Ah! The free air of Vus at long last!
string: ああ、ヴスの自由な空気よ！ 待ちかねたぞ！

original: Arkay and I think it could be a great advantage for us. You should look into retrieving it.
string: アーケイも言っているが、我々の戦力として利用できそうだ。それを手に入れるべきだ

original: My father's never been much for building things, so it just stayed like this.
string: 父は建築まわりに詳しくなかったから、そのままになっておりましたわ

original: I'll be at Castle Volkihar if you need me.
string: ヴォルキハル城におりますから、用がありましたらおいで下さいませ

original: Begone! You're not welcome here!
string: 立ち去れ！ お前の来る所じゃない！

original: No! I will not allow that happen. The Elder Scrolls only tell of events that might be, not events that will be.
string: だめよ！ それは起こさせないわ。星霜の書は起こり得る出来事を示すだけ、起こる出来事そのものではないのよ

original: No, it's probably not.
string: いいえ、多分違いますわ

original: I leave politics to others. I serve the lord of the castle.
string: 権力闘争には興味がないの。私が仕えるのはあくまでもこの城の主よ

original: The tyranny of the sun is over!
string: 太陽の専制は終わりだ！

original: Windhelm. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ウィンドヘルム(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: I think we should part ways.
string: ここで別れた方がいいだろう

original: Most of our learning could be found there. We always studied our enemies, so we might better learn how to defeat them.
string: 我々の知恵のほとんどがそこに集められていた。我らは敵と有利に戦えるよう、常に研究を続けていた

original: He claims to serve loyally, but he really covets the throne. He sees himself in charge someday.
string: 彼は忠実に仕えてると言い張るけど、本当は玉座をほしがってるのさ。あわよくばって思ってるんだ

original: Here I am. Human as ever.
string: これがわたし。元の人間の姿ですの

original: Count yourself fortunate that I'm a forgiving man. Now, be still while I give you the ancient blood once more.
string: 私が寛大な心の持ち主でよかったな。古き血をもう一度与えてやる。じっとしていろ…

original: Here, I've got a dwarven gyro. Take it.
string: ドワーフ・ジャイロがあるので、渡そう

original: Bedroom. (<Global=HDSolitudeBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室(<Global=HDSolitudeBedroom> ゴールド)

original: Agh...
string: ああ…

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: A vicious night stalker rules over a group of necromancers - seeks to gain leverage over the righteous.
string: 夜の闇に住む邪悪な者が死霊術師の集団を率いて、善良な人々の世界を脅かしている

original: So, it is real...
string: 本物なんだね…

original: The Soul Cairn is a tiny sliver of Oblivion, the realm of the daedra.
string: ソウル・ケルンはデイドラの領域であるオブリビオンの、ほんのひとかけらですわ

original: As you desire.
string: 望むならな

original: Yes. I'm speaking of the Cliff Racer of course. Wretched things.
string: そう。言うまでもなく、クリフ・レーサーの事だ。忌々しい連中だったな

original: Yes, milady? What can I help you with?
string: はい、奥様。ご用は何ですか？

original: I know you're here somewhere.
string: ここにいるのは分かっていますの

original: How can I help him?
string: どうすれば彼の力に？

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: I try and meet the needs of everyone here. No reason for any of us to go hungry.
string: ここにいる全員分は確保しているつもりだ。わざわざ腹を空かせる事もないからな

original: I've allowed my hatred of your father to estrange us for too long. Forgive me.
string: あまりに長い間、あなたの父への憎悪に任せて疎遠になってしまった。どうか許して

original: Hang on... could you pull that again?
string: お待ちになって… もう一度引けますかしら？

original: I can't think of a more deserving champion to carry it than you.
string: これだけの手柄を挙げられる勇者は他にいないだろう

original: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
string: 星霜の書を取り戻したのだから、もう行くべきよ

original: And what's this thing?
string: それにしても、これはなんなのかしら？

original: Look around for the missing crests. Even in this mess, they should stick out.
string: なくなっているクレストを探しますのよ。これだけ散らかっていても、あれは目立つはずですわ

original: The prophesied time is at last upon us. Soon we will claim dominion over the sun itself, and forge a new realm of eternal darkness.
string: 予言の時がようやく訪れた。我々は程なくして太陽そのものを支配し、永遠の闇に覆われた新たな領域を作り出す事となるであろう

original: Supposedly, the bow draws its energy from the sun itself, which it why it shows up in that prophecy.
string: おそらく弓はその力を太陽自身から得ておりますのよ。だからあの予言に登場するのですわね

original: Must have run off.
string: 逃がしたみたいだな

original: So why don't you just drink the blood from the spring? I mean, that seems easier than running a skooma den...
string: じゃあその泉から血を汲んで飲めばいいじゃないか。スクゥーマ部屋を経営するより簡単だ…

original: The bow draws its power from Aetherius itself, channeling it through the sun.
string: この弓は太陽を通じてエセリウスの力そのものを取り出し、矢に込める

original: There's enough for us to fight out there. I don't need us having to defend ourselves within our own fort.
string: 外にも敵は十分すぎるほどいるのに、砦の中でも身を守るなんて事態は避けたい

original: As you can see from my bandages, it's not that I'm unwilling, it's that I'm physically unable.
string: この包帯を見ればお分かりだと思いますが、やりたくないのではなくできない体なんです

original: We're called the Dawnguard, and we need you to read an Elder Scroll.
string: 我々はドーンガードという。読んでもらいたい星霜の書がある

original: It is a rather well-kept secret.
string: かなり厳重に守られた秘密だ

original: This is my hunting ground.
string: ここは私の狩り場だ

original: I'm going to hold on to them for now.
string: 今は手元に持っておくことにする

original: Ha. Isran's going to like you. He's up the hill in the fort. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.
string: ふっ、イスランに気に入られそうだな。彼は丘の上の砦にいる。ドーンガードにふさわしいかどうか、見てくれるだろう

original: My Lord.
string: ご主人様

original: I've scrounged up a few things. Here, please, take a look.
string: 苦労して仕入れた商品なんだ。ひと目だけでも見ていってもらえないかな

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: Look out! Gargoyles!
string: 気を付けて！ ガーゴイルですわ！

original: You've no chance against a true vampire!
string: 真の吸血鬼に勝ち目はないわ！

original: He won't need either of us anymore.
string: 父にとって、わたし達はもはや用済みなのですわ

original: Now what was it I said to that prisoner? "Stand up, there you go. You were dreaming..." Yes, that was it.
string: あの囚人に何と言ったんだっけ？ 「ほら立って、行った行った。寝れば… 夢だって見るだろう」うん、そうだ

original: A spell tome. (25 husks)
string: 呪文の書(魂のハスク25個)

original: Excellent! I'm sure you'll put those to good use.
string: 素晴らしい！ 君ならきっと有効に利用してくれるはずだな

original: What happened to the castle courtyard?
string: 城の中庭で何が起きたんだ？

original: Why can't they just let us in? We won't get in the way!
string: どうして入れてくれないんだ？ 邪魔などしないのに！

original: Oh, well... some... things, I suppose. Remedies, cures, a poison or two.
string: そうだな、何か… あるだろう。治療薬とか、治療法とか、その他の薬とか

original: Any other ideas?
string: 他にいい考えはありまして？

original: Well, I think it's time I got back to my work as an alchemist.
string: さて、錬金術師としての仕事に戻る時が来たようね

original: I don't know. Certainly not longevity. Kind of a waste of time for a vampire.
string: 分かりませんわ。長寿の研究ではなさそうですわね。吸血鬼にとっては無用の長物ですし

original: With experience, your powers will grow and you will discover new ways to use them.
string: 慣れてくれば力が成長し、新たな使い方が見えてくる事だろう

original: The secret of the bow's power is written elsewhere. I think there is more to the prophecy, recorded in other scrolls.
string: 弓の力の秘密はどこか別のところに書かれている。他の書に記録された予言の続きがあるようだ

original: Damn. Well what do you know?
string: まったく… 君は何を知ってるんだ？

original: Let me take a look at it.
string: わたしに読ませて

original: Do you still feel that way?
string: まだそう思うのか？

original: We're done with this when none of them are left standing. Let's go.
string: 奴らを根絶やしにして初めてこの件は片づいたと言えるんだ。行くぞ

original: They represented the steps the Initiates took on the path to total enlightenment.
string: 新人達がたどる、完全なる悟りへの道程を象徴していたのだ

original: Ha. Nothing can destroy an Elder Scroll. Worry more about protecting your hide, and let me worry about my things.
string: 星霜の書を滅せられるものなどございませんわ。ご自身を守る事だけを心配されてはいかがでしょう？ わたしの事はわたしがやりますから

original: I'm telling you, there's something strange with the moondial.
string: あのですね、この月時計はどこかおかしいですわ

original: Is he... like me?
string: わたしと… 同じですの？

original: Take care of yourself.
string: 気をつけて行け

original: How can I help?
string: 何かできる事はあるか？

original: You don't trust Vingalmo?
string: ヴィンガルモを信用できないのか？

original: Quickly now! The longer you delay, the more danger the Jarl is in.
string: 急ぐんだ！ ぐずぐずしてたらそれだけ首長の身の危険は大きくなるぞ

original: You're not going to keep me in here!
string: 縛りつけられるのはごめんこうむりますわ！

original: Looks like these Falmer are here to stay.
string: このファルメル達はここに住んでいたようですわね

original: Thanks again for all your help.
string: 手助けに本当感謝するよ

original: Look at the size of that fort. They must have room for a few more in there.
string: あの砦の大きさを見て。中にあと数人分の広さはあるはずよ

original: Thank you for breaking that foul vampire's hold over me.
string: ありがとう。あの薄汚い吸血鬼の手に落ちずに済んだよ

original: No, this was different. He never trusted Florentius, always thought him to be trying to get attention.
string: いや、違うな。フロレンティウスは目立ちたがっていると言って、まるで信用していなかった

original: Who are the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: How is your work going so far?
string: 作品の進み具合は？

original: Without the royal blood flowing through you, you're one step away from the rest of the thralls.
string: 体に流れる王族の血がなければ、従徒どもとお前の違いは微々たるものだ

original: You have done well.
string: よくやってくれた

original: Almost...
string: あと少しだよ…

original: You are prey, like all mortals. I banish you!
string: お前は獲物だ、定命の者の例に漏れずな。立ち去るがいい！

original: If I return to Tamriel, that increases Harkon's likelihood of bringing the Tyranny of the Sun to fruition.
string: タムリエルへ戻れば、それによってハルコンが太陽の専制を実現する公算は高くなる

original: What is so special about your Skooma?
string: そのスクゥーマは何が特別なんだ？

original: Leave this place.
string: ここから立ち去れ

original: We won't know until we find her.
string: 彼女を見つけなければ、何とも言えない

original: They didn't stop to visit, though. They rode through town heading south, and went across the big bridge.
string: ここには立ち寄らなかったけどね。南に向かって街を走り抜けて、大きな橋を渡って行ったんだ

original: And that story led you here?
string: その話に基づいてここへ？

original: May mortals quake at your approach.
string: 君が近づけば定命の者達は震え上がるだろう

original: Terrible, simply terrible.
string: 本当、全く最悪だった

original: I thought you said you were happy together.
string: 一緒にいれば幸せだって言いましてよね？

original: Do you?
string: 本当か？

original: Where are you!
string: どこにいる！

original: Even with all my preparations, we can't be too careful. The monsters could strike at us at any moment.
string: できるだけ準備はしたが、念には念を入れないとな。バケモノがいつ襲ってくるか分かったものじゃない

original: You need to locate the tallest of the rocky spires that surround these ruins.
string: この遺跡を囲む岩のような尖塔のうち一番高いものを探す必要があるわ

original: Well, at least you're smart enough to want to learn more. I'll show you what I can.
string: うむ、君は少なくとも向学心があるという意味では賢いな。教えられる事は教えておこうか

original: To judge us.
string: ひいてはわたしの家族の事も

original: This is generally performed at the Imperial Library, but as history has shown us, that isn't always possible.
string: 解読作業は主に帝国図書館で行われるが、歴史を見れば分かるように、それが不可能な場合もあるんだ

original: I don't think we've reached the top yet. I'd bet there's some kind of secret passage around here.
string: まだ最上階にはたどりついてないと思いますわ。この辺りにはきっと秘密の通路があるはずですわよ

original: At that point, you'll have given him everything he's ever wanted.
string: その時点で、あなたは父のほしい物をすべて渡す事になりましてよ

original: So I need to fill this at each wayshrine?
string: それぞれの祠でこれを一杯にすればいいと？

original: Only I hear that's not quite how it happened. Secret organization, you see. No one to blame when homes are broken into, things stolen.
string: だが、聞いた話ではそれは間違いだ。何しろ秘密結社だから、家に侵入されて物を盗まれても、泥棒の素性すら分からないわけだ

original: Very good. Should you visit him again, I suspect you'll find our new sibling appreciates his transformation.
string: 素晴らしい。彼に次会った時、我々の新しい同胞として自分に起こった変化を感謝してる事が分かるだろう

original: Well, it started with the followers of Mehrunes Dagon having Emperor Uriel Septim VII assassinated.
string: 事の起こりは、メエルーンズ・デイゴンの信者が皇帝ユリエル・セプティム7世を暗殺した事件だ

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: Turns out my mother was sneakier than I thought. I wonder what she's hiding?
string: 母は思ったよりも隠し事をなさる人でしたのね。一体何をしまいこんでいたのかしら？

original: Do you need something?
string: 何か必要なものでも？

original: Are you saying that I need to become a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼になる必要があると？

original: I've tracked this damned bear for two weeks; I'll not let it have any more victims.
string: あのくそったれなクマをもう2週間も追い続けている。これ以上犠牲を出させてたまるものか

original: I would never use Serana like that.
string: セラーナをそのように利用したりしない

original: I'll be off then.
string: それでは、先を急ぐか

original: I had always just assumed that the other tower was completely destroyed inside.
string: もうひとつの塔は内部がめちゃくちゃに壊されていると、ずっと思っておりましたの

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: It is done. <Alias=Spouse> has been welcomed into the family.
string: <Alias=Spouse>が血を分けた家族となった

original: What ended up happening?
string: 結局どうなったんだ？

original: Now it is time to see if those efforts have borne fruit. Go forth, and search the land for rumors of a Moth Priest within our borders.
string: その努力の甲斐があったかどうかを見てみなければならん。各地に足を運び、領域内に聖蚕の僧侶が来ていないか噂を確かめるのだ

original: It's the only way they'll discover that they weren't always malignant... they were once a proud and prosperous race.
string: 彼ら自身が、生まれついての邪悪な存在でない事を知るには、そうするしかない。かつての彼らは高貴で豊かな種族だったのだから

original: Ha. Isran's going to like you. Go talk to him at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.
string: ふっ、イスランに気に入られそうだな。リフテンの南東にあるドーンガード砦にいるから会ってみるといい。ドーンガードにふさわしいかどうか、見てくれるだろう

original: You blood will not protect you from me.
string: その血は私から身を守るのには役立たない

original: I'll be with the Dawnguard if you need me.
string: わたしに用がありましたら、ドーンガードの所におりますわ

original: It's impressive.
string: 見ごたえあるな

original: There you are, father!
string: 見つけましたわよ、お父様！

original: A dremora captured you?
string: ドレモラに捕まったのか？

original: I must have failed. Harkon's found a way to decipher the prophecy, hasn't he.
string: 失敗したに違いないわ。ハルコンはお告げの解読方法を見つけたのね

original: Do I detect a hint of reproach? I am only looking out for your best interests. And perhaps, a small measure of my own.
string: もしかして気に食わないのかな？ 君のためを思っての事だが… まあ、ちょっとは私のためでもあるけど

original: If we head back to the castle and kick the front door in, we're going to be knee-deep in his friends.
string: 城に戻ってドアを蹴破って中に入りましたら、彼の友達が大勢でお出迎えして下さるのでしょうね

original: A small price to pay for the betterment of our kind.
string: 我が一族の発展のための、微々たる犠牲だ

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: So there's no way in, then.
string: 入る方法はないということか？

original: I once killed thirty vampires with my bare hands, you know. Ask Arkay, he'll tell you.
string: 昔、吸血鬼30人を素手で殺した事があるんだ。嘘だと思ったら、アーケイに聞いてみろ

original: By the time the compact had been completed, it was too late for us to even attempt to intervene.
string: 盟約が成立した頃には、すでに我々が手出しできない状況だったのだ

original: Then, well... you got a taste. Stronger, faster.
string: 分かったでしょう。強く、速くなれるの

original: I merely wish to respectfully ask a favor of you.
string: そなたに頼み事をさせてもらいたい

original: The bow... you have Auriel's Bow!
string: その弓は… アーリエルの弓じゃないか！

original: I'd be happy for you to have them. Here.
string: もらってくれれば嬉しい。渡そう

original: I had no idea you felt that way about me, Serana. It was never my intention to push you aside.
string: そんなふうに感じていたとは知らなかったわ、セラーナ。のけ者にするつもりなどなかった

original: I finally bit off more than I could chew.
string: 調子にのって、とうとうやりすぎちまったわけだ

original: If I may ask, what will you do with them now?
string: それをどうするつもりか、教えてもらってもいいかな？

original: Well, that's a ridiculous question. Everyone traveling through here has said that the Oblivion Gates have been opening all over Tamriel.
string: 愚かな質問だ。ここを通る旅人達は皆、タムリエルのあちこちでオブリビオンの門が開いていると言ってるぞ

original: What kind of a favor?
string: 頼み事とは？

original: Don't tell me you're that naive.
string: まさか本気で信じておりませんわよね

original: I was close with my mother, but she just kept feeding me her opinions of him, and eventually I started believing them.
string: わたしは母と仲がよかったけれど、母は父の事をどう思っているのかをわたしにすり込み続けましたわ。やがてわたしは母の意見を信じるようになったのです

original: What exactly are you doing?
string: 何をしているんだ？

original: Have you thought about getting cured of vampirism?
string: 吸血症を治すことは考えてみたか？

original: Perhaps you should. I count some of the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim among the members of my court.
string: そうするといいかもな。我が臣下にはスカイリムで最も古く、強大な吸血鬼らの何体かが属している

original: Need... to sleep...
string: 眠らなくては…

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: I don't know what she was thinking.
string: 何を考えてたんだか

original: Is this a dwarven city? I can't believe they'd let it get so run down.
string: これがドワーフの都市？ こんなに荒れ放題なんて信じられませんわ…

original: Isran has a problem with most people, if you haven't yet noticed.
string: イスランは大抵の相手と対立してしまうからな、気づいているとは思うが

original: If I can remain useful, those above me will see fit to keep me here.
string: 役に立つところを見せれば、ずっと置いてくれるだろうからね

original: If you're holding out for more gold, it's never going to happen.
string: 値を釣り上げるつもりなら、あきらめるんだな

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Maybe.
string: そうですわね

original: A vicious night stalker rules over a group of bandits - seeks to gain leverage over the righteous.
string: 夜の闇に住む邪悪な者が山賊を率いて、善良な人々の世界を脅かしている

original: Tradition dictates the females be offered to Molag Bal on his summoning day. Few survive the ordeal. Those that do emerge as a pure-blooded vampire.
string: 伝統により、モラグ・バルの召喚日には女性が捧げられる。その試練を生き延びる者はほぼいない。生き延びた者は純血の吸血鬼となって現れる

original: Became obsessed with the Dwemer. Took off north saying he had found some old artifact. Haven't seen him since.
string: ドゥーマーに夢中になってしまってね。ある古の秘宝を見つけたと言って北へ旅立ってしまった。それからは音沙汰ひとつない

original: Why fight me? Your blood is already mine.
string: なぜ歯向かう？ お前の血はもう俺のものなのに

original: You don't scare me.
string: 脅しには乗らない

original: In that case, I'm glad you're the one doing it.
string: だとしたら、君に頼めたのは幸いだった

original: Can you train me in Restoration?
string: 回復の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: Any other ideas?
string: 他にいい考えは？

original: I used to walk through here after evening meals. It was beautiful, once.
string: 夕食のあと、よくここを散歩したものですわ。当時はなんとも美しい場所でしたのよ

original: Let me think about it.
string: 考えてみる

original: The Dawnguard apparently like killing vampires.
string: ドーンガードは吸血鬼を殺すのが好きなようね

original: We call such confluences the "Daughters of Coldharbour."
string: その状態になった者を“コールドハーバーの娘”と呼ぶの

original: I've never heard of it.
string: 聞いたことないな

original: Look into my eyes, Serana. You tell me what I am.
string: この目を見ろ、セラーナ。私は何者だ？

original: You here for the Skooma? Head around inside, there's a trap door that'll lead you in.
string: スクゥーマがほしいのか？ じゃあ横手に回って中に入れ。落とし戸の奥に部屋がある

original: But, my techniques only work on the living, not those that have crossed over into undeath.
string: でも、私の技術は生者にしか使えない。アンデッドへ足を踏み入れた者には無理よ

original: Dragons breathing fire in the sky. Vampires brazenly attacking people on the street. It's the end of the world I tell you.
string: 空ではドラゴンが火を噴き、街では吸血鬼が厚かましく人々を襲撃している。思うに、これが世界の終わりだ

original: You wouldn't like it.
string: …これでも冗談のつもりでしたのよ

original: That is a personal matter, and one I will not discuss.
string: それは個人的な問題だ。話すつもりはない

original: Of course. What is it that you need me to do?
string: もちろんです。ご用は何でしょうか？

original: I'll rend the flesh from your bones!
string: 骨から肉を引き千切ってくれる！

original: Explain this "ritual."
string: その“儀式”について説明してほしい

original: You'd better know what you're doing.
string: 自分のしてる事が分かってるんだろうな

original: You made a pact with Molag Bal?
string: モラグ・バルと契約を結んだのか？

original: This was my mother's garden. It... do you know how beautiful something can be when it's tended by a master for hundreds of years?
string: ここは母の庭園でしたのよ。そうですわね… 名人が何百年も手掛けたものがどれほど美しくなるか、想像がつきまして？

original: We should strike them first before they can muster a larger force.
string: 彼らが大軍を召集できるようになる前に、先に攻撃するべきよ

original: Make it count. This may be the only chance we ever get to use the Forge.
string: 有効に使って。鋳造器具を使える唯一の機会かも知れない

original: That's it...
string: それでいい…

original: In the unlikely event that I ever require you for some reason, I shall find you. Until then I see no reason for us to be speaking.
string: 万が一何かの用事ができた時は、こちらから君を見つけるよ。それまで君とおしゃべりする理由はないな

original: How dare you. I was the Arch-Curate of Auri-El, girl. I had the ears of a god!
string: 何のつもりだ。私はアーリエルの最高司祭だぞ。この耳は神の耳なのだ！

original: Are you taking me to him?
string: わたしを彼の所へ連れて行きますの？

original: Good...
string: よし…

original: And now the feeding begins.
string: さあ、食事の始まりよ

original: Well, then...  Best of luck to you.
string: そうか… なら幸運を祈る

original: What is it between you two?
string: 一筋縄ではなさそうな親子関係だ

original: So you prefer living in the shadows.
string: 影に生きることを好むと

original: That took longer than usual. How deep are we?
string: 普通より長くかかったね。どれだけ深いのかな？

original: Hey... we did pretty well for ourselves here. Good work.
string: なかなかうまくできたんじゃないかしら。お見事ね

original: When you first transform into a Vampire Lord, you will hover in the air. While you do, you will command the powers of Blood and Night.
string: 吸血鬼の王に変身すると、初めは体が宙に浮かび上がる。その間は血と、夜の力を操る事ができる

original: I'll take you to the monster you're hunting. (Persuade)
string: 狙っている怪物のところに案内しよう(説得)

original: It may have driven my family apart, but I'm still here, and I'm alive. I won't give this up.
string: そのせいで家族はバラバラになりましたけど、わたしはまだ生きておりますわ。力を捨てたりなどいたしませんのよ

original: The bow was said to be carried by Auri-El himself into battle against the forces of Lorkhan in ancient and mythic times.
string: この弓は、神話時代にアーリエルがロルカーンとの戦いで使ったものだと伝えられている

original: You're back, good! So, what happened?
string: 戻ったか、よかった！ それで、どうなったんだ？

original: It's not safe out there. Horrible creatures attacking towns in the night... If they won't let me in, at least I can stay here.
string: 外は安全じゃないわ。恐ろしい生物が夜に街を襲撃する… 中に入れてもらえなくても、ここにはいられるわ

original: You know what this is? It's a lock. A 'Tonal Lock'. Simple, and very, very deadly.
string: これが何か分かる？ 鍵だよ。“色彩の鍵”。単純で、しかも極めて危険だ

original: Hm. Did I call it "The Great Hunt" or was it just "The Hunt?" Bah, I can't remember!
string: あーむ、「グレートハント」と書いたかな？ 単に「ハント」だったか？ ブァー、思い出せんじゃないか！

original: I only know what she told me.
string: 聞かされた話しか知りませんわ

original: Do you regret becoming a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼になったことを後悔しているのか？

original: Death is nothing to me...
string: 死ぬなんてなんでもないね…

original: Not again!
string: 勘弁してよね！

original: I cast you out!
string: 消し去ってやる！

original: Anyway, we should keep moving.
string: とにかく、先を急ぎましょう

original: I'll give you a chance to redeem yourself. Go to Morthal and speak to Falion. He can help you. Otherwise you're dead to me.
string: だがお前にチャンスをやろう。モーサルに行ってファリオンに会え。彼なら力を貸してくれるだろう。さもなければお前は死人も同然だ

original: ShoutStartLong
string: ShoutStartLong

original: The voice of the Ancestor Moth has always been an integral part of reading the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を読む時は、聖蚕の声に耳を傾ける事が常に重要だ

original: He was out of control, Garan. It had to be done.
string: お父様は正気を失っておりましたのよ、ガラン。やむを得ませんでしたわ

original: Get rid of this interloper and you and I can be on our way.
string: この侵入者をどうにかして、出発はそれからですわね

original: Everything eventually tumbles down to you.
string: 何もかも結局は他人事ですものね

original: Your mind was strong, but you're exhausted from the struggle.
string: 強靭な精神であったが、抗う中で疲弊してきているな

original: The more you fight me, the more you will suffer, mortal.
string: 抗えば抗うほど苦しみは続くのだぞ

original: Do you think mudcrabs might've taken it? I saw one the other day... Wouldn't be surprised if it followed me here.
string: マッドクラブに取られたのかしら？ この前、見かけたから… あの時、ここまでついて来たのかも知れないわ

original: Would you look at that. An exploding crossbow bolt. This should be fun!
string: ちょっと見てよ。爆発するクロスボウのボルトだって。アツいわね！

original: All of the ingredients for our potions came from there. She used to say that my father couldn't stand the place. Too... peaceful.
string: うちの薬の材料はみんなそこで採っておりましたの。母いわく、父はその場所が大嫌いだったようですわ。ちょっと… 和やかすぎるから

original: Carefully gather the bark? How?
string: 樹皮を慎重にはがすって？ どうやって？

original: Moths barely make a sound, let alone speak.
string: 聖蚕は言葉どころか、ほとんど音を発しないはずだが

original: They also have an Elder Scroll.
string: 連中は星霜の書も一巻、持っている

original: We'll stop them, whatever it is they're up to...
string: 奴らの企みが何であれ、止めてみせるわ…

original: All right, you've heard what it has to say. Now tell me, is there any reason I shouldn't kill this bloodsucking fiend right now?
string: 分かった。君は奴の言い分を聞いたというわけだな。では教えてくれ。その血を吸う悪魔を今すぐ殺さない理由が少しでもあるのか？

original: And they have an Elder Scroll.
string: そして奴らは星霜の書を持っている

original: Enough of these games. Fight me!
string: 遊びは終わりだ、堂々と戦え！

original: Look what it did to your family.
string: そのせいで家族がどうなったかを考えてみろ

original: DLC1ThrallHellos
string: DLC1ThrallHellos

original: Too slow!
string: 遅くてよ！

original: For two weeks I've tracked that bear, and now find that you've killed it on your own.
string: あのクマを2週間も追っていたんだが、1人で仕留めてしまったのか

original: I was paid to assassinate some high-ranking official from House Redoran.
string: おれはレドラン家の高官を暗殺する仕事を引き受けた

original: I'm back from <Alias=Dungeon> with the <Alias=Item>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>から<Alias=Item>を持ち帰った

original: Craven fool. This isn't over.
string: 愚かな臆病者め。これで終わりだと思うな

original: Even if I could, it would only serve to hinder your efforts.
string: たとえできたとしても、あなたの努力の妨げにしかならないわ

original: Does he have the Scroll? Is everything ready?
string: 書は彼が持っているな。準備は万全なのか？

original: I don't want you to feel like I'm forcing you into this.
string: 無理強いされていると思わないで下さいましね

original: Every last drop of your blood is mine!
string: お前の血は一滴残らず私のものよ！

original: We have to do something.
string: 何とかしなければ

original: Let's see... Ooh! This diagram explains how to fashion a bolt that will send a jolt of shock through whatever it hits.
string: どれどれ… シビれるわね！ 当たったものに大きな衝撃を与えるボルトの作り方が記してある！

original: I'll see you soon.
string: また会いましょう

original: Thank the divines for you!
string: 神々に感謝を！

original: I mean, why would that idea even cross your mind?
string: つまり、どうしてそんな事考えつくわけ？

original: Were you successful?
string: うまくいったのか？

original: Is there anything else? Could be your last chance.
string: 他に何かある？ 最後の機会かも知れないわよ

original: Oh, I'm sorry. Didn't mean to bring up a bad memory.
string: ああ、ごめんなさい。嫌な事を思い出させるつもりはありませんでしたの

original: And then realizing a troll with armor is even more intimidating.
string: でもって、鎧を着たトロールはさらに厄介だ、と

original: But bringing something from the Soul Cairn gives you something much more powerful.
string: けれどもソウル・ケルンから何かを持ってこられれば、もっと大きな力が手に入る

original: I've found the infidel!
string: ここにいたか、異端者め！

original: Please, he's such a loyal creature, and he's been running for so long. You have to save him! A place like this will change you...
string: 何しろ忠実な奴でね。それ以来ずっと逃げ続けてる。なんとか助けてやってくれ！ こんな所にいたらおかしくなっちまうよ…

original: Haven't you heard that the Hall of the Vigilants was destroyed by vampires? They never took the threat seriously, and now they've paid the price.
string: 番人の間が吸血鬼達に壊滅させられた話は聞いてないのか？ 奴らの脅威を甘く見ていた代償が高くついたな

original: Guards! Kill him!
string: 傭兵ども！ 奴の頭をねじ切れ！

original: But to finalize the deal, you have to travel here yourself... and most of them never come back.
string: でも契約を仕上げるには、あなた自身の足でここを旅しなければ… そして旅した者はほとんど帰ってまいりませんわ

original: I'm looking for an Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書を探している

original: Get back here!
string: 戻ってこい！

original: Garden. (<Global=HDRiftenGarden> gold)
string: 庭(<Global=HDRiftenGarden> ゴールド)

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to. (Intimidate)
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない(威圧)

original: I despise your presence, mortal!
string: 忌々しい定命の者め！

original: Coming from one who murders vampires as a trade, I find it hard to believe your intentions are noble.
string: 吸血鬼殺しを職業とする者から出る言葉として聞けば、あなたの意図が高潔だとは信じがたいわ

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: But not me! I knew it all along!
string: だが、俺は違う！ ずっと信じていた！

original: Well... so long as you don't tell anyone. Here take it and slip into a booth before someone notices.
string: いいけど… 内緒だからね。ほら、これを持って、他の人に見られないうちに部屋に入って

original: I want to hear it.
string: 聞かせてほしい

original: Of course I do.
string: もちろんだとも

original: A soul gem... that's what it was. Then... I must be... Oh, no.
string: 魂石… あれがそうだとしたら、じゃあ… 私は… ああ、どうしよう

original: Thought I'd come here to be safe. Now they won't so much as let us in.
string: 安全を求めてここに来たというのに、入れてすらもらえないなんて

original: Well, using an arrow with the bow that's been dipped in blood may cause it to function differently... corrupting its purpose.
string: 血に浸した矢を使うと、また別の効果がある… 当たった者を腐敗させるのだ

original: What is the Chantry of Auri-El?
string: アーリエルの礼拝所とは？

original: I don't much like him, but I can't allow the people of Skyrim to be preyed upon by those monsters.
string: 彼の事はあまり好きじゃないけど、スカイリムの仲間が怪物達の餌食にされるのを黙って見てるわけにはいかないわ

original: Stay sharp out there.
string: 気を抜くんじゃないぞ

original: What are you talking about?
string: 何の話をしてるんだ？

original: I'm not ready yet. Give me more time.
string: まだ準備ができていない。もっと時間がほしい

original: I've located the whereabouts of a vampire masquerading as a common citizen.
string: 一般市民になりすましている吸血鬼の居場所が判明した

original: Put her mind to rest, allay her fear through vampiric seduction and when she is in a pliant condition, embrace her and bite her on the neck.
string: 彼女の心を落ち着かせて、吸血鬼の誘惑でその恐れを鎮める。そして彼女が従順になったら、抱きしめて首筋に噛みつけばいい

original: I have some preparations to make, first.
string: 先に準備する必要がある

original: Gelebor and his kind are easily manipulated fools.
string: ギレボルもその同胞も、流されやすい愚か者ばかりだ

original: Could you tell your companion to head home?
string: お供を家に送り返してもらえるかしら？

original: Hmph.
string: ふふん

original: In the old days, the Dawnguard kept all of Skyrim safe from those bloodsucking scum.
string: 昔はドーンガードがスカイリム全体を、あの血を吸うバケモノ達から守っていた

original: How about you pay for your habit like everybody else. We're not running a charity here.
string: 他の人と同じように、お金を払って楽しんだらどう？ 慈善事業じゃないのよ

original: I feel nothing but sympathy for the Betrayed, despite my actions against them.
string: 裏切られし者に対する気持ちは同情しかない。行動からは想像つかないだろうがな

original: I've been asking myself the same thing since we came back to the castle.
string: お城に戻って以来、同じ事を自問してきましたわ

original: I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で会おう

original: It pains me to think you'd travel with Serana under the guise of her protector in an effort to hunt me down.
string: あなたが私を捜し当てるために保護者を装ってセラーナと旅した… そう考えると胸が痛むわ

original: This was just the end of something else.
string: 今のはただ、別な何かの命が尽きただけの事ですわ

original: You'll pay for your insolence!
string: 思い知らせてやる！

original: Never saw anything like this back on the island.
string: 島ではこんなのを見た事もありませんでしたのよ

original: I got a warmer welcome from my father, and that's saying something.
string: 父の歓迎の方がマシでした、と言えばお分かりでしょう

original: I'd like to decorate my home.
string: 家を飾りたい

original: You need something?
string: 何か必要なものが？

original: So, if you'd be a dear and collect those plans for me?
string: その図面を持ってきてもらえたら、助かるんだけど？

original: Yes, of course Lokil. Do not forget who brought you news of the Vigilants' discovery.
string: ええ、もちろんよロキル。番人の発見を知らせたのが誰か忘れないで

original: You could always go back and get my journal, you know.
string: 戻ってあたしの日記を取ってくる事はいつでもできるんだよ

original: How about sitting in your home, minding your own business and then suddenly getting attacked by a dremora and his cronies.
string: 自分の家で用事に集中している時に、ドレモラとその仲間に突然襲われる話だ

original: I'd be happy to, but your purse is lighter than you think.
string: 応じたいのも山々だが、財布が思いの他軽いようだな

original: I have news, but I wouldn't call it good.
string: 報せはあるが、朗報とは呼びにくい

original: Certainly not enough to devolve them into the sad and twisted beings they've become.
string: だがそれだけで、あれほどまでに卑しく邪悪な生き物に変わってしまうはずがない

original: This is a statue of Auriel, but it's using the older signs of his power. This temple must be ancient.
string: これはアーリエルの像ですわね。ですが彼の力を示す比較的古い印が使われているところを見るに、この聖堂は相当古いに違いありませんわ

original: No, I don't need anything right now. Please stop asking.
string: いや、今は何もいらない。ちょっと口をつぐんでくれ

original: And here we are.
string: さあ着いたぞ

original: Her name's Serana. It was her that the vampires were seeking.
string: 名はセラーナという。吸血鬼たちが探し求めていたのは彼女のことだ

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: "My pa's axe", Stendarr preserve us.
string: “私の父親の斧”だ。ステンダールが我々を守って下さる

original: Well, I assume so. It cast a spell at me from some kind of strange black crystal.
string: 多分な。不気味な黒い水晶みたいなもので呪文をかけられたんだ

original: It is true there are some here who have spent years studying the accumulated knowledge of the scrolls.
string: 確かにここには、書に蓄積された知識の研究に、幾年も費やしている者達がいます

original: It's ruled by unseen beings known as the Ideal Masters.
string: そこはアイディール・マスターと呼ばれる不可視の存在達が支配する場所ですの

original: I'll meet you back there.
string: 戻って向こうで合流しよう

original: Then root out the monster, and destroy it.
string: その上で、化け物を追い詰めて倒せ

original: I don't like the look of this...
string: 見た感じが気に入りませんわ…

original: How did you end up here?
string: どうしてこんな所にいる？

original: I'll tell you, the only thing more surprising than hearing from Isran after all these years was hearing that he wanted my help.
string: イスランが今さら連絡を寄こしたのも驚きだが、奴が俺の助けを求めてるってのはもっと驚きだ

original: I've lasted this long because I don't take chances, I cover my tracks, and I keep my eyes open. If you're smart, you'll do the same.
string: 私がこれほど長生きできたのは、リスクを冒さず、痕跡を残さず、常に注意を怠らなかったからだ。君が賢明なら、同じ事をすべきだな

original: That's quite a bold claim. I'd need proof before I could possibly accept it.
string: かなり大胆な要求だな。たとえ受け入れるとしても、その前に証拠が必要だ

original: What do you mean by "don't draw attention?"
string: 目立つな、というのは？

original: The ice entombs the heart. The bane of Kagrenac and Dagoth Ur.
string: 氷は心を埋葬する。カグレナクの遺産とダゴス・ウルの招いた災いだ

original: I suppose she's right. I shouldn't let my personal feelings get in the way.
string: 彼女が正しいようだな。個人的な感情をここで挟むべきではない

original: I used to be one of the best traders in High Rock, you know. People would track me down just to see what I had for sale.
string: 昔はハイロックで最高の商人の一人だった。うちの商品が見たくてみんな俺を追いかけたもんだ

original: Now, where was I...
string: さて、続きはどこからだったか…

original: You brought that up before... I think I was a little short with you.
string: 前にもこの話をしましたね… わたし、ちょっと無愛想すぎでしたかしら

original: In the meantime, we're going to get to the bottom of why a vampire showed up here looking for you.
string: さて、それでは吸血鬼がなぜ君達を探してここに姿を現したのか、その真相を探るとしようか

original: Yes? What did you need?
string: はい？ 何が必要ですの？

original: These caves must be massive.
string: ずいぶん大きな洞窟のようだ

original: Did you have something in mind?
string: 何か思うところでも？

original: That's... a long story.
string: それは… 長い話になりますわ
