original: That doesn't make much sense. Where is this woman? Who is she?
string: 話がよく分からないな。その女性はどこにいる？ 彼女は誰なんだ？

original: I don't know that name. You say she's Jarl of Solitude? Who supports her?
string: 聞きおぼえのない名前ですわね。ソリチュードの首長ですって？ 後ろ盾は？

original: I suppose you're right. I should have a little more faith.
string: それはそうかも。もう少し信じるようにすべきなのかも…

original: The barrier should be gone now. Let's head back.
string: これで障壁は消えたはずですわ。戻りましょう

original: I fear that my time here has taken its toll upon me. I share a bond with this dreaded place.
string: ここには長居しすぎたようだ。我とこの地との繋がりはもはや断てぬ

original: That letter's the last I've heard of her and mentions where she is. Now please, leave me alone.
string: あれが彼女から届いた最後の手紙だ。居場所が書いてある。さあ、もう一人にしてくれ

original: Feast on life, friend.
string: 人生を楽しみなさい

original: You have brought my daughter back safely, and for that I am grateful.
string: 娘を無事に連れ戻してくれた事には感謝している

original: I'm sorry. I wish I knew a better way, something that would be easier for you.
string: あなたの負担が軽い、もっと冴えたやり方を知っていればよかったのですけど…

original: Okay. Hope this helps.
string: いいわよ。これが役立つ事を願うわ

original: That is the very purpose that first brought me to Skyrim.
string: 私がスカイリムに来たそもそもの理由がそれなんだよ

original: I'm the Arch-Mage. It's 2,000 coins.
string: 私がアークメイジだ。2000ゴールドだ

original: I need the Elder Scroll that speaks of dragons.
string: 竜族について書かれた星霜の書がほしい

original: You. Come forward. I would speak with you.
string: あなた。こちらへ来なさい。話しましょう…

original: Vampires threaten all of Skyrim. We need your help.
string: 吸血鬼がスカイリム全土を脅かしている。力を貸してほしい

original: One more word of warning. There's a dragon that calls itself Durnehviir roaming the Cairn. Be wary of him.
string: もう一つ警告するわ。ダーネヴィールと名乗るドラゴンがケルンをうろついている。用心して

original: Ready for more? I certainly am.
string: 次を探してきてくれる？ 待ちきれないわ

original: "And without any regard for my safety, I fearless charged the enemy!" No, much too dramatic...
string: 「そして、身の危険も顧みず、恐れる事なく敵に立ち向かう！」 いや、ドラマチックすぎるかな…

original: If there's any way I can be of service, please let me know.
string: 何か役に立てる事があったら、是非教えてくれよ

original: Well, I don't know. Everything seemed fine until that dremora attacked me. I only heard later about the gates from the other souls.
string: さあてね。あのドレモラに襲われるまでは、何の問題もなかったんだ。あとになって、他の連中から門の話を聞いただけだ

original: It became quickly apparent that the best way I could help would be by wiping out the cliff racers.
string: どうすりゃいいかはすぐに分かった。クリフ・レーサーを壊滅させるのが一番だって

original: Oh... damn it...
string: ああ… 何て事ですの…

original: Well, well. He wants the Chalice, then.
string: なるほど。彼の望みは聖杯か

original: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
string: どこかに引越しをしたいな

original: I knew it was only a matter of time before your ambition outgrew your loyalty.
string: お前の野心が忠誠心を追い落とすのも、時間の問題だとは分かっていた

original: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
string: ブリーズホーム、ホワイトランの家だ

original: Dur...
string: ダー…

original: Yes. I've kept it safely secured here ever since I was imprisoned.
string: ええ。ここに幽閉されて以来ずっと、これを守ってきたの

original: Those twisted creatures you call Falmer, I call the Betrayed.
string: お前達がファルメルと呼ぶ邪悪な生き物の事は、裏切られし者と呼んでいる

original: Ah, yes. Hmm. I'm afraid they don't quite work that way.
string: そうか… 残念だがそうはいかないだろう

original: What's that, Lord? Well, should I tell him?
string: 何ですって？ それは彼に話しても？

original: Not... over... yet...
string: いや… まだだ…

original: That make you feel any better?
string: それで気休めになる？

original: Where do you expect me to go?
string: どこに行けばいいのだ？

original: Look, I'm just here to keep watch. What you're looking for is down inside.
string: なあ、俺はただの見張りなんだ。あんたの探してるものは中にある

original: Your husband is such a soul, and the stars appear cooperative. Now is your chance.
string: 君の旦那さんは大した人だ。それに星の巡りも味方している。今がチャンスだな

original: He's dead?
string: 彼は死んだのか？

original: So now what?
string: お次は？

original: Only thing that stood out for me was Auriel's Bow. That's a powerful weapon, and I sure as Oblivion don't want the vampires to get hold of it.
string: 私にとって意味があるのは、アーリエルの弓だけだった。吸血鬼には絶対渡したくない強力な武器だ

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: I'm going to hold onto it.
string: ひとまず手元に持っておくことにする

original: I've been thinking about this for a long time.
string: この事はずっと考えておりましたわ

original: Please, take the bow... it's yours.
string: この弓はお前のものだ… 持っていってくれ

original: Something tells me the divines favor you, my friend.
string: 見ていると、神々に気に入られているように思えてくるよ

original: Have to say, I'm pretty impressed.
string: 正直言って、かなり感心した

original: Welcome, Initiate. This is the Wayshrine of Illumination.
string: ようこそ、新人よ。ここは光の祠だ

original: (Heavy breathing)
string: ハァ、ハァ

original: But no matter. The greatest artists are never recognized in their own time.
string: でも関係ないわ。最も偉大な芸術家は決して生前には認められないものよ

original: The bow! Use the bow!
string: 弓ですわ！ 弓を使って！

original: Katria? No, no that's not possible!
string: カトリア？ 馬鹿な、そんな事があってなるものか！

original: My family used to live on an island to the west of Solitude. I would guess they still do.
string: 昔は、家族でソリチュードの西にある島に住んでおりましたの。今もそこにいると思いますわ

original: Remember, I'm not leaving until Harkon's no longer a threat.
string: 覚えておいて、ハルコンが脅威でなくなるまでは行かないわ

original: The Elder Scroll gives insight deeper than the deep ones, though. To bring about the opening.
string: だが星霜の書は深遠よりもさらに深い明察を与えてくれる。開放をもたらすためのな

original: I got enough troubles on my mind just tryin' to scrape by out here.
string: ここで何とか暮らしていく事で頭が一杯なんだ

original: If you think of any juicy details to add to my work, let me know!
string: 何か面白い物語のネタがあったら、おれに教えてくれよな！

original: Suit yourself.
string: どうぞよしなに

original: I will accept your gift and become a vampire.
string: 恩恵を受けて吸血鬼になろう

original: Way I hear it, Lady Serana's been gone a real long time.
string: 聞いた話じゃ、セラーナ様はかなり長い間いなくなっていたらしい

original: Castle looks so big from down here. I mean, it is big, but, well, even bigger.
string: 下から見上げると随分大きく見えますわね。いえ、実際大きいのですけれど、それ以上に大きく見えるという事ですわ

original: I don't even know who that is...
string: それが誰なのかも分かりませんのに…

original: I suppose you could call this the ultimate waiting game, each watching the other to see which will give in.
string: 究極の持久戦と呼べるかも知れないわ。どちらが先に降参するか、お互いに監視し合う

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: This won't end well for you!
string: ろくな結果になりませんわよ！

original: I think so. And thanks for asking.
string: そうですわね。聞いて下さってありがとう

original: It's the Dawnguard! Let none escape!
string: ドーンガードだ！ 1人も逃がすな！

original: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
string: プラウドスパイヤー邸、ソリチュードの家だ

original: What do you mean, "like you"?
string: “わたしと同じ”とは？

original: Lady Serana's back! Open the gate!
string: セラーナ様がお戻りだ！ 門を開けろ！

original: This is what your obsession brings you!
string: これがお父様のこだわりの結果ですのよ！

original: I knew it! I knew Arkay would save me. I asked for help, and he sent you!
string: やっぱり！ アーケイが救ってくれた。彼に助けを求めたから、あんたが来たんだ

original: You've helped me, so I suppose the least I can do is find out what Isran wants. He's still at that fort near Stendarr's Beacon, I assume?
string: 助けてもらったわけだし、イスランの望みを確かめるくらいはお安いご用だ。まだステンダールの灯の近くの砦にいるのだろうか？

original: Yes, I'd like you to change my appearance. (<Global=DLC1SurgeryCost> gold)
string: 外見を変えてくれ(<Global=DLC1SurgeryCost> ゴールド)

original: Arkay and I will take care of the little ones! You find the leader!
string: 雑魚はアーケイと俺が引き受ける！ お前はリーダーを探せ！

original: Rrrraaaaahhhh!
string: イイィィヤァアー！

original: You were hunting?
string: 狩りをしていたのか？

original: I suppose I'd rather be here than most other places in Skyrim. If Isran needs me, it must be pretty bad.
string: スカイリムにあるどんな宮殿よりも、ここの方がいいわ。イスランに呼ばれるなんて、最悪の状況って事だもの

original: I thought death was a release, not an eternity of torment.
string: 死は解放だと思ってたのに、実際は永遠の苦しみだった

original: Very funny.
string: 面白いね

original: Maybe that's why I worked so hard to redeem myself once I was freed.
string: 脱獄した後、あれほど熱心に働いたのはその償いのためだろうな

original: Please, we need your help.
string: お願いだから協力してほしい

original: You probably weren't expecting to see me again.
string: わたしとまた会うとは思っていなかったのでしょうね

original: I can't believe I'm trading this for some dried up plants. Oh well, a sale's a sale.
string: こいつをしなびた植物と交換するなんて信じられないよ。まあ、商売は商売だ

original: Looks like we're on the right track.
string: どうやらこの方向で正しいようですわね

original: But for Serana's sake, I'll assist you in any way that I can.
string: でもセラーナのために、どんな手段を使っても支援するわよ

original: It sounds like you weren't thinking clearly.
string: 考えが甘かったんじゃないのか？

original: Are you alright? Come on, we can do this. I know we can.
string: 大丈夫ですわね？ さあ、きっとやり遂げられますわ

original: Look around you. There are some extremely powerful undead here.
string: 周りをご覧あそばせ。ここにいるのはとてつもなく強力なアンデッドですわよ

original: You can't hide from us!
string: 隠れても無駄ですわ！

original: The Dawnguard were protecting him, and they nearly killed me.
string: ドーンガードが彼を守っていて、殺されかけた

original: I thought Lokil knew what he was doing. This is taking too long.
string: ロキルを信頼していたけど、ちょっと時間がかかり過ぎだわ

original: I suppose we're all a little crazy to be here, right?
string: ここに来てる時点で、頭おかしいと思わない？

original: We're called the Dawnguard. We're fighting a vampire conspiracy.
string: 我々はドーンガード。吸血鬼らの陰謀と戦っている

original: I wonder what we're up against here.
string: 一体、何と戦わなくちゃいけないのかしら

original: It is good to know that I will not have to do it alone. I am glad this Dawnguard exists.
string: 独りでやらなくていいのはありがたい。ドーンガードがいてよかった

original: But what of Serana? Can she be trusted to lift a blade against her own kind? Her own family?
string: だがセラーナは？ 本当に彼女は自分と同じ種族に、ひいては自分の家族に剣を向ける事ができるのか？

original: I'm working on it, now give me some silence so I can think.
string: 今やってるところだ。考えをまとめたいから静かにしてくれないか

original: Still over half the pages are missing. Keep trying.
string: まだ原稿は半分残ってる。頑張って探してくれ

original: Yes, he's a fanatic... he's changed. But he's still my father. Why can't you understand how that makes me feel?
string: ええ、お父様は狂信的に… 変わってしまいましたわ。それでもわたしのお父様なのです。そういう父親を持った娘がどんな気持ちでいるのか、どうして分かってくれませんの？

original: You're blind!
string: 目が見えないのか！？

original: You first.
string: そちらからどうぞ

original: First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.
string: セラーナの次は聖蚕の僧侶か。ハルコン卿はきっと君の事がお気に入りだな… 今のところは

original: The Elder Scrolls have served me well, Dexion.
string: 星霜の書は役に立ってくれたよ、デキソン

original: If the Dawnguard can't stop these vampires, who can?
string: ドーンガードがこの吸血鬼達を防げなければ、誰ができるの？

original: Here, you should take a crossbow. Good for taking out those fiends before they get close.
string: ほら、クロスボウを使え。あの悪魔どもが近づいてくる前に攻撃するには最適な武器だ

original: The story they'd like you to believe is that they were such a noble bunch, doing the honorable thing and saving lives.
string: 彼らは自分達が高貴で、誇りに満ちた行いをし、人々の命を救う者達だと信じさせようとする

original: Yah!
string: ヤァ！

original: Any advice?
string: 何か助言でも？

original: I really do enjoy killing vampires.
string: 吸血鬼狩りはなかなか楽しめるものだ

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: Are you... Did you get infected?
string: まさか…感染したのか？

original: Why worry about who has the bigger chair at the table when there's more than enough to go around?
string: テーブルに椅子が十分に行き渡る以上にある時に、なぜ誰の椅子が大きいかを気にするの？

original: So... this is the place.
string: すると… ここがそうですのね

original: You deserve to be happy.
string: あなたはもっと幸せになるべきですわ

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: We will march on their lair and destroy those wretched abominations so they can no longer corrupt our world!
string: 奴らの根城に進軍して、あの忌々しいバケモノどもを破滅させてやれ。奴らがこの世界を汚すのをこれ以上許すな！

original: How did you earn your nicknames?
string: 二つ名の数々の由来は？

original: And you think I do? Humph.
string: そうだと思うのか？ ふんだ

original: Sure... do you have any arrows, though? They would have to be of elven quality, I'd guess.
string: もちろんですわ… でも矢は持っておりますの？ おそらくエルフの矢みたいに立派なものでなければ駄目ですわよ

original: The secret is our mystic Redwater Spring. The magic in the waters opens the mind to experience Skooma in a way like never before.
string: 秘密は、秘伝のレッドウォーター・スプリングよ。水に込められた魔法で精神が解放されて、これまでにないスクゥーマが体験できるの

original: DialogueRiftenGoodbyes
string: DialogueRiftenGoodbyes

original: This used to lead into the castle's great hall. It looks like my father had it sealed up.
string: 以前ここは城の大広間に通じておりましたのよ。どうやら父が封印したようですわね

original: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, go talk to Isran up in the fort. He decides who's Dawnguard material.
string: そこであんたの出番だ。吸血鬼退治に興味があるなら、砦にいるイスランに会うんだ。ドーンガードにふさわしいかどうかを判断してくれる

original: Time to gather some bark.
string: 樹皮を集める頃合ですわ

original: If we don't, he'll keep chasing us for the rest of our lives.
string: この時を避けたら、残りの人生ずっと彼に追いかけ回されますわよ

original: Look at these fools, so concerned with tending their precious "beacon."
string: この能なしどもを見ろ。自分達の大事な“のろし”の世話に必死になっている

original: That one's far nicer though... almost ceremonial.
string: あれはもっと素敵だったけど… 何かの儀式とかにも使えそうだったわね

original: The tower suffered damage in the recent war with the Aldmeri Dominion, and is not what it once was.
string: 最近のアルドメリ自治領との戦争で損傷を受けたせいで、塔は以前の姿を失ってしまったが

original: What did this area used to be?
string: この一帯、元々は？

original: Looks like they're better at making traps than they are at making bridges.
string: 彼らは橋を造るよりも罠をこしらえる方が得意だったようですわね

original: Maybe he knows what's going on.
string: 彼なら、この状況を理解しているかも知れませんわ

original: Oh no...
string: ああ、なんて事かしら…

original: Do I look like a "sir" to you, boy? I'm not a soldier, and you're not joining the army.
string: 私の事を“サー”とでも呼びたいのか、新人君？ 私は兵士ではないし、君が入隊する予定もない

original: One moment I'm raising a sword against that necromancer, the next moment I found myself here. What happened?
string: あの死霊術師に向かって剣を振り上げた、次の瞬間にはここにいた。一体どうなってるんだ？

original: I... I can't really tell.
string: わたしには… 何とも言えませんわ

original: How dare you profane this place!
string: この場所を穢す事は許さん！

original: Be still!
string: 動くな！

original: If I ever see her again, she will pay most dearly for that betrayal.
string: もしまた会う事があれば、裏切りの代償を存分にとってやるとも

original: It is.
string: そうですわ

original: I don't recall addressing you, worm.
string: お前に話しかけた覚えはないぞ、虫ケラ

original: What... have I done... Auri-Eil forgive me...
string: 私は… 一体何を… アーリエルよ、ご慈悲を…

original: Yes, I did. When I told you that I was grateful for my daughter's safe return, I told the truth. But I did not tell you everything.
string: そうだな。娘が無事に戻って感謝している、というのは事実だ。だがその先がある

original: It's your choice whether to attempt to deal with them or force your way through.
string: そいつらを相手に取引してみるか、強引に突破してみるかは自由だ

original: I must rest now. The reading has made me weary.
string: 休息が必要だな。書を読んだせいでクタクタだよ

original: Have we angered the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターを怒らせてしまったのだろうか？

original: I don't relax. Ever.
string: 気が休まる時などないよ。一瞬たりとも

original: This one's mine!
string: これはあたしのものだよ！

original: I'm not going to waste my time making sure your friend doesn't get killed. When it's just you and me, we can go.
string: 味方の命を守る事に必死になって、時間を無駄にしたくはありませんの。あなたと二人だけなら、すぐ出発いたしますわ

original: Your staff... gods, it's made of Aetherium! Pure Aetherium!
string: お前の装備品は… 何てこった。エセリウム製じゃないか！ 正真正銘のエセリウムだ！

original: I'm sure your reward will be great for ensuring our Lord's success.
string: 我らが王の成功を確かなものにしてくれたのだから、君へのほうびはすごいものになるはずだ

original: Wait! ...Yes, yes there is. The shards we collected... they're pure Aetherium, remember? It's not much, but it'll do.
string: 待って！ …うん、あるよ。集めた破片は… 純粋なエセリウムだよ、覚えてる？ 多くはないけど、使えるね

original: I'm right behind you.
string: すぐ後ろにいましてよ

original: What do you have against the Vigilants?
string: 番人たちとの間に何か？

original: I'll be here if you change your mind.
string: 気が変わったら、ここにおりますわ

original: How will vampires gain power over the sun?
string: 吸血鬼がどうやって太陽を司るつもりなのか？

original: Said he found some old Dwemer artifact, but... well, that was years ago.
string: ある古のドゥーマーの秘宝を見つけたと言っていたが… それもずっと昔の事だ

original: I'm over here!
string: わたしはこちらよ！

original: Hey! Journal?
string: ねえ！ 日記は？

original: What do you mean... "lost himself"?
string: “没頭してしまって”とは？

original: I always wondered what the dwarves actually looked like. I hear they're like elves, but with beards.
string: ドワーフの実物はどんなふうなんだろうとずっと思っておりましたの。エルフに似てるけど、ヒゲを生やしてるんですって

original: I can't decide which parts of you I'd like to keep for a while...
string: お前のどの部分をしばらくとっておこうか迷っている…

original: Did you have anything to ask before you depart?
string: 出発の前に何か聞く事はあった？

original: I have ordered the court to assemble. I have a new task for us all to carry out, and that includes you.
string: 臣下の者達に集まるよう指示した。我々全員でなすべき事がある。お前を含めてな

original: Ah, Solitude. Best port in Skyrim. You should try the Spiced Mead while you're there.
string: ソリチュードか。スカイリム一の港がある街さ。あそこのピリ辛ハチミツ酒はお勧めだ

original: I will find you. Then you will beg me to let you die.
string: 必ず見つけ出して、慈悲を乞わせてやるわ

original: Yes?
string: はい？

original: Come, infidel, meet your end!
string: 異端者め、死を受け入れるがいい！

original: That was the plan, yes. Assuming the rest of them can trust a vampire. Come on, I'll need you to help convince them.
string: そのつもりですわ。残りの者達が吸血鬼を信用できればですが。さあ、行きましょう。説得するのにあなたの助けが必要になりそうですわ

original: The scroll I presume you found with Serana speaks of Auriel and his arcane weapon, Auriel's Bow.
string: おそらくあなたがセラーナと一緒に発見した書には、アーリエルと彼の神秘の武器、アーリエルの弓の記述がある

original: The moment you hand over the bow your usefulness ends. He'll kill you and then he'll take my blood for the damn prophecy.
string: 弓を渡した瞬間あなたは用済みになりますわよ。父はあなたを殺して、それからあの下らない予言のためにわたしの血を抜き取るのでしょう

original: Huhn!
string: うぐっ！

original: Never made it far in the Companions, but now... I'd like to see any of them try and call me "whelp" again.
string: 同胞団ではうまくいかなかったけど、今は… あの中に私をまた“お嬢さん”と呼ぶ者がいるか見てみたいわ

original: Are you going to help?
string: 手を貸してくれるか？

original: This has certainly been quite the adventure, hasn't it?
string: ちょっとした冒険だったな。そうだろう？

original: For the reading? Yeah. Just let the old man know when you're ready.
string: 解読のために？ そうか。では準備ができたらこの年寄りに教えてくれ

original: I miss the flowers.
string: 花が恋しいですわ

original: I'm sure I'll manage to repay him later, but you... What can I do to thank you?
string: アーケイにはいずれ恩返しができると思うが、あんたには… 何をすればいい？

original: Wouldn't that kill me?
string: 死んでしまったりしないのか？

original: Congratulations, friend. You've won a well-deserved victory here.
string: おめでとう、尽力の甲斐ある勝利だったな

original: Another time, perhaps.
string: また次がある

original: Neither do I.
string: わたしもですわ

original: But we all took part in it. Not really wholesome family activity, but I guess it's something you do when you give yourselves to a daedric lord.
string: ですが、確かにその場にはおりましたわ。家族でやるような事ではございませんけれど、デイドラの王に仕える者としては普通の事ですのよ

original: Was I wrong?
string: 違いまして？

original: I'm ready to be soul trapped.
string: 魂縛を受ける用意ができた

original: As you wish.
string: かしこまりました

original: The Chantry is quite isolated, so it took some time for word of the dwarves' offer to reach us here.
string: 礼拝所は周囲から孤立していて、ドワーフからの申し出がここに届くには時間がかかった

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: How does that help the Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶にとって利点があるのか？

original: Maker... it can't be. Serana?!
string: 神よ… まさか。セラーナ！？

original: And so I'm going to give you a chance to get yourself cured.
string: 治療のチャンスをやろう

original: Thanks again for searching. I don't know what I'd do without my pages.
string: 探してくれてありがとう。原稿がなかったら、どうなっていた事か

original: What do you mean? Why were the vampires after this woman?
string: どうして？ どうして吸血鬼たちは彼女を？

original: What about me?
string: 自分がどうしたって？

original: Who'll need thralls when the very sun is at our mercy?
string: 太陽そのものが我々の意のままになれば、従徒など必要なくなる

original: My presence in Tamriel would simply double the risk that Harkon could complete the prophecy.
string: 私がタムリエルに存在すれば、ハルコンがお告げを実現する危険を倍増するだけ

original: The day is dark as night! What's happening?
string: 昼が夜みたいに暗い！ 何が起きているんだ？

original: Is that all of them?
string: それで全部？

original: Let's just pretend you didn't, all right?
string: なかった事にしておきましょう？

original: Why can't I just die? I fear I'm cursed to walk this desolate land forever.
string: どうして死ねないんだ？ この何もない場所をさまよい続ける呪いなんて嫌だ

original: What? You... you found the Forge? The Aetherium Forge?
string: 何？ お前が… 見つけただと？ エセリウムの鋳造器具を？

original: Do me this simple honor and I will fight at your side as your Grah-Zeymahzin, your Ally, and teach you my Thu'um.
string: 名誉を証し立てるべく、グラー・ゼイマージンはそなたの兄弟として共に戦場を駆けん。さあ、我がスゥームを授けよう

original: Why did you come here?
string: ここに来た理由は？

original: I will say only that we did not part on good terms.
string: 別れが温かなものではなかったとだけ言っておこう

original: You've found the Wayshrine of Radiance, Initiate.
string: ここは輝きの祠だ、新人よ

original: Not your first choice, I'd guess.
string: 迷わず選べる道ではないかも知れませんわ

original: I'd like to hire your boat.
string: 船で行きたいところがある

original: How did you actually become a vampire, then?
string: 実際にどのようにして吸血鬼になったんだ？

original: I don't think he knew much of anything.
string: ほとんど何もわかっていなかった気がする

original: Yes. By destroying it, the vampires hoped to cripple our order's activities in Skyrim.
string: ああ。吸血鬼らはあれを破壊する事で、我ら教団のスカイリムでの活動を阻害しようと目論んだのだ

original: Look at the sky!
string: 空を見て！

original: Apparently you had blood in your ears when I said not to draw attention to yourself. If I wanted a messy kill I would have said so.
string: 目立つなと言った時に、耳に血が詰まっていたようね。下手な殺し方をしてほしければ、最初からそう言ったわよ

original: See the Resonators up there? Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: あそこの共鳴装置が見える？ あれを正しい順番で叩けば、扉は開くはずだよ

original: Now your blood is mine!
string: お前の血は私がいただく！

original: Gunmar and I have a lot of work to do here, so we were hoping that maybe you could track him down.
string: ガンマーも私もここでやる事がたくさんあるから、あなたに彼を探してもらいたいの

original: Sure, I'd like the help.
string: そうしてくれれば助かる

original: I'm ready.
string: 準備はできてる

original: I can actually assist you in that regard.
string: それに関しては、任せてくれ

original: Glad you're finally listening. Come on, let's move.
string: お分かり頂けたようですわね。さあ、急ぎましょう

original: You have kept your side of the bargain, now let me fulfill mine.
string: そなたは約束を守ってくれた。今度は我の番だ

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: I was on the trail of something big. It led me here, and... I didn't make it.
string: ある大物を追っていたんだ。それでここにたどり着いて… 失敗した

original: Not until we have the bow. But... you're right.
string: 弓を手に入れた後の話ですわ。でも… そうですわね

original: What do you want?
string: 何をすればいい？

original: With a sky like that, something bad is coming.
string: あの空の様子では、何か悪い事が訪れるな

original: The ingredients are in the vessel.
string: 材料は器に入れた

original: So let me take the lead in there.
string: だから中ではわたしにお任せを

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: I lost two wives to vampires. I will avenge them.
string: 吸血鬼には妻を二人も奪われた。仇はとる

original: I'd... well, I'd come with you, but I don't know if I can trust your friend.
string: ええと、そうですわね… 一緒に行っても構わないのですが、あなたのお友達を信用していいものかどうか

original: Perfect. This should do it.
string: 完璧よ。これで十分でしょう

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: Tolan was telling me about some cave that the Vigilants were poking around in. Seemed to think it was related to these recent vampire attacks.
string: 番人達がある洞窟を探ってたとトランが言っていたな。最近の吸血鬼の攻撃とそこの関連性を調べていたらしい

original: Oh, they definitely were.
string: ええ、間違いなくそうでしたわ

original: Good. You deserve that much.
string: よかった。あなたのためなら喜んで

original: Just look around, will you?
string: ちょっと、辺りを見てきてくれない？

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: そんなことはさせない

original: Fine, fine. No need to get your breeches in a twist.
string: そうか、そうか。そんなにムキにならなくてもいいだろう

original: Hmm. Nothing.
string: うーん。何も匂わない

original: I can see that. This has been my life for a long time, though. Do you understand that much?
string: 承知しておりますわ。ですが、ずっとこうして生きてきましたの。それを分かっていまして？

original: This is the most peace and quiet I've had in a lifetime.
string: 生まれてから今まで得る事のできなかった平穏がある

original: That's too bad. Do you know how they're doing now?
string: 残念ですわね。今どうしてるかお分かりには？

original: If you were to bring me some good quality elven arrows, I could imbue them with the proper incantations and rituals.
string: 質のいいエルフの矢を持ってきてくれたら、正式な呪文と儀式で魔法をかけてやろう

original: Maybe I could have seen this coming. We could all be better off now.
string: おそらくこうなるのは予測できたはず。そうしたら今こんな目に遭わずに済んだというのに…

original: I'm here to join the Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガードの一員になりたくて来た

original: He's such a loyal beast. Here, I'll teach you how to call him to you.
string: あいつはすごく忠実でね。どれ、呼び方を教えてやろう

original: Deep inside, it brings me joy that the Betrayed weren't to blame for what happened here.
string: 内心、ここで起こった事が裏切られし者の仕業ではないと知って嬉しいのだ

original: And it all ended with me being locked underground for who knows how long.
string: そのせいでわたしは、誰も覚えていないほど長く地下に閉じ込められていたわけですし

original: Keep watch for Durnehviir. With the prison's barrier down, he's almost certain to investigate.
string: ダーネヴィールに警戒して。牢獄の障壁が壊れた今、調査しに来るのはほぼ確実よ

original: If we do, he'll have to die.
string: もしそうなら、彼には死んでもらうしかない

original: Ugh. I thought this place was supposed to be secret?
string: この場所は秘密じゃなかったのか？

original: The ingredients are in the vessel.
string: 材料は器に入れた

original: They used to criss-cross the skies over Morrowind like vermin. Nasty flying creatures with a habit of sneaking up on the unwary.
string: 奴らは害虫のようにモロウウィンドの空を飛びまわり、不用心な人を襲う事で忌み嫌われていた

original: Ah, you are here. Good.
string: おお、来たのか。よいぞ

original: So this is where your Vigilants came from? No wonder you look so lost all the time.
string: となると、ここがあなた達番人の本拠ですの？ あなたがいつも途方に暮れたような顔してるのも無理ありませんわね

original: Not as much as I would like. Even after spending decades of my life in study of the Elder Scrolls, they remain a great mystery to me.
string: 望みどおりというわけではないがね。生涯の数十年を星霜の書の研究に費やしたが、まだ分からない事が多すぎる

original: W...Where's the sun?
string: 太陽は… どこ？

original: I like what Isran has done with the place. It's good to see someone else who's really prepared.
string: あそこでは、イスランはいい仕事をしたわね。自分の他にも有事に備えている人がいると分かって嬉しいわ

original: Tell me more about what's going on.
string: 何が起きているのか、聞かせてくれ

original: Well. After you.
string: さあ。先にどうぞ

original: It's like I said, I'm not going to talk about it.
string: 言っただろう？ その話はしないって

original: Me too.
string: わたしも

original: Serana underwent this ritual willingly?
string: セラーナは自分の意思でその儀式を？

original: What if the vampires come here, after the Dawnguard? We'll be stuck right in the middle.
string: もしドーンガードの後に吸血鬼がここへ来たら？ ちょうど真ん中に挟まれてしまう

original: I don't suppose there's a way to free you.
string: 解放する方法はないんだろうな

original: He can help you. Go now, please, before you lose control of yourself.
string: 彼が力になってくれるはずだ。早く行ってくれ。理性が残ってるうちに

original: I already have another shard.
string: 既に破片をもう1つ持っている

original: The amulets increase the effectiveness of your vampiric powers.
string: アミュレットは君の吸血鬼としての力を高めてくれるんだ

original: My father and I don't really get along.
string: 父との折り合いがよくないのです

original: It seems they wanted to send a message to the other Vigilants still walking the roads of Skyrim.
string: スカイリムの道を歩んでいる他の番人達に警告を発したかったようだな

original: No, just...
string: いや、違う…

original: Stay away from the Oblivion Gate I told them. Did they listen? Of course not.
string: オブリビオンの門に近づいてはいけないと言ったけど、彼らが聞くわけないだろ？

original: Remember, you are no mere vampire. You are something far greater.
string: 自分がただの吸血鬼ではなく、はるかに上位の存在である事を忘れるな

original: Not sure what you're waiting for... step into the light.
string: 何を待っているのか存じませんけど… 光の中へお入りになって

original: Revel in your power.
string: 自分の力を満喫したまえ

original: You've been imprisoned here for all this time?
string: ずっとここに幽閉されていたのか？

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: It's important that I find him right away. (Persuade)
string: すぐにその彼を見つけないといけない(説得)

original: Very well.
string: よろしい

original: Still, its liquid is powerful, full of magic. Others have noticed, though they have never fully realized its potential.
string: それでも、強力で魔力にあふれる液体だ。気づいた者もいたが、その潜在力を十分には理解しなかった

original: Ah yes, I remember your Moth Priest now.
string: ああそうだ。あんたの探してる聖蚕の僧侶の事を思い出したよ

original: I'll take this one back to the castle.
string: これは城に持って帰っておくわ

original: Look, take whatever you want. I'm getting out of here!
string: 好きなものを持ってってくれ。すぐに出ていくから！

original: Where do you need to go?
string: 行き先は？

original: You've worked with Isran before?
string: 以前にもイスランと組んだことが？

original: Why haven't you pursued the prophecy?
string: 予言を追い求めていない理由は？

original: Awake at last, good.
string: ようやく目覚めたか

original: Mind yourself.
string: お気を付けて

original: I'll darken the skies with her blood!
string: その娘の血で空を黒く染めてやろう！

original: Is it really... it is! I was hoping we'd find this. It's a diagram for a dwemer crossbow. Much more sophisticated, and powerful, than the ones we use.
string: まさか… やっぱり！ これを探してたのよ。ドゥーマーのクロスボウの図面だわ。今使っているものの何倍も洗練されてて、しかも強力よ

original: Heard anything about a moth priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Ohhh... that's good stuff. Believe me friend, I've tried it all and this is the best.
string: ふむう… 上物ですね。冗談抜きであらゆる種類を試しましたが、これが最高です

original: Forgive me, Qahnaarin. We will continue this when time releases you from its relentless grasp.
string: 許せ、クァーナーリン。時がそなたを手放した暁には、続けるとしよう…

original: We're meeting at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で合流予定だ

original: Yes, that's it. Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald was sure it held some long-lost vampire artifact of some kind.
string: ああ、そうとも。ディムホロウ墓地。アダルヴァルド修道士はそこにはるか昔の吸血鬼の秘宝か何かがあると確信していた

original: You arrived just in time. I think those vampires were getting hungry.
string: ちょうどいい時に来てくれた。あの吸血鬼どもも腹を空かせてたところだよ

original: Isran will never admit it, but I'm sure he's proud of you.
string: イスランは認めないだろうけど、きっとあんたの事は鼻が高いはずだよ

original: Look at you, wandering around causing trouble. Precious.
string: すごいじゃないか。あちこちで面倒を起こしてるんだな。素晴らしい

original: Ready for some bloodshed, beast?
string: 血を見る覚悟はできているか？

original: First you die, then Serana suffers!
string: お前を殺し、セラーナには苦しみを味わわせてやる！

original: So, in case you didn't notice the giant thing on my back, I have the Elder Scroll with me.
string: 背負っているモノに気づいていらっしゃらない場合を考えて言いますが、星霜の書を持ち歩いているのです

original: Do you know anything about this place?
string: この場所について知っていることを教えてほしい

original: What are you doing that's so dangerous?
string: そんなに危険な事とは？

original: All right. Here's the extract.
string: いいでしょう。これがエキスよ

original: This is incredible. It's like a whole other world.
string: 信じられませんわ。まるで別世界ですわよ

original: If you think I'm going to let you have all the fun, you're crazy. I'll let you lead ahead, but I'll be keeping an eye on you.
string: 楽しみを独り占めできると思っておいでなら、酔狂にもほどがありますわ。先に行かせてさしあげますけど、ちゃんと見ておりますわよ

original: I have a task that will test your new powers, but first, do you have any questions?
string: お前の新たな力が試される使命があるが、その前に質問は？

original: Death to the vampires!
string: 吸血鬼どもに死を！

original: Your death will be my gift to Auri-El!
string: 貴様の命をアーリエルに捧げてやろう！

original: Don't worry, I'm not in any danger or anything like that. It'll just be more unpleasant to run into my father.
string: 別段、危険にさらされてるわけではございませんの。父に会うのがそれだけ不愉快な出来事になるだけで

original: A wondrous blade... ahhh, never mind. Just take the darn thing.
string: これぞ伝説の剣… あああ、気にしないでくれ。持っていきな

original: They increase the abilities of your vampiric powers.
string: 君の吸血鬼としての力を高めてくれるんだ

original: Follow me. I'll take you to it.
string: ついて来い。案内しよう

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: The College of Winterhold seems like a good place to start.
string: ひとまずはウィンターホールド大学に向かうべきか

original: You got it. Horse, wagon and all. Plopped here without so much as a word.
string: 馬でも馬車でも何でもありさ。何も言わなくてもここにドサっと集まるんだ

original: Hunters! Take his heart!
string: みんな！ 奴の心臓を狙え！

original: Is there any more Aetherium?
string: 他にもエセリウムはあるのか？

original: "Just step into the painting" he said. Yeah, sure... like it's that simple.
string: 彼の言う通り、「絵の中に入っただけ」。そうよ… 簡単で素敵だと思ったのよ

original: Oh. I didn't even know. What kind of woman is she?
string: あら、存じませんでしたわ。どんな奥様なのかしら？

original: I've been keeping her safe.
string: 彼女の安全を守る、護衛だ

original: Who is Florentius?
string: フロレンティウスとは？

original: If it'll get him closer to being in charge, he'll slit your throat without a moment's thought.
string: 自分が上に立つためには、一瞬のためらいもなくお前の寝首をかきにくるぞ

original: This won't stop your soul from getting ripped out, but at least you'll look good when your corpse hits the ground.
string: こいつを着てても死ぬ時は死ぬけど、立派な格好で死ねるだけましだよ

original: None of this makes any sense. What does she have to do with this?
string: どうも話が分からないな。彼女はこの件とどう関係しているんだ？

original: There's not a whole lot to tell.
string: 説明できる事は、そう多くありませんわ

original: Tell you what, I'll sell it back to you for 4,000 coins.
string: 4000ゴールドでまた売ってやってもいいけどな

original: Slay any vampires lately have we?
string: 最近は吸血鬼を殺してる？

original: Watch your step.
string: 足元に注意して

original: And we will not return without it. Vingalmo and Orthjolf will make way for me after this.
string: そして手に入れるまでは帰らない。事が終われば、ヴィンガルモとオースユルフは裸足で逃げ出すだろうな

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: ... what's that?
string: …あれは何だ？

original: Now, make your choice!
string: さあ、選ぶがいい！

original: Indeed. He's off to Redwater Den.
string: いかにも。彼はレッドウォーターの隠れ家へ向かった

original: I knew she was deep into necromancy. I mean, she taught me everything I know.
string: 母が死霊術にのめりこんでいた事は存じておりましたわ。だって、わたしの知っている事はすべて母から教わったものですのよ

original: They're indestructible, so they'd make good armor.
string: 破壊不能なら、防具として使えそうだ

original: You're no merchant.
string: 商人などではないな

original: Very well. I am Harkon, lord of this court. By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
string: いいだろう。私の名はハルコン、この一族を率いている。我々の素性については娘から聞いている事だろう

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: What do we need?
string: 何が必要だ？

original: Stendarr grant that you do not have to face the same test and be found wanting.
string: そちらが同じ試練にさらされ、力不足が判明しないよう、ステンダールのご加護あれ

original: Damn things are like flies. No matter how many you kill...
string: いまいましい、ハエみたいな奴らだ。いくら殺しても…

original: Keep in mind that Redwater Den has fallen into... well, let's just say less reputable members of society now dwell there.
string: 覚えておけ、レッドウォーターの隠れ家は… まあ、社会であまり信頼できん者達のすみかになっているとだけ言っておこう

original: Something's happened, I can't quite remember...
string: 何かが起きたのか？ はっきり思い出せない…

original: Gods, you're one of them! Get yourself cured before you think about asking me to help you again.
string: おいおい、あんた奴らの仲間じゃないか！ 協力してほしいなら、まずそれを治してから来るんだ

original: Here, take this one and give it a try. You'll want to get to know how to use it if you really plan to join the Dawnguard.
string: こいつを持っていって使ってみるといい。本気でドーンガードの一員になるなら、使い方を身につけておくべきだ

original: You're lucky to be alive, then. I'm guessing you don't have a plan for where to go next, then?
string: でしたら、まだ生きてる事に感謝なさって。次にどこへ行くかも分からないのでしょう？

original: Yes, he said to meet him at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ああ、ドーンガード砦に来てくれと言っていた

original: Snow elves? You're a Falmer?
string: スノーエルフ？ ファルメルなのか？

original: It's Durnehviir... he's here! Defend yourselves!
string: ダーネヴィール… 来たわ！ 身を守って！

original: Come on, let's go home.
string: さあ、帰りましょう

original: Hm. Most interesting.
string: ふむ、実に興味深い

original: Have you ever thought about marriage?
string: 結婚を考えたことはあるのか？

original: What does it mean to be a werewolf?
string: ウェアウルフになると、どうなるんだ？

original: Forgive me, my instinct was to grant you this title. I am uncertain why. Perhaps one day it will become clear to both of us.
string: 許せ、かようにもこの称号を与えねばならぬと思えたのだ。理由は我にも分からん。いつか明かされる日が来るのかも知れないが…

original: Why, because of that story about the prophecy? About some vampire trying to put the sun out?
string: あの予言の事か？ 吸血鬼が太陽を消そうとしているという？

original: Given how I've lived... what I've done... I can't ask the gods for a blessing like that.
string: 今までの人生とか… やってきた事を思えば… そんなふうに神の祝福なんて望めませんわ

original: Did you really come here expecting to claim Auriel's Bow?
string: ここに来ればアーリエルの弓が手に入ると、本気で思ったのか？

original: It sounds like... that's the last bit of the prophecy. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour can corrupt the bow.
string: そうですわね… 予言の最後の部分ですわ。コールドハーバーの娘の血が弓を汚せばいい

original: After all these years, that's the first thing you ask me? Yes, I have the scroll.
string: 久しぶりに出会って、真っ先に聞く事がそれですの？ ええ、その書なら持っておりましてよ

original: You'd become the very thing you've sworn to destroy. I don't know how the Dawnguard will react.
string: 倒すと誓った敵そのものになる事ですのよ。ドーンガードがどう反応するか、分かりかねますわ

original: You're sweet to say that, but you need to sort things out on your own. It's not something I'm going to get involved with.
string: お優しいのね、けれど自身の問題は自身で整理するべきですわ。わたしは関わり合いになりたくありませんの

original: I hope you find Lord Harkon's court to your liking.
string: ハルコン卿の宮廷を気に入ってもらえるといいね

original: You've done well. I won't forget that.
string: よくやった。今回の功績は忘れん

original: I think we have a better chance of surviving here, don't you?
string: ここでは死なずに済む可能性が高そうじゃない？

original: Because we're going to need her help.
string: 彼女の助けが必要になるからだ

original: Oh. Good.
string: あら。そうですのね

original: Forge something? With what?
string: 鋳造って？ 材料は？

original: No one is going to stand in my way!
string: 誰にも邪魔はさせない！

original: No, but there's no way she would have left it in Tamriel.
string: いいえ。でも母がそれをタムリエルに置いていったなんてありえませんわ

original: Neh!
string: ネー！

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: We should keep it small. Too many people, and we'll draw unwanted attention to ourselves.
string: 集団の規模は小さい方がいい。人が多すぎると余計な注目を浴びてしまう

original: Do you have a moment to talk?
string: 少し話がしたいのですけれど

original: I'm going to Dimhollow Crypt. Perhaps I can be of some small assistance to you.
string: ディムホロウ墓地に向かう事にする。少しは助力できるかもな

original: Can you give me Bloodcursed Arrows?
string: 血の呪いの矢をもらえないか？

original: Certainly. I can only do twenty at a time, but I see that won't be a problem in this case.
string: もちろん。一度に作れるのは12本だけだが、その本数なら問題ないな

original: This stranger may call himself vampire, but he knows nothing of our struggle. Why should I entrust you to him?
string: このよそ者が吸血鬼を名乗ったとしても、私達の苦悩を何一つ知らないのよ。どうしてあなたを任せられる？

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: He said he was heading for Dragon Bridge next. I hope that helps you.
string: 次はドラゴン・ブリッジに向かうと言ってたよ。お役に立てたならいいが

original: No, no. You must speak with Lord Harkon, not me!
string: 違う違う。話す相手はハルコン卿だ、僕じゃない！
…ふうん…

original: Why do you think I was asking?
string: あなたに尋ねたと思ったの？

original: Light take you!
string: 光に呑まれよ！

original: Yes, milord? What can I help you with?
string: はい、旦那様。ご用は何ですか？

original: Yes, well... I never wanted any of this to happen. I tried to warn all of you... I am sorry, you know.
string: ああ… こんな事は望んでなかった。君達みんなに警告しようとしたんだが…  すまなかった

original: I won't let you defile this place, foul being!
string: この場所を穢す者は許さん！

original: Oh, good. Well then... let's head over to the portal vessel and I'll do the rest.
string: それはよかったですわ。…それなら、転移門の器の所まで行きましょう。後はわたしが

original: May Auri-El light your path.
string: アーリエルの導きを

original: You'd think a vampire would be right at home in this place. You'd be wrong. Let's just find my mother and get out of here, quickly.
string: 吸血鬼にはかえって居心地がよさそうですって？ それは誤解ですわ。とにかく早いところ母を探し出してここからおさらばしましょう

original: What must I know about being a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼として知っておくべきことは？

original: Now that the Dawnguard are back, the vampires' reign of terror is about to end.
string: ドーンガードが戻った今、吸血鬼の恐怖支配が終わるのも間近だ

original: The night belongs to us.
string: 夜は私たちのものだ

original: You've given up the powers granted to you? Get away from me. I don't want to be seen talking to you.
string: 授かった力を放棄したのか？ あっちへ行ってくれないか。お前なんかと話をしているのを見られたくない

original: We're up against vampires.
string: 敵は吸血鬼だ

original: You're welcome here, as long as you don't overfeed on the thralls.
string: 従徒達の血を吸いすぎさえしなければ、歓迎する

original: When I find you, I'm going to gut you like a deer and feast upon you blood!
string: 見つけたら鹿のようにはらわたを裂き、血をすすってやろう！

original: I've waited so long for this moment. We found it. At last.
string: この瞬間を本当に長い間待っていた。見つけたんだね。ついに

original: Come on, I think it's over here.
string: ついて来て、こっちだと思うよ

original: Let me see it. ...Huh...
string: ちょっと見せて。…ふふん…

original: I didn't even know the crests could be removed. Maybe my mother's trying to tell us something?
string: クレストが取り外せるなんて知りませんでしたわ。ひょっとして母は私達に何かを伝えようとしてるのかしら？

original: Can anything be done to help you?
string: 助けられる方法は何かないのか？

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: How'd you get caught?
string: どうして捕まったんだ？

original: Make it seem you are a member of the Dawnguard, thus sowing confusion among the herd. Wear this armor and plant this note on the victim.
string: ドーンガードのメンバーになりすまし、大衆を混乱させるんだ。この鎧を着て、それからこのメモを犠牲者の死体に仕込んでおけ

original: May Auri-El's warmth imbue your body with strength.
string: その身がアーリエルの力で満たされん事を

original: Drinking it gives you strength, but it also gets you pretty messed up... That's why we thought of putting it in the skooma.
string: 飲むと力が湧くんだけど、何しろ副作用が酷くてね… だからスクゥーマに混ぜようと考えたってわけ

original: You've got plenty of moths. What's our next move?
string: 蚕はたっぷり集まりましたわ。次はどうしますの？

original: Almost as much as we like killing them.
string: 私達が彼らを殺すのが好きなのと同じくらいに

original: Why? What do you want?
string: なぜ？ 何が目的なんだ？

original: Hmm. Cowards.
string: なんて臆病だ

original: Take care.
string: 気を付けて

original: Feel the last word of Soul Tearing within yourself: "Zol" - the unlife that results when a soul is imprisoned in dead flesh.
string: ソウル・ティアリングの最後の一語、“ゾル”を感じよ。魂が死した肉体に幽閉された時に生じる、不死の事だ

original: I've located the last known resting place of a set of ancient Amulets of Night Power.
string: 太古の夜の力のアミュレット一式が眠る最後の場所が分かったぞ

original: I was expecting someone from my family. I don't recognize you. Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
string: 家族の誰かだと思いましたの。あなたの事は知りませんわ。父に仕えてる人ですの？

original: Umm... this is the part where we usually get in the boat. You with me?
string: うーん… 普通ならボートに乗るところですわね。ついて来ますの？

original: Quite bold, to return here as a mortal. Some will take offense.
string: 定命の者としてここに戻ってくるなんて、ずいぶん大胆だね。よく思わない者も中にはいるのに

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 間違えれば… ええと。あたしが試した時の結果は知ってるよね

original: The Ideal Masters have charged him with overseeing the Keepers, and will undoubtedly intervene if you're perceived as a threat.
string: アイディール・マスターに、番人を監視する任務を負わされているの。あなたを脅威と感知すれば間違いなく邪魔に入るはずよ

original: Where did the Dawnguard come from?
string: ドーンガードの由来は？

original: I await your answer.
string: 答えはまだか

original: I keep thinking that there's got to be another way, but he'll turn on us both the moment he gets the chance.
string: 他の道があるはずだとずっと考えておりますけど、父は機会があればすぐにでもわたし達二人を襲ってきますわよ

original: Got him!
string: 倒した！

original: Keep that in mind, will you?
string: 今言った事を覚えておいてくれ

original: I see a vision before me, an image of a great bow. I know this weapon! It is Auriel's Bow!
string: 見えるぞ… 巨大な弓が見える。この武器には見覚えがあるぞ！ アーリエルの弓だ！

original: I was hoping you might want to talk about it.
string: そのことについて話せるかと思って…

original: Arvak. My horse. We came to this horrible place together. We were attacked by monsters, so I told him to run.
string: アルヴァク。俺の馬だよ。一緒にこのおぞましい土地にやってきたはいいが、化け物どもに襲われたんで、逃げろと命じたんだ

original: Something has shifted in the moons, sister.
string: 月の中で何かが変わったわ、同志よ

original: I got nothing on me. If you're looking for Skooma, head on downstairs.
string: 私は何も持ってないわ。スクゥーマがほしいなら、下へ行ってよ

original: Well, looks like some other guests have taken over since my mother left.
string: なるほど、母がいなくなったあとは、他のお客さんが引き継いだようですのね

original: Can you imagine it? A world without a sun... we would all have been doomed, vampires and men alike.
string: 想像できるかい？ 太陽のない世界なんて… そうなったら吸血鬼も人間もみんな終わりだよ

original: I was. Honestly, it took me up until now to figure out that my mother was really just as bad as he was.
string: 以前はそうでしたわ。正直に言いますけど、母が父と同じぐらい悪者だというのは今になってようやく分かった事ですのよ

original: You appear to have something on your mind. What is it?
string: 何か気になっているようね。何なの？

original: Yes. These vampires are a new threat, and a truly deadly one.
string: ええ。吸血鬼は新たな脅威であり、その影響力は致命的よ

original: I rejoice in my freedom, if only for a moment.
string: 一瞬とはいえ、この自由を喜ぶとしよう

original: Your intentions are still somewhat unclear to me.
string: あなたの意図はどこか不透明なままだわ

original: Gave me a lot of time to think, that's for sure.
string: ありあまる時間の中で、色々と考えるなどしてみた

original: Unnnnhhh...
string: ううううう…

original: Get the ingredients in the vessel and let me know when you're ready.
string: 材料を器に入れて、準備ができましたらお知らせになって

original: Living here, I have access to magic I couldn't possibly imagine before.
string: ここに住んでると、以前は想像もできなかった魔法にお目にかかれるよ

original: I do not practice my art for free, however. I doubt you can afford my services. You have the smell of the vagabond about you.
string: ただし、無料では施術しないわよ。支払えるとは思えないわ。あなたからは放浪者の匂いがするもの

original: You're a "bard" / "merchant" / "pilgrim" ? I doubt it.
string: “吟遊詩人”で“商人”で“巡礼者”なのか？ 疑わしいな

original: But if this miracle were to somehow happen, I would gladly return to Tamriel.
string: でも、もしこの奇跡が何らかの形で起こるなら、喜んでタムリエルへ戻るでしょうね

original: Surrender and give us the bow!
string: 降伏して弓を渡しなさいな！

original: I'm sorry, it's not that... it's just that I don't know who I can trust just yet.
string: ごめんなさい、他意はございませんの… 誰を信用していいのか、分からないのです

original: Florentius still worked with the Order from time to time.
string: フロレンティウスはその後も時々教団と仕事をしていた

original: My claws have rended the flesh of innumerable foes, but I have never once been felled on the field of battle.
string: 我が爪は新鮮な肉をあまた引き裂いてきたが、戦場で倒された事は一度もなかった

original: The daedric princes disgust me.
string: デイドラの王子には吐き気をおぼえる

original: That's actually only a fraction of its potential.
string: 実はそれも、弓の持つ力の一部に過ぎない

original: I can feel my strength returning each time I am set free from that prison!
string: あの監獄から解き放たれるたびに、力が戻ってくるのが分かる！

original: I'll drink you dry, mortal!
string: 一滴残らず血を吸ってやる！

original: Keep your neck covered!
string: 喉笛をさらさないように！

original: Who can?
string: 誰なら可能なのか？

original: Hey, uh, don't tell Isran I was afraid to meet him by myself. Not the best first impression for a new vampire hunter, I guess.
string: なあ、俺が1人で会うのを怖がってたって事、イスランには言わないでくれよ。吸血鬼ハンター志願者としちゃ、あんまりいい印象与えないだろうからね

original: Aye, I was. Didn't progress very far. Never did care for their attitude, acting like they're better than everyone else.
string: ええ、そうよ。大して進歩しなかった。彼らの優越感に満ちた態度がずっと嫌だったわ

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: It's good to see you again.
string: また会えて光栄だよ

original: Is that why you're free now?
string: それで自由になれたのか？

original: Ah, my rescuer! It's good to see you again.
string: おや、私の救世主じゃないか！ また会えてうれしいよ

original: We have to keep my mother alive!
string: お母様を守りますのよ！

original: Justice will prevail!
string: 正義は勝つ！

original: See if you can find a pattern in the sequence. Most of these locks have a pattern of some kind.
string: 順番にパターンがあるか確かめて。こういう鍵のほとんどは、ある種のパターンがあるよ

original: My life's work. Unraveling one of the great mysteries of the dwarves.
string: あたしの一生の仕事だよ。ドワーフの偉大な謎の一つを解明する事

original: Being selected as an offering to Molag Bal is an honor. She wouldn't have dared turn her back on that.
string: モラグ・バルへの生贄に選ばれるのは名誉なの。彼女が断れるはずもなかったでしょう

original: Wait a moment... you've brought a stranger here? Have you lost your mind?
string: ちょっと待って… よそ者をここへ連れてきたの？ 正気なの？

original: Before this, I roamed the skies above Tamriel. I desire to return there.
string: その前はタムリエルの空をさまよったものだった。戻れればと願っている

original: I've got more leads on additional Dwemer plans.
string: 新しいドゥーマーの設計図の手がかりを掴んだの

original: For those who cherish memories of loved ones, their compassion often conceals the beast.
string: 愛する者の想い出を大事にする者の思いやりこそが、化け物を隠す一助となっている事がしばしばある

original: She was so sure of what we did to my father, I couldn't help but go along with her. I never thought of the cost.
string: 父に対してわたし達がした事を、母があまりにも確信をもってやっていたから、ついていくという発想しかありませんでしたわ。代償なんて考えもしなかった

original: Deal. (Give Book)
string: 商談成立だ(本を渡す)

original: I already have the other three shards.
string: 既に残りの破片を3つとも持っている

original: Then I'll take it from your corpse! Kill her!
string: ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！ 奴の望みを絶て！

original: You've simply used Serana in an attempt to take away what should rightfully be mine.
string: 私が手にすべきものを、セラーナを利用してお前が横取りしようとしただけだろうが

original: You share her blood.
string: あなたの血を使ったらどうだ？

original: Who's your father?
string: 父親はどういう人物だ？

original: Silence, cur. No meat for you today.
string: 静かに。今日は肉をおあずけだ

original: Why her? What significance does she have? We don't have enough information.
string: なぜ彼女が？ 彼女に何の意味があるんだ？ 情報が足りないようだ

original: Can you teach me more about archery?
string: 弓術の腕を鍛えてほしい

original: You know, I've asked myself the same thing.
string: 同じ内容の自問をした事がありますわよ

original: Descend to the ground, and you can attack with your claws and feed upon your prey to regain your strength.
string: 地面に下りれば爪で攻撃し、獲物を糧にして力を取り戻す事ができる

original: Please, don't be angry with me.
string: お怒りにならないで下さい

original: Let's go have a little chat with it, shall we?
string: ちょっとおしゃべりでもしようか

original: The scent has gone cold.
string: 匂いがしないな

original: It's through this ancestral chorus that the moths tap into a form of primal augur and become a conduit for deciphering the scrolls.
string: この先人のコーラスを通じて蚕は原始の予言者となり、書の解読における架け橋としての役割を果たす

original: He rode through town not long ago with an escort of soldiers. They didn't stop, just headed south across the Dragon Bridge.
string: そいつが馬にまたがったまま、護衛の一団を引き連れて町を通り抜けていったのはそれほど前じゃない。一度も止まらずにドラゴン・ブリッジを渡って南に向かったよ

original: Only those who have suffered long can find the light within the shadows.
string: 長く苦しんだ者だけが、暗闇の中で光を見つけることができる

original: ...I won't hide down here forever... gather a few of the brethren, we'll strike out on our own...
string: …ずっとここに隠れているつもりはない… 仲間を集め、打って出てやる…

original: Any moment now, I'll find you...
string: すぐに見つけてやる…

original: Let's run as far from him as we can.
string: 彼からできるだけ遠くに逃げるんだ

original: Do you have the Elder Scroll with you?
string: 星霜の書は持っているのか？

original: How could I help?
string: どうすればいい？

original: I don't think that's something you want. You're a little... I just don't think you're the type.
string: それは望まぬ方が良いと思いますわ。あなたはちょっと… そのような感じではありませんもの

original: Which just makes you a more dangerous rival.
string: その時から、父にとってのライバルになったのですわ

original: When I rewrite those pages... they'll see what they missed.
string: すべてを書き直したら… 誰もが知らなかった事が明らかになるぞ

original: I am Jiub. Some call me Saint Jiub. Others call me Jiub the Eradicator. Perhaps you've heard of me?
string: ジウブだ。聖ジウブや、根絶者ジウブと呼ぶ者もいる。聞いた事あるよな？

original: Can't say I'm surprised.
string: 驚く事でもないがな

original: Look, this whole blood ritual is a bit personal. I'd rather not have a bigger audience than I need to.
string: 血の儀式はかなり個人的な事なのです。必要以上に見られるのは落ち着きませんわ

original: I heard you were looking for vampire hunters.
string: 吸血鬼ハンターを募集していると聞いた

original: I'm not sure it's really your place to judge me.
string: あなたにはお分かりにならないでしょう。わたしの事も

original: You're welcome.
string: どういたしまして

original: You just enjoy the fresh air and leave the rowing to me.
string: こぐのは任せて、新鮮な空気を存分に味わってくれ

original: That makes sense.
string: それなら分かりますわ

original: If you change your mind and decide to join the fight before it's too late, talk to Isran at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften.
string: もし気が変わって、手遅れにならないうちに戦いに加わりたいのであれば、リフテンの南東にあるドーンガード砦に行き、イスランと話せ

original: It was very sudden. It was almost like one day we were a normal family, and then the next I didn't know who they were.
string: 本当に突然でしたの。普通の家族が1日経つと赤の他人同士… そんな感じでしたわ

original: What do the Masters provide in return?
string: アイディール・マスターらがもたらす見返りは？

original: These people were... why would anyone want to set up camp here?
string: この人達は… どうしてここでキャンプを張ろうとしたのかしら…

original: Huh? What do you want?
string: ん？ 何しに来たんだ？

original: Beautiful. That crown... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの王冠… 非の打ちどころがない

original: Please, it's very important that I find him. (Persuade)
string: お願いだ、何としてでも彼を探し出さないと(説得)

original: Well, now that's done.
string: これで終わりですわね

original: Damn it, not again!
string: もう、またか！

original: I worry it'll never be safe to go home.
string: 二度と安全に家へ帰れないのかしら

original: I hope you've read the first volume of my epic by now.
string: 手記の第一巻、もう読んでくれただろうな

original: That's actually a matter for debate.
string: それは意見が分かれるところかもしれない

original: Idiot. You didn't really think I'd let you walk out of here either, did you? Vingalmo wants you both dead.
string: ばかね。ここから立ち去らせるはずがないでしょう？ ヴィンガルモは二人両方の死をお望みよ

original: She'll definitely know where it is, and if we're lucky, she actually has it herself.
string: 母ならそのありかを絶対に知っていますわ。もしかしたら持っているかも

original: Keep an eye out and let us know if you see any vampires.
string: 警戒して、吸血鬼がもしいたら知らせてくれ

original: The blood of a vampire... Auriel's Bow...
string: 吸血鬼の血… アーリエルの弓…

original: Climb on in the boat and get comfortable.
string: 船に乗ってくつろいでくれ

original: What sort of prophecy?
string: 予言とは？

original: There you are!
string: そこだ！

original: A vampire?
string: 吸血鬼だと？

original: We've made it to the courtyard.
string: 中庭にたどりつきましてよ

original: Dur!
string: ダー！

original: Harkon himself disbelieved in their existence, though perhaps he felt slighted they were not already in his possession and only feigns indifference.
string: ハルコン自身はその存在を疑ってるよ。でも多分、彼は指輪が自分のものではない事が気に食わないんだ。だから無関心を装ってるのさ

original: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
string: 星霜の書を取り戻したのだから、もう行くべきよ

original: You are welcome here... for now.
string: 歓迎しよう… 今のところはな

original: If I had to guess, I'd say the moment mother fled the castle, father went on a rampage.
string: わたしが予想するに、母が城から逃げ出した途端、父は乱心したのかも知れませんわ

original: Why do I even post guards? This is the headquarters of the Dawnguard. Well, it used to be, a long time ago.
string: なぜ見張りを立てる必要がある？ ここはドーンガードの本部だ。まあ、少なくとも昔はそうだった

original: Keep quiet! We're hunting vampires spotted in the area.
string: 静かに！ 近くで目撃された吸血鬼を探してる

original: We're not going to have a problem with your little... project, are we?
string: 君のちょっとした… 計画とやらはうまくいくんだろうな？

original: Our friend here has been ordered to fill the Chalice.
string: この友人が聖杯を満たすよう命じられた

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: Nobody. I just walked in here.
string: 別に誰でもない。たまたま通りがかっただけだ

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: The first lay at the end of Darkfall Passage, a cavern that represents the absence of enlightenment.
string: ダークフォール洞窟の闇が無知の象徴とするなら、さながらその出口で最初に差し込む光だ

original: This structure is known as a wayshrine. They were used for meditation and for transport when the Chantry was a place of enlightenment.
string: この建造物は祠だ。かつて礼拝所が悟りを開くための場所だった頃、瞑想や移動のために使われていたのだ

original: The Tyranny of the Sun has been broken!
string: 太陽の専制は打ち破られた！

original: I often wonder where we'd be if the Dwemer were still around. Ah well. We'll have to manage with the scraps we find.
string: 今もドゥーマーがいたらどうなってただろうってよく考えるの。まあ、手に入るガラクタで何とかやっていくしかないわね

original: That's what he's after. He wants to control the sun, have vampires control the world.
string: 父の狙いはそこなのです。太陽を操り、吸血鬼に世界全体を支配させたいと考えています

original: Do I need to read the scrolls in any particular order?
string: 特定の順番で読む必要はあるのか？

original: Now, acknowledge me as your master!
string: 主として我を受け入れよ！

original: Like I said, we were never very close. Not a lot of father-daughter bonding if you know what I mean.
string: 承知の通り、わたし達の仲がいい事なんて一度もございませんでしたわ。父と娘の間に絆なんて存在しませんでしたの。お分かりになって？

original: What's the matter with you?
string: どうかしたのか？

original: Little patience for talk? Good. Let's end this!
string: 言葉を交わすのも面倒か？ ならば決着をつけてやろう！

original: I think we both know... it's time to face my father.
string: わたし達二人とも分かっているはずでしてよ… 父と対決する時が来た事を

original: You must be clever. Find a way not to be caught or accused of murder.
string: うまくやらないとな。捕まったり、殺人の罪を負わされたりしない手を考えるんだ

original: Whether or not you've become one of us in order to survive the Soul Cairn, you're still a vampire hunter at heart.
string: ソウル・ケルンを生き延びるために私達の仲間になってもならなくても、心は今でも吸血鬼ハンターなんだわ

original: Now, you be careful with the creature.
string: やさしく扱ってやってくれ

original: Go, then, and do not forget who is your master.
string: さあ行くがいい。くれぐれも誰が主君であるのかを忘れるなよ

original: Hmm?
string: ふふん？

original: Unh!
string: あああ！

original: You're an insult to our kind.
string: お前たちの存在自体が我々への冒とくだ

original: As I've told you before I'm a Daughter of Coldharbour... offspring to Molag Bal.
string: 以前言ったように、私はコールドハーバーの娘… モラグ・バルの子孫よ

original: Watch yourself. This bear is vicious.
string: 用心しろ。実に凶暴なクマだ

original: Oh, definitely. Mother would have plenty of those materials in her laboratory, you just need to find them.
string: ええ、あるはずですわ。母はそういった素材を研究室にたっぷり蓄えていたから。探せば見つかるかと

original: Alchemy laboratory. (<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy> gold)
string: 錬金器具(<Global=HDMarkarthAlchemy> ゴールド)

original: Just a taste...
string: ちょいと味見を…

original: What's the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: If you wish to learn more about the bow, or obtain Sunhallowed Arrows for it, I'd be more than happy to help. You've but to ask.
string: あの弓の事が知りたい時や、あの弓で使う太陽神の矢がほしい時は、いつでも言ってくれ。喜んで力になろう

original: The... Empire. From Cyrodiil.
string: 帝国だ… シロディールの

original: Depends on who you ask. Some say Molag-Bal himself gave these rings to ancient powerful vampire lords. Some say that is just a myth.
string: 聞く相手によるね。モラグ・バルが大昔の有力な吸血鬼の王達に自らこの指輪を授けたという話もある。ただの神話にすぎないという人もいる

original: Yes.
string: ああ

original: I will herald the fall of eternal night!
string: 我こそは、永遠の闇の始まりを告げる者だ！

original: Something's not right.
string: 何かおかしいな

original: Totally unprepared for any real threat. And yet I was the one ridiculed for trying to be ready for anything.
string: 本物の脅威という奴にまったく備えがなかった。そして私は何かに備えようとして、周りから笑われたんだよ

original: I could see it in your eyes. You looked about a thousand leagues away.
string: 目を見れば分かりますわ。あなたはずっと遠くにいるように見えましてよ

original: Where is he now?
string: 今はどこに？

original: Serana isn't yours, she's mine!
string: セラーナはお前のものではない、私のものだ！

original: Don't make a big scene. Don't get caught.
string: 派手な事はしないで。捕まらないように

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: What do you make of all this?
string: これは、つまり…？

original: Gah...
string: ぐう…

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Then how do I even stand a chance?
string: だとすれば、自分にできるとは到底思えない

original: Only what I've heard.
string: 話に聞いた事しか知らないが

original: I wonder how many copies I'll sell? Hundreds? Thousands? I'll hire the finest bookbinder I can find.
string: 何冊売れるかな？ 百？ 千？ 最高の出版社を見つけなくては

original: That's why I'm here for the Elder Scroll.
string: だからこそ星霜の書を探しに来た

original: Gah!
string: ぐああ！

original: The last time I saw her, she said that she'd go somewhere safe... somewhere that my father would never search.
string: 母と最後に会った時は、どこか安全な場所へ行くと言っておりましたわ… 父が決して探さないような場所へ

original: Nothing like a goose chase around the whole damned province.
string: 1つの地域をあてもなく探しまわるほど素敵な事はございませんわね

original: What do you know about Auriel's Bow?
string: アーリエルの弓について何か知らないか？

original: Then it's almost over. We can finally put an end to this ridiculous prophecy.
string: となれば、もうほとんど終わりですわね。このバカげた予言にようやくピリオドを打てるのかしら

original: Come on. We can talk about this another time.
string: 行きましょう。この話はいつでもできましてよ

original: A noble cause. Arkay likes the idea very much, so I'm happy to help.
string: 高潔な動機があるんだな。アーケイも気に入るだろう。喜んで手を貸すよ

original: Sorry it had to be this way!
string: こうするしかありませんの！

original: Okay, let's head into the portal.
string: いいですわ、それでは転移門に入りましょう

original: What's this "Soul Cairn" that she mentions?
string: その“ソウル・ケルン”とやらはいったい？

original: Farewell, and good journey milady.
string: では奥様、よい旅を

original: There were splinter groups that resisted the agreement, and even some that sought alternate alliances.
string: この協定に反対する派閥もあったし、また別の派閥は他の勢力との協定も考えていた

original: Isran? Wants me?
string: イスランが？ 私に？

original: You had your chance to escape, vampire.
string: 逃げるチャンスがあったのに

original: A sword. (25 husks)
string: 剣(魂のハスク25個)

original: You dare walk away from me? In my own hall, before my own court, you dare insult me?
string: 私に背を向けるのか？ 我が城で、我が臣下の前で、私を愚弄するというのか？

original: Needless to say, we can't abide that, as it would raise general alarm amongst the herd, to say nothing of the increased feeding competition.
string: かの者が広く民衆に不安を引き起こしているのをこれ以上看過はできない。このままでは捕食の競争も激化する事になる

original: Why, are you interested in my services? I warn you, my skills do not come cheaply.
string: あら、私の仕事に興味があるの？ 言っておくけど、私の技術は安くないわよ

original: Do you ever feel lonely?
string: 孤独を感じた事はおありになって？

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Auriel's power is ours!
string: アーリエルの力が我々のものに！

original: I knew you had it in you! Arkay wasn't so sure. Between you and me, I think he didn't expect you to make it.
string: やってくれると思ってたよ！ アーケイは信じてなかったけどな。ここだけの話、彼はあんたには期待してなかったんだ

original: No... it's not working!
string: 違う… これでは駄目ですわ！

original: Thank you! It's not much, but this will help a great deal with some things I've been researching.
string: ありがとう！ 量は少なくても、ある研究には大いに役立つものなのよ

original: Good.
string: いい返事だ

original: What? Are you certain?
string: 何ですって？ 確かなの？

original: Your parents didn't make it easy on you.
string: 両親のせいで孤独好きになった？

original: Of course he will.
string: もちろん、そうですわね

original: No, there's another way. The question is, how much are you willing to risk to find Auriel's Bow?
string: いや、他にも方法はある。問題は、アーリエルの弓を見つけるために君がどれだけの危険を冒せるかだ

original: Do I need to read the scrolls in any particular order?
string: 特定の順番で読む必要はあるのか？

original: Whatever it says, it will have something that can help us stop my father.
string: 何が書かれているにせよ、父を止めるのに利用できるはずですわ

original: I do, but you can't leave that way.
string: 自分が知ってる方法ではあなたは出られない

original: Will you be a hunter, or will you be prey?
string: お前は狩人になるのか、獲物になるのか？

original: Yes, yes. Aren't you lovely looking like that. Do you mind?
string: ああ、そうとも。お前は素晴らしいよ。もういいかね？

original: Fine, fine! I can't afford to forget about this work, though. Some very interesting applications.
string: 分かった、分かったわよ！ 正直この仕事を放り出すわけにはいかないんだけどね。とても興味深い実験なのよ

original: No. I was just curious.
string: ただの興味本位だ

original: Now, what is our Lord's wish?
string: さあ、我らが主は何をお望みで？

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: I wonder if the fires are still burning in the Imperial City...
string: 帝都の火はまだ燃えてるのかしら？

original: You said you were in prison?
string: 投獄されていたと？

original: I'd also like to not have to smell troll all the time.
string: それに、ずっとトロールの悪臭をかぐのも嫌だし

original: Come on, old man. You should get some rest.
string: ご老体よ。少々休んだ方がいいぞ

original: Well, that's certainly a line of thinking I can relate to.
string: その事については、考えてる事があるの

original: It's really too bad, you know. The little accident you had here, completely unexpected...
string: 本当に残念ね。ここで起きた、完全に予想外のささいな出来事が…

original: Even with these vampires gone, the fight isn't completely over. Once we're settled back in at the fort, there will be more work to do.
string: 吸血鬼どもがいなくなっても戦いは続く。砦に戻ったら、仕事が山ほど待っているぞ

original: Fortunately, you seem to have already killed the Keepers maintaining the barrier around these ruins.
string: 幸い、この遺跡を囲む障壁を守る番人をすでに始末してくれたようね

original: I hear you're doing a lot of the work in tracking down these vampires. If there's anything I can do to help, let me know.
string: 吸血鬼達の追跡にずいぶん活躍しているらしいわね。何か手伝える事があれば知らせてちょうだい

original: Excuse me, but I must address the court.
string: 後にしろ。臣下達に下達をせねばならんのでな

original: Orthjolf, I'm surprised!
string: オースユルフ、驚いたよ！

original: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
string: ヒジェリム、ウィンドヘルムの家だ

original: Got it.
string: よしなに

original: I wanted to thank you for getting me this far. But after we get in there, I'm going to go my own way for a while.
string: ここまで連れて来てくれてありがとう。でも中に入ったら、わたしはしばらく自分の道を進む事にいたしますわ

original: You dare defy me?
string: 私に歯向かうつもりか？

original: Centuries of preparation will not fall to ruin because of you!
string: 何世紀もかけたこの計画を、貴様ごときに潰させはしない！

original: Well, I hate to see it go, but what am I gonna do with it here anyway?
string: 本当は手放したくないけど、ここでそんなもの持っててもしょうがないしな

original: Still, it's my duty to help protect Skyrim as much as any Nord's, don't you think?
string: それでも他のノルド達と同じように、私にもスカイリムの防衛に協力する義務があるわ。そう思わない？

original: You want to find him, try talking to anyone who'd meet a traveler. Innkeepers and carriage drivers in the big cities maybe. But you're on your own.
string: 彼を見つけたいなら、旅人を相手にする連中をあたればいい。大きな街の宿屋の主人とか、馬車の御者とか… 君自身の足でこなすんだ

original: How did you become imprisoned here?
string: どうしてここに閉じ込められてしまったのか？

original: I'm not going to do that for you.
string: あなたの代わりにして差し上げるつもりはありませんわ

original: Once we're inside, just keep quiet for a bit. Let me take the lead.
string: 中に入ったら、しばらく大人しくしていて。段取りはわたしが

original: Ah. Been working more on his secret hideout, has he? It'll be interesting to see how much progress he's made.
string: ああ、ずっと秘密の隠れ家で仕事してたのね？ どれだけ進んだか、見るのが楽しみだわ

original: Quite a place, huh? Was even more impressive before it all fell to pieces.
string: すごい場所だろう？ 崩壊する前はもっと素晴らしかったんだ

original: Why would a necromancer want to deal with them?
string: 死霊術師が彼らと取引したがる理由は？

original: You're all talk.
string: 口先だけですのね

original: That's not really your business.
string: あんたには関係のないことだ

original: If you can prove you're reliable, maybe you can join the Dawnguard. We have ways of dealing with vampires.
string: 君が頼りになると証明されたら、ドーンガードに参加してもいい。我々は吸血鬼の扱いに慣れている

original: How many of you are there?!
string: 一体何人おりますの！？

original: I can smell your blood!
string: お前の血の匂いがするわ！

original: You'll also want to find Gunmar. Big brute of a Nord, hates vampires almost as much as I do.
string: ガンマーも見つけた方がいいな。冷酷なノルドの巨漢で、私と同じぐらい吸血鬼を憎んでいる

original: That something... was probably me.
string: その何かとは… おそらくわたし自身の事ですわね

original: Hmph... not very impressive, is it?
string: ふうん… 大した事ないじゃない

original: You've already seen my father's obsession. My mother's not a whole lot better, but you'll see that soon enough.
string: 父の強迫観念は、その目でご覧になったでしょう。母の方だって、それと同じくらいひどいものでしたわ。もうすぐお分かりになりますわよ

original: Good, let's get inside there. The sun is starting to get to me.
string: よかった。中に入りましょう。もう陽の光がそこまで来ていますわ

original: That was a dark time in my life. I did a lot of things I ended up regretting.
string: 人生最悪の時期だった。後悔しか残らない事をいくつもしでかしたもんだよ

original: Well, I don't take just anyone into the secret parts of the place I grew up.
string: わたしが育ったところの秘密の場所には、誰でも入れるわけではございませんの

original: At least the pain is gone...
string: 少なくとも、苦痛はもう感じない…

original: If Isran hadn't left the Order, this could've been our home.
string: イスランが教団から抜けていなければ、ここが家になっていたかも知れない

original: Hiding won't help you!
string: 隠れてもどうにもならんぞ！

original: Grrah!
string: グラァー！

original: Let's head back up there and see if we can read the scrolls.
string: あそこに戻って、書が読めるかどうか確かめましょう

original: Argh!
string: あ痛っ！

original: It sounds like they were both being selfish.
string: どちらも身勝手だったみたいだな

original: I'm doing my best to not think of him as my father anymore.
string: 彼はもう父親ではない、そう思うので精一杯ですのよ

original: I'm only here to kill you.
string: お前に引導を渡しに来ただけだ

original: Watch out!
string: 気をつけて！

original: My dear Salonia, how are you?
string: 愛しのサロニア、ご機嫌いかがかな？

original: Arrggh!
string: ああああ！

original: I just don't feel comfortable sharing that moment with a total stranger, I'm sorry.
string: 赤の他人にその場を見られるのはどうも落ち着きませんの

original: Hey, so... before we go in there...
string: 中に入る前に言っておきたい事があるのですが…

original: Because unlike her, I'm not afraid of you. Not anymore.
string: わたしはお母様とは違う。もうお父様など恐れませんわ

original: She had to be up to something in that garden. I'm hoping it's a clue that will tell us where she went.
string: 母はあの庭で何かをしていたはずですわ。それが母の居場所を見つける手掛かりになればいいですわね

original: Her name was Valerica. She has been gone for so long now, I can only assume she has left this world, one way or another.
string: 名はヴァレリカだ。最後に見てからかなりの時間が経ったが、何らかの形でこの世を離れたのだろうな

original: I know that in my head. But I just can't help feeling bad about... the way things are.
string: 頭ではその事が分かっておりますわ。ですが心はとめどなくて… 現状を嘆いてしまいますのよ

original: The screams... they pierce my mind. I can't stand it!
string: あの叫び声… 心を引き裂くようだ。耐えられない！

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Hide if you wish. It's only a matter of time.
string: 好きなだけ隠れるがいい。すぐに見つけてやる

original: Certainly. Where can I find this castle?
string: もちろんです。その城はどこにあるのですか？

original: I would never harm Serana. She's too important to me.
string: 大事なセラーナを、傷つけなどしない

original: I think perhaps you should speak to Isran. You don't look... well.
string: イスランと話した方がいいぞ。なんだか具合が悪そうだ

original: I guess so.
string: そうかも知れませんわね

original: Time is almost irrelevant to the Ideal Masters.
string: アイディール・マスターにとって、時間はほぼ無意味よ

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of bandits, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 野蛮な血の者の一人が山賊の一団に加わった。おそらく彼ら全員に血の力を授けるのが目的だ

original: They're bound to bring me fortune and glory.
string: 持っていれば富と栄光が舞い込んでくるだろう

original: Do you still want to come with me?
string: まだ一緒に来る気はあるか？

original: Sorine, you'll find room to start your tinkering on that crossbow design you've been working on.
string: ソリーヌ、懸案中のクロスボウのデザインだが、その作業用のスペースを用意しよう

original: Aha... and now you die.
string: そこにいたのか… さあ、覚悟しろ

original: But a kill is a kill, and it'll send a message to the Dawnguard, if not exactly the one we wanted.
string: でも殺しは殺し、そしてドーンガードに意図は伝わる。正確に望み通りではないとしても

original: Come to visit this lost soul again?
string: この迷える魂に、まだ何か用か？

original: You'll need to trust me. The family is safer this way.
string: 信じてほしい。こうした方が家族は安全だ

original: Blood of the sick. Blood of the weak. Blood of the unsuspecting noble lord. Savor each flavor. Unsuspecting, delicious prey.
string: 病人の血。弱者の血。無防備な貴族の血。それぞれの味を楽しむわ。疑う事を知らない、美味な獲物

original: Are you prepared to honor the mantras of Auri-El and fill your vessel with His enlightenment?
string: アーリエルの真言を受ける光栄に浴し、その水差しを悟りの水で満たすか？

original: How dare you! I gave up everything I cared about to protect you from that fanatic you call a father!
string: よくもそんな事を！ あなたが父と呼ぶ狂信者から守るために、すべてを諦めたのよ！

original: That's why our leader Isran is reestablishing the Dawnguard. Real, serious vampire hunters.
string: ゆえに我らの長であるイスランが、本格的な吸血鬼ハンターの組織であるドーンガードを再興させつつある

original: What's that? I can feel some kind of power from it...
string: あれは何ですの？ ある種の力を感じますわ…

original: Dur...
string: ダー…

original: Change it? I can remake your face, if that's what you desire.
string: 変えるの？ お望みなら、あなたの顔を作り直せるわよ

original: You are testing my patience.
string: いつまで待たせる気だ？

original: When will you fools learn? The night is ours!
string: 何度言えば分かる？ 夜は我々のものだ！

original: Uh, crossbow? I've never...
string: クロスボウかい？ 俺なんか一度も…

original: I will be happy to assist you with your Elder Scroll. Just tell me where I need to go.
string: 星霜の書の事なら喜んで協力するよ。行くべき場所があればどこだろうと言ってくれ

original: I'd like to treat some arrows with your blood.
string: 矢を処理するのに血を提供してほしい

original: I warned them. I knew something like this would happen eventually. But they didn't listen, and look where it's gotten them.
string: 彼らには警告したんだ。今回のような事態がいつか起こる事は分かっていたからな。でも彼らは警告に耳を傾けなかった。そしてご覧の有り様だよ

original: If there's anything at all I can help you with, please ask.
string: 何かできる事があれば言ってくれ

original: Where is this "Darkfall Cave?"
string: その“ダークフォール洞窟”はどこにありますの？

original: I'm no so easily coerced. I've got my eye on you. Try anything, and you will be the one who regrets it.
string: 脅迫は無駄だ。隙は見せない。変な真似をしたら、後悔することになるぞ

original: What are you doing here?
string: ここで何をしてるんだ？

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をしてるんだ？

original: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
string: ソウル・ケルンを旅した事で、あなたの身体はかの地に同調したの

original: While you're thinking about it, the vampires will be gathering strength in the shadows, waiting to strike.
string: 君がそれについて考えている間に、吸血鬼達は闇の中で力を蓄え、襲撃の時を待っている事だろう

original: Are there other Vigilants out there?
string: 他にも番人はいるのか？

original: Ah, yes, the Elder Scroll! I admit, I'm looking forward to this.
string: ああ、星霜の書ですね！ 正直言って、とても楽しみですよ

original: There was a time when I called Tamriel my home, but those days have long since passed.
string: タムリエルを故郷としていた頃もあったが、遥か昔の事だ…

original: I murdered others for money. And before you think I belonged to some romantic or secretive guild, think again.
string: 金のために人も殺った。何かロマンチックな秘密結社の類に属していたと思うなら、それは大間違い

original: Well, you could waste a lot of time trying to figure out our next move, or you could let me help.
string: 次にどうすべきかを決めるのに多大な時間を浪費してもいいでしょうし、わたしの助言に耳を貸すのもよくてよ

original: It's over. He's dead, and the prophecy dies with him.
string: 終わったな。奴は息絶え、予言も潰えるだろう

original: I'd rather not be here either, but I needed to talk to you.
string: わたしもここに来たくはなかったのですが、話したい事がありまして

original: Prison? You mean the Soul Cairn?
string: 監獄？ ソウル・ケルンのことか？

original: We have Auriel's Bow. We can't lose... right?
string: 私達はアーリエルの弓を持ってる。失うわけにはいかない… 分かった？

original: Once the Initiate completed his mantras, he'd dip a ceremonial ewer in the basin at the wayshrine's center and proceed to the next wayshrine.
string: 新人は真言を得た後、祠の中央にある水瓶に水差しを浸し、次の祠へ向かうという儀式を行っていた

original: I have lots of friends.
string: 友達が大勢いる

original: I've destroyed the <Alias=Vampire> at <Alias=Dungeon>.
string: <Alias=Dungeon>の<Alias=Vampire>を倒した

original: You can't hide, father!
string: 隠れても無駄ですわ、お父様！

original: They should be among our kind, not laying about unguarded for mortals to find.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。定命の者達の目につかないようにしっかり保管されているよ

original: And might I add, this is a remarkable fortress. I have colleagues back home that would love to study this place in detail.
string: それにしても、ここは素晴らしい砦だね。故郷の仲間にも是非ともじっくり見せてやりたいよ

original: With any luck he'll bleed to death before anyone notices. A cold corpse will say what we want better than a warm one.
string: うまくいけば誰かが気づく前に彼は出血多量で死ぬ。温かい死体より冷たい死体の方が私達の言いたい事が伝わるわ

original: Like Serana, I am a Daughter of Coldharbour, an vampire offspring of Molag Bal.
string: セラーナと同じく、私もコールドハーバーの娘。モラグ・バルの吸血鬼の子孫よ

original: I'll return to Castle Volkihar as soon as I'm finished gathering my things.
string: 荷物をまとめ終わったらすぐに、ヴォルキハル城へ戻るわ

original: How did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうやってドーンガードの一員に？

original: Lead on.
string: 案内して下さいましね

original: How long would they have to do that?
string: 彼らはいつまであんな事を続けなければなりませんの？

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. Stand aside!
string: 悪いけど、ドーンガードのための大事な仕事があるの。邪魔しないで！

original: Your mother maintained quite a laboratory.
string: 彼女の研究室は、かなり本格的みたいだ

original: I wonder if my family misses me? I wonder if they're still alive. How much time has passed?
string: 家族は心配してるかな？ それ以前に、生きてるのかな。一体どれほどの時間が経ったんだ？

original: Bleed Skyrim dry.
string: スカイリムの血を吸いつくすのよ

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: It was no mere chance that brought you to me. It was destiny.
string: お前がここに現れたのは偶然ではない、運命だ

original: Well, some necromancers believe they are the crystalline structures dotting the Soul Cairn.
string: まあ、実力のある死霊術師の中には、彼らはソウル・ケルンに点状に存在する結晶構造体だと信じている者もいるけど

original: There must be something you want.
string: 何かしら、欲しいものがあるはずだ

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: This is no ruse. I want to keep her safe.
string: だますつもりはない。彼女を守りたいだけだ

original: I've located one of the lost ancient Amulets of Night Power.
string: 太古の夜の力のアミュレットのひとつがどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: Now, let's get you the Elder Scroll and you can be on your way.
string: さあ、あなたが出発できるよう星霜の書を手に入れましょう

original: Return to me when your part is done. And may you enjoy your second nuptials.
string: やるべき事が済んだら戻ってきてくれ。素敵な2度目の結婚式になりますよう

original: This is, or was, the epicenter of our religion. Most of the snow elf people worshipped Auri-El.
string: ここは我らの信仰の中心地だった。ほとんどのスノーエルフはアーリエルを信じていたのだ

original: The Vigilants of Stendarr, in over their heads. What a surprise.
string: ステンダールの番人が手をこまねいている。これは驚きだな

original: You get yourself to Morthal at once. Speak with Falion. He'll help you. But go do it now.
string: すぐにモーサルに向かって、ファリオンと話しなさい。助けてくれるわ。でも急いでね

original: I'd very much like to have those scrolls. Someday I may be able to return them to their rightful place in the Imperial City.
string: 星霜の書を是非とも授かりたいね。帝都の本来あるべき場所にそれを戻す日もいつか来るだろう

original: Your shield... gods, it's made of Aetherium! Pure Aetherium!
string: お前の盾は… 何てこった。エセリウム製じゃないか！ 正真正銘のエセリウムだ！

original: I heard you mention Serana's mother. What happened to her?
string: 話に出てきたセラーナの母親はどうなったのか？

original: It's true for most of my brothers in the order as well. We don't really know where the scrolls came from or who wrote them.
string: 聖蚕会の仲間達も同様だ。書がどこの誰によって書かれたのか、我々の中で知っている者はいないよ

original: If you're buying, go on in. Otherwise, shove off.
string: 買い物に来たなら入って。それ以外なら、さっさと消えて

original: Having trouble finding those ingredients?
string: 材料がなかなか見つかりませんの？

original: What about... wait. Are you? Were you the one the Greybeards were calling?
string: そうだなあ… ちょっと待った。もしや、グレイビアード達が呼んでいたのはお前だったのか？

original: I'm putting a lot of faith in you. Don't let me down.
string: とても信頼しているのよ。失望させないで

original: Yes, Feran. Of course. I'll see to it.
string: はい、フェラン。やっておきます

original: Like she didn't want to just stop my father... she wanted to stick it to him, too.
string: 父を止めるだけでは飽き足りず、思い知らせてやりたかったかのような…

original: All right. Good luck.
string: 分かった。がんばってね

original: And it seems we have a problem.
string: 我々は問題を抱えているようだな

original: It's symbolic. I don't expect you to understand.
string: 象徴を理解できなくても無理はない

original: You've reached the Wayshrine of Learning, Initiate.
string: この学びの祠へようこそ、新人よ

original: Hhyyaarrggh!
string: はああー！

original: Help!
string: 助けて！

original: Nuh...
string: ぬう…

original: That's it.
string: そうだ

original: My love! I knew you'd come for me! I just knew it!
string: 愛しの君よ！ やっぱり来てくれたな！ 思った通りだ！

original: You're awfully... mature for your age.
string: その年にしてはずいぶん… ませているな

original: I suspect now it was Brother Adalvald's journals they were after. He was obsessed with ancient vampire artifacts and burial sites.
string: どうやら連中はアダルヴァルド修道士の日記を狙っていたようだ。奴は太古の吸血鬼の秘宝や埋葬場所の研究に熱中していた

original: Yes… master…
string: はい… ご主人様…

original: Why? What's happened?
string: どうして？ 何があった？

original: Fine, here you are. (4000 gold)
string: いいだろう、払おう(4000ゴールド)

original: I hope we can go home soon. I don't like it here.
string: 早く家に帰れるといいけど。ここは嫌いよ

original: Leave it to my mother... always smarter than I gave her credit for.
string: それは母の手に委ねましょう… 母はいつもわたしが思うよりも賢明でしたわ

original: May not look like much, but my boat can get you there faster than walking.
string: 大した船には見えないだろうが、歩いていくよりは早いぜ

original: To what end?
string: 何のために？

original: That must be it. Fort Dawnguard... Wow. Bigger than I expected.
string: きっとあれがドーンガード砦だよ… うわあ、思ってたより大きいなあ

original: Arkay, we're going to need your help more than ever.
string: アーケイ、これまでにないほど、あなたの力が必要になりそう

original: I didn't even think you knew what a book was, my brutish friend.
string: 野蛮な君が本というものを知ってるとはまさに意外だな

original: Both of you were obsessed with your own paths. Your motivations might have been different, but in the end, I'm still just a pawn to you, too.
string: お父様もお母様も自分の道を譲らなかった。理由はたぶんそれぞれ違っていたのでしょうけど、結局は二人ともわたしをただの道具としか見ておりませんのよ

original: You made it! And you've brought the shards!
string: やったね！ 破片を持ってきてくれたんだ！

original: How did you know?
string: どうしてそれを？

original: Are you alright?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: Well, go on! What are you waiting for?
string: さあ、ほら！ 何を待っているの？

original: Didn't I tell you to step forward? Hmm... Farm boy, eh? What's your weapon?
string: 前に出ろと言わなかったか？ ふむ… 農民の子か？ お前の武器は何だ？

original: Therefore, when an arrow is loosed from the bow, it produces a magical effect very similar to being burned by fire.
string: 放たれる矢には魔力が宿り、当ったものは炎に包まれたようになる

original: Have my companions made you feel welcome?
string: 仲間たちが歓迎してくれたか？

original: So, the deed has been done. My brother is dead.
string: 為すべき事は為され、我が兄弟は死んだ

original: Well, well. I haven't seen one of these beauties in a long time. A rare find in the original falmer language.
string: これはこれは。目にするのはずいぶん久しぶりだな、この種の掘り出し物は。ファルメルの原語で書かれた、珍しい一品だ

original: I'll get rough with you if I have to.
string: 必要ならば実力行使もいとわない

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: I'm not happy about this. He... he was still my father. But I suppose my father really died a long time ago.
string: これが嬉しいものですか。あの人が父親だった事に変わりはありませんもの。ですが、お父様はずっと前に死んでいたのだと思いますのよ

original: Tolan, tell her about, what was it, Dimhollow?
string: トラン、彼女にあの事を教えてやれ。あの… ディムホロウだったかな？

original: I'll be here.
string: ここで待っておりますわ

original: Gaaahh...
string: ぐうう…

original: And what exactly are you going to pay me with? Take a look around. Gold doesn't exactly win you any friends around here.
string: 支払いはどうやって？ 周りを見ろよ。この辺じゃあゴールドを持っててもそんなに意味はないぞ

original: What are you doing?
string: 何をしてるんだ？

original: I've already got an animal with me, maybe next time.
string: もう動物を連れているので、またいつかな

original: He took the road southwest out of town, and said he was going to be crossing over the Dragon Bridge. That's all that he told me. I hope it helps.
string: そいつは町を出て南西に向かったよ。ドラゴン・ブリッジを渡ると言ってな。それ以上の事は教えてくれなかった。お役に立てたならいいが
