original: But... with everything in my past, I don't think I could bring myself to go into a temple and ask for that kind of blessing.
string: でも… 自分の過去の事を考えると、聖堂に入って祝福を願うなんて、できそうもありませんわ

original: An axe imbued with magic fueled by the destruction of the unholy. With every victorious blow against an undead creature, its power grows.
string: この斧にかけられた魔法は、邪悪なものを破壊する事でその強さを増す。アンデッドに打撃を加えるたびに、斧は強くなっていく

original: In an age long forgotten to history, I ruled as a mighty king. My domain was vast, my riches endless and my power infinite.
string: 歴史上忘れられてしまった遥か昔、私は強大な王として君臨していた。領土は広く、富は際限なく、権力は無限とすら言えた

original: That... has to be the place. I've never seen a building like that before.
string: きっと… あれがそうですわ。あんな建物は見た事がありませんもの

original: The Ideal Masters unleashed their Keepers and sent them to destroy me.
string: アイディール・マスターは番人を解き放ち、私を殺すために送り込んだ

original: You could be your own person again.
string: 自分の人生を取り戻せるかもな

original: But of course, those days are gone now.
string: だがそれも、今や過去の事となってしまった

original: May the light of Auri-El cleanse your soul!
string: アーリエルの光で罪を洗い流すがいい！

original: This has gone on long enough.
string: 今まで長かった

original: And how exactly do you plan on stopping him?
string: では、厳密にはどうやって彼を止めるつもり？

original: That sounds pretty lonely.
string: それは孤独だったろうな

original: Now a voice whispers, saying "Among the night's children, a dread lord will rise."
string: 声がささやく… 「夜の子供達の中から、ドレッド・ロードが現れる」

original: But this is something different. I'd say do what she wants. Take her home, and see who else is in this castle.
string: でもそういうわけにもいかないから、好きにさせてやろう。彼女を連れて帰って、この城に他の誰かがいるのかを探ってみようか

original: I feed when I'm hungry, I sleep when I'm tired, and I kill whenever I'm in the mood. Those are the things that are important to me.
string: 空腹な時に食べ、疲れれば眠り、殺したい気分の時にはいつでも殺す。それが私にとって重要な事

original: I know this isn't an easy choice. Take your time.
string: おいそれと決められる話ではありませんわね。じっくり考えるのがよろしくてよ

original: But I think I turned out ok.
string: でも今は大丈夫ですわ

original: I'll meet you there.
string: 現地で待ち合わせよう

original: After I was freed from prison, I decided to turn my life around. Give something back to the people of Morrowind.
string: 牢屋を出てから、人生を変えようと思い立ったんだ。モロウウィンドの人々のためになる事がしたくてね

original: I'll try my luck elsewhere.
string: 他を当たってみよう

original: You're lucky Isran hasn't killed you outright. Get cured while you can.
string: イスランにとどめを刺されずにすんで幸運だったな。早く治療した方がいい

original: Talk to Serana, and decide which you want to be.
string: セラーナと話して、どちらになりたいか決めなさい

original: We need to put a damper on their efforts and give those trouble makers something to worry about other than harassing our interests.
string: 奴らの努力に水を差さねばならん。あの厄介者達に悩みの種を植えつけて、我々の利益を害するのをやめさせるんだ

original: Trust me. I lived in that castle for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: お任せあれ。あの城には長い間住んでいましたから、あそこの事なら隅から隅まで知っていますの

original: And with that... it's done. No one could possibly deny what we've found now.
string: そしてこれで… 完了だ。もうあたし達が見つけたものを否定できる奴なんていない

original: Done and done.
string: 片付きましてよ

original: Well, we've got that knife. There has to be a use for it.
string: さあ、ナイフは手に入りましたわ。あとはその使い道ですわね

original: I'm not the most powerful of vampires, but I'm good with a hammer. See for yourself.
string: 最強の吸血鬼ではなくとも、鎚の扱いはうまいのよ。自分の目で確かめて

original: Son of a...
string: こんの…

original: Let's go. My mother must be waiting on the other side of that thing.
string: 行きましょう。母があの向こう側で待っているに違いありませんわ

original: I'll take you to the monster you're hunting. (Persuade)
string: 狙っている怪物のところに案内しよう(説得)

original: My apologies. I shall not trouble you with it again.
string: すまなかった。二度とこの件では煩わせない

original: Running will warm your blood nicely.
string: 逃げれば血が温まって飲みごろになる

original: Now tell me, whom do you represent, and what do you want with me?
string: さて、教えてくれ。君は誰の使いで私に何の用があるんだ？

original: I imagine you know why we're here.
string: ここに来た理由は、言うまでもないんだろうな

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: That was close...
string: 危なかった…

original: This is your home?
string: これが家なのか？

original: Suit yourself.
string: どうぞよしなに

original: Arkay's never clear on life and death. Is she still alive? There's always hope...
string: アーケイは生や死をはっきり言わない。彼女は生きてるのか？ まだ希望はあるはずだ…

original: She doesn't seem too fond of him.
string: 母親が父親を好きだったようには聞こえないな

original: You managed to destroy all three Keepers? Very impressive.
string: 三人の番人をすべて倒したの？ 本当に見事だわ

original: The Dawnguard tried to stop me, but they posed no threat.
string: ドーンガードが止めようとしてきたが、問題にならなかった

original: This won't be easy. But we can handle it.
string: 簡単ではなくてよ。けれどもわたし達ならやれますわ

original: Yyyaaaarrgghh!
string: いやあああるぐぐぐ！

original: I... I feel... different. What happened?
string: 違う… 感じがする。何が起きた？

original: Who are you?
string: お前は誰だ？

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: And you carried out my instructions to kill the victim in view of others and while wearing the Dawnguard uniform. Very good.
string: ちゃんと指示を守って、ドーンガードの制服を着て人目につくところで殺したんだな。いいぞ

original: Fine, suit yourself.
string: そう、ご自由に

original: ...she said I'd forget, and usually I do, but sometimes... still remember their faces, their pleading...
string: …どうせ忘れると彼女は言ったわ。大抵はそうだけど… 忘れられない時もある。命乞いをする彼らの顔がね…

original: I need you to do something.
string: 手伝ってもらおうかな

original: Well, that's the thing. We don't know where he is. Haven't seen him in years.
string: それが問題なの。彼の居場所は分からないわ。もう何年も、姿を見てないの

original: You were in the Companions?
string: 同胞団の一員だったのか？

original: I understand. Take your time.
string: 分かりますわ。焦る必要はなくてよ

original: Seems that I'm the only of my kind here. Suppose I shouldn't be surprised.
string: 種族うちでここにいるのは私だけみたいね。別に驚く事でもないけど

original: I don't want to either, but you're going to have to jump. I'll be... right behind you. Above you. Just go.
string: わたしだっていやですけど、跳ぶしかありませんわ。わたしは… すぐ後ろに続きましてよ。後ろと言っても上の事ですわね。さあ、お先にどうぞ

original: You know you can't win, so all you can do is hide...
string: 勝ち目がない以上、隠れるしかないのだろう…？

original: Wait...
string: お待ちになって…

original: Why did you join the Dawnguard?
string: どうしてドーンガードの一員に？

original: Where do you want to go?
string: どこに行きたいんだ？

original: Find Lord Harkon. Let him know the time of the prophecy is at hand.
string: ハルコン卿を見つけろ。予言の時が間近だと知らせるのだ

original: I'll see you again. Soon.
string: また、近いうちに会いましょう

original: There's no blood here for you.
string: ここにはお前のぶんの血はないぞ

original: The clouds, the sky... it's all wrong. Everything's wrong.
string: あの雲も、空も… 何もかも、全部がおかしい

original: You want to take revenge... on a god?
string: 復讐がお望みなのかしら… 神に対して？

original: What is it now?
string: 今度は何？

original: I guess you'll never get to find out.
string: それは一生分からないかも知れませんわ

original: That's right. You've seen him?
string: その通り。見かけたのか？

original: You're no match for me!
string: 貴様などには負けん！

original: The air, the ground... this is all wrong.
string: 空気も、地面も… 何もかも間違ってますわ

original: Unf!
string: フン！

original: It's ironic that we're "helping" these priests.
string: 司祭たちに“協力している”のは皮肉な話だ

original: Sure. Here you go. Can't understand a word of it, maybe it will do you some good.
string: いいよ。ほらどうぞ。何が書いてあるのかさっぱり分からんが、君には価値があるんだろうね

original: Lots of theories. Some say they feed on them like I feed on blood.
string: 仮説は色々ありますわね。わたしが血をほっするように彼らはそれをほっすると言う人もおりますわ

original: After everything we've been through, it had damn well better work.
string: ずいぶん大変な思いをしたのですから、うまくいってもらわないと困りますわ

original: My traitor wife stole one of them away and then disappeared.
string: 妻が私を裏切り、その一つを盗み出して行方をくらました

original: How could they trick me like this? I was one of Reman's court wizards!
string: あんな奴らに騙されるとは思わなかった。レマンの王宮魔術師である、この私が！

original: I've killed the Dawnguard masquerading as a <Alias=Target>.
string: <Alias=Target>になりすましていたドーンガードを始末した

original: The prophecy said that vampires would no longer need to fear the sun. For someone who fancied himself as vampire royalty, that's pretty seductive.
string: 予言には、吸血鬼達が太陽を恐れなくてもよくなると書かれていたのです。吸血鬼の王を自称する者にはかなり魅力的な内容でしょうね

original: You'll figure something out. We must be vigilant and self sufficient if we are to defeat these monsters.
string: 何か手があるはずだ。あの化け物どもに勝つには用心深く行動し、我々だけでどうにかする必要がある

original: Where are you headed?
string: どこへ向かう？

original: That doesn't exactly make me want to open up.
string: 信用したくはなりませんわね

original: Perhaps if he had spent more time with us, he would have recognized the beauty for himself.
string: もっとわたし達と一緒に過ごしていれば、その美しさを自分で理解できたでしょうに…

original: And an assault on the Betrayed guarding the Inner Sanctum would only end with my death.
string: それに、裏切られし者が守る最奥聖域に攻め込んだところで、無駄死にするだけだ

original: Anything good?
string: いいものはありまして？

original: Wait, stop! I yield!
string: おい、やめてくれ！ 降参だ！

original: That's why we're headed there?
string: それが、そこに向かっている理由なのか？

original: Very good. That should, for a time, direct the people's anger towards the Dawnguard and away from us.
string: よし。これでしばらく人々の怒りの目はこちらから離れてドーンガードに向けられるだろう

original: Trust me. I lived here for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
string: お任せあれ。長い間住んでいましたからここの事なら隅から隅まで知っていますの

original: Are you going to help?
string: 手を貸してくれるか？

original: Is your... pet keeping you entertained?
string: お前は… そのペットで満足しているのか？

original: Assuming you have the smithing skills, you should be able to make this yourself at Gunmar's forge. Either way, I'll have some for sale soon.
string: 鍛冶の技術を持ってるなら、ガンマーの鍛冶場で自分で造れるはずよ。近いうちに、商品としても売り出すつもりだけど

original: Then behold Auri-El's gift, my child. May it light your path as you seek tranquility within the Inner Sanctum.
string: では、アーリエルの祝福を受けるがいい。最奥聖域へ導く光が、汝と共にあるように

original: We have to find the other pieces, of course. There should be, hmm... three more. One for each of the four cities that worked on the Forge.
string: もちろん、他の部分を見つけないと。そうだね、ふふん… あと3つだよ。鋳造器具を手掛けた4つの街それぞれに一つずつ

original: The trolls will serve us well, I think.
string: トロールらが役立ちそうだな

original: I'm still hard at work on the second volume of my epic.
string: 我が冒険物語の第二巻の執筆で忙しいんだ

original: I have an alternative for you, if you'd be interested.
string: よかったら代案を教えてあげよう

original: Arvak...You saved him! His soul is free, I can feel it!
string: あんたはアルヴァクを救ってくれた！ あいつの魂は自由だ！

original: What can it do?
string: 具体的な効果は？

original: Never... not yet...
string: ちっとも… 怖くなんか…

original: This will put my father in a great mood. You should come enjoy it while it lasts.
string: これで父は上機嫌になるはずよ。曇らないうちが花だけど

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: Kill their leader before it has a chance to escape!
string: リーダーを殺すのよ、逃げる機会を与えちゃ駄目！

original: I'm ready to learn about my new powers.
string: 新たな力について知りたい

original: What exactly are you planning to do to these vampires?
string: 吸血鬼らをどうするつもりで？

original: A Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶？

original: Finally, a trace of honesty in our little conversation.
string: ようやく会話に誠実さの片鱗が見えたな

original: Destroying the head vampire is usually sufficient to scatter its minions, though it's best to destroy every last one of them.
string: 大抵は頭目格の吸血鬼を倒せば手下どもは四散するが、最後の1体まで根絶やしにするのが最善ではある

original: Might need a little convincing, but she should.
string: 多少説得は必要だが、彼女にはそうすべきだな

original: If? I've been assuming that's where all this is going.
string: もし？ 全部がそういうものだと思っておりましたわ

original: Yes, of course.
string: ええ、もちろん

original: Yes. I once practiced my art in the salons and manors of Tamriel's great and good. Now, the scum of Skyrim are my only clients.
string: ええ。かつてはタムリエルの名士達のサロンや邸宅で施術していたわ。今では、スカイリムのクズが唯一の顧客よ

original: And you were caught in the middle.
string: 間に挟まれてしまったと

original: I was sent to retrieve something from this cave.
string: この洞窟から何かを持ち帰るように言われた

original: Congratulations. And... thanks, Katria.
string: おめでとう… そしてありがとう、カトリア

original: I was about to suggest that very thing. Yes, you most certainly deserve a reward.
string: 今まさにその話をするところだった。そうとも、当然ほうびをとらせるべきだ

original: I don't think anyone's ever met the Ideal Masters. I'm not even sure anyone knows what they look like.
string: アイディール・マスターに会った人なんていないと思いますわ。彼らがどんな姿なのかさえ定かではありませんのに

original: What are you talking about?
string: 何の話をしてるんだ？

original: Keep your guard up.
string: 気を抜かない事ね

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: Solitude. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ソリチュード(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: Yes, you've explained yourself. I'm supposed to just throw myself in front of you all and offer protection, am I?
string: ああ、言いたい事は分かった。君達みんなの前に身を投げ出して、守ってくれというわけだな？

original: Over here!
string: こっちだよ！

original: That's too bad.
string: それは残念ですわね

original: Then I'll take it from your corpse! Kill him!
string: ならお前の死体から奪ってやる！ 奴の望みを絶て！

original: Nothing, until you choose to use it.
string: 別に何も。力を使わない限りはね

original: Whatever they're doing with them, they've been harvesting for millennia. No telling how many souls are trapped here.
string: いずれにせよ、彼らは数千年もの間それを収穫し続けておりますの。ここにどれほどの魂が捕えられているのかは誰にも分かりませんわ

original: I'm sorry, I don't feel comfortable giving them to you.
string: ごめんなさい、これらをあなたに与える気にはなれないの

original: Taron Dreth, the world's foremost expert in Dwemer metallurgy. Not that you would know anything about that.
string: タロンだ。このタロン・ドレスはドゥーマーの鋳造技術に関しては世界最高の権威なのだよ。君にこんな事を言ってもしょうがないが

original: He's obsessed... insane. Everyone around him fears him as they would a rabid dog.
string: 彼は取りつかれて… 正気を失っているわ。周囲の皆が、狂犬を恐れるように彼を恐れている

original: The prophecy's end approaches!
string: 予言された終末は近いぞ！

original: Well, if I were a betting woman, I'd say it's a scraper of some sort.
string: 憶測でも構わないのでしたら、多分それはヘラか何かのようなものでしたわ

original: Give up while you can!
string: あきらめて引くがいい！

original: Yes. Please, follow me.
string: ええ。お願い、ついてきて

original: To know the complete prophecy, we must have the other two scrolls.
string: 予言をすべて知るには、残りの2巻の書が必要だな

original: I don't think he even sees me as his daughter anymore. I'm just... a means to an end.
string: 父はもうわたしの事を娘とは思っておりませんわ。わたしはただの… 道具にすぎませんのよ

original: See you.
string: またね

original: That I am. So I'm guessing you want to just use my blood, then?
string: ですわね。となれば、わたしの血を使いたいのでしょう？

original: That's a good way to be thinking.
string: それはいい考え方だな

original: Should your husband go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 夫がいなくなったらどうする？ 一緒に住むのが耐えられなくなって… その… バケモノとね

original: It's... it's true. It's all true! Come on, let's check it out!
string: 本物だ… まさしく本物だよ！ さあ、確かめよう！

original: I've... never heard of him. Is he well supported?
string: その名は… 初耳ですわね。人望があるのかしら？

original: Hrargh!
string: ハァーッ！

original: Oh, what is it?
string: あら、何ですの？

original: Half the people in your little crew would just as soon kill me as talk to me.
string: あなたのお仲間さん達の半数は、わたしと話すくらいなら殺そうとするでしょうね

original: So my daughter applied some of the lessons I taught her about necromancy, did she?
string: では娘は私が死霊術について教えた中から、いくつかの教訓を生かしたわけね？

original: They'd be even less welcoming to her than they've been to me. It would have been a bloodbath.
string: 母はわたしよりもっと歓迎されないでしょうね。血の海になってもおかしくなかったですのよ

original: This is fine for now, but we can't stay holed up here forever.
string: 今はいいが、いつまでもここに立てこもってもいられない

original: It may seem cruel that we hold our thin-blooded kin in low esteem. But our needs must come before theirs.
string: 血の薄い同族を蔑むのは残酷に思えるかも知れん。だが彼らより我らの需要が優先されるべきだ

original: My long-lost daughter returns at last. I trust you have my Elder Scroll?
string: 長らく行方の知れなかった娘がようやく戻ったか。星霜の書は持っているのだろうな？

original: Let's keep moving. I feel like we're being watched.
string: 先に進みましょう。誰かに見張られてる気がいたしますの

original: So far this hasn't been too bad. Gets lonely exploring by myself, though.
string: これまでのところ、そんなに悪くありませんわね。独りで探索してると寂しくなりますけれど

original: Like I said. I don't know what you're talking about.
string: 言ったろう。何の話か分からないね

original: This matters to me.
string: こちらにとっても重大な問題だ

original: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
string: ソリチュードの家に住もう

original: Good. I assume you took care of that little infestation. Did you figure out what they were looking for in there?
string: よし。あの侵入者に対処してくれたようだな。奴らがあそこで何を探していたのか分かったか？

original: You're... you're a vampire?
string: あなたは… 吸血鬼ですの？

original: Only a single spire remains. Be careful, I'm almost certain the final Keeper will be prepared for your assault.
string: 残りは尖塔一つだけよ。慎重にね。最後の番人があなたの襲撃に備えているのはほぼ確実よ

original: Where do I begin?
string: どこから始める？

original: You have an Elder Scroll? Remarkable!
string: 星霜の書を持ってるのか？ すごいじゃないか！

original: She always seemed happy, before we heard the prophecy. Then it all changed. She became a different person. They both did.
string: 予言を耳にするまではいつでも幸せそうだったのに、すべてが変わってしまった。母はまるで別人になった。両親とも変貌してしまったのです

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: You see the Tyranny of the Sun as your chance at deification, and like Harkon you won't hesitate to destroy anything that stands in your path.
string: 太陽の専制を自分の神格化の好機と見なしているのね。そしてハルコンと同じく、邪魔するものすべての破壊もためらわない

original: I'm wondering what my mother got up to, here. She definitely wasn't trying to keep the place clean.
string: 母はここで何をしていたのかしら。掃除をしていたわけではない事は確かですわね

original: But something's wrong. He never looks as though he's in pain or under duress. He just... stands there and watches, as though waiting.
string: しかし、何か変だった。苦痛を感じていたり、脅されていたりするようには見えなかった。ただ… 何かを待つように立っていただけだ

original: Let's sate our hunger together.
string: 共に飢えを満たすとしよう

original: I have spread false rumors about the discovery of an Elder Scroll in Skyrim to lure a Moth Priest here.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶をおびき寄せるため、スカイリムで星霜の書が発見されたとの偽の噂を流しておいた

original: Glad to see you've taken care of your little problem, and kept it from becoming my problem.
string: 君が自分の問題に対処できた事と、それが私に飛び火しなかった事をうれしく思うよ

original: Since you could've attacked me before now, I'm going to assume this was a little accident on your part.
string: これまで君には私を襲う機会があったのだから、今回の件はちょっとした事故だと思っておく

original: You should find no difficulty using the portal any longer.
string: もう転移門の使用に困難を感じる事はないはずよ

original: Death is but a door, time is but a window. I'll be back.
string: 死は扉にすぎず、時は窓にすぎない。また来るよ

original: Of course. What is it?
string: もちろんですわ。どうしまして？

original: Let's get back to work.
string: さあ、仕事に戻りましょう

original: No, and if you're smart you won't either. I know he's one of your kind and all, but he's only looking out for himself.
string: いいや。お前も同族だからと言って、信用しない方がいい。奴は自分の事しか考えていないからな

original: Though there's plenty more where he came from. Be ever watchful.
string: 仲間はまだ大勢いるはずだ。気を抜くなよ

original: Everyone! Gather 'round!
string: みんな！ 集合だ！

original: Here. Let me show you how it's made...
string: これよ。作り方を教えてあげるわ…

original: Forgive me, but I am on urgent business for the Dawnguard. I have no time to speak with you.
string: 悪いけど、ドーンガードのための急ぎの仕事があるの。あなたと話す時間はないわ

original: Why were you locked away like this?
string: このように閉じ込められていた理由は？

original: Wha- who... you're that one from Helgen. Barely made it out of there myself. I hurt my back and I- I just need something for the pain.
string: あんたは… ヘルゲンから来た例の人だな。あそこから何とか抜け出せたけど、背中を痛めてね… 痛み止めがほしいんだよ

original: We need to strike a crippling blow against them before they muster more men against us.
string: 奴らが我らに対してより多くの人数を集める前に、大打撃を与えねばならん

original: Nuhn!
string: うぬ！

original: I'll wait for you at the dock.
string: 波止場で待っておりますわよ

original: People say there's someone in Riften that can... change your face. Make you look completely different. Do you believe that?
string: うわさではリフテンに… 顔を変えられる者がいるらしい。外見を完全に変えるんだ。信じられるか？

original: That... well, that might change things.
string: そうか…それなら話が変わってくるな

original: Why?
string: 何故だ？

original: Look to the cities. Speak to innkeepers, carriage drivers, anyone who would meet a traveler.
string: 街に行き、宿屋の主人、馬車の御者、旅人に出会いそうな者達と話してこい

original: Maybe your mother didn't trust you, either.
string: 母親は君自身のことも信用していなかったのかもな

original: Don't think that'll keep them from turning on you eventually. They'll figure out what you are.
string: それでいつまでも、彼らの目をごまかせるとは思えませんわ。遠からず正体に気づかれましてよ

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: Someone will bleed for this.
string: このままでは済まさん

original: It's not easy to get supplies way out here, but I'm managing. Take a look.
string: こんな場所では、仕入れも一苦労なの。でも、なんとかやってるわ。どうぞ見ていって

original: That was my theory, you know. My research. My life's work. All of it, lost! Stolen by my own damn apprentice!
string: あれはあたしの理論だったんだ。あたしの研究。一生の仕事。それをすべて失った！ 自分の見習いに盗まれたんだよ！

original: All right. Lead on, then.
string: 分かった。じゃあ先導して

original: Only those who can trace their ancestry through Harkon's mortal blood line can faithfully accept the power conferred by his Vampiric blood.
string: ハルコンの血を持つ定命の者だけが、吸血鬼としての彼の力が授けし力を忠実に受け継ぐ事ができるんだ

original: Auri-El bless you, child. For you are a step closer to the Inner Sanctum and everlasting wisdom.
string: アーリエルの祝福は汝と共にある。最奥聖域の深淵なる英知に、また一歩近づいたのだ

original: The power is growing within you, and now you must learn to wield it.
string: 体の中で育ちつつある力の、使い方をおぼえる必要がある

original: In the meantime, don't make me regret my sudden outburst of tolerance and generosity, because if you do, your friend here is going to pay for it.
string: それと、私が突然寛容の念に駆られた事を後悔させないでくれ。後悔したら、迷惑を被るのはここにいる君の友達なんだぞ

original: Hello
string: やあ

original: Never mind that... it worked!
string: おっと… うまくいったみたいだ！

original: Come with me, "bard."
string: 一緒に来てほしい、“吟遊詩人”よ

original: Then I think I shall see to the repairs. Thank you for your time.
string: では修理を手配しよう。手間を取らせたな

original: I understand what you did for Serana and for me, but the prophecy never sat well for me, and I don't want to be a part of it. I'm sorry.
string: セラーナと私のためにしてくれた事は承知よ。でもお告げには決して納得いかないし、かかわりたくもない。ごめんなさいね

original: No, no more!
string: もう嫌だ！

original: But you... take that out into the world. And if anyone asks, tell them what we discovered. Together.
string: でもあんたは… それを世界へ持ち帰って。そして誰かに聞かれたら、あたし達の発見を伝えてよ

original: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
string: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

original: Suits me just fine.
string: せいせいしたよ

original: I will see you dead, monster.
string: まっぴらだ、怪物めが

original: He's holed up with a group of a bandits.
string: 山賊の一団と共に立てこもっている

original: True. But I know a way we can get to the courtyard without arousing suspicion.
string: そのようですわね。けれども騒ぎを起こさずに中庭まで行く方法がありましてよ

original: Then how are you sure they even exist?
string: だとしたら、どうしてそいつらが実在すると確信がもてる？

original: Ah, yes. I see. Well, if you do change your mind, please let me know.
string: そうか。まあ、気が変わったら教えてくれ

original: Why would someone who isn't... like me... come all the way down here?
string: わたし達の仲間でもない人が、こんなところまで何をしにいらっしゃいましたの？

original: My mother had a bit of a thing for magical constructs. Not... not what you're thinking. She just found them fascinating.
string: 母や魔術で作られたものに興味を持ってはいましたけれど… あなたが思っている意味ではなく、神秘的に感じていた程度の事ですわ

original: Nervous?
string: 落ち着きませんの？

original: Didn't work out that way I assume.
string: そうはならなかったようだな

original: Do you think there's more Aetherium somewhere?
string: まだエセリウムがどこかにあるだろうか？

original: Do you think Florentius really talks to Arkay?
string: フロレンティウスは本当にアーケイと話してると思う？

original: What do you want from me?
string: 何が望みなのだ？

original: If you'll excuse me.
string: では失礼する

original: Show me your wares, "merchant."
string: 商人なら売り物を見せてほしい

original: Well, this isn't exactly a palace, is it? Still, it's sturdy, secure, and seems defensible.
string: まあ、宮殿には見えないわよね？ でも、頑丈で安全で、守りも固いわよ

original: My family's home is west of Solitude. If you help me get back there, they'll be grateful to you.
string: わたしの実家はソリチュードの西部にありますの。無事に送り届けてくれましたら、家族も喜びます

original: I will find you.
string: 逃がさないぞ

original: So I'm thinking that wasn't the right way.
string: ですから、道を間違えたのではないかと思っておりますの

original: In reward, he gave everlasting life to myself, my wife and my daughter. And so I have defeated mortality itself.
string: 見返りとして私と、妻と娘の三人は無限の命を授かった。そうして私は寿命にさえも打ち勝ったのだ

original: Well, as far as I'm aware it's the only one in existence.
string: わたしが知る限りは、この一つしか存在いたしませんわ

original: You hate him that much?
string: そこまで憎んでいるのか？

original: I could see through my eyes, but I could not control my actions.
string: 状況は理解してたけど、体が勝手に動いたんだよ

original: Gunmar, do you think I could borrow a troll?
string: ガンマー、トロールを借りてもいい？

original: Does the air feel... heavy down here? I'm a little woozy, but it might just be from waking up.
string: ここの空気… 重く感じませんこと？ 少し頭がぼんやりいたしますわ、寝起きだからかも知れませんけれど

original: I don't want to hear about it. I want what I asked for.
string: それについては何も聞きたくない。ほしいのはお願いしたものだけだ

original: I will send you back to the shadows!
string: 闇へ還してやる！

original: Do you, now? Hircine doesn't usually bestow his favor on the fickle.
string: そうなの？ ハーシーンは普段気まぐれに誰かをひいきする事はない

original: There might be, but I don't think you're going to like it.
string: あるといえばあるかも知れませんが、おすすめはいたしませんわね

original: There's something out there.
string: あそこに何かある

original: In my language, the Qahnaarin is the Vanquisher, the one who has bested a fellow dovah in battle.
string: 我らの言葉でクァーナーリンは征服者を意味する。仲間のドヴァーを戦いで打ち破った者の事だ

original: There are at least thirty different ways of being attacked and killed in your own home at any given moment.
string: 家の中にいる時も、突然襲われて殺される危険は常に30個以上あるのよ

original: I promise to make this as painless as possible. Hold still.
string: なるべく痛くないようにいたしますわね。そのまま動かないで…

original: I've often asked myself that very same question. The blinding of my race was supposedly accomplished with a toxin.
string: ずっと、同じ事を疑問に思っていた。種族の皆は、毒を使って光を奪われたはずなのだ

original: Which shrine? Well, I... I'm going to them all. Yes. One at a time. Until I've visited all the shrines to all the gods in Skyrim.
string: 祠？ えーと… 全部回るつもりさ。そう。巡礼なんだ。スカイリムの全ての神の、全ての祠を巡る旅だ

original: You came for me? How did you know? I thought I was going to die in here. Thank you!
string: 助けに来てくれたのか？ なぜ分かったんだ？ ここで死ぬと思ったよ。ありがとう！

original: He'll cozy up to you, use his honeyed words to get you to lower your guard, then use you and throw you away when he's done with you.
string: 近づいてきて甘い言葉で油断させ、利用した上で用が済んだら捨て去るつもりだ

original: Vampires?
string: 吸血鬼だと？

original: Nevermind, I don't need you to do anything right now.
string: いや、今は特に頼みたいことはない

original: So, you think he's just crazy?
string: 彼はイカれてると思う？

original: How can we get in without your father noticing?
string: 父親に気づかれずに入るには？

original: What happened to this place?
string: ここで何が起きたのか？

original: Speak with Vingalmo. He has something for you.
string: ヴィンガルモと話すといい。何かあるようだ

original: Just... try to make it quick.
string: ええ… 早く終わらせて下さいましね

original: Wait, please! Don't leave me for the wolves to find!
string: 待ってくれ！ このままじゃ狼の餌食だ！

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: You mentioned a treasure?
string: さっき、宝があると？

original: Best not to damage our reputation. Let your actions be as discrete as possible.
string: 評判を落とさないよう注意が必要だ。なるべく目立たずに行動するといい

original: Give him a crossbow bolt between the eyes for me!
string: クロスボウのボルトを、眉間に叩き込んでやるのよ！

original: Let Auri-El smite you with his wrath!
string: アーリエルの怒りを受けろ！

original: For my daughter's safe return, you have my gratitude.
string: 娘が無事に戻った事、感謝している

original: Why?
string: どうしてだ？

original: Ironically, our undoing came at the hands of our own people.
string: そして皮肉な事に、我々に滅亡をもたらしたのは我々自身に他ならなかったのだ

original: Die, damn it... die!
string: 死ね、クズめが… 死ね！

original: Why am I able to bestow the gift of Harkon's blood?
string: 自分もハルコンの血の恩恵を他人に授けられるのはどうしてか？

original: Do I have a choice?
string: 選択肢はあるのか？

original: Fine, then.
string: そう、なら結構ですわ

original: Oh yes. They were an important part of the process here.
string: ああ。ここでの大切な儀式の一部だった

original: I've brought the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書を持ってきた

original: Lead on.
string: 案内して

original: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello
string: DLC1SoulCairnMerhcantHello

original: You sure? They might prove useful.
string: そうか？ 役に立つかもしれない

original: It's time to end this.
string: 今こそ終わらせる時よ

original: You contracted a disease, perhaps, but you are no true vampire.
string: 疾病にはかかったかも知れんが、真の吸血鬼ではないな

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of bandits. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 野蛮な血の者が山賊の一団と一緒に潜伏したわ。おそらく同族の隠れ場所を作りたいのね

original: Heard they'd go on midnight raids, pillaging and looting, and then stash the spoils somewhere, guarded by their sigil.
string: 連中は真夜中に民家を襲い、盗みや略奪を働くそうだ。戦利品はどこかに隠して、印で守っていると聞いた

original: Excuse me? I told you we should go to my family's home.
string: もし？ わたしの家族の住処を目指すべきだとお伝えしましたわよね？

original: While I ready things here, you find out what this woman means to the vampires. She must be important somehow.
string: 私がここで準備している間に、君はその女性が吸血鬼達にとってどういう存在なのかを探ってくれ。彼女には何か重要な意味が隠されているはずだ

original: We may never return.
string: 二度と戻らないかもしれない

original: No, you've proven your strength to him.
string: 違いますわね、あなたは自分の強さを証明してみせた

original: I had no idea that her laboratory even existed.
string: 研究所があったなんて存じませんでしたわ

original: I can't imagine living here. Or... being dead here. Or... whatever they'd call it. Ugh.
string: ここで生活を送るなんて想像できませんわ。私は生きていませんけれども… 誰がなんと言おうとお断りですわ… うぅっ

original: Gaan...
string: ガーン…

original: Whatever is required! I am happy to do whatever is asked of me. I only wish to be useful.
string: どんな事でも喜んで！ とにかく役に立ちたいんだ

original: What do you mean by "discreet."
string: “慎重に”とは？

original: Another victory for the Dawnguard.
string: またドーンガードの勝利ね

original: Let's not waste any more time then.
string: でしたら、そろそろ本題に移らないといけませんわね

original: We'll secure the castle. You just get to their master!
string: 城の安全を確保する。あんたは彼らの主人のもとに行くんだ！

original: I've helped your people.
string: あなたの人々を助けてきた

original: We knew Isran was working on something, but we had no idea he'd found this place.
string: イスランが何かを推し進めているのは分かっていたが、あんな場所を見つけたとは初耳だった

original: I am but your humble servant, milord.
string: 旦那様、私はあなたの忠実なしもべです

original: The scroll!
string: 星霜の書か！

original: Actually, now that you mention it...(Attack)
string: 言われてみればその通りだ…(攻撃)

original: When do you plan to start trusting me?
string: そろそろ信用してくれてもいいのでは？

original: Hopefully he'll be gracious enough to make you one of us again.
string: 彼が寛大にも君をまた仲間にしてくれるといいね

original: I no longer hunger, grow weary or feel anything but loneliness.
string: お腹も減らないし、疲れもしないし、何も感じない。孤独以外はな

original: How are you feeling after talking to your mother?
string: 母親と話した感想は？

original: Very funny.
string: そうか

original: Find all of them! Don't let any of them get away!
string: 全員見つけ出せ！ 1人も逃がすな！

original: Yes. I've kept it safely secured here ever since I was imprisoned.
string: ええ。ここに幽閉されて以来ずっと、これを守ってきたの

original: Well, if you do just let us know. We'll be in this area until we find them.
string: もし見つけたら教えてほしい。見つけるまではこの周辺にいる

original: ...maybe the clans have it right... hunting's so chancy... why not keep a few thralls... blood whenever you want it...
string: …一族の言う事は正しいんだろう… 確かに狩りは当てにならない… それなら従徒を何人か抱えた方がいい… ほしい時に血が手に入るからな…

original: You there, boy. Stop skulking in the shadows and step up here. What's your name?
string: おい、そこの若いの。影でコソコソするのはやめて姿を見せろ。名前は？

original: Spare me the details.
string: 具体的な話は省略してくれていい

original: Let me go...
string: 放してくれ…

original: Go. Reconsider your plight.
string: 行って。自分の立場を考え直しなさい

original: But I can't worry about that now. We need the scroll, and she's our only lead.
string: でも今はそんな事を心配している場合ではありませんわ。書を手に入れなくては。彼女が唯一の手掛かりなのですから

original: I'm sure Lord Harkon will be most pleased with your efforts. Find him at once.
string: 君の働きぶりをハルコン卿もきっと喜ぶだろう。今すぐ彼に会うといい

original: We'll speak again soon.
string: また会おう

original: That's a fine looking animal you've got there. I had a dog once. Kept getting fur in my mead.
string: 素敵な動物を飼っているね。私にも以前犬がいて、いつもハチミツ酒に毛が入ったよ

original: Those vampires put up a hell of a fight.
string: 手ごわい吸血鬼どもだったわ

original: See that thing?
string: あれが見える？

original: Are you infected? Keep your distance from me.
string: 感染してるのか？ だったら近づくな

original: A more "serious" group of the Vigilants of Stendarr. Sometimes when you skin a skeever, you find he has a more aggressive mate.
string: 攻撃的な、ステンダールの番人においてもより“危険な”集団よ。スキーヴァーの皮をはぐ時のあなたみたいに

original: The only way to get to my brother is by following in the Initiates' footsteps and traveling from wayshrine to wayshrine just as they did.
string: 我が兄弟に会いたいなら、新人達と同じ道をたどり、祠から祠へと渡り歩くしかない

original: Isran? Needing someone else's help? Never thought I'd hear that.
string: あのイスランが？ 他人に助けを求めるだと？ 前代未聞だな

original: While you're looking for the vampires, I'll try to get us some help. Come find me at Dead Drop Falls when you've learned more.
string: 吸血鬼達を探してくれればその間に協力者を募ってみる。何か分かったらデッドドロップ・フォールズで落ち合おう

original: How does Serana fit in?
string: セラーナにはどう関係するんだ？

original: (Whine)
string: クゥーン…

original: Enough of these games.
string: 遊びは終わりだ

original: Is that why you had retained your sight?
string: 視力を失わなかったのはそのためか？

original: This vampire showed up while you were away.
string: 君の留守中に吸血鬼が現れた

original: I can't wait to see the courtyard again.
string: 中庭をもう一度見る時が待ちきれませんわ

original: You're already as good as I am. There's nothing you can learn from me.
string: もう同じくらいの腕前よ。教えられる事は何もないわ

original: One of the feral brood has joined a group of nercromancers, presumably with aims to grant the gift to the entire lot of them.
string: 野蛮な血の者の一人が死霊術師の一団に加わった。おそらく彼ら全員に血の力を授けるのが目的だ

original: Should your blushing bride go missing, perhaps unable to bear the thought of living with a... a monster...
string: 清らかな君の花嫁がいなくなったらどうする？ 一緒に住むのが耐えられなくなって… その… バケモノとね

original: She says she lives in a castle near Solitude.
string: ソリチュードの近くにある城に住んでいるとか

original: Not exactly.
string: ちょっと違うな

original: If you want to cure yourself, I'll support you.
string: 根治したいというなら、力になろう

original: You would dare show up here after becoming mortal, abandoning all that Lord Harkon has granted you?
string: ハルコン卿に与えられたものをすべて捨て去り、定命の体になった上でここに姿を現すとはな

original: Oh, most certainly! Let's find out what secrets the scroll can tell.
string: もちろんだとも！ 書に隠された秘密を探ろうじゃないか

original: I yearn to see the great dunes of Hammerfell once again.
string: ハンマーフェルの砂丘を、もう一度この目で見てみたいな

original: My trip to Skyrim has become quite the adventure!
string: スカイリムへの旅がちょっとした冒険になったよ！

original: You may not be dovah, but the defeat of Alduin earns you the right of title.
string: そなたはドヴァーではないかも知れんが、アルドゥインを倒したとなれば、その権利を認めよう

original: Why hide? Face Auri-El. Face your end!
string: なぜ隠れる？ 出てきてアーリエルの裁きを受けろ！

original: Hmm. Very well. Just tell me what you desire - beauty or hideous deformity, nothing is beyond my skill.
string: ふーん。結構よ。望みを教えて… 美か、恐ろしい変形か。私の技術で不可能な事はないわ

original: All those things had been building for a while. You have no idea how long I wanted to say that to her.
string: すべてがしばらくの間ずっと積もって大きくなっていきましたの。どれほど長く母にその事を伝えたかったか、あなたには想像もつかないでしょうね

original: The Elder Scroll is just a bit further.
string: 星霜の書はあとほんの少し先よ

original: What do these rings do?
string: その指輪の効果は？

original: Wound up turning into a vampire. The Jarl, unable to kill his own son, spent a fortune building this keep and hiring men to guard it.
string: 息子は結局吸血鬼になった。首長は我が子を殺す事ができず、大金をはたいてこの砦を築き、守りを固めるために人を雇った

original: Wagh!
string: うわああ！

original: Sure, that's what they all say.
string: 当然だね、誰もがそう言うよ

original: So these Initiates had to lug around a heavy pitcher of water. Marvelous.
string: それであの新入り達は重たい水差しを抱えて歩き回らなければならなかったというわけですのね。素晴らしいですわ

original: I do. It's how the vampire has survived for millennia, and the only way we can continue to survive in the future.
string: ええ。そうやって吸血鬼は何千年も生き延びてきた。そして私達が将来も生存し続けられる唯一の方法よ

original: I try.
string: やれるだけやるしかない

original: And so you delivered her to them.
string: では、君が彼女を奴らのところに送り込んだんだな

original: Especially not me. I mean... with my history, I still kind of get a chill just walking by a temple. Can't imagine going in one.
string: 特にわたしは違いますわ。今までの行いを考えると、今でも聖堂の横を通るだけで震えが止まりませんの。中に入るなんて、とんでもない事ですわ

original: This is it!
string: いよいよだな！

original: What?
string: 何？

original: It was the Betrayed... they did something to him, I just don't know why Auri-El would allow this to happen.
string: 裏切られし者の仕業であろうな… 奴らに何かされたのだ。アーリエルはなぜこんな事を許すのだろうか

original: Brother Adalvald had been there not long ago. Said he found something of great importance.
string: アダルヴァルド修道士はほんの少し前にそこに行き、何かとても重大なものを発見したと言っていた

original: Remember that Harkon isn't to be trusted. No matter what he promises, he'll deceive you in order to get what he wants.
string: ハルコンは信頼できないという事を覚えておいて。彼が何を約束しようと、望むものを得るためにはあなたを欺くわ

original: How dare they cast me from the Battlespire! I will make them pay dearly.
string: バトルスパイアーからこんな所に飛ばすなんて！ 必ず復讐してやる

original: Harkon would likely sense my return to Tamriel. The last thing you need right now is a trail for him to follow.
string: おそらくハルコンは私のタムリエルへの帰還に感づく。今、彼にその跡を追わせる事だけは避けるべきよ

original: Oh no you don't!
string: いや、やめて！

original: Hurrnhh...
string: はああ…

original: It appears I have you to thank for turning my daughter against me.
string: 娘を心変わりさせたのはお前の仕業のようだな

original: Why are we speaking?
string: 話すことが何かあるのか？

original: I think even Gunmar's been impressed with what we've managed to do with the Dwemer drawings. Let's see what we can do with these ones!
string: ドゥーマーの図面から作り出したものには、あのガンマーでさえ驚いたはずよ。今度はどんな発見があるのかしら！

original: You've arrived at the Wayshrine of Resolution.
string: ここは意思の祠だ

original: What else would you like to know?
string: 他に何が知りたいのですか？

original: I believe we can prolong its salutary effects if we infuse it with potent vampiric blood.
string: 吸血鬼の上質な血を聖杯に注げば、その効用を延長させる事ができるはずだよ

original: We could use your help in Tamriel.
string: タムリエルに戻って力を貸してほしい

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: I will erase you from existence!
string: この世から消し去ってやる！

original: Kill the abominations!
string: 化け物どもを殺せ！

original: Figured.
string: なるほど

original: I understand.
string: 分かりますわ

original: So how has it come to pass that a vampire of mixed blood is in the company of my daughter?
string: それで、吸血鬼の血が入った者がなぜ私の娘に同行する事になったの？

original: I just wonder if that meant it was my job to be giving.
string: あれは、わたしの役割が担う事という意味でしたのかしら

original: No. We expected some kind of artifact.
string: いや、何らかの秘宝が眠っているものと

original: There is much to learn, but if you master the powers of the Vampire Lord, few enemies will be able to stand against you.
string: 学ぶ事は多々あるが、吸血鬼の王として力を体得すれば、お前に抗える敵はごくわずかとなるだろう

original: Watch yourself. The sky is a bad omen.
string: 気をつけて。空が不吉だ

original: Mortal fool, you can't stop us.
string: 愚かな定命め。我々はとめられないぞ

original: They're a splinter group of the "Vigilants of Stendarr." A bit more ambitious, it seems.
string: 彼らは“ステンダールの番人”の分派よ。もう少し野心が強いようだけど

original: Depends on who you ask. Some say Molag-Bal himself gave these amulets to ancient powerful vampire lords. Some say this is just a myth.
string: 聞く相手によるね。モラグ・バルが大昔の有力な吸血鬼の王達に自らこのアミュレットを授けたという話もある。ただの神話にすぎないという人もいる

original: Where would a Moth Priest actually go?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶はどこに行こうとするだろうか？

original: I'll stick around this place if you need me.
string: ここにおりますから、用事がありましたらまた

original: Darkness shroud you.
string: 闇に包まれん事を

original: So, I see this dragon has fangs.
string: なるほど、このドラゴンには牙があるのだな

original: What do you think of this place?
string: この場所の印象は？

original: Good hunting.
string: 良い狩りを

original: You're a good son.
string: あなたはいい息子ですわ

original: I trust your journey was successful?
string: 旅はうまくいったのかな？

original: I need you to kill Arch-Curate Vyrthur... my brother.
string: 兄弟を… 最高司祭のヴィルスールを殺してほしい

original: I was hoping it wouldn't smell this bad.
string: 思っていた以上に酷い臭いですわ

original: What is it?
string: どうした？

original: An' maybe it won't.
string: 多分ダメだね

original: You can find us at Fort Dawnguard, near Stendarr's Beacon.
string: 我々はステンダールの灯近くのドーンガード砦にいる

original: By the Eight... look at the sky!
string: 八大神よ… 空を見ろ！

original: It is our sacred duty to study the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書の研究は、我々に課せられた神聖な任務だ

original: You did? Let me see them.
string: そうですの？ 見せてもらえて？

original: Glad you decided to give it a try. I hope Isran likes you.
string: 試してみる気になってくれて嬉しい。イスランに気に入られるといいな

original: Fairly well, I'd say. I've managed to get this far without blowing myself up, I still have all my limbs...
string: かなりいいと思う。ここまでの開発で、爆発もしてないし、手足もちゃんと無事だし…

original: Were you a part of all that?
string: 一枚かんでいたのか？

original: I can help you find out what that is.
string: それが何かを知りたいなら、手伝ってさしあげますわ

original: Welcome to the politics of Lord Harkon's court.
string: ハルコン卿の宮廷の政略争いへようこそ、だな

original: Hello.
string: やあ

original: My blood is potent. At first, the body is overwhelmed by it.
string: 私の血は強い力を宿している。最初は相手の体を圧倒してしまう

original: And then preyed on the Rift until finally someone put them down.
string: それで、リフトを襲ったんだけど、誰かに退治されたんですって

original: Take a deep breath and let it out as you fire.
string: 深く息を吸って、発射する時に吐き出すんだ

original: You seem to have lost the gift that Lord Harkon gave you. I suggest you tell him at once.
string: ハルコン卿からの贈り物を失くしたみたいじゃないか。その事をすぐ彼に言った方がいいよ

original: Hsss
string: シャー！

original: You'd figure a couple hundred years locked away with one would have given me some insight, but no.
string: 二百年も一緒に埋まっていれば何か分かりそうな気がしてくるかも知れなかったけれど、そんな事はありませんでしたわ

original: Thank you.
string: ありがとう

original: All of Skyrim will tremble before us.
string: スカイリム全土が我らに恐怖するだろう

original: Skyrim is ours!
string: スカイリムは我らのものだ！

original: What? What meeting? I wasn't informed of any such thing!
string: 何？ 会合だって？ そんな話はまったく聞いてないぞ！

original: If you want the Elder Scroll, it's yours.
string: 星霜の書が望みなら、あなたのものよ

original: Serana?
string: セラーナ？

original: You're here because we're abominations in your mind. Evil creatures that need to be destroyed.
string: ここにいるのは、内心では私達を嫌悪しているからだわ。破滅させられるべき邪悪な生物として

original: You must read an Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書を読んでもらいたい

original: The Dawnguard would want me to kill you.
string: ドーンガードは君を殺せと言うだろう

original: There's no use hiding from me.
string: 隠れても無駄だ

original: Now you decide to give up? Fine. I'll be here.
string: あきらめるわけ？ いいよ。あたしはここにいるから

original: I could feed again.
string: また食事にありつけるな

original: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
string: 星霜の書を取り戻したのだから、もう行くべきよ

original: I absolve you of your sins!
string: 罪深き命を消し去ってやる！

original: Marriage is a fine institution, however, one that does present certain difficulties for such as like ourselves.
string: 結婚とは素晴らしい慣習だが、確かに問題もある。我々の場合もそうだが

original: Let's get that portal open.
string: 転移門を開こう

original: You'll have shown yourself to be strong, which means you can't be allowed to just stick around.
string: あなたは自分の強さを証明したから、そばに置いておくには危険になった

original: If we follow that path around, we can find the other switch.
string: 向こうの道をたどれば、別のスイッチが見つかるはずですわ

original: You would dare address me?
string: 誰に口を利いている？

original: Have you been paying attention to everything that's happened? He'll betray us the second our backs are turned.
string: 何があったのかちゃんと見ていまして？ 背中を向けたらすぐ父はわたし達を裏切りますわよ

original: Ha ha ha. Here you are.
string: あははは。見つけたぞ

original: Aye lass.
string: 分かったよ、お嬢さん

original: I have more pressing matters at the moment.
string: 今はそれどころではない

original: A man named Isran.
string: イスランという名の男だ

original: I don't like him any more than you do. But he is my father.
string: 愛情はかけらもございませんわ。それでも、わたしの父なのです

original: I pledged myself to Molag Bal, and in his name I sacrificed a thousand innocents.
string: 私はモラグ・バルに忠誠を誓い、その名のもとに無実の者を千人、生贄として捧げた

original: Why?
string: 何故だ？

original: Gods curse you!
string: 神罰を受けろ！

original: Why did she care where used souls went?
string: 消耗した魂の行き先を気にかける理由は？

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: Still, if it means their safe-keeping, I suppose it is worth it.
string: だが安全に保管するためならそれも仕方ないか

original: You fight worse than you smell!
string: 臭いも酷ければ、戦いぶりも酷いですわね！

original: Go find Lord Harkon. Tell him of your success.
string: ハルコン卿の所に行き、成功を報告するといい

original: In an age of strife, when dragons return to the realm of men, darkness will mingle with light and the night and day will be as one.
string: 戦いの時代、ドラゴン達が人間の国に舞い戻る時、闇と光が混ざり、夜と昼はひとつになる

original: Now... you'd be lucky to find a single room intact.
string: 今は… そのままの部屋が一つ見つかれば幸運だね

original: I trust you're faring well?
string: うまくいっているのだろうな？

original: Why are they collecting these souls?
string: どうして魂を集めているんだ？

original: Mother?
string: お母様？

original: You've mistaken me for someone who cares about you and your problems. Find someone else.
string: どうしてそんな事を気にかけなきゃいけないんだ。他を当たるんだな

original: How dare you disobey me!
string: 私に逆らうとは！

original: But I'm not just going to abandon what I've been working on here. It's too useful. I need at least one intact dwarven gyro.
string: でもね、ここでの仕事を放り出す事はできないの。とても役立つはずだから。それには傷のないドゥーマーのジャイロが必要だわ

original: Very good. That's one less monster we need to worry about.
string: よし。悩みの種の化け物を1体減らせたな

original: What do you need? Blades, armor, smithing materials?
string: 何がほしい？ 剣か、鎧か、鍛造の材料か？

original: So you take a major decision for me, and make it all about you?
string: わたしの事で大事な決断をして、その責任を負うつもりですの？

original: Well, once the Initiate's enlightenment was complete, he'd bring the ewer to the Chantry's Inner Sanctum.
string: 新人が完全に悟りを開くと、水差しを持って最奥聖域に向かう事になっていたのだ

original: It's something all right.
string: これは何やらありそうですわね

original: Through the grace of Auri-El, they were restored to their spectral form to enable them to continue their duties.
string: アーリエルの栄光によって精霊として蘇り、今も使命を果たしている

original: Pah, your blood is foul.
string: うっ、お前の血ときたら酷い味だ

original: Be careful who you trust. Not all of us have the court's best interests at heart.
string: 信頼する相手は慎重に選んだ方がいいよ。宮廷の利益を優先しない者も中にはいるからね

original: Ah, welcome, welcome! I don't believe we've seen you here before, have we? You can buy from me, then join any booth you'd like.
string: ああ、いらっしゃい！ ここは初めてでしょう？ まずは買い物をしてね。部屋に入りたいなら、その後よ

original: Not... like... this...
string: こんな… ふうには…

original: I have no choice. As I told you before, I'm a Daughter of Coldharbour.
string: 仕方ないわ。以前話した通り、私はコールドハーバーの娘よ

original: If we open that one, we'll be able to move around this valley a lot faster.
string: あれを開けば、この谷をずっと速くまわれるようになりますわ

original: Sorry, what?
string: ごめん、何？

original: Careful, here. If you fall down that thing I'm going to have to drag you out of... wherever it leads.
string: 用心なさって。もしあなたがあそこに落ちたら、どこにつながっているにせよ… わたしが引っぱり上げる事になりますのよ

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: I was. But unlike some of my brethren, I sought solutions outside the norm in order to maintain my superiority.
string: いかにも。だが同族の一部とは違い、我は優位を保つために尋常ならざる策を求めたのだ

original: Thank you! You're too kind.
string: ありがとう！ 君は優しい人だね

original: Let's kill those... Keeper things and get back to the prison.
string: さあ… 番人どもを片づけて、牢屋へと戻りましょう

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Looks like you know your daedra.
string: デイドラの事をよく知っていらっしゃるようですわね

original: Keep yourself armed and protected as best you can.
string: 可能な限り、武器や防具を充実させておく事だ

original: Vyrthur said something about using blood?
string: ヴィルスールが血を使うとか言っていた気が

original: Can you teach me how to make a crossbow?
string: クロスボウの作り方を教えてほしい

original: You're no pilgrim.
string: 巡礼者などではないな

original: Oh, wow. All right, well, what do you think my father's going to do once we bring the bow to him?
string: あらまあ。そう、じゃあ、弓を届けたら、父は何をすると思いまして？

original: Yes, certainly. Are you willing to let me have them?
string: ああ、もちろんだよ。私が授かってもいいのかな？

original: Harkon disbelieved in their existence, though perhaps he felt slighted they were not already in his possession and only feigns indifference.
string: ハルコン自身はその存在を疑ってるよ。でも多分、彼はアミュレットが自分のものではない事が気に食わないんだ。だから無関心を装ってるのさ

original: Isran's done nothing but mock me. He's never given me the respect I deserve.
string: イスランにはバカにされてばかりだ。あるべき敬意が全く感じられない

original: Our empire had temples to some of the other deities: Trinimac, Syrabane, Jephre and Phynaster rounded out the rest.
string: 我々の帝国には、他の信仰も根づいていた。トリニマック、シラベイン、イェフレ、フィナスタール、挙げればきりがない

original: What a horrible place.
string: なんてひどい場所だ

original: I'll kill Harkon.
string: ハルコンを殺すつもりだ

original: I hope Alvide doesn't think less of me, but I can't protect her on my own. We're safer here.
string: アルヴァイドに見くびられたくはないが、自分一人じゃ彼女を守りきれない。ここにいる方が安全だ

original: Does anything live here?
string: ここには生き物は住んでいるんだろうか？

original: With them, and the materials in this room, we should have everything we need.
string: それと、この部屋の材料があれば、必要なものはすべて揃うはず

original: He stopped in to do some research in the library, then left for Dragon Bridge. If you hurry, you might catch him there.
string: 図書館で調べ物をしに立ち寄った後に、ドラゴン・ブリッジに向かったようだ。急げば向こうで追いつけるかもな

original: But I can't wait to see these drawings. Go on, get out of here!
string: それでも、最後の図面を早く見てみたいわ。さあ、行ってきて！

original: But be warned. The Jarl's guards are unaware of the threat, and will treat violence against this "advisor" as a crime.
string: だが注意しろよ。首長の衛兵達はその企みに気づいていない。もし“特別顧問”に危害を加えようとしたら、それは犯罪行為とみなされるだろう

original: Indeed! One moment I was writing diligently, and the next, my door bursts open.
string: そうなんだよ！ 書き物に集中できると思ったら、次の瞬間には扉を叩く奴がいやがってだね

original: Well, at least we're getting closer. Let's go.
string: でも、少なくとも近づいてはいますわ。行きましょう

original: You're going to go kill a Dawnguard spy.
string: ドーンガードの密偵を殺すのよ

original: Now, volume two begins! What else?
string: さあ第二巻だ！ 始めるっきゃないだろ？

original: It's possible that your killing blow has merely displaced Durnehviir's physical form while he reconstitutes himself.
string: あなたのとどめの一撃は単にダーネヴィールの物理形態を置き換えただけで、復活中の可能性もあるわ

original: Well, what are they up to?
string: それで、今の状況は？

original: I'm a werewolf. What will happen if I accept your gift?
string: ウェアウルフの身で恩恵を受け入れたらどうなる？

original: Watch yourself.
string: 気をつけて

original: Another time, maybe.
string: また後で

original: Goodbye
string: それでは

original: Don't speak to me, meat.
string: 気安く話しかけないで

original: Fair enough.
string: なるほど

original: These vampires claimed they had some purpose in store for me, but they wouldn't say what. Probably hoping to ransom me, the fools.
string: この吸血鬼達は私に対して何か企んでると言ってたが、詳しくは語らなかった。おそらく身代金目当てだろう。愚か者どもめ

original: He wanted me to take him out to Dragon Bridge, but I told him it ain't one of my stops.
string: ドラゴン・ブリッジに行きたいって言われたけど、そこはコース外だから断ったんだ

original: I don't care about politics. You want to fight over the throne with the rest of them, go right ahead.
string: 政治には関心がないの。他の者達と玉座を争いたければ、ご自由にどうぞ

original: Your obedience pleases me.
string: お前の忠誠には満足している

original: Any idea what I'll be up against?
string: どんな脅威に直面するか、わからないか？

original: Show yourself.
string: 出てこい

original: Listener! Fancy seeing you out here.
string: 聞こえし者！ ここで会うなんて奇遇ね

original: Why me...
string: なぜ私が…

original: They're trolls. They smell like trolls. I can't help that either.
string: トロールだよ。トロールの臭いがする。どうしようもない

original: Poor thing. I know it would have tried to kill us, but still...
string: 哀れなものですわ。わたし達を殺そうとしたかも知れない相手ですけど、それでも…

original: If my desire to end your life was still my purpose, we would not be speaking.
string: いまだに我が目的が、そなたの命を終わらせる事であれば、こうして話してなどいないだろう

original: Do you have any ideas?
string: 何か思うところはないか？

original: I don't know much about it.
string: それについてはほとんど知らない

original: That hurt.
string: ひどい目にあった

original: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
string: つまり、あなたのほんの一部がかの地に乗り移って、代わりに、ソウル・ケルンのかけらがその隙間を埋めたのよ

original: I admit, I do not entirely understand your sense of humor.
string: 正直なところ、お前の話の笑いどころが今一つ分からんな

original: It's important that I find him right away. (Persuade)
string: すぐにその彼を見つけないといけない(説得)

original: Great gift of blood you've given me. Blood that boils in my veins. Gives me strength.
string: 偉大な血の贈り物だわ。血管の中で沸き立つ血。力を与えてくれる

original: Good, they should be able to help us.
string: よし、それなら力を貸してもらえるかも

original: For centuries we lived here, far from the cares of the world. All that ended when my wife betrayed me and stole away that which I valued most.
string: 我々は世の気苦労から遠く離れ、何世紀もここで暮らしてきた。しかしそんな時代も、妻が私を裏切り、もっとも大切にしていたものを奪い去った事で終わりを告げた

original: What am I doing here? I don't belong in a place like this!
string: なぜここにいるんだ？ こんな所、私にはふさわしくない！

original: I find your choice of words quite interesting considering that Serana is in far more danger now than she was following my "foolish plan."
string: セラーナが私の“ばかげた計画”に従っていた頃よりも今の方がはるかに危険な事を考えると、あなたの言葉の選択は極めて興味深いわ

original: Do you think we'll meet the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターに会うことになるのかな？

original: Speak with Feran Sadri. He has something for you.
string: フェラン・サドリと話すといい。何かあるはずだ

original: Not quite, though I can see how an outsider might arrive at that conclusion.
string: 正確には違うが、部外者がその結論に達するのは無理もない事だ

original: Goodbye, hero! Take good care of Arvak for me! Such a good horse...
string: あばよ、ヒーロー！ アルヴァクを可愛がってやってくれよ！ できた馬だからな…

original: Let's get to my home, and I'll have a better sense of where we all stand.
string: 家に着けば、我々がどういう状況にいるのかがもう少し分かるはずですわ

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: It's difficult to have a conversation with you like that. Would you mind changing back?
string: その様子では話しづらいわ。元に戻ってくれない？

original: An ancient font, full of power. As much as it looks like blood, sadly it is not. Can you imagine if it were? We'd never need to hunt again.
string: 力に満ちた古代の瓶。血に見えるが、不幸にも違う。そうだった場合を想像できるか？ 二度と狩りの必要はなかっただろう

original: I need to find someone named Florentius.
string: フロレンティウスという人物を探している

original: Anything you can tell me about the Soul Cairn?
string: ソウル・ケルンについて聞かせてほしい

original: You have forsaken my gift. The ancient blood no longer flows through your veins. Don't deny it!
string: 我が恩恵を捨て去ったのか。古き血はもうお前の体に流れてはいない。否定しても無駄だ！

original: Your powers are nothing!
string: 通用しませんわよ！

original: We'd be honored to have you join us.
string: 君が協力してくれたら光栄だよ

original: Enough games, let's finish this!
string: お遊びは十分だ、決着をつけるぞ！

original: And I thought the Soul Cairn was creepy.
string: ソウル・ケルンは不気味な場所だと思っていましたけど…

original: Our sense of what's right is what separates us from the vampires. Don't forget that.
string: 吸血鬼と我々の違いは何を正しいとするかだ。忘れるな

original: Bring the two of them back here, and we can get started on coming up with a plan.
string: 彼ら二人をここに連れてくるんだ。計画を立てるのはそれからになる

original: Oh, I get it. Is that why you're wearing an Amulet of Mara?
string: ああ、分かりましたわ。だから、マーラのアミュレットをしておりますのね？

original: ...I'll find you...
string: …隠れても無駄だ…

original: Someone is here. Find them!
string: 誰かいるぞ。見つけ出せ！

original: I need to trade some things with you.
string: 持ち物を交換したい

original: That... that wasn't me you were fighting.
string: あれは… 君と戦うつもりはなかったんだ

original: I'm looking for a vampire.
string: 吸血鬼を探している

original: Hey there, friend. If you're looking for a fix, you're at the right place. Just head on down the trap door.
string: あら、こんにちは。一服していくならここよ。落とし戸から入ってちょうだい

original: I can crush skulls with the best of them. Let me show you a few things.
string: 頭蓋骨を砕くのは誰よりも上手よ。ちょっと見せてあげましょうか

original: We should honor our agreement with him.
string: 彼との約束を守るべきだ

original: Hunh...
string: うう…

original: You'll get the hang of it.
string: そのうちコツが分かる

original: I've fought worse than you!
string: 何のこれしき！

original: Look at all this. She must have spent years collecting these components.
string: ご覧になって。母は何年もかけてこういう部品を集めていたに違いありませんわ

original: Until the "Betrayed" corrupted you. Yes, yes. We've heard this sad story.
string: “裏切られし者達”に堕落させられるまでは。あらまあ、その悲しいお話ならもう聞きましてよ

original: Your blood will be mine!
string: お前の血はいただく！

original: Mind yourself in that form. Don't go damaging my thralls.
string: その姿で暴れて従徒達を傷つけたりするなよ？

original: Oh, I see. I just assumed he'd sent for both of us. How awkward for you.
string: なるほど。我々両方を呼びつけたものかと。あいにくだったな

original: Take my advice, don't listen to that talk of the "face sculptor" down in the Ragged Flagon. "Face butcher" is more like it from what I've heard.
string: 忠告するわ、ラグド・フラゴンにいる“顔面改造医”の話は聞いちゃだめよ。聞いた限りでは、むしろ“顔面破壊屋”の方が近いわ

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Ah, yes. That. There were... well, complications.
string: ああ、そうでした。実はその… ちょっと面倒がありまして

original: Look, you're great. Really. But I just don't think that's for us.
string: ええ、あなたは素晴らしい方だと思いますわ。でも、それはわたし達の話ではありませんのよ

original: As for the other, the last that I heard, it was lost in the bowels of a Dwemer ruin.
string: もう一方については、最後に聞いた話ではドゥーマーの廃墟で失われたとの事だ

original: Excellent. That should prevent the problem from escalating.
string: 素晴らしい。これで問題の悪化を防げるだろう

original: Are you all right?
string: 大丈夫か？

original: Yes, I see that. I trust his capture was not too difficult a task?
string: そのようだな。捕獲はさほど難しくはなかったのだろうな？

original: The sun cannot protect you any more!
string: 太陽はもうお前たちを守れない！

original: We hunt down and kill vampires. Haven't you been paying attention?
string: 我々は吸血鬼を追い詰めて殺す。知らなかったのか？

original: I see. Interesting that you can set aside your morals when it suits you.
string: なるほど。必要に応じて道徳心を捨て去れるとは…

original: I will banish you from this castle. I will spare your life this once, but after that, you are prey.
string: この城からお前を追放する。今回ばかりは見逃してやるが、その後は獲物とみなす

original: Their job was to keep the Jarl's son contained within. They took it seriously, and served honorably.
string: 彼らの役割は、首長の息子を閉じ込めておく事だった。彼らはその仕事を忠実に立派にこなした

original: That ends it.
string: それで終わりだ

original: You can't beat us!
string: 貴様らには負けないぞ！

original: I guess I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で会う事になりそうね

original: I was.
string: 以前はそうでしたわね

original: I doubt my mother would waste her time with those fools.
string: 母があの愚か者達の相手をするかしら。おそらくありえませんわ

original: Mmm hmm.
string: はいはい

original: Is there anything I can do to help?
string: 何か手を貸せることはあるか？

original: We're just lucky I was here to return the Chalice to Vingalmo, so he could make sure Harkon gets it back.
string: ハルコンが確実に聖杯を取り戻せるよう、私がヴィンガルモへ返しに来ていたのは単なる幸運よ

original: They were both drunk with power, and pulling in different directions.
string: 二人とも力に酔いしれていた。そして別々の道を歩み始めた

original: Why not hide it in the Soul Cairn and then return?
string: ソウル・ケルン内に隠して、自分だけ戻らなかったのは？

original: No, we are vampires, among the oldest and most powerful in Skyrim.
string: 訂正しよう。我々は吸血鬼、スカイリムにおいて最も古く、最も強大な種族だ

original: Don't speak to me, meat.
string: 気安く話しかけないでくれ

original: If I had foreseen the value they placed on my own soul, I would never have come here.
string: もし彼らが私自身の魂に置いた価値を予見していたら、ここには決して来なかったわ

original: Unfortunately, we were constantly at war with the Nords who claimed the land as their ancestral home.
string: しかし悲しい事に、ここが祖先の土地だと主張するノルドとの間で戦争が絶えなかった

original: Got anything left?
string: 他に何かあるか？

original: We're vampire hunters. We search out and destroy those bloodsucking scum wherever we find them.
string: 我々は吸血鬼ハンターを使命としている。あの化け物どもがどこにいようと、探しだして排除する

original: Accept my gift and I promise that you will learn the difference.
string: 我が贈り物を受け取れば、その差が分かると保証しよう

original: Please, make use of my coffin whenever the need arises.
string: どうか私の棺を使ってほしい。必要なときにはいつでも

original: I cast you to Oblivion!
string: オブリビオンに送ってやる！

original: May Auri-El watch over you.
string: アーリエルの加護があらん事を

original: May Auri-El's radiance fill your heart with joy.
string: アーリエルの光がその心を喜びで満たさん事を

original: Make use of my coffin whenever you like. My home is your home.
string: 棺は自分のものだと思って、自由に使ってくれてかまわないからね

original: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
string: ヴリンドリルの間、マルカルスの家だ

original: I sense the power of the ancient blood in your veins. It has made you strong.
string: 古き血の力が体をめぐっているのが分かる。力を得ているようだな

original: While I doubt we'll ever be truly rid of vampires in Skyrim, you've certainly made it a much safer place for now.
string: スカイリムからすべての吸血鬼を駆逐できるとは思えないけど、今までの活躍でかなり危険は減ったと思うわ

original: I want to add some punch to our crossbow capabilities, I've done all I can on my own. I need a little inspiration.
string: クロスボウの威力を改良したいんだけど、思いつく事は全部試してしまったの。何か新しいアイデアがほしいのよ

original: Go to Morthal and find Falion. He's the only one I know of in Skyrim that can cure vampirism.
string: モーサルに行ってファリオンに会うんだ。それを治せるのは、スカイリムでおそらく彼だけだろう

original: His ambition will justify any actions. Put your faith in him, and you will regret it, I promise you.
string: 彼の野望はどんな行動でも正当化するだろう。信頼したら後悔するよ。本当さ

original: What's that? No, that's not what I...  Yes, but... Are you sure? Really?
string: 何だって？ いえ、そういう意味では… はい、しかし… そんな、本当ですか？

original: Now let's finish this.
string: さあ、ケリをつけましょう

original: My mother was meticulous about her research. If we can find her notes, there might be some hints in there.
string: 母の研究は実に入念なものでしたの。記録を見つけられれば、そこに手がかりがあるかも知れませんわ

original: Are you ready now?
string: 用意はいいかしら？

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of one of the ancient Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 太古の血の魔法の指輪のひとつがどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: That will make them all more upset to have one of their citizens slain, and under such flimsy pretense.
string: そうすれば仲間を殺された事に対する市民の怒りは倍増する。見え透いた手だがうまくいくだろう

original: Is he working for my father?
string: 父の下で働いておりますの？

original: Look at this place. No one's been here in centuries.
string: ご覧になって。何世紀というもの、誰一人訪れなかった場所ですわよ

original: You have earned my trust, so I will share what I can.
string: 信頼に足ると判断して、話せる事は話そう

original: Here's the location of the next set of Dwemer diagrams. Thanks!
string: 次のドゥーマーの図面がある場所はここよ。お願いね！

original: An impressive display, but a wasted effort. You delay nothing but your own deaths!
string: いい態度だ。しかし、死ぬのが少し遅くなるだけだ！

original: These chosen few can divine events of the past and future within the scrolls, though in time, it drives us to blindness.
string: 選ばれしそのわずかな者達は、書に記された過去と未来の出来事を読み取る事ができる。ただしそれと引き換えに、何も見えなくなる運命が待ち受けているが

original: Summon them you mean?
string: 召喚するということか？

original: What do they resemble?
string: どんな形状をしているのか？

original: Was there something else?
string: 他に何かあった？

original: Destroy every last one of them!
string: 一匹残らず倒すんだ！

original: Here we are.
string: 着いたか

original: I might be just a soul now, but I'm still not going to give my stuff away. Bring me at least twenty-five husks and then we'll talk.
string: どれほど落ちぶれても自分のものをただで手放すわけにはいかないよ。最低でもハスクを25個持ってきてくれたら話を聞こう

original: Behold the power of Night!
string: 夜の力を見るがいい！

original: We cannot afford to relax.
string: 気を抜いている余裕はない

original: Let's just get this over with.
string: 済ませてしまいましょうか

original: I've discovered the whereabouts of a set of ancient Rings of Blood Magic.
string: 太古の血の魔法の指輪一式がどこにあるか分かったぞ

original: Yeah, too bad. Lord Harkon's new favorite, dead so soon after joining the family.
string: ああ、残念だね。ハルコン卿の新しいお気に入りが、家族の一員になってそんなにすぐ死んでしまったなんて

original: Then we kill him, before he kills us.
string: ならばやられる前にやるまでだ

original: Bleed and die!
string: 血を流して死ぬんだ！

original: He's a very powerful man. Or he was at one point. I'm surprised another vampire hasn't heard of him.
string: 彼は凄い力を持っていますの。少なくとも、ある時点ではそうだった。他の吸血鬼が彼を知らないのが不思議ですわ

original: They could be underground, flying above us... They might be the ground. I have no idea.
string: 彼らは地下にいるのか、空を飛んでいるのか… 地上にいるのか。何もかも不明ですわ

original: Very good, though I suspect there's more wherever he came from.
string: うまくいったな。もっとも、奴の仲間がまだまだいそうだが

original: Don't say I didn't warn you.
string: 警告はいたしましてよ

original: Don't worry, I think I can help you.
string: 心配しないで、手伝えると思うわ

original: Hey, watch it!
string: ちょっと、気をつけて！

original: Good, I could use all the help I can get.
string: ありがたい、借りられる手はすべて借りたいからな

original: What's stopping you?
string: どうして自力では逃げられないのか？

original: Keep your eyes open.
string: 気を抜くなよ

original: Yes, I can feel your defenses crumbling. You want it to end. You want to give in to me.
string: 守りが崩れていくのが分かる。早く終われと思っている。屈服したがっているな

original: Arkay bless you, friend.
string: アーケイの祝福があらん事を

original: Get out while you can.
string: 逃げられるうちに、ここを離れるんだな

original: I appreciate your concern for me, but Serana is all that I care about. You must keep her safe at all costs.
string: 心遣いに感謝するわ、でも私が心配なのはセラーナだけ。何としても彼女の安全を守ってちょうだい

original: There's so much to do. I'm going to head out and start tracking things down. We'll meet again, I'm sure of it.
string: やる事は山ほどある。出発して色々探し始めよう。また会おうね、必ずだよ

original: I'm not sure about this circle, but it's obviously... something.
string: 確かな事は言えませんけど、でもこの円環、明らかに… 何か重要なものですわよ

original: The scroll you found with Serana is one of those scrolls of prophecy. Now that it is back within my grasp, we can read the scroll and learn more.
string: セラーナがもっていた星霜の書は予言が書かれたものの一つだった。我が手中に戻ったので内容を確かめられる

original: I am ready to receive the ancient blood.
string: 古き血を授かる用意ができた

original: Yes, quite. I'm growing weary of speaking to you and my traitorous daughter.
string: そうだな。お前と、私を裏切った娘とこうして口をきくのも疲れてきた

original: I had thought better of you.
string: お前を認めていたんだが

original: For the time being I will remain here, on the overlook and continue trying to keep the Sanctum free of the Betrayed.
string: しばらくはこの見張り台に残って、裏切られし者から聖域を守る仕事を続けるつもりだ

original: Fools.
string: 愚か者め

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: Even in this weather, it's better than the cave.
string: こんな天気でも、洞窟の中よりはましですわ

original: Deciphering one of the Elder Scrolls is nothing like reading a simple book. There's quite a bit of ritual and concentration required.
string: 星霜の書の解読は単なる本読みとは大違いだ。非常に儀式的なものだし、集中力も必要とする

original: What will you do now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: "A powerful warhammer imbued with magic that places warding runes on the ground to obliterate it's wielder's foes."
string: 「魔法で満たされた強力な戦鎚。地面に防御のルーンを描く事により、持つ者の敵を撃破する」

original: See that thing? Dwarves called them 'Kinetic Resonators'. Don't see them very often, least not among the clans in Skyrim.
string: あれが見える？ ドワーフは“動力共鳴装置”と呼んでる。スカイリムの人々には殆ど知られちゃいない代物だよ

original: It looks like there's another lever over on the other side.
string: どうやら反対側にもう1つレバーがあるようですわ

original: I understand.
string: わかった

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: That's why I'm here. Let's go.
string: そのために来た。行こう

original: Well Arkay isn't going to intervene... not here, not now. Best point yourself towards Morthal, find a man named Falion.
string: アーケイは手を出すつもりはない… 今、ここではな。モーサルへ向かって、そこでファリオンという男を探すといい

original: And if he's that concerned, the situation must be pretty bad. Make sense?
string: それほど悩んでるって事は、状況はかなり悪いに違いない。そうでしょ？

original: You've done exactly as I predicted and brought your fetching companion to me.
string: 確かにお前は言った通りの仕事を終え、魅力的な人物を連れ帰ってきた

original: Your kind is a blight on this world.
string: お前たちはこの世をむしばむ呪いだ

original: I'm guessing it's the one you found in Dimhollow Crypt. Says it's got something really important to say to you.
string: おそらく君がディムホロウ墓地で見つけた奴だろう。そいついわく、君に重要な話があるそうだ

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: I'm glad we're finally taking the fight to those monsters.
string: ついにあの怪物どもに戦いを仕掛けるのか。うれしいな

original: Threaten me all you like, it won't matter.
string: 好きなだけ脅すがいい。痛くもかゆくもないぞ

original: Hmm... well, you can pick up where I left off. My notes should still be in my journal, if you can read it.
string: ふふん… あたしの続きから始めればいいんだよ。もし読めれば、日記にまだメモがあるはず

original: Good. Maybe now they'll afford the vampire threat a tad bit more respect, eh?
string: よし。これで彼らも吸血鬼の脅威を少しは真剣に考えるだろう

original: Be careful with those crystals. They feel... hungry.
string: そういうクリスタルには注意なさって。どれも… お腹をすかせてますのよ

original: Like that they were supposed to guard some vampire here, but wound up all becoming vampires themselves when they saw how powerful he was.
string: ここにいる吸血鬼を護衛するために来たけど、吸血鬼のすごい力を目の当たりにして、自分達も吸血鬼になってしまったんだとか

original: I have kept my end of the bargain, now I expect you to keep yours.
string: 私は約束を果たした、今度はお前の番だ

original: All right, I suppose I could do that.
string: まあ、それならいいだろう

original: That is all I have to teach you. If you wish to be reminded of these lessons, you need only ask.
string: 教える事は以上だ。もう一度聞きたければ、申し出るがいい

original: Of course. Hasn't everyone?
string: もちろん。誰だってそうだろう？

original: I have the bow.
string: 弓を手に入れた

original: Do you actually believe any of that?
string: あんな話をちょっとでも信じてるのか？

original: Disgusting creatures.
string: おぞましい化け物達ですわね

original: Vingalmo, is there... can I do anything for you?
string: ヴィンガルモ、何かその… 手伝う事はないですか？

original: No, I don't think so.
string: いや、違うと思う

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: I'd like to be able to make a potion without tasting iron flakes, you know?
string: ポーションは作りたいが、鉄の粉が口に入るのは嫌なんだよ。へへ、わかるだろう？

original: Emptiness consumes me.
string: 虚無感に押しつぶされそうだ

original: If I ventured far from the Soul Cairn, my strength would begin to wane until I was no more.
string: ソウル・ケルンから離れれば力が衰え、やがてこの身も滅んでしまうだろう

original: Where did you get to?
string: どこに行きまして？

original: Oh, come now... spare me your notions of kinship.
string: これはこれは、我々の間柄を誤解してはいまいか？

original: Your deception is useless. I'll find you.
string: 惑わされないぞ。すぐ捕えてやる

original: I can help you get it, but first I must have your assistance.
string: あれを手に入れたいなら協力してもいいが、その前に手を貸してほしい

original: If remnants of our kind who escaped the betrayal at the hands of the dwarves exist out there, perhaps they will find this place one day.
string: もし、裏切られし者の手を逃れ、ドワーフに助けられた同胞がいたら、いつの日かここを見つけてくれるだろう

original: Troll, wait!
string: トロールよ、待て！

original: What do you do?
string: どんな仕事なんだ？

original: Feran is so good to me, allowing me to be his assistant.
string: フェランはとても親切にしてくれる。助手に取り立てられたんだ

original: Sorry, I know you're trying to help. Thanks.
string: ごめんなさい。あなたの善意は分かっておりますのよ。ありがとう

original: Will I be able to safely revisit the Soul Cairn?
string: 無事にもう一度ソウル・ケルンに来ることはできるだろうか？

original: But I had no idea she had a setup like this.
string: でも、こんな仕掛けがあるなんて夢にも思いませんでしたわ

original: I have a house in Riften.
string: リフテンに家がある

original: Take good care of it for me.
string: 大事に扱ってね

original: Come now, you think you stand a chance against me?
string: さあ、お前に勝ち目があると思うか？

original: You are the Dovahkiin, the Dragonborn. You may not be one of us in body, but you have earned the right to bear this title.
string: そなたはドヴァーキン、すなわちドラゴンボーンなのだ。身体は我らの一員ではなくとも、この称号を名乗る資格を勝ち得ている

original: But once we threw our lot in with Molag Bal... people just don't think about their families anymore. "Power takes precedence," he always said.
string: けれどモラグ・バルに運命をゆだねると… 家族の事なんてどうでもよくなってしまいますの。父はいつも「力の前に力なし」と言っていましたわ

original: I did, in fact. Quite perceptive of you.
string: 確かにそのとおりだ。君は鋭いね

original: See those things in the alcoves up there? 'Kinetic Resonators', the dwarves called them. Strike them in the right order, and the doors should open.
string: あそこのくぼみにあるものが見える？ ドワーフは“動力共鳴装置”と呼んでいるんだ。正しい順番で叩けば、扉は開くはずだよ

original: You can't get rid of me that easily.
string: そう簡単に、わたしはいなくなりませんわよ

original: By the blood...
string: ああ、ご先祖様…

original: I'm sorry, Serana. I didn't know... I didn't see.
string: ごめんなさい、セラーナ。知らなかった… 分からなかった

original: If Isran is really asking for me, it must be serious. I'll help. Where do you need me to go?
string: イスランが私を必要としているなら、かなり深刻な事態ね。手を貸さなくちゃ。どこへ行けばいいの？

original: I had just moved from my ancestral home in Morrowind to the continent of Cyrodiil.
string: 祖先から受け継いだモロウウィンドの土地を離れ、シロディール大陸に渡ってきたばかりの時だ

original: It's in a place called Darkfall Cave.
string: ダークフォール洞窟と呼ばれる場所にある

original: It sounds like you don't like either of them very much.
string: どちらのこともあまりこころよく思っていないみたいだな

original: When did I say that?
string: そんな事をいつ言った？

original: Good job.
string: よくやったわ

original: Well, there's the Falmer, to start with. Deadly rapids. Major earthquakes. Massive chasms. Unstable ground. Lethal falls.
string: そうだね、まずはファルメル。そして命取りの急流。大地震。巨大な裂け目。不安定な地面。死をもたらす滝

original: Last I knew, she was out in the Reach, convinced she was about to find the biggest dwarven ruins yet.
string: 最後に消息を聞いた時は、彼女はリーチにいた。ドワーフの最大の遺跡を発見できると見込んでいたようだ

original: Farewell.
string: さらばだ

original: They probably would have tried to kill her, and that has a way of souring relationships.
string: 彼らはきっと母を殺そうとしたでしょうね。でしたら関係は最悪ですわよ

original: What's the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードとは？

original: Then we'll have to take care of him.
string: ならば彼をどうにかする必要がある

original: You're no pilgrim.
string: 巡礼者などではないな

original: You're infected? Get away from me. Get yourself cured, or don't come near Fort Dawnguard again.
string: 感染者か？ 近寄るんじゃない。治療をするまでは二度とドーンガード砦に近づくなよ

original: He's alive. I've seen him.
string: 彼は生きている。姿を見た

original: Did you at least find out what the vampires were looking for in there?
string: 少なくとも、吸血鬼達があそこで何を探していたのかは分かったか？

original: Let's... uh... let's just keep going.
string: さあ… うっ… 先に進みましょう

original: Ronthil, where is the last batch of alchemy ingredients I asked you for?
string: ロンシル、頼んでいた最後の錬金術用の素材はどこにある？

original: I'll find you yet, coward.
string: すぐ見つけてやるぞ、卑怯者め

original: All right...
string: 大丈夫よ…

original: We earned this.
string: 苦労して手に入れたものですのよ

original: You wanted to speak with me?
string: 話があると聞いた

original: I'm not going to take your blood right now.
string: 今すぐに血をもらう必要はない

original: Pitiful. Simply pitiful. I expected more from the defiant fool that beguiled my daughter.
string: 情けない、実に情けないぞ。我が娘を魅了した身の程知らずが、その程度か

original: The corpse is to be the message, not the attack.
string: 死体は攻撃ではなく伝達のために使うのよ

original: You haven't seen a sack full of dwarven gyros lying around, have you? I'd swear I left it right here.
string: この辺りに、ドゥーマーのジャイロが入った袋はなかった？ 確かにここに置いたんだけど

original: Beware the dragon Durnehviir, destroyer of souls and harbinger of the fallen.
string: ドラゴンに気をつけて。魂を破壊し、滅びをもたらすわ

original: So, let's get this straight.
string: それでは、話を整理しますわよ

original: Troll, follow me!
string: トロールよ、ついて来い！

original: Shadows take you!
string: 闇に呑まれよ！

original: Does Harkon even care about you anymore?
string: 今のハルコンは、君のことを少しでも想っているのか？

original: I'm a little nervous about all of this.
string: こういう事に、ちょっと神経質になっておりますの

original: No, I haven't seen any.
string: いや、見ていない

original: Gah...
string: ぐう…

original: Just get all of the ingredients into the vessel.
string: 材料をぜんぶ器に入れて下さいまし

original: And I suppose you're the one Tolan says is actually doing something about this mess.
string: 君がこの惨状を何とかしてくれるらしいな。トランから聞いたが

original: Wait here.
string: ここで待て

original: Let me know if you want me along.
string: わたしと行きたい時は教えて下さいましね

original: I'll probably stay here, for as long as they'll let me.
string: 追い出されない限りは、ずっとここにいると思いますわ

original: At this rate, my first volume will be complete. Don't give up.
string: この調子でいけば、第一巻が復元される日も近い。諦めるなよ

original: My sincerest pardons, I but look after your own peace of mind.
string: 悪いね、でも君の心の平穏って奴が気になったんだ

original: My ship... what happened to my ship? Where am I?
string: 船は… 私の船はどこ？ ここは一体どこなんだ？

original: Oh, absolutely. But my mother's not a coward.
string: そのとおりですわ。でも母は卑怯者ではございませんの

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: My vision darkens, and I see no more.
string: 暗くてもう見えないよ
…うーん？

original: Find Sorine and Gunmar, and maybe we can do something about this mess.
string: ソリーヌとガンマーを見つけてくれ。そうすればこのひどい状況も好転するだろう

original: Set your hatred aside and try to see the larger picture, Isran.
string: 憎しみを忘れて大局を見るんだ、イスラン

original: Excellent. That's one less beast and nest of broodlings we needn't worry about any longer.
string: 素晴らしい。これで危険な化け物一家を一つ減らせたわけだな

original: Help yourself to anything you need in my laboratory.
string: 私の研究所で必要なものがあればご自由にどうぞ

original: What now?
string: 今度は何？

original: Somewhere in the ice fields, if you want to try to find him.
string: もし彼を探す気があるのなら、氷原のどこかを当たってみたらいい

original: You have the bow...
string: 君は弓を持ってる…

original: She would have hated to see it like this.
string: 母がこの様子を目にしたら悲しんだでしょうね

original: Well, go on, take it!
string: さあ、どうぞ。ほら！

original: Nobody hears from them much anymore.
string: 音沙汰がほとんどなくなっている

original: Yes, it is, and it's mine.
string: ええ。わたしのものですわ

original: Auriel's Bow. Well done, indeed.
string: アーリエルの弓か。実によくやった

original: The herd is becoming distressed, which makes it more difficult for us to slip in and out undetected.
string: 民衆の動揺がこれ以上続けば、我らが気づかれずに出入りするのがより困難になるだろう

original: Take me near the castle to the west. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge> gold)
string: 西の城へと渡してほしい(<Global=DLC1FerryCostLarge>ゴールド)

original: That bark's pretty fragrant, no wonder the moths are attracted to it.
string: あの樹皮はすごく良い“香り”がしますもの。蚕が引き寄せられるのも無理ありませんわ

original: What? What is this?
string: 何だ？ 何だこれは？

original: I'll stain the ground with your blood!
string: 血の海でもがき苦しめ！

original: I've saved her from your foolish plan.
string: あんたのばかげた計画から彼女を助け出した

original: Not just vampires. We are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim.
string: 吸血鬼であるだけではない。我々はスカイリムの吸血鬼の中でも最も古く、最も強大な一族だ

original: Good.
string: いい返事ね

original: Cease your flight and we will move on to the next lesson.
string: 飛行をやめれば次の話をしてやろう

original: Follow me, this way.
string: ついてきて、こっちよ

original: A bunch of feral vampires are running wild, upsetting the mortals.
string: 野生化した吸血鬼の群れがはびこり、定命の者達を混乱させている

original: Need something?
string: 何か探してるのかい？

original: If eternal night fell, there are many who wouldn't stand for it. They would raise armies in attempts to return things to normal.
string: 永遠の夜が訪れれば、それに我慢できない者達が大勢現れる。彼らは軍隊を召集し、事態を普通に戻そうとするでしょう

original: Then he found that prophecy, and... that was it.
string: そんな時に父があの予言を見つけて… それが終わりの始まりでしたの

original: But before I send you on your way, you'll need the Initiate's Ewer.
string: 送り出す前に、新人の水差しが必要だな

original: That's it? All right.
string: あれがそうですの？ 分かりましたわ

original: But after everything with her... I don't think we can trust him.
string: けれども母と会って… 父の事が信用できなくなりましたわ

original: Ideas?
string: いい案はないか？

original: All right, now pull your lever!
string: いいですわ。そっちのレバーを引いて！

original: Those last ones helped me immensely. If you could collect this one for me, it's sure to result in extraordinary success!
string: 前に見つかった分は、すごく役に立ったわ。また見つけてきてくれたら、驚きの成果が挙げられると思うの！

original: Was it "Between the forces of good and evil."? No, no... that's not it...
string: 「善と悪のはざま」？ 違う、違うぞ… 何だったっけかな…

original: The sun's gone dark. What could be happening now?
string: 太陽が暗くなった。一体何が起こっている？

original: No, sire. I have not.
string: いいえ。まだです

original: How so?
string: どうして？

original: Jeron was furious to be left guarding the door.
string: ジェロンの奴、扉の番なんかやらされてカンカンだったわね

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: May Auri-El keep you free from harm.
string: アーリエルの守護があらん事を

original: Must... resist...
string: 抵抗… しなければ…

original: I think my father wanted to see you. Have you talked to him yet?
string: 父があなたに会いたがっていたと思いますけれど、もう話はいたしましたの？

original: Time was I could barely hold my own in the Companions. Now I could slaughter them all without a second thought.
string: 同胞団にいた頃は自制するのがやっとだった。今なら何のためらいもなく彼ら全員を殺せそうよ

original: We need to do something about these vampire attacks.
string: この吸血鬼の攻撃を何とかしなければ

original: You disappoint me, Serana. You've taken everything I provided for you and thrown it all away for this... pathetic half-breed vampire.
string: 失望したぞ、セラーナ。私がお前に与えたもののすべてを投げ捨てたというのか、この情けない半吸血鬼のために

original: You know why we're here.
string: わたし達がここにいる理由はお分かりですわね

original: I think you know.
string: ご存知のはずですわ

original: I fear for what is to come.
string: 何が待ち受けているのか…

original: I'm not afraid of you!
string: お前なんか怖くないぞ！

original: Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
string: 父に仕えている人？

original: If you're putting yourself in harm's way, you'd best be prepared. Take these.
string: 身を危険にさらすなら、準備は入念にすべきだ。これを使うといい

original: That's all I wanted to ask.
string: 聞きたいのはそれだけだ

original: Oh, very well. I don't know how you expect me to keep this place in order when I can't make a profit.
string: そうかい。利益を上げずに店を経営しろとか言うんじゃないだろうな？

original: I have two of the other shards already.
string: 既に破片をもう2つ持っている

original: If you're not one of us, you're just another piece of meat.
string: 私達の仲間でないなら、あなたはただの肉片と同じよ

original: And from what I could tell, a thousand extra years of obsession haven't made him any better. We should have found him a hobby.
string: わたしに分かる限りでは、さらに千年ほど没頭した事で改善するはずもなかったようですわね。何か趣味でも見つけてあげるべきでしたわ

original: I want to buy back the Elder Scroll I sold you.
string: 売りつけた星霜の書を買い戻したい

original: What exactly are the Ideal Masters?
string: アイディール・マスターとはいったい？

original: I hope so.
string: だとよいですわね

original: Well, that's usually the trick. It's possible to do it through a simple portal.
string: 普通はそれでうまくいきますわ。簡単な転移門を通れば十分可能ですの

original: Alright. Now take note. He'll mind you and us Dawnguard, but there's no accounting for other folk.
string: さて、心得ておいてほしいのは、お前や我々ドーンガードには気を遣ってくれるが、それ以外に対しては分からないって事だ

original: Do you ever think about curing yourself?
string: 治療法を探そうと考えたことはあるか？

original: Oh, I see. You've decided to cease pursuing your busy schedule and wish to talk now. How kind.
string: ああ、忙しい中、予定を後回しにして話をしてくれるのか。そりゃどうもね

original: You're a vampire?
string: 吸血鬼なのか？

original: Oh, I've read a few things. Heard a few more things. Arkay's told me a bit as well.
string: ああ、本で読んだ事があるし、噂も耳にした。アーケイからも聞いた事がある
