original: It's just... it's not for me.
string: そんな事… すべきではありませんわよ

original: I therefore honor-name you "Qahnaarin," or Vanquisher in your tongue.
string: よってそなたに征服者を意味する“クァーナーリン”の名を授けよう

original: The Dawnguard are apparently focused on exterminating vampires, noble and brute alike.
string: ドーンガードは吸血鬼の根絶に重点を置いている、貴族もけだものも一様にな

original: This isn't that watered down child's power that you simply contract from another vampire. We're pureblood creations of original vampires.
string: 他の吸血鬼が出せる、子供だましな力とは別物ですの。最初に造られた、純粋な吸血鬼なのですから

original: Sorine thought we'd need his help.
string: ソリーヌが、彼の助けが必要になるだろうと

original: I see. Where are you taking me, then? Is that much my business?
string: 分かりましたわ。それで、どこに連れて行く気かしら？ わたしに関係のある所ですの？

original: I've found your mother's notes.
string: 母親の日記を見つけた

original: That's easy to say, but I definitely didn't help things.
string: 口で言うのは簡単でしょうけれど、わたしにはどうする事もできませんでしたの

original: That's how I ended up here. I can't rest. Not until I find the Forge, until I can prove that it was my discovery. Mine, not his!
string: それでここに行き着いたんだ。眠りにつく事はできない。鋳造器具を見つけ、それがあたしの発見だと証明できるまで。彼じゃなくあたしの！

original: I'm starting to think you like this as much as I do!
string: あなたも楽しくなってきたんじゃない？

original: These things are everywhere, aren't they?
string: これってどこにでもありますのね

original: Indeed. It is no small thing to submit yourself to the flesh sculptor's knife.
string: そうよね。肉体改造医のナイフに身を委ねるのは容易ではないわ

original: It's good to speak to you again.
string: また会えて嬉しいぞ

original: But if you want to know the whole story, help me get back to my family's home.
string: でも、すべてが知りたいのでしたら、わたしを家族が住む家に帰して頂きますわよ

original: The time has come to finally put an end to Harkon and his unholy prophecy!
string: ハルコンと奴の不浄な予言を終わらせる時が訪れたのだ！

original: Back to visit Jiub the Magnificent, eh?
string: またもやこの偉大なるジウブを訪ねて来たりしたのかな？

original: I never knew what became of Kvatch. I wonder if they were triumphant without me.
string: クヴァッチがどうなったのかも知らない。残った人々は勝てたのかな

original: It looks like some kind of temple.
string: どうやら聖堂か何かのようですわね

original: DialogueFerrySystemIdle
string: DialogueFerrySystemIdle

original: We haven't gotten anywhere ourselves with...
string: まだ何も進展がないのに…

original: Arkay's been watching over me for years now. He says he's not too sure about you yet, though.
string: アーケイは何年も前から、俺を守ってくれている。あんたの事は、まだ分からんと言ってるがな

original: Let me show you what I need.
string: 探しているものがある

original: If you think it'll help.
string: それは役に立つと思いますわ

original: Not until you get rid of whoever your other friend is.
string: 他の仲間と別れてきてくれましたらね

original: How has it affected your family?
string: 家族にはどのような影響が？

original: Now be silent, and hear what I have to say.
string: 黙って私の話を聞くがいい

original: Now you're beginning to see why I wanted to protect Serana, and why I've kept the other Elder Scroll as far from her as possible.
string: これで、私がセラーナを守りたかった理由、そして星霜の書を彼女からできるだけ遠ざけてきた理由が分かり始めたでしょう

original: Fair enough. What do you have?
string: なるほど。何があるんだ？

original: The only way I'd even consider returning to Tamriel was if Harkon were not only to fail, but to be destroyed.
string: タムリエルへの帰還を検討するとすれば、その唯一の道はハルコンが失脚するだけでなく、死ぬ事よ

original: It's not like anything else in Skyrim, I can tell you that much. From now or... before.
string: スカイリムのどんなものとも趣が異なりますわ。それだけは確かですわね。今も… 昔も

original: Your choice.
string: あなた次第ですわ

original: What will you do if we find your mother?
string: 母親が見つかったとしたら、どうする？

original: I never forget who my friends are. Or my enemies.
string: 誰が仲間で、誰が敵なのか、忘れなどしない

original: Who said something, Sorine or Gunmar? I thought they'd have learned their lesson by now.
string: 誰が言ったんだ？ ソリーヌか？ ガンマーか？ 彼らは十分教訓を学んだと思っていたが

original: Hold up. We... need to talk.
string: 待って。話す必要が… あるんじゃないかな

original: Of course I'm delighted to see you, my daughter. Must I really say the words aloud?
string: もちろん会えて嬉しいに決まっているだろう。言葉として口にしないと分からんのか？

original: Look at the sky. What kind of a place is this?
string: 空をご覧になって。ここは一体どういう場所なの？

original: Yes, how may I serve you, milady?
string: 奥様、ご用は何ですか？

original: Hello there.
string: やあ、こんにちは

original: You will not touch him.
string: 彼には指一本触れさせませんわ

original: Not even the gods will show you mercy!
string: 神でさえお前らには慈悲の心を持つまい！

original: Come with me. (Persuade)
string: 一緒に来てほしい(説得)

original: Qoth...Zaam!
string: クォス…ザーム！

original: Come on. It's just around the side.
string: さあ。横手に回りましょう

original: Enjoy yourself.
string: 楽しんでこい

original: Follow me and stay close. Keep your eyes open for Durnehviir.
string: 私についてきて、離れないで。ダーネヴィールに十分気をつけて

original: It is done. I've slain someone on the streets of <Alias=City>.
string: 言われた通りにやった。<Alias=City>の路上で人を殺めた

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Yes, let me show you.
string: ああ、見せてやろう

original: Damn Akaviri Shaman... how could I know it would trap my soul?
string: 忌々しいアカヴィリの呪術師… まさか、魂を捕らえられるなんて！

original: As long as you're ready to kill him, that's all that matters.
string: 彼を殺す用意さえあるなら、問題ない

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: Maybe you should leave the writing to an expert and stop making foolish suggestions.
string: 文章の事は専門家に任せて、下らない提案はやめたらどうかね

original: There's my wife...
string: 妻がいる

original: I've proven my value to him.
string: 自分の価値を証明してみせたはずだ

original: No, and I'm not going to waste men looking. We're fighting a war against your kind, and I intend to win it.
string: ダメだ。そんな事に人員を割くのは無理だ。我々は君達の種族と戦ってるんだぞ。そして私はその戦いに勝つつもりでいる

original: Turning someone is a very... personal thing for vampires. It's intimate. For us.
string: 誰かを変えるという事は… わたし達吸血鬼にとっては、とても特別な事ですの

original: And Serana's opinion in this?
string: セラーナの意見は？

original: Where have you been?
string: どこにおりましたの？

original: No, I'm here to prevent our annihilation.
string: 我々の根絶を防ぐためにここにいる

original: My brother in darkness. While it's good to see you, we'll keep up appearances, yes?
string: 闇の兄弟よ。会えてうれしいけれど、平静を装いましょう。いいわね？

original: I'd like to buy an armored troll. (<Global=DLC1TrollCost> gold)
string: 武装したトロールを買いたい(<Global=DLC1TrollCost>ゴールド)

original: Well, too bad for you... I intend on keeping it. Let's see if your blood has any power to it!
string: でもお生憎様。これは渡しませんわよ。あなたの血の力がこれにも通用するかどうか、見てみましょうか！

original: The Chalice? Why?
string: 聖杯が？ なぜだ？

original: I never knew them. I grew up alone.
string: 両親の顔は知らない。物心ついた頃には独りだった

original: It was a little... quieter... back then. Guess a little vampire girl was enough to scare off the rats.
string: 当時はもう少し… 静かなところでしたわね。吸血鬼の少女でもネズミを十分追い払えましたわよ

original: If you were anybody else, I'd probably be taking some blood from you for asking that.
string: あなた以外の人でしたら、そんな事を頼んできたら血を抜き取ってやりましたのに

original: Auri-El forgives you.
string: アーリエルの許しを請え

original: Very well, then.
string: それでは

original: And now that you've stirred up the vampires against you, you come begging for my protection?
string: 吸血鬼達を自分で怒らせたくせに、私に守ってほしいと言うのか？

original: I don't feel... right... I'm going to lay down... for awhile...
string: 何か… おかしい… 少しの間… 横になるよ…

original: I'm afraid in my haste to read the first scroll, I neglected the time I needed to prepare. The failure is purely mine to bear.
string: 最初の書を早く読みたくて、ちゃんとした準備を怠ったのです。自業自得ですよ

original: All right. If you say so.
string: 分かりましたわ。そうおっしゃるなら

original: Do you have any insights about your Elder Scroll reading?
string: 星霜の書の解読について何か気づいたことは？

original: Why not just scream at the top of your lungs "Here we are, monsters! We're oh so tasty! Come and get us!"
string: 声の限りに叫べばいいじゃないか。「こっちだ、バケモノめ！ 俺達は美味いぞ！ 食べに来いよ！」とな

original: So you'll help us?
string: 手を貸してくれると？

original: It was expected of her, just as it was expected of me.
string: それが彼女に期待されていた、私と同じようにね

original: Honestly, I don't think they care what a bunch of vampires would do with Auriel's Bow. They're pretty focused on the past.
string: 正直なところ、吸血鬼達がアーリエルの弓をどうしようが彼らは気にしないと思われますわ。彼らは過去に注目しておりますもの

original: And yet, as my mortal life neared an end, I faced a seemingly invincible enemy -- my own mortality.
string: しかし、寿命の終わりが近づくと共に、私は打倒不可能と思える敵、自らの命のぜい弱性と向き合う事になったのだよ

original: Neh...Viir!
string: ネー… ヴィール！

original: This is everything I've got right now.
string: 今あるのはこれで全部だ

original: No, they didn't. But that's why I like being out here with you.
string: それはございませんわ。あなたと一緒に出掛けるのは好きですもの

original: I have nothing more to say to you.
string: もう話す事はないよ

original: So they have everything they wanted, and we're left with nothing.
string: つまり奴らはほしいものをすべて手に入れたというわけだ。こっちには何も残されてないのに

original: If all else fails, just take a chance, see what happens. Wouldn't be surprised if half the traps had been sprung by now...
string: 他がすべて失敗したら、いちかばちかやってみて、様子を見て。すでに罠の半分が作動していても不思議じゃない…

original: Gah... let's clear out this steam so we can take a look.
string: ゴホ… この蒸気を払って、見てみようか

original: Bedroom furnishings. (<Global=HDWindhelmBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室用品(<Global=HDWindhelmBedroom> ゴールド)

original: How did you survive the vampires' attack?
string: 吸血鬼の襲撃を生き延びられたのは？

original: Grrargh!
string: がるるる！

original: It's my fault. In my haste to read the first scroll, I neglected the careful preparation required.
string: 失敗したんだよ。最初の書を早く読みたくて、ちゃんとした準備を怠ったんだ

original: May Auri-El's light guide you in your darkest hours.
string: 苦難の時も、アーリエルの光の導きがあらん事を

original: Why, you would be distraught with emotion, perhaps even to the point of questioning your loyalty to this Court. And we ours to you.
string: 君は感情を抑えきれず取り乱すだろう。もしかしたらこの宮廷への忠誠が揺らぐかも知れない。そして我々は君の心変わりを疑うというわけだ

original: Another adventure.
string: 新たな冒険の始まりですわね

original: Your voice drips with the venom of your mother's influence. How alike you've become.
string: 母親の影響が毒となってお前の声から滴っている。実によく似てきたものだ

original: It's our time now.
string: 我々の時代が来た

original: What's that, Lord? Well, should I tell her?
string: 何ですって？ それは彼女に話しても？

original: He's been working on that place for years now. Never lets anyone in.
string: 奴はもう何年もあれに手を加え続けている。誰も中には入れようとしない

original: Oh no! What have I done?
string: ああ、とんでもない事を！

original: Auriel's Bow is ours. Deliver it to Lord Harkon at once, so we can reap the benefits of this prophecy.
string: アーリエルの弓は私達のものよ。このお告げの恩恵を受けられるよう、すぐにハルコン卿へ届けて

original: I'm afraid I'll need elven arrows if you want me to produce the Sunhallowed Arrows, and it seems you're all out of them at the moment.
string: 太陽神の矢を作るには、エルフの矢が必要だ。残念ながら、見たところ手持ちがないようだな

original: I shouldn't have brought it up again.
string: 繰り返し話題にすべきじゃなかった

original: Which, I'm sorry to say, means your usefulness is at an end!
string: つまり、お前はもう用済みだという事だ！

original: Hide if you wish, it matters little to me.
string: 好きなだけ隠れるがいい。何も変わらない

original: Sadly, yes. It's the inevitable fate we agree to pursue when reading the Elder Scrolls.
string: 残念ながらそうだ。星霜の書を読むならば、目にした運命そのものをたどる事を覚悟しなければならない

original: Do you... know what you're doing?
string: あなた… 目算はありまして？

original: Politics bore me terribly, but they're a fact of life here.
string: 政治は退屈極まりないが、ここでは日常の一部だよ

original: How about right here, in the castle?
string: この城の中は？

original: And unless I'm seeing things, you're starting to... glimmer.
string: それに、わたしが幻を見ているのでもない限り、あなた… 発光してますわよ

original: That letter's the last I've heard of him and mentions where he is. Now please, leave me alone.
string: あれが彼から届いた最後の手紙だ。居場所が書いてある。さあ、もう一人にしてくれ

original: My time... has come...
string: これで… 最後か…

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
string: ハアッ…

original: Now, I believe that Lord Harkon wishes to speak with you.
string: さて、ハルコン卿がお前と話したがっている事だろう

original: These Falmer are... they're frozen in the ice.
string: このファルメル達… 氷漬けになっていますわ

original: I wish I could say it was courage, or skill at arms that saved me. But that would be a lie.
string: 勇気か武器の腕前で助かったと言いたいが、それでは嘘になってしまう

original: Where're these vampires coming from? We need to wipe them out before things get worse.
string: この吸血鬼どもはどこから来る？ 事態が悪化する前に、奴らを一掃しなければ

original: This isn't really a good time.
string: あまりいいタイミングではありませんわね

original: He knew nothing. He served his purpose by leading us to this place. Now it is up to us to bring Harkon the prize.
string: 奴は何も知らなかった。我々をこの場所に導いた時点で用済みという事だ。後は我々がハルコンに宝を届けるまで

original: Another cave. I've spent enough time underground, myself, but if you want to go in, I'm right behind you.
string: また洞窟ですの？ 地下にはもう飽き飽きしていますけど、あなたがどうしてもと言うなら仕方がありませんわね、お供いたしますわ

original: Conduits through which the Ideal Masters speak to their underlings and feed on their victims.
string: アイディール・マスターが手下へ語りかけ、彼らの犠牲者達を捕食するのに使う導管よ

original: I need to go there anyway.
string: いずれにせよそこに行かないと

original: I've been really wanting to get out and explore a bit.
string: 外に出て、歩き回ってみたくてたまらなくなりましたのよ

original: Vampires, perhaps?
string: 吸血鬼とかかな？

original: Ask Serana to make you one of us again, before someone makes a meal out of you.
string: 誰かがあなたを食べてしまう前に、セラーナに頼んでまた私達の仲間にしてもらいなさい

original: Stop wasting my time, Garan.
string: そんなのは時間の無駄だな、ガラン

original: I can't think of any reason I'd want to lose this gift. Especially after what I did to get it.
string: この力を捨てる理由なんて、どこにもございませんわ。あれだけ苦労して手に入れたのに

original: I wasn't sure you'd come back for me. I'm still looking for a guide to get me home. What do you say?
string: 戻って来てくれるかは自信なかったけど、まだ家に案内してくれる誰かを探しているわ。お願いできないかしら？

original: I wonder what happened here.
string: 何が起こったのかしら、ここで…

original: Good.
string: いい返事ね

original: Well, back before I... you know. The College of Winterhold was the first place I'd think to go for any kind of magic or historical thing.
string: まあ以前は… 色々と。最初に行こうと考えたのはウィンターホールド大学でしたわ。魔法や歴史を学ぼうと思いましたの

original: I spent my life tracking down that legend... until my damn apprentice stole everything from me, and published it all under his own name.
string: あたしは伝説を追うのに生涯を費やした… あの見習いがすべてを盗み、彼の名前ですべてを発表するまではね

original: I'm glad we found the scroll, but I... I wish she could come with us.
string: 書が見つかったのは嬉しいですわ、でも… 母にも一緒に来てほしかった

original: Kill the beast!
string: あいつを殺して下さい！

original: Maybe we should try asking at the College of Winterhold. Sounds like something they'd know about.
string: ウィンターホールド大学に行って聞いた方がいいですわね。彼らなら何か知ってそうですし

original: Vampires are worse than Daedra. I wish we Vigilants had taken them more seriously while we we had the chance.
string: 吸血鬼はデイドラ以上に厄介だ。手遅れにならないうちに我ら番人がその危険に気づけていればよかったんだが…

original: Isran's inside the fort. He's the one you need to talk to.
string: イスランは砦の中だ。彼に直談判するといい

original: Fine. You could've just said 'no'.
string: 分かったわ。一言「ダメ」って言えばいいのよ

original: Where is he now?
string: 今はどこに？

original: I hope you comprehend killing better than you comprehend speech.
string: おしゃべりより殺しの方を理解してほしいものだな

original: Beautiful. That staff... it's everything I could have hoped for.
string: 美しいね。あの杖… 非の打ちどころがない

original: I can take you to any port on the coast.
string: 沿岸の港ならどこにでもいくよ

original: It's been a long time since I felt that way and it's been long overdue. My thanks, to both of you.
string: 昔から思っていた事だが、長らく実現する気配もなかった。お前達に感謝しないとな

original: You don't scare me. Let's go.
string: 脅しは必要ない。行こう

original: Come forward. You have nothing to fear here.
string: 近くへ来い。恐れる事はない

original: I look forward to our next meeting.
string: 次に会うのを楽しみにしてるよ

original: I'll be off then.
string: それでは、先を急ぐか

original: What do I do with the knife?
string: ナイフはどうすれば？

original: Never mind, I'll look somewhere else.
string: まあいい、別の所を探してみる

original: Don't leave, you'd have better dreams here...
string: 帰る前に、いい夢見ていきなさいよ…

original: Why wouldn't Isran like me asking about Florentius?
string: どうしてフロレンティウスのことを聞くとイスランが嫌がるんだ？

original: Exactly!
string: その通りですわよ！

original: Where can I find him?
string: 彼はどこにいる？

original: Then let's face him, together.
string: 共に彼と対決しよう

original: What's so special about the moondial?
string: その月時計は何か特別なものなのか？

original: Can you make me some Sunhallowed Arrows?
string: 太陽神の矢を作ってもらえないか？

original: I'm going to go away for a while. I'll meet you back home when I'm done.
string: 少しの間、出かけてきますわ。終わったら家に帰ってきますわね

original: I understand. Take your time.
string: 分かりますわ。焦る必要はなくてよ

original: The old water cistern. On some days, this would smell just... be glad you weren't here then.
string: 古い貯水池ですわ。ここの臭いときたら日によっては… 言わぬが花というものですわね

original: So, welcome to Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦にようこそ

original: Have you seen a Moth Priest?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見なかったか？

original: (Bark)
string: ワン！

original: As well you should have.
string: お前もそうするべきだった

original: Can the Betrayed ever be cured?
string: 裏切られし者を治療することは？

original: We both know what's going to have to happen once we find the bow.
string: 弓を見つけたら何が起こるのか、わたし達お互いに

original: The Dawnguard have increased their operations and have been aggressively recruiting.
string: ドーンガードはその活動範囲を広げ、積極的に構成員を募集している

original: A pristine copy of my first volume. Only one in print, actually.
string: これぞ第一巻の初版本。印さつされたものは、なんとこの1冊だけ

original: I'm on my way to Markarth to confer with my colleague, Calcelmo. I've no time to stop and chat.
string: 同僚のカルセルモと会うためにマルカルスに行くところだ。立ち止まっておしゃべりする暇はない

original: Are you sure that's something you want? This isn't like picking out a new outfit. You'll be a creature of the night, like me.
string: 本気ですの？ 新しい装備品を選ぶのとはわけが違いますわ。夜の申し子になりますのよ、わたしみたいに

original: Mother had something similar back home when she was tending the courtyard gardens to scrape moss and fungus off of the trees.
string: うちに似たようなやつがあったわ。母が中庭の庭園でコケやキノコを木からはがすのに使ってたの

original: Others think they use them as payment to an even higher power... almost like a currency. A very strange currency.
string: より大きな力への代償として彼らはそれを使うという人もおりますし… まるでお金ですわね。お金にしては奇妙ですけれど

original: An old escape tunnel from the castle exits there. I think that's our way in.
string: 昔の脱出用トンネルが城からそこまでつながっていますわ。あそこから入れるはずですわよ

original: I can't do everything for you.
string: なんでもして差し上げるわけにはいかなくてよ

original: That circle in the center of the room is definitely some type of portal.
string: 部屋の中央の円が何らかの転移門なのは間違いなさそうですわね

original: They tried to kill me!
string: 殺されそうになった！

original: Yeah. Is it just you, or do you have... people in your life?
string: そうですわ。あなたは一人で生きてきましたの？ それとも、誰かが周りにいた？

original: Perhaps her death is destined.
string: 彼女の死は運命で決められたことかもな

original: Parading around in that form won't do you any good here.
string: ここをその姿で練り歩くのは何の得にもならないわよ

original: For all of this to end, he must die.
string: このすべてを終えるには、彼が死ぬしかない

original: To think... no one's been here in four thousand years...
string: ここに… 四千年もの間来た者がいないと思うと…

original: They tricked you.
string: だまされたのか

original: You should have kept running.
string: 足をとめるべきじゃなかったな

original: Never seen a crossbow before, eh? Not surprised. Kind of a Dawnguard specialty. Nothing better for putting down vampires.
string: クロスボウを見るのは初めてか？ 無理もない。ドーンガードの専用品に近いからな。吸血鬼を倒すにはもってこいだ

original: These people seem nervous, which makes me nervous.
string: ここの人達はなんだか張り詰めているように見えますわ。それでわたしも気が張ってしまいますのね

original: Hyargh!
string: ハイヤァー！

original: All right. I'll meet you back at the castle.
string: 分かりましたわ。城に戻りましたら、またお会いしましょう

original: You've met both of my parents. They're both crazy in their own way.
string: 両親には会った事がありますわね。それぞれ、違う意味で道を外れた人達ですわ

original: It's fine.
string: 問題ない

original: I was always taught to avoid these types of ruins. I think I see why, now.
string: こういう廃墟は避けるようにと教わりましたけれど、ようやく理由が分かりましたわ

original: Fine. If it will get you to leave me alone. Lead the way.
string: 分かったよ。それで放っておいてくれるならな。先導してくれ

original: Didn't you fight back?
string: 反撃しなかったのか？

original: You... always say what you think, don't you?
string: あなたって人は… 思った事をいつでも口にしてしまいますのね

original: You need something? I am happy to help, if I can.
string: 何か必要なものでも？ 喜んで力になるよ

original: Do you know anything about the old Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードの由来について知りたい

original: They're respectable fighters, and I think they see the benefits of having a vampire on their side, now.
string: 尊敬できる戦士達ですし、今は味方に吸血鬼がいる利点もご存知のはずですわ

original: Why was your mother so fascinated by it?
string: 母親がそこまで固執した理由は？

original: Yes, the place was crawling with vampires.
string: ああ、吸血鬼だらけだった

original: Nothing right now.
string: 今は特にない

original: I owe you a debt for the timely rescue.
string: タイミングよく助けてくれてありがとう。君には借りができたな

original: Are you seeing this? It's fantastic!
string: ご覧になって？ 素敵ですわよ！

original: Good luck.
string: 幸運を祈る

original: There you are. Looks like this place has been cleaned out. At least the shard is still here...
string: そこにいたんだね。この場所は空っぽみたいだけど、少なくともまだとっかかりはある…

original: We now have Auriel's Bow. The gods themselves have favored us and we must answer with action!
string: 今や我々はアーリエルの弓を手に入れた。神は我々を選んだのだ。その期待に行動で応えようではないか！

original: I ain't in the mood to talk. Ohhhh...
string: 今は話をする気分じゃない。ああ…

original: Oh, you're off on your own for a while? All right.
string: 一人で行きますの？ 今だけならよろしくてよ

original: Well that's just fine. Orthjolf told me to finish off anyone who got in the way.
string: 大丈夫だ。オースユルフは邪魔する奴全員を始末しろと言っていた

original: Stay here. I'll go check it out if you open the door back up.
string: ここにいらして。後ろの扉が開くかどうか見てきますわ

original: Indeed I was. I hunted down and killed every last one of them. Took years.
string: その通り。奴らを最後の1匹まで追い詰め、皆殺しにしたのである。何年もかけてな

original: What's on your mind?
string: 何を考えている？

original: Not at this rate, no.
string: この調子ではだめかも知れませんわね

original: Knowing him, anything at all that reminded him of her was just destroyed.
string: 父の性分を考えると、母を思い出させるあらゆる要素が破壊されたでしょうね

original: I'd love to have you along.
string: 一緒に来てくれれば、ありがたい

original: I'll have some for sale soon.
string: もうすぐ、商品として生産できるわ

original: With each passing day that you do not feed, that weakness will become more deadly, but your powers will also become stronger.
string: 血を吸わずにいれば一日ごとにその弱点が致命的なものとなっていくが、同時に力も強大になっていくだろう

original: As you wish.
string: かしこまりました

original: I was hoping to feed.
string: 食事にありつけると思ったのに

original: Beyond that... well, maybe one of our predecessors still has a clue.
string: その先は… そうだね、先に行った者達が手掛かりを残したかも知れない

original: This meant that we were vulnerable to the forces of Oblivion.
string: そうなりゃ、オブリビオンからの攻撃を防ぐ手段はないわな

original: You're staying here?
string: ここに残るのか？

original: There's probably groves like this all over Tamriel. Most people just don't even know what to look for.
string: タムリエルのあちこちにこんな森がきっとあるはずですわ。みんな何を探すべきなのかすら分かっていないだけですわね

original: This is the power that I offer!
string: この力が手に入るのだぞ？

original: And instead you found me. So what's your next step, now that I'm here?
string: 代わりにわたしを見つけたわけですのね。それで、次はどうしますの？ わたしはここにおりますのよ？

original: This leads out to the courtyard. Just head for the door.
string: ここを行けば中庭に出ますわ。まっすぐ扉に向かって

original: The lower floors are home to the Imperial Council, and the Order of Moth Priests occupies the middle floors.
string: その下層部は帝国議会の本拠地で、中層部は聖蚕会が占有している

original: Come on boy, let's go.
string: ほらほら、行くぞ！

original: It's only for Serana's sake that I have let you live.
string: セラーナに免じて生かしてやっているに過ぎん

original: Running is your only chance to live.
string: 逃げられなきゃ終わりだ

original: Leave me in peace.
string: ほっといてちょうだい

original: They're ghosts of the snow elf priests that tended the wayshrines before being slaughtered by the Betrayed.
string: 裏切られし者に殺されるその時まで、祠を守っていたスノーエルフの魂だ

original: But none of that matters now.
string: でもそんな事はもう関係ない

original: Tell me about your home.
string: 家について聞かせてほしい

original: Go away! We don't suffer trespassers!
string: 立ち去れ！ 侵入は許さんぞ！

original: Lead the way. Take me to this "monster" of yours.
string: 案内してちょうだい。その“怪物”のところへ

original: Hard to say. Maybe if we found the missing crests, we could figure it out.
string: それは何とも。なくなっているクレストを見つければ、解明できるかも知れませんわね

original: If you can find them, we might have a chance.
string: 君が彼らを見つけてくれたなら、我々にも勝算が立つかも知れない

original: Then behold Auri-El's gift, my child. May it speed your journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: では、アーリエルの祝福を受けるがいい。汝の最奥聖域への旅が滞りなき事を

original: I'll find you, don't worry.
string: きっと見つけてあげるから

original: Maybe we don't deserve that kind of happiness. Maybe it isn't for us.
string: もしかしたら、わたし達には分不相応な幸せなのかも知れませんわね。高望みと言ってもいい

original: I'm as ready as I can be.
string: 自分なりに覚悟はできてる

original: Very well. I suppose a moment or two of my time couldn't hurt.
string: そうだな。時間はいくらでもある事だし

original: Besides, he can handle anything alone! He assured me so himself. What could he possibly need my help with?
string: だいたい、自分でどうとでもできるだろう！ 奴からそう言われたよ。助力がほしくなるほど、困るような事があるのか？

original: Never mind.
string: 気にするな

original: I'm gonna have to kill you... again!
string: 殺すしかありませんわ… もう一度！

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Let's just get this over with.
string: とにかくやってしまおう

original: Wayshrine?
string: 祠とは？

original: Rrargh!
string: ワァーッ！

original: If you need anything else, I'll be here.
string: 他に何かいる時は、ここに来てくれ

original: And then you get to the real danger. We can discuss that when the time comes. If it comes.
string: 真の危険はそこからだよ。その時が来たら話し合おうじゃないか。その時が来れば、だけどね

original: You're right. Let me think about it.
string: そうだな。もう少し考えてみる

original: I heard a lot of vague nonsense. You could interpret that a hundred different ways.
string: あいまいすぎて無意味な話は山ほど耳にした。解釈が百通りもあるような事をな

original: Really?
string: 本当？

original: There you are!
string: そこだ！

original: Kill their leaders. That should put a stop to a full out war.
string: 彼らのリーダー達を殺して。それで全面戦争は阻止できるはずよ

original: You there, bring me another bottle of skooma... wait, who are you? You look like fun. Pull up a seat friend.
string: そこのあなた、スクゥーマのビンをもう1本… 待った、あなたは誰です？ 面白そうですね。一緒に座りませんか

original: I don't think you can ever be ready to kill your parent.
string: 両親を殺す準備なんて、いつまで待って頂いてもできませんわ

original: We end this here and now!
string: 今、ここで決着をつけてやる！

original: Good. Strong instincts and a cunning mind will serve you as well as blade, spell or claw.
string: ふむ。強い本能と機転は武器や魔法や爪に劣らず有用なはずだ

original: We'll return soon.
string: すぐに戻る

original: Sorry, I'm not that easy to get rid of. If you want to run ahead, I won't stop you, but I'll be following.
string: お生憎様、そう簡単には離れませんわ。一人で先に行きたいならご自由に、しっかりついて行きますわよ

original: We'll need to watch our steps inside.
string: 中では慎重に進まないと

original: I seek the knowledge of the Elder Scrolls.
string: 星霜の書についての知識がほしい

original: Now that the first volume's complete, there's no much left to do but begin work on the second.
string: 第一巻が完成した今、次にする事は第二巻の執筆しかないだろうが

original: I will be. Just give me a little time.
string: もちろん。必要なのは時間だけですわ

original: Okay, here goes.
string: さあ、行きますわよ

original: What would mudcrabs want with my satchel, anyway?
string: マッドクラブが私のカバンを盗んで、何をどうするっていうの？

original: You'd best find him soon. Ask him to change you back.
string: すぐに会って、元に戻してもらうようお願いするんだな

original: And you haven't forgotten what you need to do, have you?
string: 自分の仕事は忘れてないな？

original: It's the reason for the Soul Cairn's existence, and the only leverage a necromancer has when bargaining with them.
string: それがソウル・ケルンの存在理由であり、そして死霊術師が彼らと取引する時に唯一利用できるものなの

original: It doesn't last long, though. The blood of your foes can sustain you. If you're willing to feed.
string: あまり長い時間は無理よ。でも敵の血で時間を伸ばせるわ。血を吸うのが嫌じゃなければね

original: And now... I think I can rest. Farewell, my friend, wherever your travels take you.
string: ようやく… 眠りにつける。名残惜しいけどここでお別れ… 楽しかったよ、じゃあね

original: I hope one day to see it restored to its former glory.
string: いつか修復されて過去の勇姿をまた見せてくれるといいね

original: Speak with Isran. He has something for you.
string: イスランに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: We can't give up. There's no one else to stand against these monsters.
string: あきらめるわけにはいかない。あの化け物達に抗えるのは我々だけだ

original: A feral-blooded has holed up with a group of necromancers. Likely wants to create a nest of broodlings.
string: 野蛮な血の者が死霊術師の一団と一緒に潜伏したわ。おそらく同族の隠れ場所を作りたいのね

original: Just... leave me alone for now. I'll be fine.
string: 今は… そっとしておいて下されば。わたしは大丈夫ですわ

original: Oof!
string: うわあ！

original: Look, I'll be honest with you. I have no idea. But I'm sure we can find something worth your time.
string: じゃあ、正直に言おう。見当もつかない。だけど、探せば何か出てくる。損はさせないよ

original: Hhyyaarrggh!
string: はああー！

original: I know you didn't know your parents. But if they were anything like mine, you're better off.
string: あなたに両親がいないのは存じておりますが、わたしの両親みたいなのでしたら、いない方がマシですわよ

original: We're all that stands between Skyrim and disaster.
string: スカイリムを破滅から救うのは我々だけだ

original: You can meet me at Fort Dawnguard.
string: ドーンガード砦で合流しよう

original: Look, I care about you. A lot. And I'll come with you wherever you want to go.
string: ねえ、わたしはいつでもあなたの事を考えて、どこにでもついて行きたいと思っておりますわ

original: Anything else?
string: 他に何の理由がありまして？

original: I'll make you pay for this, daughter!
string: 代償は高くつくぞ、娘よ！

original: Get it wrong, and... well. You've seen what happened when I tried it.
string: 間違えれば… ええと。あたしが試した時の結果は知ってるよね

original: Does Isran have a problem with him?
string: イスランとの間に何か問題でも？

original: That's not your concern.
string: 君が心配することではない

original: I don't like the feel of this place. I'll wait for you back by the entrance.
string: ここの雰囲気はどうも好ましくありませんわ。戻って入口のところで待っておりますわね

original: I remember Keeper Carcette telling me repeatedly that Fort Dawnguard is a crumbling ruin, not worth the expense and manpower to repair.
string: 番人のカルセッテが何度も言ってたな。ドーンガード砦は廃墟寸前だから、人と金を使って修復する価値はないって

original: What do we need to do?
string: 何をすればいい？

original: Can I assist you? You know I live to serve.
string: 手伝いましょうか？ そのためにいるんですから

original: Are we ready then?
string: さあ、用意はよろしくて？

original: I suppose you're lucky you're not dead. Or worse, one of them.
string: 君がまだ生きてるのは幸運だよ。あるいはもっと悪い事に… つまり奴らの仲間にならずに済んだのは

original: Do as I command, and you will reap the rewards. Defy me, and I can offer you only pain and suffering.
string: 命じた通りにやればほうびをとらそう。抗うならば、やれるのは苦痛と苦悶だけだ

original: Run, coward! Run and never return!
string: 行け、腰抜けめ！ 二度と来るな！

original: If you want that scroll, the barrier needs to come down.
string: 書がほしければ、障壁を崩す必要があるわ

original: Then he just walled it off.
string: 彼は壁を作って丸ごと封じてしまったのか

original: How do we do that?
string: どうやってやるの？

original: To which shrine are you headed, "pilgrim."
string: 次の巡礼はどの祠で？

original: You can't walk around here like some common mortal!
string: 平凡な定命の者みたいにここを歩き回ってはだめよ！

original: You're a good daughter.
string: あなたはいい娘ですわ

original: Don't know how well I'd have managed by myself. You have my thanks.
string: 自力ではどうなるか分からなかった。ありがたい

original: Yes... yes, you're right. I'm sorry. I just didn't expect anyone to care how I felt about her. Thank you.
string: ええ… その通りですわね。ごめんなさい。わたしの母に対する想いを気にしてくれる方がいらっしゃるなんて。ありがとう

original: Scattered across Tamriel are secluded locations known only as Ancestor Glades. There's one in Skyrim, in the Pine Forest.
string: タムリエルのあちこちには、先人の湿地と呼ばれる人里離れた場所が存在している。スカイリムにおいては、パイン・フォレストにその一つがある

original: Can't help you, friend. I might remember better if my pockets weren't so light.
string: 悪いが力になれないね。懐が温かくなったらもうちょっと思い出せるんだが

original: Shouldn't we keep moving? I really want to get back home.
string: 先に進むべきではなくて？ 早く家に帰りたいですわ

original: Until next time.
string: ではまた

original: Don't...
string: 嫌ですわ…

original: That sky... it feels like I'm being watched. Can't stand it anymore!
string: あの空… なんだか、ずっと見張られてるみたいだ。もう耐えられない！

original: That's over half of the pages found. Keep it up!
string: もう半分以上見つけたのか。いいぞいいぞ！

original: Your husband, kidnapped!
string: 旦那さんが、さらわれた！

original: Very good. Should you visit her again, I suspect you'll find our new sibling appreciates her transformation.
string: 素晴らしい。彼女に次会った時、我々の新しい同胞として自分に起こった変化を感謝してる事が分かるだろう

original: Finding that Moth Priest is worth a lot to me. (<bribecost> gold)
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけられるなら、礼ははずむ(<bribecost>ゴールド)

original: Come on, stoneskin!
string: かかっておいでませ、石肌の化け物！

original: All I said to Potema was I thought she looked a little portly in that gown. How was I supposed to know?
string: ポテマには、そのドレスだと少し太って見えると言っただけさ。だって知らなかったからね

original: Home? Well, where is that? Some dusty crypt or frigid cave?
string: 家とは？ ほこりだらけの墓穴か、凍りついた洞窟？

original: You're no merchant.
string: 商人などではないな

original: My congratulations on defeating Harkon. Clearly, you are the superior vampire.
string: ハルコンへの勝利を祝福する。紛れもなく、お前は優れた吸血鬼だ

original: My lady, you have my deepest sympathies. I am sure this was not easy for you.
string: お嬢様、心からお悔やみ申し上げます。さぞつらかった事でしょう

original: That'll teach you.
string: いい教訓になるな

original: I'm not sure what they would do with one, but in this case Isran is probably correct in thinking it isn't good.
string: 彼らがどうするつもりか知らないけど、この場合はイスランが正しいと思う。つまり、良くないって事

original: What went wrong?
string: 何か問題でも？

original: Heard anything about a Moth Priest passing through?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: Ha ha. They seem quite taken to you now that you're carrying some of the tree bark.
string: ふふっ。あなたが木の皮を持っているから、蚕達があなたに頬を染めてますわ

original: I think both of our parents have failed us. Just you and me against the world, now.
string: わたし達二人とも、親に捨てられたのですわ。一緒にこの世界へ立ち向かいましょう

original: A savior?
string: 救世主だって？

original: We should keep moving.
string: 先を急ごう

original: For the thousands of years I've served as the Chantry's sentinel, there hasn't been a single visitor here for any other reason.
string: 礼拝所の守り人として何千年も過ごしてきたが、それ以外の理由で訪ねてきた者は誰もいない

original: I'm not going to talk you out of it, am I? I know, I know. I was just like you, once.
string: やめるよう説得するのは無理そうかな？ 分かるよ。あたしも昔はあんたみたいだった

original: It was a cadre of dremora. The city was under attack.
string: ドレモラの集団だよ。奴らが街を襲撃したんだ

original: If the Moth Priest has guards, show them no mercy.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が護衛を連れている場合、護衛には容赦するな

original: You have done me a great service, and now you must be rewarded.
string: 多大な貢献に対し、ほうびをとらせねばな

original: Aggh!
string: ああ！

original: The Ideal Masters's weakness is their insatiable hunger for pure souls.
string: アイディール・マスターの弱点は、純粋な魂への飽く事のない飢え

original: I'll speak to Falion. I've heard he knows about these things.
string: ファリオンと話してみますわ。こういう事に詳しいと聞いておりますの

original: You have no dominion here!
string: ここでは貴様など、何の力もない！

original: But as luck would have it, I've tracked down the location of some actual Dwemer diagram drawings!
string: でも、ツイてる事に、ドゥーマーの描いた設計図そのものがある場所を突き止めたの！

original: No? Well, I've given it a bit of thought.
string: ノーだって？ この件はじっくり考えたんだよ

original: Wait... that almost makes sense!
string: ちょっと待って… きっとそうだわ！

original: I'm not known for my patience.
string: 私は気が短いのだ

original: Hey, there's my bow! There, out on the log. Wondered what happened to it.
string: 見て、あたしの弓だ！ あそこの丸太の上。どうなったかと思ってたんだよ

original: Let's just... move on from here, ok?
string: 今はとにかく… 先へ進みますわよ。よろしくて？

original: You'll think you're best of friends, until you find his fangs in your neck.
string: 親友かと思い込んでいたら首筋に牙を突き立てられている、といったところだ

original: I'd read stories about the Solitude windmill, but I didn't expect it to be that big!
string: ソリチュードの風車の事は本で読んだことがありますけれど、まさかあんなに大きいなんて！

original: Our blood grants us power to calm and relax. If you currently lack the gift, forgo feeding for a day and that power will come naturally.
string: 我々の血は心の平穏をもたらす力を授けてくれる。もし今その力を感じないなら、血の分配を1日控えれば自然と戻ってくるはずだ

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: Diil...
string: ディール…

original: Got it into his head years back that his experience with animals would help. Trolls in particular, from what I hear.
string: 数年前から動物との触れ合いが大事だと信じるようになってな… 特にトロールとの交流が重要らしい

original: It belongs among our kind, not gathering mold in some vagabond's treasure pile.
string: 我々の同族が所有してるんだ。放浪人の宝の山の中でカビを生やしたりなどしてないよ

original: Sure, got plenty. What am I gonna' do with it?
string: もちろんたくさん持ってるよ。何に使うとするかな？

original: Harkon is dead.
string: ハルコンは死んだ

original: I'm married. (Lie)
string: 結婚している(嘘)

original: Hatred born of your neglect.
string: ないがしろにされたゆえの憎しみだ

original: It's not that simple. I guess it never is with families, is it?
string: そんな簡単な話ではございませんの。家族は関係ないと思いませんこと？

original: So that's how you got here.
string: そうしてここにやって来たわけか

original: We'll celebrate our victory.
string: 共に勝利を祝おう

original: Look at you. Mortal. Weak.
string: ぜい弱な定命の体とは、情けない姿だ

original: I promise you, it didn't always look like this.
string: 誓って言いますわ、昔はこんな風ではありませんでしたのよ

original: My mother kept this a secret, even from me. She must have been up to something she thought was dangerous.
string: 母はこの事をわたしにさえ秘密にしていましたわ。きっと何か危ない事をやっていたのですわね

original: You heard right. I'm glad word's finally starting to get around. But that means it won't be long before the vampires start to take notice as well.
string: 君の聞いた話は本当だ。いい噂がやっと広まり始めたようだな。だがそれは同時に、噂が吸血鬼の耳に入るのも時間の問題だという事を意味する

original: You'd better get out of here and get yourself cured.
string: こんな所にいないで、治療を受けに行った方がいいわよ

original: Don't get yourself killed!
string: 殺されるのを待ってちゃダメ！

original: Look at this place. This has to be it!
string: この場所を見て。ここに違いありませんわ！

original: Spheres! On the upper level!
string: スフィアだ！ 上の階に！

original: How do you serve Lord Harkon?
string: ハルコン卿にはどのように仕えているのか？

original: A cure? Why even think of it that way?
string: 治療法？ どうしてそのような事を？

original: Right. Well, you can relax. I have it under control.
string: そうか、なら安心しろ。こちらで何とかする

original: We're very close. I can't wait to see them again.
string: 親子の仲は良かった。会うのが待ち遠しい

original: I hope you find life in the castle to be to your liking.
string: 城での生活が性に合うといいな

original: Ah, it's good to be home again.
string: ああ、故郷に戻るのはいいものね

original: Otherwise, all I can do now is grant you my hopes for a safe journey.
string: 質問がないなら、旅の無事を祈って送り出すだけだ

original: Fool. You should have run.
string: 馬鹿だな。逃げればよかったのに

original: I'm just here for the Elder Scroll.
string: 星霜の書を取りに来た

original: So you always got along?
string: ずっと仲良かったのか？

original: She was practically smirking as we left home. Almost like she was proud of herself.
string: わたし達が家を出る時、母はにやついているようにさえ見えた。勝ち誇ったかのようでしたわ

original: Actually, I have some things to do first.
string: 実は、先にやっておきたいことがある

original: You've done Lord Harkon two great services. Take what you've learned to heart, and be careful who you trust.
string: つまりお前はハルコン卿へ二つの大きな貢献をしたのだ。学び得た事を肝に銘じ、信頼する相手は慎重に選べ

original: Our Lord will be most pleased, I'm sure. I knew you could do it.
string: 我らが王もきっとお喜びになるに違いない。あんたならやってくれると思ってたよ

original: When will you return to Tamriel?
string: タムリエルにはいつ帰るのか？

original: Might I offer an alternative?
string: 代案を提供してもいいかな？

original: I'll meet you at Dimhollow. It's the least I can do to avenge my fallen comrades.
string: ディムホロウで待ち合わせよう。倒れた仲間達の仇を討つくらいはやらせてほしい

original: Where are you?
string: どこにいる！

original: I have never understood the Nord fascination with weapons. Magic is so much more versatile, don't you think?
string: なぜノルドが武器に魅了されるのか理解できない。魔法の方がはるかに万能だとは思わんかね？

original: Whether you believe it or not, the scrolls have a mind of their own. If they didn't want you to find them, they wouldn't allow it.
string: 信じられないかも知れないが、書には意思があるんだよ。君が発見者になれたのは、書がそれを望んだからだ

original: You can't stop the prophecy!
string: 予言を止められると思うな！

original: He's holed up with a group of a necromancers.
string: 死霊術師の一団と共に立てこもっている

original: Would you be interested in having the passage to the Courtyard restored? Harkon clearly never cared much for it.
string: 中庭へ通じる道を修復させてはどうだろうか？ ハルコンはあまり手入れをしていなかったようだが

original: The Tyranny of the Sun requires Serana's blood?
string: 太陽の専制の成就にはセラーナの血が必要なのか？

original: Follow your instincts.
string: 本能に従うんだ

original: Mother had something similar back home when she was tending the courtyard gardens to scrape moss and fungus off of the trees.
string: うちに似たようなものがありましたわね。母が中庭の庭園でコケやキノコを木からはがすのに使っておりましたの

original: I wish I could help. The scrolls have changed hands so many times, it's impossible to keep track.
string: 力になれなくて残念だよ。書はその持ち主が何度も変わるうちに、ついに行方が分からなくなってしまった

original: You can't trust a word that comes out of Vingalmo's mouth. Remember that.
string: ヴィンガルモの口から出た言葉は一語たりとも信用に値しない。それを忘れるな

original: Who knows? It was in shambles when we first got here.
string: 分かりませんわ。最初に来た時点で荒廃しておりましたの

original: Can't anyone become a vampire if bitten by one?
string: 噛まれたら誰でも吸血鬼になりうるのでは？

original: And while I do not know its exact whereabouts, I do have information suggesting someone who does.
string: 正確な居場所は知らないが、知っているであろう人物の手がかりは得ている

original: Something bad happens, word spreads. More bad things happen, people worry.
string: 悪い事が起きると、うわさが広まる。さらに悪い事が起きると、人々は不安になる

original: For me? I've done what I set out to do.
string: あたし？ 目的はもう果たしたよ

original: We're also going to need a sample of her blood. Which... if we could get that, we wouldn't even be trying to do this in the first place.
string: 彼女の血も少し必要みたいですわ。それが手に入るくらいなら、こんな手順はそもそも必要ないというのに

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: It looks like this is as close as we're going to get being safe from the vampires.
string: 吸血鬼ら相手に安全を確保するのも、ここらが限界みたいだ

original: That's, what, your third? All right, only one left to go. I'll meet you there.
string: それは、三つめかな？ いいね、残りは一つだけだよ。そこで会おう

original: How in the name of Zenithar was I to know the ingredients were phony? Do I look like someone that would double-cross a necromancer?
string: ゼニタールに誓って言うが、商品が偽物だなんて知りようがなかったよ。俺が死霊術師をあざむくような奴に見えるかい？

original: I commanded every vampire in the court to look for them, but after centuries of searching without success, I lost hope.
string: 配下の吸血鬼総出で行方を探したが、何百年かけて探っても手応えが得られず、私は絶望した

original: Bedroom furnishings. (<Global=HDRiftenBedroom> gold)
string: 寝室用品(<Global=HDRiftenBedroom> ゴールド)

original: I have found such a soul and the stars appear cooperative.
string: よき星に導かれた、素晴らしい魂を見つけたぞ

original: In keeping with tradition, you must use a specific tool in the Ancestor Glade, an implement known as a Draw Knife.
string: 伝統に従って、ドローナイフと呼ばれる特別な道具を先人の湿地で使用するんだ

original: Arkay tells me the Sun Fire spell can break open those caches, but I've never found one. I think he might be lying to me.
string: アーケイの話では、宝の隠し場所は太陽の炎の呪文で開くが、どこを探しても見つからない。一杯食わされたのかもな

original: Got to keep alert. We don't want to get caught napping like the Vigilants did.
string: 用心しないとな。番人達のように寝込みを襲われたらたまらない

original: I keep a stable of thralls in the castle should you need to feed like the baser vampires to stave off the sun.
string: 下々の吸血鬼のように血を吸う事で日の光から身を守りたいのであれば、城に従徒を数名待機させてある

original: Follow me, or you'll regret it. (Intimidate)
string: おとなしくついて来ないと、後悔することになるぞ(威圧)

original: It is an honor to serve Harkon, is it not?
string: ハルコンに仕えるのは名誉な事だろう？

original: Tolan was right. And he's dead. The vampires killed him.
string: トランの言っていた通りだ、本人は死んでしまったが。吸血鬼らにやられて

original: Is that... the Forge?
string: あれは… 鋳造器具？

original: While it would fill me with joy to see the Chantry back to its former glory, that time has long since passed.
string: 礼拝所にかつての栄光が戻ったのは喜ばしい事だが、あまりにも長い時間が経ってしまった

original: I've helped you all that I can. The rest is up to you.
string: できるだけ手は貸したつもりだ。あとは君次第だよ

original: By forging something, of course!
string: もちろん、何かの鋳造によってね！

original: I don't see another way. I'll become a vampire.
string: 他に方法が見つからない。吸血鬼になろう

original: Oh, gods...
string: ああ、神よ…

original: What can I do to help?
string: 何か手伝えることは？

original: It... it was you? You created that prophecy?
string: あれは… あなたでしたの？ あなたがあの予言を創り出したと？

original: Here. Let me show you how this works...
string: これよ。使い方を教えるわね…

original: I see you chose a suitably high profile target. Well done.
string: ちゃんと人目につく標的を選んだようだな。よくやった

original: This is it. Home sweet... castle.
string: これですわ。懐かしの… 我が城

original: Three's a crowd. Get rid of your other friend, and I'm yours.
string: 三人は多すぎますわね。お仲間と別れてきましたら、お供いたしますわ

original: Now, where was I...
string: さて、続きはどこからだったか…

original: She has the scroll!
string: 彼女は書を持っている！

original: Keep strong, and eyes open. We're on a different path now.
string: 心を強く持って、目の前をしっかりお見すえになって。別々の道を行かなければなりませんのよ

original: Nobody's ever asked me that before. I... I don't know.
string: そんな事、聞かれた事がございませんの… 分かりかねますわ

original: Any idea how you're going to find a Moth Priest? Skyrim's a pretty big place.
string: この広いスカイリムで、聖蚕の僧侶1人を探し出すのは大変ですわ。何か目星はございますの？

original: Oh, this is simply getting infuriating!
string: おう、これ以上は腹に据えかねるな！

original: We're getting close. I'm sure of it.
string: 近づいていますわ。確かですのよ

original: My mother spent a lot of time trying to contact them directly, to travel to the Soul Cairn itself.
string: 母はそういった存在と接触をとれないか、つまりソウル・ケルン自体に行けないかという検討にかなりの時間を費やしましたわ

original: You watch yourself around him.
string: 奴には気をつけた方がいい

original: Here's everything I have. Sorry there isn't more.
string: ここにある物で全部よ。少なくてごめんね

original: So what ended up happening to you?
string: どういう流れで監獄に？

original: What do you think I mean?
string: どういう意味だと思う？

original: I need you to do something.
string: 手伝ってもらおうかな

original: Besides, I can't imagine a single place my father would avoid looking. And he's had all this time, too.
string: それに、父が探すのをためらう場所なんてありますかしら。探す時間だっていくらでもあるわけですし

original: Exactly.
string: その通りでございます、ってね

original: You really ought to become one of us again. Bad for your health, otherwise.
string: 再び我々の仲間になるべきだ。君の体のためにもね

original: There is but one gift I can give that is equal in value to the Elder Scroll and my daughter.
string: 星霜の書、そして我が娘と同等の価値をもつ贈り物となると、一つしか考えられない

original: You need to concentrate, boy. Try it again.
string: 集中しろ、若いの。もう1回やってみろ

original: If you're so worried about the trolls, why agree to let me go ahead with it?
string: トロールの事がそこまで心配なら、何故止めなかったんだ？

original: Find that Moth Priest! I will suffer no delays!
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探せ！ 遅れは許さん！

original: Dragons weren't enough. Now we've lost the sun too?
string: ドラゴンだけでは飽き足らず、今度は太陽まで失うと？

original: That's what I wanted to hear.
string: その言葉を待っておりましたの

original: Excellent. I trust he'll find his situation more accommodating, now that he is a member of the family.
string: 素晴らしい。彼は今や家族の一員だから、肩の荷も少しはおりるだろう

original: Not like this...
string: こんなはずでは…

original: I need to find a Moth Priest.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を探している

original: And take this as well. Seeing as Saint Jiub has ascended to pure spiritual form, I won't need it any longer.
string: それと、こいつもくれてやろう。この聖ジウブが真の精霊に姿を変えた以上、もう必要のないものだ

original: Enough of this!
string: いいかげんにしろ！

original: This is our fight and this is our fate!
string: これは我々の戦いだ。そして我々の使命だ！

original: Any idea why the vampires attacked the Vigilants?
string: 吸血鬼らが番人たちを襲った理由に心当たりは？

original: I already found all of the ingredients.
string: 材料は全部見つけた

original: A pathetic creature in her present condition, but the gift will embolden her. And her lowly state suits her to being our eyes and ears in Markarth.
string: 今はただの惨めな生き物だが、贈り物を与えれば彼女も元気になるだろう。それに彼女の卑しい身分は、マルカルスで我々の目や耳になるのには適任だ

original: I will not be defeated!
string: 私は負けない！

original: Assume the mantle of the Vampire Lord, and we will continue.
string: 次に進む前に、吸血鬼の王の衣を身にまとうがいい

original: That's all I can tell you. He asked me not to let anyone know where he was going. I suppose he didn't want the attention.
string: それ以上は言えないよ。行き先は誰にも教えないでくれと言われてるんでね。余計な関心をひきたくなかったんだろうさ

original: What is this bloodspring?
string: 血の泉とは？

original: Or maybe her plan was to come back, but she was stuck here. We won't know until we find her.
string: それか、母は戻ってくる予定だったけれど、ここで足止めさせられたのかも… 見つけるまでは分かりませんわね

original: I'm proud of what we've managed to accomplish.
string: これは偉大な行いよ。誇りに思うわ

original: You must be crazy.
string: すっかりおかしくなっているな…

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: In a manner of speaking.
string: そういう言い方もできる

original: Precisely.
string: 全くその通りですのよ

original: That's the last of them. Poor sods can't resist after they get a taste of your dosed Skooma.
string: こいつで最後よ。マヌケどもには、薬入りのスクゥーマを飲ませたからもう抵抗できないわ

original: Bring the Dawnguard honor.
string: ドーンガードに名誉を

original: That's the thing... what's the point of a moondial? I always wondered why she didn't just have the whole thing ripped out.
string: そこなのですが… 月の満ち欠けを知ってどうするのかしら？ なぜ丸ごと撤去しないのか、昔から不思議でしたの

original: What is this place?
string: ここはどんな場所なんだ？

original: Well, considering no one else in Skyrim would buy something they couldn't possibly read, I'd say you don't have much of a choice.
string: スカイリムで読めすらしない書物を買ってくれる奴が他にいるとも思えないから、選択肢があるわけでもないな

original: Potions my friend, potions! Possibly some spells. Maybe some other things I've forgotten about. Actually I'm not sure. Let's see, shall we?
string: 薬、そう薬だ！ 呪文もあるかも知れない。思い出せないが、他のものも。実は自分でもはっきり分からない。ちょっと見てみよう

original: One thousand steps and a thousand more...
string: 千歩進んで、そこからまた千歩…

original: Die, traitor!
string: 死ね、裏切り者め！

original: I can't even begin to imagine how much time she spent in this room. Doesn't look too cozy.
string: この部屋で一体どれだけ長い時間を過ごしたのかしら。そんなに居心地が良さそうには見えないのに

original: Fortune smile upon you, milord!
string: 旦那様、ご幸運を！

original: Want to head out there and collect some more?
string: 他の図面も探してきてくれる気はない？

original: Relieved... I think.
string: 安心いたしましたわ… 多分

original: Have you ever seen anything like this?
string: このようなもの、今まで見たことあるか？

original: Follow me.
string: ついて来い

original: Any dangers I should be aware of?
string: 用心すべき危険は？

original: Home? Where's that?
string: 家だと？ それはどこに？

original: I need more time to prepare myself.
string: もう少し準備する時間がほしい

original: Very well, master.
string: 主様、それでは

original: You are to make a public show of murdering someone. Do it in the streets for all to see. The higher the profile the better.
string: 君には公衆の面前で誰かを殺してほしい。みんなの目がある大通りでやるんだ。目立てば目立つほど望ましい

original: Rii...
string: リィ…

original: This place makes me a little uneasy.
string: ここにいると少し落ち着かない気分になりますわね

original: Hey, where are you going. I need those pages!
string: おい、どこへ行くんだ。その原稿が必要なんだ！

original: I think you'll need to find some arrows, first. Only elven ones will work for this, remember?
string: まずは矢を見つけないといけませんわ。使えるのはエルフの矢だけですわよ、覚えてまして？

original: Stand aside!
string: どいて！

original: This cave is a temple to Auriel?
string: この洞窟はアーリエルの聖堂なのか？

original: I'll bet my parents didn't know the half of this part of the castle.
string: 父も母も、お城のこの部分に関しては半分も知らなかったと断言できますわ

original: Auri-El... save me...
string: アーリエルよ… ご加護を…

original: Watch it!
string: 気をつけてよ！

original: The night eternal awaits.
string: 夜は永遠に待ってくれる

original: I know why they needed you, because we need you for the same purpose.
string: 彼らが何を求めていたのかは分かる。同じ理由で力を借りたいからだ

original: Rargh!
string: ラァーッ！

original: Right to the point, aren't you. I like that. Not like those fools in the order.
string: 短刀直入だな。好ましい事だ。教団の能なしどもとは大違いだよ

original: Die!
string: 死ね！

original: Ooh, good. I was just starting to get bored.
string: わあ、素敵。待つのに退屈してたところよ

original: We own the night, fool.
string: 夜は私たちのものだ

original: What do you know about the Elder Scrolls?
string: 星霜の書について教えてほしい

original: Turns out you don't learn much from just sleeping with something.
string: 何かと一緒に寝るだけでは、大した事は学べないみたいですわね

original: This must be that beautiful Skyrim weather I've always heard about.
string: これが噂に聞くスカイリムの美しい空ですのね

original: And how exactly do you plan on completing the prophecy without the death of my daughter?
string: では、厳密には娘を死なせずにどうやってお告げを実現させるつもり？

original: Show yourself!
string: 姿を見せろ！

original: Where are you?
string: どこにいる！

original: He got to my target first and called the guard to cover his tracks. By the time I got there, the place was on alert.
string: あいつはターゲットを殺すと、衛兵を呼んで自分の痕跡を消そうとした。到着した時には、現場は厳戒態勢だった

original: You only delay the inevitable.
string: 逃げ回っても、どうせ死ぬのだぞ

original: Have to say, I'm glad that's over.
string: 認めるよ、終わってほっとしたって

original: Nnnnyyaarrggh!
string: ぬあー！

original: Good work. It's always best to deal with a problem by ripping it out at the root.
string: よくやったわ。問題は根源を引き裂く事で対処するに限るわね

original: I beg your pardon, ma'am. I don't know what you're getting at, but whatever it is, it's not appreciated.
string: どういうことだ？ 何が言いたいのか分からないが、とにかく不愉快だ

original: Speak with Florentius. He has something for you.
string: フロレンティウスに聞けば、何かあるだろう

original: What a wonderful place you've brought me.
string: 何て素敵な場所なのでしょう

original: She actually did it... created a portal to the Soul Cairn. Incredible.
string: 母は本当に成し遂げた… ソウル・ケルンに通じる転移門を造り上げたのですわね。信じられませんわ

original: We're not sure, but they have an Elder Scroll.
string: 確証はないものの、彼らは星霜の書を持っているようだ

original: Maybe we can reason with him.
string: 理詰めで話せばわかってもらえるかもしれない

original: I promise to try and make this as painless as possible. Hold still.
string: なるべく痛くないようにいたしますわね。そのまま動かないで…

original: What will you do now?
string: これからどうするんだ？

original: They're mystic entities that lord over the Soul Cairn, controlling every aspect from its fabric to its appearance.
string: 彼らはソウル・ケルンに君臨する神秘的な存在で、その素材から外見まですべての側面を支配している

original: That's of course if you're foolish enough to try it.
string: 知恵があれば、試そうとは思わないだろうがな

original: She worried about me. About all of us. But she wanted to get me as far away from my father as possible before he really went over the edge.
string: 母はわたしの身を案じましたの。わたし達全員の身を。でも父が我慢の限界に達する前に、わたしを彼からなるべく遠くに離したがっていた

original: So you found the Moth Priest. Let's see you find the rest of the Elder Scrolls all on your own.
string: 聖蚕の僧侶を見つけたか。残りの星霜の書も自力で集められるのか？

original: It's sort of a random assortment of things. See anything useful?
string: あらゆる物の寄せ集めってとこね。何か役立ちそうなものはある？

original: Nature will take care of the rest.
string: その後は自然の成り行きに任せるんだ

original: Can't we inform the Jarl's men of the threat?
string: 首長の部下に警告すべきでは？

original: What do I need to do?
string: 何をすればいい？

original: Can you train me in Restoration?
string: 回復の訓練をしてくれないか？

original: Don't you already have someone at home waiting for you?
string: 今は、家に帰ればあなたを待っている家族がおりますでしょう？

original: Come on!
string: かかってこい！

original: I want to come with you.
string: 一緒に行かせてほしい

original: You became trapped.
string: だが閉じ込められてしまった、と

original: Hear now the second word of Soul Tearing: "Vaaz"- meaning to tear your enemy's soul from its living vessel.
string: ソウル・ティアリングの2つめの一語、“ヴァーズ”を聞くがいい。敵の魂をその生ける器から引き裂く事を意味する

original: I've heard of you. From Katria.
string: 話は聞いている、カトリアから

original: Oh my, that's... Well, that's not exactly what I had in mind.
string: おお、それは… ちょっと予想外だな

original: Look, on the edge here. This has been cut, precisely cut. If you had another piece, about the same size, it would... it would snap right in.
string: ここの縁を見て。正確に切断されている。もし、ほぼ同じ大きさの破片がもう一つあれば… ぴったりはまるはずだよ

original: Why are you here, Tolan? The Vigilants and I were finished with each other a long time ago.
string: なぜここにいるんだ、トラン？ 番人と私の関係はずっと昔に切れたはずだぞ

original: There's no hiding from me...
string: 私から隠れられると思うな…

original: Arvak?
string: アルヴァクか？

original: What did you want?
string: 用件はなに？

original: If you want to find the remaining scroll, you'll have to consult with someone versed in magical knowledge. Perhaps at the College of Winterhold?
string: 残りの書を見つけたいなら、魔法の知識を持つ者に相談すべきだ。ウィンターホールド大学に行ってみてはどうかな？

original: No... my blood is strong...
string: そんな… 私の血は強いはず…

original: All I remember is that damn dremora and his minions bursting into my home and sending me to their prison.
string: 覚えているのは、家に押し入ってきた忌々しいドレモラとその手下によってこの牢屋に送り込まれた事だけだ

original: I... don't know who that is. Did he... mention my father at all?
string: その人の事は… 存じませんわ。父の事、何かおっしゃって？

original: I'm ready to be turned.
string: 変わる覚悟ができた

original: Hello
string: やあ

original: He fought well though. Jeron and Bresoth were no match for him.
string: 奮戦していたがな。ジェロンとブレソスは歯が立たなかった

original: I need to trade some things with you.
string: 持ち物を交換したい

original: Of course! Let's go.
string: もちろんですわ！ さあ行きましょう

original: What will you do then?
string: これからどうするつもりなんだ？

original: It's not exactly the hospitality I'm used to, but your man Isran has seen to my needs well enough.
string: こういうおもてなしには不慣れだが、君の友達のイスランはとてもよくしてくれているよ

original: We need strength, power. Not magic. Elves don't seem to understand that.
string: 我々に必要なのは腕力と武力で、魔力じゃない。エルフどもはそこが理解できないようだ

original: Serana, my darling. I see you still favor keeping a pet.
string: 愛しいセラーナよ。今でもペットを連れ歩くのを好むのだな

original: Yes, I can smell it on you.
string: そうだな、臭いで分かる

original: The moment we gave ourselves to Molag Bal, things got really icy between them.
string: わたし達がモラグ・バルに身を捧げた瞬間、両親の関係は冷えきってしまったのですわ

original: Like the best of friends. I would never hesitate to share anything with her.
string: 親友みたいな存在でしたわ。母となら何でも話し合えた

original: Gather your things and rest well, my friend. We meet outside Castle Volkihar.
string: 荷物をまとめて十分休んでおけよ。ヴォルキハル城の外で落ち合おう

original: I'm afraid in their current form, they still believe the Chantry to be an active center of worship.
string: 気の毒な姿になってしまっているが、彼らは今もこの礼拝所が聖地だと信じている

original: A single gyro would be enough, I think. Believe me, this is useful stuff.
string: ジャイロがたった1つあればいいはずよ。それで本当に役立つものができるの

original: Mother!
string: お母様！

original: Must stay away from the Keepers... must stay away from the Keepers.
string: 番人に近づいてはダメだ… 番人に近づいてはダメだ

original: I need training in Speech.
string: 話術の訓練をしてほしい

original: Don't worry, I think we can make a Dawnguard out of you. Here, take this crossbow and let's see how you shoot.
string: 大丈夫だ。我々が君を立派なドーンガードにしてやろう。ほら、このクロスボウでちょっと腕前を見せてくれ

original: I think they transcend what we perceive as a physical form.
string: 彼らは私達が物理形態として感知するものを超越していると思うの

original: So where is this Elder Scroll?
string: その星霜の書はどこに？

original: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
string: それが何を意味するかはまだ分からないが、突き止めてみよう。おそらく吸血鬼達がほしがるものを彼女が持ってるか、彼女自身が重要なのかのどちらかだろう

original: And I'll be unnecessary once he has it.
string: わたしも、父が目的を果たした後はきっと用なしですわね

original: I was sure I heard something.
string: 何か聞こえたぞ

original: You seem tense. Join a booth and relax a bit. Or did you need another fix?
string: 緊張してるみたいね。部屋に入ってリラックスしたら。それとも、もう一本イっとく？

original: Oh no. I hope not. But even I haven't seen him in years, and we were close.
string: とんでもない。そうじゃなければいいと願っているのだが、親しいこの私でさえ、もう何年も彼と会っていないからな

original: Ah, I see you've been speaking to Valerica and she's convinced you that eternal night will plunge us into war with daytime dwellers.
string: なるほど、ヴァレリカと話して、永遠の夜が来れば我々が日なたに住む者達と開戦してしまうと信じさせられたのか

original: I will share that knowledge with you gladly, master. What do you wish to know?
string: 主様、その知識を喜んであなたと共有します。何が知りたいのですか？

original: I could use help with the crystals around here.
string: ここらにある水晶について教えてほしい

original: This better not be all the things you just can't be bothered with.
string: この件が、あなたの手に負えるといいのですが

original: Vyrthur was saying something about vampire blood and the bow...
string: ヴィルスールが吸血鬼の血と弓がどうの、と言っていた…

original: Over time, your powers will grow in strength and you will find new ways to use your gifts.
string: 時間と共に力が成長し、恩恵の新たな使い方が見えてくる事だろう

original: Hunh!
string: ふん！

original: No, but we're all better off this way.
string: いや、でもこの方が全員にとってマシだ

original: Might be that I have, but I can't say for sure.
string: そうかも知れないが、確かな事は言えないね

original: Ancestors guide you.
string: 先人の導きあれ

original: That's enough!
string: もうたくさんだ！

original: Very supportive.
string: 協力的ですのね

original: Be sure to enjoy some of our Redwater Skooma before you leave.
string: レッドウォーターのスクゥーマを試していかなきゃ損するわよ

original: The second scroll declares that "The Blood of Coldharbour's Daughter will blind the eye of the Dragon."
string: 二つめの書は、「コールドハーバーの娘の血がドラゴンを失明させるであろう」と示している

original: Let's not revisit that.
string: 思い出したくもありませんの

original: There's no time. You need to get moving now. (Persuade)
string: 時間がない。先を急がないと(説得)

original: It had to be one of us, and, well, she's so much more powerful than I am. It just made sense for her to be out here.
string: きっとわたし達の味方ですのよ。そして母はわたしよりずっと力がある。ここにいる事自体が彼女にとって意味があったのですわ

original: ...too much hiding... the mortals are weak... he's a coward to fear them, we should feed when we like... can't stand this hunger gnawing at me...
string: …隠れてばかりいるのにはもううんざり… 非力な定命の者どもを恐れるなんて、彼は腰抜けだわ。食べたい時に食べて何が悪いの？ この空腹感には耐えられない…

original: Can't you tell your own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
string: 自分の種族もお分かりになりませんの？ 目を開けなくても、匂いだけで分かるぐらいですのに

original: And that was just one trap! Look around! Who knows what else this thing is capable of?
string: しかもそれは罠の一つに過ぎなかったんだ！ 見回してごらんよ！ こいつら一体他に何をしてくるかな？

original: Sometimes they go out looking for Elder Scrolls. Lucky for you, there's a Moth Priest in Skyrim right now, doing just that.
string: 連中は時に、星霜の書を求めて遠出する。幸いこのスカイリムにもまさしくそんな聖蚕の僧侶が来ている

original: Dawnstar. (<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall> gold)
string: ドーンスター(<Global=DLC1FerryCostSmall>ゴールド)

original: Who threw you in here?
string: 誰の手でここに送られたんだ？

original: Unh... where is... who sent you here?
string: ああ… ここは… あなた、誰に言われていらっしゃったの？

original: Are you okay? Almost thought I lost you there... you went white as the snow.
string: 大丈夫ですの？ あそこであなたが死んでしまうのかと思いましてよ… 雪みたいに白くなってしまったものですから

original: Think I'll be sad when we're done collecting these. Who knows though, maybe more plans will turn up in the future.
string: 全部集まったら、寂しくなると思うわ。また将来他の図面がどこかで見つかるかも知れないけどね

original: It begins again.
string: また始まったか

original: As you can see, we have some work to do to restore it to its former glory. But maybe you want to help me with that?
string: ご覧の様に、過去の栄光を取り戻すのは大仕事になる。だが君も協力してくれるのだろう？

original: Your existence is meaningless!
string: 貴様の存在など、何の意味もない！

original: ShoutEndShort
string: ShoutEndShort

original: Changed your mind, huh? The Dawnguard could use somebody like you.
string: 気が変わったんだな？ あんたならドーンガードの一員として活躍できるかもな

original: They won't respond to you in any way other than believing that you're an Initiate and you're undertaking the journey to the Inner Sanctum.
string: 彼らは最奥聖域を目指す新人の巡礼以外には、何の反応も示さない

original: Well I need to do some testing on this new weapon, and I was thinking a live target would be helpful.
string: この新しい武器の性能を確かめたいんだけど、生き物を的にして試すのがいいと思うの

original: What the... get back! Hurry!
string: あれは… 戻って！ 早く！

original: Nobody really knows.
string: 誰も本当の事を知りませんわ

original: The vampires were looking for a woman trapped in Dimhollow.
string: 吸血鬼らは、ディムホロウ墓地に閉じ込められた女性を探していた

original: Well met, brother.
string: こんにちは

original: We've got enough to worry about right now. You stay focused, and I'll worry about me.
string: 今は他の問題がたくさんありましてよ。それに集中しなくては。わたしもわたしの問題に集中いたしますわ

original: We still have to find the Forge itself. I had a lead on that, too.
string: 鋳造器具自体を見つけないと。その手掛かりもつかんでいたんだ

original: But now... we have a clue. Something made by the Forge. Something that can lead us to it.
string: でも今は… 手掛かりがある。鋳造器具で作られた何か。それに私達を導いてくれる何かがね

original: My lord! Everyone! Serana has returned!
string: 主様！ みんな！ セラーナが戻ったぞ！

original: Thanks again for saving my life.
string: 命を助けてもらって、改めてありがとう

original: What do you mean by allaying fear through vampiric seduction?
string: 吸血鬼の誘惑で恐れを鎮める、というのは？

original: Ambushed by vampires... I certainly wasn't expecting that.
string: 吸血鬼達に待ち伏せを喰らって… 完全に予測外だったよ

original: It's daytime... Why is it so dark outside?
string: まだ昼間なのに… どうして外が暗い？

original: What do you want now?
string: 望みは何だ？

original: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
string: マルカルスの家なら完ぺきだ

original: Rrarggh!
string: うらああ！

original: Bleed!
string: 血を流しなさいな！

original: The bow has to be in here.
string: きっと弓はここにありましてよ

original: Yeah, all right. I'll take you as far as I can.
string: ああ、いいとも。超特急で連れてってやるさ

original: You've probably killed lots of vampires, huh? I'm sure Isran will sign you right up. Not sure he'll take me. I hope so.
string: 吸血鬼をいっぱい退治したんだね？ きっとイスランに取り立ててもらえるよ。俺もそうなるといいなあ

original: After so many centuries, I feared the Elder Scroll and my daughter were lost to me.
string: 何百年もの時が過ぎ、私は星霜の書と娘は二度と戻って来ないのではないかと恐れた

original: Don't worry about it.
string: 心配いらない

original: If you believe that, then you're a bigger fool than I originally suspected. Don't you think I weighed that option before I enacted my plans?
string: それを信じるなら、私が当初にらんだよりも上を行く愚か者ね。私が計画を実行する前にその選択肢を考えなかったと思う？

original: This latest attack proves it's the right time.
string: 最近起こった襲撃は、時が来た事を告げているに違いない

original: Let's move faster. The sun is... it's not great for my skin, if you know what I mean.
string: 急ぎましょう。太陽は… お肌の大敵ですのよ。分かっているとは思いますけれど

original: The steam! Quick, shut it off!
string: 蒸気だ！ 早く、止めて！

original: Oh, the moths don't literally read the scrolls... but they maintain a connection to ancient magic that allows the Moth Priests to decipher them.
string: 蚕が本当に書を読むわけじゃなくて… 蚕は古代魔法への架け橋となって、聖蚕の僧侶が書を解読するのを可能にするんだ

original: You know why I'm here. The Vigilants are under attack everywhere. The vampires are much more dangerous than we believed.
string: ここに来た理由は分かるだろう。番人達がそこら中で襲われている。吸血鬼らは我々が思っていたよりもはるかに危険な存在だ

original: Divines guide you.
string: 神々の導きがあらん事を

original: You realize that doesn't impress anyone here.
string: そんな事では誰も何とも思わないぞ

original: Your pathetic powers are no match for mine!
string: その程度の力で、勝てると思うな！

original: You're no match for me, fledgling.
string: お前みたいなひよっこ、敵じゃない

original: In case you haven't noticed, Isran is always concerned about something. That's what got us working together in the first place.
string: 気づいてるかも知れないけど、イスランは常に何かを気にかけてるの。私達が協力して働けるのは、それが理由よ

original: What I didn't know is someone had hired the Morag Tong to kill him as well.
string: 他の奴が、同じ高官を暗殺するためにモラグ・トングを雇ったとも知らずに

original: Your end has come!
string: ここで終わりだ！

original: So who are you? What do you want?
string: 君は誰だ？ 望みは何だ？

original: Auri-El, give me strength to smite my foe!
string: アーリエルよ、この敵を倒す力を私に！

original: I'll also assume Vyrthur didn't exactly give you the option to stay your hand.
string: それに、ヴィルスールの状態を見れば、倒す事をためらう余地などなかっただろう

original: I guess we'll have to keep looking for that Moth Priest, then.
string: となると聖蚕の僧侶を探し続けるしかないかもな

original: You mean... the earthquake?
string: 地震のこと？

original: Why did you call me "Qahnaarin?"
string: こちらを“クァーナーリン”と呼ぶ理由は？

original: I'm sorry I don't have more to offer.
string: あいにく品切れだよ

original: If you can manage that, the Dawnguard still may have use for you.
string: 君がその件に対処できたら、ドーンガードは君をまだ見捨てないかも知れない

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: The Chantry was constructed near the beginning of the First Era to provide a retreat for those that wished to become enlightened.
string: 悟りを開こうとする者達が集まる場所としてこの礼拝所が造られたのは、第一紀の始めの事だ

original: What was that?
string: 今のは何だ？

original: Do you still want to come with me?
string: まだ一緒に来る気はあるか？

original: Your name sounds familiar...
string: 名前に聞き覚えがある気が…

original: Understood.
string: 分かった

original: Arvak! Arvak, where are you? Arvak, please come back! Come back!
string: アルヴァク！ どこにいるんだ？ アルヴァク、頼むから戻ってきてくれ！

original: This stranger aligns herself with those that would hunt you down and slay you like an animal, yet I should entrust you to her?
string: このよそ者はあなたを追いつめて動物のように殺す者達と手を組んでいるのよ。それなのにあなたを預けるべきだと？

original: I'm okay with the dark, but I've spent more than my share of time in caves already.
string: 暗いのは平気ですけれど、洞窟にはもう飽き飽きしておりますのよ

original: I can hardly believe it. This is it. We've actually found the Forge! At last!
string: とても信じられない。これだよ。本当に鋳造器具を見つけたんだ！ ついに！

original: And among those, it seems, only when the heavens show the correct aspects.
string: さらにその者にあっても、天が正しき様相を見せている時のみに限られるが

original: Did you see where it went?
string: どこに行ったか見まして？

original: Life here has many advantages, don't you agree?
string: ここでの暮らしはいい事ずくめだよ。そうだろう？

original: Forgive my astonishment, but I never thought I'd witness the death of that dragon.
string: 驚いてごめんなさい、でもあのドラゴンの死を見るとは思いもしなかったの

original: You know more than I do now. Arkay has us both beaten, but he's not giving up all his secrets.
string: もう、教えられる事はない。アーケイはもっと知ってるが、秘密は明かさないだろう

original: Hold it. If you're going downstairs, you keep your weapons to yourself or we'll be getting better acquainted.
string: 待て、下に下りるなら武器をしまえ。さもないと仲良くする事になるぞ

original: Convince the Jarl of the threat and he'll let you destroy the creature. If not, then do your best not to get caught.
string: まずは吸血鬼の脅威を首長に知らせる事だ。そうすれば堂々と奴の首をとれる。それが無理なら、捕まらないよう最善を尽くせ

original: By the Divines, this couldn't get much worse. This is more than you and I can handle.
string: おお神々よ、こいつは最悪だ。私と君の手には負えないな

original: You disrespect our Lord by speaking to me instead of him.
string: 彼ではなく私に話しかけるのは、我らが主への冒とくよ

original: Even in the Soul Cairn, the defeat of the World Eater has reached my ears, Dovahkiin.
string: ソウル・ケルン内にいても、世界を喰らう者を打ち破った事は耳にしているぞ、ドヴァーキン

original: I know, and I'm sorry that happened. But now...
string: ああ、残念な事だった。だが今は…

original: Oh. I... I see.
string: ああ… そうですのね

original: Excellent. I trust she'll find her situation more accommodating, now that she is a member of the family.
string: 素晴らしい。彼女は今や家族の一員だから、肩の荷も少しはおりるだろう

original: Serana can make you one of us again.
string: セラーナがもう一度お前を我らの一員に変えてくれる

original: You're sweet. And... I'm not stupid. I can see what you're getting at.
string: お優しいですのね。でも… わたしは馬鹿ではありませんのよ。どういう事かは分かっておりますの

original: You've come this far, and you've found several Elder Scrolls.
string: 君はここまでたどり着いて、星霜の書をいくつか発見した

original: By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
string: 我々の素性については娘から聞いている事だろう

original: Very few people appreciate all the horrible things that can happen to you if you're not being cautious.
string: 注意が足りないせいで起こる不幸は、大抵の人にとって有難くないものよ

original: ...the clans think they're better than us... putting on airs... pah, they'll be the first to burn when the mortals get organized...
string: …一族の奴らは私達より優れているつもりでいるけど… はっ、思いあがりも甚だしいわ。定命の者どもが足並みを揃えたら、真っ先に焼き殺されるのは彼らでしょうね…

original: You're right. Let me think about it.
string: そうだな。もう少し考えてみる

original: We've been so terribly fortunate. I can't wait to see what's in these drawings.
string: 最高にツイてるわ。この図面に何が描かれてるのか、早く確認したい

original: Please, let's hurry. I need to get home so I can figure out what's happened.
string: 急ぎましょう。家に帰って、何が起きたのかを見極めなくては

original: Unnnhhhh...
string: ウウウン…

original: Most snow elves?
string: 主にスノーエルフが？

original: You risked everything to get Auri-El's Bow, and in turn, you've restored the Chantry.
string: すべてを投げ打ってアーリエルの弓を手に入れ、礼拝所を立て直してくれた

original: I have a new task for you, thrall.
string: 新たな使命を与える

original: Of course there are. Most of us spend our lives as nomads, traveling from place to place in our endless war against evil.
string: もちろんだ。我々の大半は流浪の暮らしを選び、悪との終わりなき戦いで各地を転々としている

original: (Growl)
string: ウゥーッ…

original: Unnff!
string: ウゥッ！

original: He wasn't always like that, though. There was... a turn. He stumbled onto this obscure prophecy and just kind of lost himself in it.
string: でも昔からそうではなかったのです。ある時、埋もれた予言を見つけて、没頭してしまってからですのよ

original: You talk about being lonely a lot.
string: 孤独を話題にすることが多い気がする

original: Let's keep looking around.
string: 周りをよく見て用心なさって

original: Never.
string: 断わる

original: But I'm warning you, do anything funny, and you'll regret it.
string: ただし、警告しておく。変な真似をしたら、後悔することになるぞ

original: You care nothing for Serana or our plight.
string: セラーナや私達の苦境はお構いなしなのね

original: And from the bottom of my heart, I thank you.
string: そして心の底から、感謝するわ

original: They what?
string: 奴らが何だって？

original: Rrrraaaaarrggghhhh!
string: らああああぐ！

original: I see. You're simply here to stop the Tyranny of the Sun, despite the cost to Serana. Nothing else matters.
string: なるほど。太陽の専制を阻止するためだけに来たのね。セラーナが犠牲になろうと。他の何も重要ではない

original: Go ahead, give it a try.
string: さあ、試してみて

original: Vigilants? Dawnguard? What are you talking about?
string: 番人だのドーンガードだの、意味がわからない

original: None of this feels right. We need to know more.
string: 話がどうもしっくりこない。もっと情報が必要だな

original: What's all this have to do with the Dawnguard?
string: ドーンガードにどう関係が？

original: What do Moth Priests do, exactly?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶の使命とは？

original: We have not finished speaking yet. Come back at once.
string: 話は終わっていない。今すぐ戻れ！

original: Yiiee!
string: イェエー！

original: ...still always hungry... there's no prey down in this hole... need to hunt more... all this hiding and skulking around, pah...
string: …相変わらずいつも腹が減ってる… この穴蔵には獲物がいない… もっと狩らなければ… こそこそ逃げ隠れするのはもううんざりだ…

original: The Hall of the Vigilants is in ruins, my brothers and sisters dead or scattered.
string: 番人の間は荒れ果て、仲間達は死んだり散り散りになったりしてしまった

original: More spiders? I liked the ones back home better.
string: またスパイダーですの？ 故郷ではそんなに苦手ではありませんでしたけど

original: Unless...
string: もしくは…

original: I understand you know how to change someone's appearance.
string: 人の外見を変える技を知っていると聞いた

original: Heavy armor. (25 husks)
string: 重装鎧(魂のハスク25個)

original: Yes, how may I serve you, milord?
string: 旦那様、ご用は何ですか？

original: And what happens when you've slain me? Is Valerica next? Is Serana?
string: 私を倒したらどうするのだ？ 次はヴァレリカか？ セラーナか？

original: Know anything about a Moth Priest visiting Dragon Bridge?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶がドラゴン・ブリッジに立ち寄ったとかいう話は？

original: I can certainly try.
string: やってみるわ

original: Were you always a vampire?
string: 元々吸血鬼だったのか？

original: No, sorry. It's 4,000 coins or no deal.
string: いいや、4000ゴールドじゃなけりゃ売るつもりはない

original: I know your friends would probably want to kill everything in here. I'm hoping you can show some more control than that.
string: あなたのお仲間はここの住人を皆殺しにしたがるのでしょうね。あなたにはもう少し話が通じると思いたいですわ

original: Any interest in ancient falmer tomes?
string: 古代のファルメルの書物に興味はあるか？

original: You were waiting... all this time for someone with my blood to come along.
string: 待っておりましたのね… ずっと、わたしの血を持つ誰かがやってくるのを

original: I'm afraid I won't be able to help you with the scrolls any longer, milord.
string: 旦那様、書の件に関してはもうお手伝いできそうにありません

original: I saw a drawing of this once. This shard... it's... it's part of a key. A key made of pure Aetherium! The key to the Forge!
string: これの絵を見た事があるよ。この破片は… 鍵の一部だよ。純粋なエセリウムからできた鍵！ 鋳造器具への鍵だ！

original: Now that my brother's dead, it's quite possible I'm the last of our kind.
string: 兄弟が死んだ今、種族の生き残りは私1人かも知れない

original: Good thing the boss heard that old farmer running his mouth off in the tavern about finding this place.
string: 親分が酒場で老いた農民からこの場所について聞き出せたのは幸運だった

original: You're mine, mortal!
string: お前は私のものだ！

original: I'm not going to die like this!
string: こんなふうに死ぬつもりはありませんのよ！

original: Yes, si... Isran.
string: 分かりました閣下… いえ… イスラン

original: You're a fool to have become mortal again. I want nothing to do with you.
string: 再び定命の者に戻るとは愚かな。あなたとかかわる気はない

original: I don't converse with my prey.
string: 獲物と話をする気はない

original: All right, let's see what you have.
string: さて、何がありますかしら

original: Run, coward! Run back to the filthy Dawnguard!
string: 逃げるがいい、臆病者め！ 汚らわしいドーンガードのところまで！

original: What you might not know is that for the most devoted and impressive followers, Molag Bal will give the gift anew, in its pure form.
string: ですが、モラグ・バルが忠誠心と能力の高い部下には、純粋な力を新たに与える事ができるのは、まだ知らないのではなくて？

original: I count the nobility of both the Empire and the Dominion among my clients.
string: 私は帝国と自治領両方の貴族を顧客としているの

original: It involves carefully removing the bark from a Canticle Tree which will in turn attract Ancestor Moths to you.
string: それにはカンティクルの木から樹皮を慎重にはがす作業が含まれる。そうする事によって聖蚕が集まってくるんだ

original: If you think I'll help you, you're mistaken.
string: 手を貸してもらえると思ってるならそれは間違いだ

original: It's time we take the fight to their door.
string: そろそろ連中に戦いを仕掛ける時だ

original: I may not have potions to block the sun, but I do have nearly everything else.
string: 太陽の光を遮る薬はないかも知れないけど、それ以外ならほとんど何でもそろってるよ

original: Why don't you come back with us?
string: 我々と一緒に戻ってはどうだ？

original: Here comes another one!
string: また来たぞ！

original: Go to Lord Harkon at once, beg him to turn you back. You're dead if you don't.
string: すぐにハルコン卿のもとへ行って、戻してもらうよう頼んできなさい。さもなければ死ぬわよ

original: Fought vampires wherever they found them. I aim to continue that mission.
string: どこであろうが、吸血鬼を発見すると彼らは戦いを挑んだ。私はその任務を遂行し続けたいんだよ

original: I guess this is it. Wish me luck.
string: いよいよみたいだ。幸運を祈ってくれ

original: Let me show you how mortal you still are, vampire.
string: 定命の名残を見せてもらうぞ

original: Have I heard anything? It was the talk of the city for three days straight.
string: 何か聞いてないかって？ 街はその話題で持ちきりだよ、もう3日もね

original: Any clues about the other Elder Scroll?
string: もう一つの星霜の書について何か手がかりは？

original: Well met, friend.
string: やあ友よ

original: I command you to travel to Castle Volkihar.
string: ヴォルキハル城に行け

original: I don't think they'll involve you.
string: 関与してもらう余地があるとは思えない

original: The potency of the Blood Chalice is beginning to wane. We must infuse it with more power if we are to keep it's fullest effects.
string: 血の聖杯の効果が薄れ始めている。効果を最大限にするには、もっと力の源を注がなければ

original: She wasn't, always. But I think you're right.
string: 昔は違いましたのよ。でもその通りかも知れませんわね

original: You never asked me if hiding me in that tomb was the best course of action, you just expected me to follow you blindly.
string: あのお墓にわたしを隠す事が最善の方法と、何一つ教えもしないで、ただ黙って言う通りにすればいいとでも思っていたのではなくて？

original: Why do you have an Elder Scroll?
string: 星霜の書を持っている理由は？

original: I would never allow that to happen.
string: そんなことはさせない

original: The dovah roamed the skies, vying for their small slices of territory that resulted in immense and ultimately fatal battles.
string: ドヴァーは大空を舞い、細切れとなった領土を奪い合って、やがてどちらかが命を落とすであろう決戦を繰り広げる事になった

original: Divines keep you safe, my friend.
string: 神々のご加護を、友よ

original: Farewell.
string: それでは

original: DLC1VQ07Attack
string: DLC1VQ07Attack

original: So, any luck? Was Tolan right about the vampires being interested in Dimhollow Crypt?
string: 偶然の一致か？ 吸血鬼がディムホロウ墓地に興味を持っているというトランの話は本当だったのか？

original: The moondial definitely wasn't like this the last time I saw it.
string: この月時計は絶対こんなふうではありませんでしたわ、わたくしが最後に見た時には

original: Pitiful sorcery. You'll not stay hidden long.
string: 下らん魔法だ。すぐに姿を現す事になる

original: I wonder what these souls do all day. They look... bored.
string: こういう魂は日がな一日、何をして過ごしているのかしら？ なんだか… 退屈そうですわね

original: You'd do well to watch that tongue, elf.
string: 口の利き方に気をつけるんだな、エルフめが

original: By the Divines... you're infected. What are you doing here?
string: 大変だわ… 感染してるじゃない。ここで何してるの？

original: I think we've talked about that enough. Come on, now.
string: それについては、十分話し合いましたわよね。さあ、行きましょう

original: Now it's my turn.
string: 今度はこっちの番だ

original: I'm sorry, I had heard there were vampire hunters here. I thought they might want to know about a vampire plot to enslave the rest of the world.
string: ここには吸血鬼ハンターがいると聞きましたので。吸血鬼達が世界を隷属させる計画を練っているとなれば、知りたがるかと思ったのです

original: Begone, foul creature!
string: 邪悪な種族め、消え去るがいい！

original: Since the Keepers weren't able to claim my soul, they had their minions construct a barrier that I'd never be able to breach.
string: 私の魂を手に入れられなかった番人は、手先に命じて私が決して破れない障壁を築いたの

original: Ugh, saying it out loud makes it sound so... common. "Little girl who doesn't get along with her father." Read that story a hundred times.
string: 言葉にするとあまりにもありがちですわね。「お父さんとぎくしゃくしている女の子」の話なら百回は読みましたわ

original: What about the scroll?
string: 星霜の書が何か？

original: There's my husband...
string: 夫がいる…

original: Of course. You're here for Auriel's Bow. Why else would you be here?
string: 分かっている。アーリエルの弓が目当てだとな。でなければ、こんな所まで来ないだろう

original: We'll stop these monsters. We have to; we're the only ones who can.
string: 奴らを止めてみせる。我々がやるしかない

original: No one ever escapes. There is no escape. Why would you even try?
string: 誰も逃げたりしないな。逃げ道なんかないからな。やるだけ無駄じゃないか？

original: Nice castle you've got here.
string: なかなか素敵な城だな

original: Arkay has some grave news, friend.
string: アーケイから悪い報せが届いたんだ

original: The Empire supported Elisif, but Ulfric now controls Skyrim.
string: 帝国はエリシフを支持していたが、現在はウルフリックがスカイリムを支配している

original: I don't trust things that try to kill me.
string: 殺そうとしてきた相手を信用しろと言われてもな

original: Watch your back.
string: 背後に気をつけろ

original: The boss said it's some sort of profaned spring. It looks like blood, but it's not the real thing.
string: ボスが言うには、不浄の泉のようなものだって。一見血に見えるけど、実は違うのよ

original: The power of my blood will purge that filth and make you whole again.
string: 私の血の力で汚れが浄化され、再び万全な状態に戻れるだろう

original: Good luck out there. Hopefully I'll see you again soon.
string: 幸運をお祈りしますわ。またお会いできますよう

original: I am above the petty squabbles here. I have lived for far too long to be bothered with them.
string: ささいないさかいは超越している。そんな事で頭を悩ますには、あまりに長く生きてきた

original: You try my patience, <Alias=QuestGiver>.
string: 我慢の限界を試されている気分だ、<Alias=QuestGiver>

original: Agh!
string: ああ！

original: You must be the face sculptor I've heard about.
string: 話に聞いた顔面改造医か

original: The prey is here!
string: 獲物はここだ！

original: I've only heard stories. Not sure if any of them are true.
string: 話を耳にしただけよ。本当かどうかは分からない

original: I was glad to find out not only the bad rumors were true.
string: 悪いうわさだけが真実ではないと分かってうれしかったわ

original: Is it normal for Moth Priests to go blind?
string: 聖蚕の僧侶が失明するのはよくあることなのか？

original: Arrrgh...
string: ああ…

original: I am well, sire.
string: 元気です

original: I knew I heard something!
string: 何か聞こえたぞ！

original: Revel in your new powers, but do not forget who gave them to you.
string: 新たな力を堪能するがいい。だが、誰にもらったものかを忘れるな

original: You should find no difficulty using the portal any longer.
string: もう転移門の使用に困難を感じる事はないはずよ

original: All right, here we go.
string: いいですわ、行きましょう

original: Right behind you.
string: 後ろですわ
